[03] 67^b^.^eb^ ``anuviccakaara.m kho, gahapati, karohi,  anuviccakaaro tumhaadisaana.m ^a^T2.0066^ea^ ~naatamanussaana.m saadhu hotii''ti.  ``iminaapaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyosomattaaya attamano abhiraddho ya.m  ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha -- `anuviccakaara.m kho, gahapati, karohi,  anuviccakaaro tumhaadisaana.m ~naatamanussaana.m saadhu hotii'ti. ma~nhi,  bhante, a~n~natitthiyaa saavaka.m labhitvaa kevalakappa.m naa.landa.m pa.taaka.m  parihareyyu.m -- `upaali amhaaka.m gahapati saavakatta.m upagato'ti. atha  ca pana ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha -- `anuviccakaara.m kho, gahapati, karohi,  anuviccakaaro tumhaadisaana.m ~naatamanussaana.m saadhu hotii'ti. esaaha.m,  bhante, dutiyampi bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca.  upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ ``diigharatta.m kho te, gahapati, niga.n.thaana.m  opaanabhuuta.m kula.m yena nesa.m upagataana.m pi.n.daka.m daatabba.m ma~n~neyyaasii''ti.  ``iminaapaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato bhiyyosomattaaya attamano ^a^V2.0049^ea^ abhiraddho  ya.m ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha -- `diigharatta.m kho te, gahapati, niga.n.thaana.m  opaanabhuuta.m kula.m yena nesa.m upagataana.m pi.n.daka.m daatabba.m ma~n~neyyaasii'ti.  suta.m meta.m, bhante, sama.no gotamo evamaaha -- `mayhameva daana.m  daatabba.m, naa~n~nesa.m daana.m daatabba.m; mayhameva saavakaana.m daana.m daatabba.m,  naa~n~nesa.m saavakaana.m daana.m daatabba.m; mayhameva dinna.m mahapphala.m, naa~n~nesa.m  dinna.m mahapphala.m; mayhameva saavakaana.m ^a^T2.0067^ea^ dinna.m mahapphala.m, naa~n~nesa.m saavakaana.m  dinna.m mahapphala'nti. atha ca pana ma.m bhagavaa niga.n.thesupi daane  samaadapeti. api ca, bhante, mayamettha kaala.m jaanissaama. esaaha.m,  bhante, tatiyampi bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca.  upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0043^ea^ kho bhagavaa upaalissa gahapatissa  anupubbi.m katha.m {aanupubbiikatha.m (sii0), aanupubbikatha.m (pii0), anupubbikatha.m  (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m,  kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi.  yadaa bhagavaa a~n~naasi upaali.m gahapati.m kallacitta.m ^a^P1.0380^ea^  muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m udaggacitta.m pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m  saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m,  magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m  pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva upaalissa gahapatissa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m  viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- `ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m  nirodhadhamma'nti. atha kho upaali gahapati di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo  viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho  vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``handa ca daani maya.m, bhante, gacchaama, bahukiccaa maya.m  bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassadaani tva.m, gahapati, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ atha kho upaali gahapati bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa ^a^T2.0068^ea^ u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa  padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena saka.m nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  dovaarika.m aamantesi -- ``ajjatagge, samma dovaarika, aavaraami  dvaara.m niga.n.thaana.m niga.n.thiina.m, anaava.ta.m dvaara.m bhagavato bhikkhuuna.m  bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m. sace koci niga.n.tho  aagacchati tamena.m tva.m eva.m vadeyyaasi -- `ti.t.tha, bhante, maa paavisi.  ajjatagge upaali gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa saavakatta.m upagato.  aava.ta.m dvaara.m niga.n.thaana.m niga.n.thiina.m, anaava.ta.m dvaara.m bhagavato bhikkhuuna.m  bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m ^a^V2.0050^ea^. sace te, bhante, pi.n.dakena  attho, ettheva ti.t.tha, ettheva te aaharissantii'''ti. ``eva.m,  bhante''ti kho dovaariko upaalissa gahapatissa paccassosi.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ assosi kho diighatapassii niga.n.tho --  ``upaali kira gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa saavakatta.m upagato''ti.  atha kho diighatapassii niga.n.tho yena niga.n.tho naa.taputto tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante,  upaali kira gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa saavakatta.m upagato''ti.  ``a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, tapassi ^a^M2.0044^ea^, anavakaaso ya.m upaali gahapati  sama.nassa gotamassa saavakatta.m upagaccheyya. .thaana~nca kho eta.m  vijjati ya.m sama.no gotamo upaalissa gahapatissa saavakatta.m  upagaccheyyaa''ti ^a^P1.0381^ea^. dutiyampi kho diighatapassii  niga.n.tho...pe0... tatiyampi kho diighatapassii niga.n.tho niga.n.tha.m  naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante ^a^T2.0069^ea^ ...pe0... upaalissa  gahapatissa saavakatta.m upagaccheyyaa''ti. ``handaaha.m, bhante, gacchaami  yaava jaanaami yadi vaa upaali gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa saavakatta.m  upagato yadi vaa no''ti. ``gaccha tva.m, tapassi, jaanaahi yadi  vaa upaali gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa saavakatta.m upagato yadi vaa  no''ti.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ atha kho diighatapassii niga.n.tho yena upaalissa  gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho dovaariko  diighatapassi.m niga.n.tha.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana diighatapassi.m  niga.n.tha.m etadavoca -- ``ti.t.tha, bhante, maa paavisi. ajjatagge  upaali gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa saavakatta.m upagato. aava.ta.m dvaara.m  niga.n.thaana.m niga.n.thiina.m, anaava.ta.m dvaara.m bhagavato bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m  upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m ^a^T2.0070^ea^. sace te, bhante, pi.n.dakena attho, ettheva  ti.t.tha, ettheva te aaharissantii''ti. ``na me, aavuso, pi.n.dakena  attho''ti vatvaa tato pa.tinivattitvaa yena niga.n.tho naa.taputto  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca --  ``sacca.myeva kho, bhante, ya.m upaali gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa  saavakatta.m upagato. eta.m kho te aha.m, bhante, naalattha.m na kho me,  bhante, ruccati ya.m upaali gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa vaada.m aaropeyya.  sama.no hi, bhante, gotamo maayaavii aava.t.tani.m maaya.m jaanaati yaaya  a~n~natitthiyaana.m saavake aava.t.tetiiti. aava.t.to kho te, bhante, upaali  gahapati sama.nena gotamena aava.t.taniyaa maayaayaa''ti. ``a.t.thaana.m kho  eta.m, tapassi, anavakaaso ^a^V2.0051^ea^ ya.m upaali gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa  saavakatta.m upagaccheyya. .thaana~nca kho eta.m vijjati ya.m sama.no gotamo  upaalissa gahapatissa saavakatta.m upagaccheyyaa''ti. dutiyampi kho  diighatapassii niga.n.tho niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``sacca.myeva,  bhante...pe0... ^a^T2.0071^ea^ upaalissa gahapatissa saavakatta.m upagaccheyyaa''ti.  tatiyampi kho diighatapassii niga.n.tho niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca --  ``sacca.myeva kho, bhante...pe0... ^a^P1.0382^ea^ upaalissa gahapatissa  saavakatta.m upagaccheyyaa''ti. ``handa caaha.m ^a^M2.0045^ea^, tapassi, gacchaami yaava  caaha.m saama.myeva jaanaami yadi vaa upaali gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa  saavakatta.m upagato yadi vaa no''ti.

[03] atha kho niga.n.tho naa.taputto mahatiyaa niga.n.thaparisaaya saddhi.m  yena upaalissa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho  dovaariko niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana niga.n.tha.m  naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``ti.t.tha, bhante, maa paavisi. ajjatagge  upaali gahapati sama.nassa gotamassa saavakatta.m upagato. aava.ta.m dvaara.m  niga.n.thaana.m niga.n.thiina.m, anaava.ta.m dvaara.m bhagavato bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m  upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m. sace te, bhante, pi.n.dakena attho, ettheva  ti.t.tha, ettheva te aaharissantii''ti. ``tena hi, samma dovaarika,  yena upaali gahapati tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa upaali.m gahapati.m eva.m  vadehi -- `niga.n.tho, bhante, naa.taputto mahatiyaa niga.n.thaparisaaya  saddhi.m bahidvaarako.t.thake .thito; so te dassanakaamo'''ti. ``eva.m,  bhante''ti kho dovaariko niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa pa.tissutvaa yena  upaali gahapati tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa upaali.m gahapati.m etadavoca  -- ``niga.n.tho, bhante, naa.taputto mahatiyaa niga.n.thaparisaaya saddhi.m ^a^T2.0072^ea^  bahidvaarako.t.thake .thito; so te dassanakaamo''ti. ``tena hi, samma  dovaarika, majjhimaaya dvaarasaalaaya aasanaani pa~n~napehii''ti.  ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho dovaariko upaalissa gahapatissa pa.tissutvaa  majjhimaaya dvaarasaalaaya aasanaani pa~n~napetvaa yena upaali gahapati  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa upaali.m gahapati.m etadavoca --  ``pa~n~nattaani kho, bhante, majjhimaaya dvaarasaalaaya aasanaani.  yassadaani kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ atha kho upaali gahapati yena majjhimaa  ^a^P1.0383^ea^ dvaarasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ya.m tattha  aasana.m agga~nca se.t.tha~nca uttama~nca pa.niita~nca tattha saama.m nisiiditvaa  dovaarika.m aamantesi ^a^V2.0052^ea^ -- ``tena hi, samma dovaarika, yena niga.n.tho  naa.taputto tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m eva.m vadehi --  `upaali, bhante, gahapati evamaaha -- pavisa kira, bhante, sace  aaka"nkhasii'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho dovaariko upaalissa  gahapatissa pa.tissutvaa yena niga.n.tho naa.taputto tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``upaali, bhante,  gahapati evamaaha -- `pavisa kira, bhante, sace aaka"nkhasii'''ti.  atha ^a^M2.0046^ea^ kho niga.n.tho naa.taputto mahatiyaa niga.n.thaparisaaya saddhi.m yena  majjhimaa dvaarasaalaa tenupasa"nkami. atha kho upaali gahapati -- ya.m  suda.m pubbe yato passati niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m disvaana  tato paccuggantvaa ya.m tattha aasana.m agga~nca se.t.tha~nca uttama~nca pa.niita~nca  ta.m uttaraasa"ngena ^a^T2.0073^ea^ sammajjitvaa {pamajjitvaa (sii0 pii0)} pariggahetvaa nisiidaapeti so -- daani  ya.m tattha aasana.m agga~nca se.t.tha~nca uttama~nca pa.niita~nca tattha saama.m  nisiiditvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``sa.mvijjanti kho,  bhante, aasanaani; sace aaka"nkhasi, nisiidaa''ti. eva.m vutte,  niga.n.tho naa.taputto upaali.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``ummattosi tva.m,  gahapati, dattosi tva.m, gahapati! `gacchaamaha.m, bhante, sama.nassa  gotamassa vaada.m aaropessaamii'ti gantvaa mahataasi vaadasa"nghaa.tena  pa.timukko aagato. seyyathaapi, gahapati, puriso a.n.dahaarako gantvaa  ubbhatehi a.n.dehi aagaccheyya, seyyathaa vaa pana gahapati puriso  akkhikahaarako gantvaa ubbhatehi akkhiihi aagaccheyya; evameva kho  tva.m, gahapati, `gacchaamaha.m, bhante, sama.nassa gotamassa vaada.m  aaropessaamii'ti gantvaa mahataasi vaadasa"nghaa.tena pa.timukko aagato.  aava.t.tosi kho tva.m, gahapati, sama.nena gotamena aava.t.taniyaa  maayaayaa''ti.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ ``bhaddikaa, bhante, aava.t.tanii maayaa; kalyaa.nii,  bhante, aava.t.tanii maayaa; piyaa me, bhante, ~naatisaalohitaa imaaya  aava.t.taniyaa aava.t.teyyu.m; piyaanampi me assa ~naatisaalohitaana.m diigharatta.m  hitaaya sukhaaya; sabbe cepi, bhante, khattiyaa imaaya aava.t.taniyaa  aava.t.teyyu.m; sabbesaanampissa khattiyaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya ^a^P1.0384^ea^  sukhaaya; sabbe cepi, bhante, braahma.naa...pe0... vessaa...pe0...  suddaa imaaya aava.t.taniyaa aava.t.teyyu.m; sabbesaanampissa suddaana.m ^a^T2.0074^ea^ diigharatta.m  hitaaya sukhaaya; sadevako cepi, bhante, loko samaarako sabrahmako  sassama.nabraahma.nii pajaa sadevamanussaa imaaya aava.t.taniyaa aava.t.teyyu.m;  sadevakassapissa lokassa samaarakassa sabrahmakassa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa ^a^V2.0053^ea^   pajaaya sadevamanussaaya diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaati. tena hi, bhante,  upama.m te karissaami. upamaaya pidhekacce vi~n~nuu purisaa bhaasitassa  attha.m aajaananti.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^M2.0047^ea^, bhante, a~n~natarassa braahma.nassa  ji.n.nassa vu.d.dhassa mahallakassa daharaa maa.navikaa pajaapatii ahosi  gabbhinii upavija~n~naa. atha kho, bhante, saa maa.navikaa ta.m braahma.na.m  etadavoca -- `gaccha tva.m, braahma.na, aapa.naa makka.tacchaapaka.m ki.nitvaa  aanehi, yo me kumaarakassa kii.laapanako bhavissatii'ti. eva.m vutte,  so braahma.no ta.m maa.navika.m etadavoca -- `aagamehi taava, bhoti, yaava  vijaayati. sace tva.m, bhoti, kumaaraka.m vijaayissasi, tassaa te  aha.m aapa.naa makka.tacchaapaka.m ki.nitvaa aanessaami, yo te kumaarakassa  kii.laapanako bhavissati. sace pana tva.m, bhoti, kumaarika.m  vijaayissasi, tassaa te aha.m aapa.naa makka.tacchaapika.m ki.nitvaa  aanessaami, yaa te kumaarikaaya kii.laapanikaa bhavissatii'ti.  dutiyampi kho, bhante, saa maa.navikaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0075^ea^ tatiyampi kho, bhante,  saa maa.navikaa ta.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- `gaccha tva.m, braahma.na, aapa.naa  makka.tacchaapaka.m ki.nitvaa aanehi, yo me kumaarakassa kii.laapanako  bhavissatii'ti. atha kho, bhante, so braahma.no tassaa maa.navikaaya  saaratto pa.tibaddhacitto aapa.naa makka.tacchaapaka.m ki.nitvaa aanetvaa ta.m  maa.navika.m etadavoca -- `aya.m te, bhoti, aapa.naa makka.tacchaapako  ^a^P1.0385^ea^ ki.nitvaa aaniito, yo te kumaarakassa  kii.laapanako bhavissatii'ti. eva.m vutte, bhante, saa maa.navikaa ta.m  braahma.na.m etadavoca -- `gaccha tva.m, braahma.na, ima.m makka.tacchaapaka.m aadaaya  yena rattapaa.ni rajataputto tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa rattapaa.ni.m  rajakaputta.m eva.m vadehi -- icchaamaha.m, samma rattapaa.ni, ima.m  makka.tacchaapaka.m piitaavalepana.m naama ra"ngajaata.m rajita.m aako.titapaccaako.tita.m  ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha'nti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhante, so braahma.no tassaa maa.navikaaya saaratto  pa.tibaddhacitto ta.m makka.tacchaapaka.m aadaaya yena rattapaa.ni ^a^T2.0076^ea^ rajakaputto  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa rattapaa.ni.m rajakaputta.m etadavoca --  `icchaamaha.m, samma rattapaa.ni, ima.m makka.tacchaapaka.m piitaavalepana.m naama  ra"ngajaata.m rajita.m aako.titapaccaako.tita.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha'nti. eva.m  vutte, bhante, rattapaa.ni rajakaputto ta.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- `aya.m kho  te, makka.tacchaapako ra"ngakkhamo hi kho, no aako.tanakkhamo ^a^V2.0054^ea^, no  vimajjanakkhamo'ti. evameva kho, bhante, baalaana.m niga.n.thaana.m vaado  ra"ngakkhamo ^a^M2.0048^ea^ hi kho baalaana.m no pa.n.ditaana.m, no anuyogakkhamo, no  vimajjanakkhamo. atha kho, bhante, so braahma.no aparena samayena  nava.m dussayuga.m aadaaya yena rattapaa.ni rajakaputto tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa rattapaa.ni.m rajakaputta.m etadavoca -- `icchaamaha.m, samma  rattapaa.ni, ima.m nava.m dussayuga.m piitaavalepana.m naama ra"ngajaata.m rajita.m  aako.titapaccaako.tita.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha'nti. eva.m vutte, bhante,  rattapaa.ni rajakaputto ta.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- `ida.m kho te, bhante,  nava.m dussayuga.m ra"ngakkhama~nceva aako.tanakkhama~nca vimajjanakkhama~ncaa'ti.  evameva kho, bhante, tassa bhagavato vaado arahato sammaasambuddhassa  ra"ngakkhamo ceva pa.n.ditaana.m no baalaana.m, anuyogakkhamo ca  vimajjanakkhamo caa''ti.

[03] ``saraajikaa kho, gahapati, parisaa eva.m jaanaati -- `upaali  gahapati niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa saavako'ti. kassa ta.m, gahapati,  saavaka.m dhaaremaa''ti? eva.m ^a^T2.0077^ea^ vutte, upaali gahapati u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m  uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m ^a^P1.0386^ea^  pa.naametvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca -- ``tena hi, bhante, su.nohi  yassaaha.m saavako''ti --
[21] ``dhiirassa vigatamohassa, pabhinnakhiilassa  vijitavijayassa.
[27] aniighassa susamacittassa, vuddhasiilassa saadhupa~n~nassa.
[22] vesamantarassa {vessantarassa (sii0 pii0)} vimalassa, bhagavato tassa saavakohamasmi..
[21] ``akatha.mkathissa tusitassa, vantalokaamisassa  muditassa.
[27] katasama.nassa manujassa, antimasaariirassa narassa.
[22] anopamassa virajassa, bhagavato tassa saavakohamasmi..
[21] ``asa.msayassa kusalassa, venayikassa saarathivarassa.
[27] anuttarassa ruciradhammassa, nikka"nkhassa pabhaasakassa {pabhaasakarassa (sii0  syaa0 pii0)}.
[22] maanacchidassa viirassa, bhagavato tassa saavakohamasmi..
[21] ``nisabhassa ^a^V2.0055^ea^ appameyyassa, gambhiirassa monapattassa.
[27] khema"nkarassa vedassa, dhamma.t.thassa sa.mvutattassa.
[22] sa"ngaatigassa muttassa, bhagavato tassa saavakohamasmi..
[21] ``naagassa ^a^M2.0049^ea^ pantasenassa, khii.nasa.myojanassa muttassa.
[27] pa.timantakassa {pa.timantassa (ka0)} dhonassa, pannadhajassa viitaraagassa.
[22] dantassa nippapa~ncassa, bhagavato tassa saavakohamasmi..
[21] ``isisattamassa akuhassa, tevijjassa brahmapattassa.
[27] nhaatakassa {nahaatakassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} padakassa, passaddhassa viditavedassa.
[22] purindadassa sakkassa, bhagavato tassa saavakohamasmi..
[21] ``ariyassa bhaavitattassa, pattipattassa veyyaakara.nassa.
[27] satimato vipassissa, anabhinatassa no apanatassa.
[22] anejassa vasippattassa, bhagavato tassa saavakohamasmi ^a^T2.0078^ea^..
[21] ``samuggatassa {sammaggatassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} jhaayissa, ananugatantarassa suddhassa.
[27] asitassa hitassa {appahiinassa (sii0 pii0), appabhiitassa (syaa0)}, pavivittassa aggappattassa.
[22] ti.n.nassa taarayantassa, bhagavato tassa saavakohamasmi..
[21] ``santassa bhuuripa~n~nassa, mahaapa~n~nassa viitalobhassa.
[27] tathaagatassa sugatassa, appa.tipuggalassa asamassa.
[22] visaaradassa nipu.nassa, bhagavato tassa saavakohamasmi..
[21] ``ta.nhacchidassa buddhassa, viitadhuumassa anupalittassa.
[27] aahuneyyassa yakkhassa, uttamapuggalassa atulassa.
[22] mahato yasaggapattassa, bhagavato tassa saavakohamasmii''ti..

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ ``kadaa ^a^V2.0056^ea^ sa~n~nuu.lhaa pana te, gahapati, ime  sama.nassa gotamassa va.n.naa''ti? ``seyyathaapi, bhante, naanaapupphaana.m  mahaapuppharaasi ^a^P1.0387^ea^, tamena.m dakkho maalaakaaro vaa  maalaakaarantevaasii vaa vicitta.m maala.m gantheyya; evameva kho, bhante, so  bhagavaa anekava.n.no anekasatava.n.no. ko hi, bhante, va.n.naarahassa  va.n.na.m na karissatii''ti? atha kho niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa bhagavato  sakkaara.m asahamaanassa tattheva u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato uggacchiiti {ugga~nchi (sii0  syaa0 pii0)}.
[06] upaalisutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0079^ea^ ^a^M2.0050^ea^ ^a^V2.0057^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa koliyesu  viharati haliddavasana.m naama koliyaana.m nigamo. atha kho pu.n.no ca  koliyaputto govatiko acelo ca seniyo kukkuravatiko yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa pu.n.no koliyaputto govatiko bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. acelo pana seniyo kukkuravatiko  bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa  kukkurova palikujjitvaa {paliku.n.thitvaa (syaa0 ka.m0), paligu.n.thitvaa (ka0)} ekamanta.m   nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho  pu.n.no koliyaputto govatiko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m ^a^T2.0080^ea^, bhante,  acelo seniyo kukkuravatiko dukkarakaarako chamaanikkhitta.m bhojana.m  bhu~njati. tassa ta.m kukkuravata.m diigharatta.m samatta.m samaadinna.m. tassa kaa  gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti? ``ala.m, pu.n.na, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m  pucchii''ti. dutiyampi kho pu.n.no koliyaputto govatiko...pe0...  tatiyampi kho pu.n.no koliyaputto govatiko bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``aya.m, bhante, acelo seniyo kukkuravatiko dukkarakaarako  chamaanikkhitta.m bhojana.m bhu~njati. tassa ta.m kukkuravata.m diigharatta.m samatta.m  samaadinna.m. tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti?

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ ``addhaa kho te aha.m, pu.n.na, na labhaami.  ala.m, pu.n.na, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m pucchiiti; api ca tyaaha.m  byaakarissaami. idha, pu.n.na, ekacco kukkuravata.m bhaaveti paripu.n.na.m  abboki.n.na.m, kukkurasiila.m bhaaveti paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m, kukkuracitta.m  bhaaveti paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m ^a^P1.0388^ea^, kukkuraakappa.m bhaaveti  paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m. so kukkuravata.m bhaavetvaa paripu.n.na.m  abboki.n.na.m, kukkurasiila.m bhaavetvaa paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m, kukkuracitta.m  bhaavetvaa paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m, kukkuraakappa.m bhaavetvaa paripu.n.na.m  abboki.n.na.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa kukkuraana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati.  sace kho panassa eva.mdi.t.thi hoti -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa  tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti,  saassa {saaya.m (ka0)} hoti micchaadi.t.thi. micchaadi.t.thissa {micchaadi.t.thikassa  (sii0)} kho aha.m, pu.n.na, dvinna.m  gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m vadaami ^a^V2.0058^ea^ -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa.  iti kho, pu.n.na, sampajjamaana.m ^a^M2.0051^ea^ kukkuravata.m kukkuraana.m sahabyata.m upaneti,  vipajjamaana.m niraya''nti. eva.m vutte, acelo seniyo kukkuravatiko  parodi, assuuni pavattesi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa pu.n.na.m koliyaputta.m govatika.m etadavoca --  ``eta.m ^a^T2.0081^ea^ kho te aha.m, pu.n.na, naalattha.m. ala.m, pu.n.na, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m  eta.m pucchii''ti. ``naaha.m, bhante, eta.m rodaami ya.m ma.m bhagavaa  evamaaha; api ca me ida.m, bhante, kukkuravata.m diigharatta.m samatta.m samaadinna.m.  aya.m, bhante, pu.n.no koliyaputto govatiko. tassa ta.m govata.m  diigharatta.m samatta.m samaadinna.m. tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti?  ``ala.m, seniya, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m pucchii''ti. dutiyampi  kho acelo seniyo...pe0... tatiyampi kho acelo seniyo  kukkuravatiko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, pu.n.no  koliyaputto govatiko. tassa ta.m govata.m diigharatta.m samatta.m samaadinna.m.  tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti?

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ ``addhaa kho te aha.m, seniya, na labhaami.  ala.m, seniya, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m pucchiiti; api ca tyaaha.m  byaakarissaami. idha, seniya, ekacco govata.m bhaaveti paripu.n.na.m  abboki.n.na.m, gosiila.m bhaaveti paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m, gocitta.m bhaaveti  paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m, gavaakappa.m {gvaakappa.m (ka0)} bhaaveti paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m. so  govata.m bhaavetvaa paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m, gosiila.m bhaavetvaa paripu.n.na.m  abboki.n.na.m, gocitta.m bhaavetvaa paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m, gavaakappa.m  bhaavetvaa paripu.n.na.m abboki.n.na.m kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa gunna.m  sahabyata.m upapajjati. sace kho ^a^P1.0389^ea^ panassa eva.mdi.t.thi  hoti -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa  devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti ^a^T2.0082^ea^, saassa hoti micchaadi.t.thi.  micchaadi.t.thissa kho aha.m, seniya, dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m vadaami  -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa. iti kho, seniya, sampajjamaana.m  govata.m gunna.m sahabyata.m upaneti, vipajjamaana.m niraya''nti. eva.m vutte,  pu.n.no koliyaputto govatiko parodi, assuuni pavattesi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa acela.m seniya.m kukkuravatika.m etadavoca --  ``eta.m kho te aha.m, seniya ^a^V2.0059^ea^, naalattha.m. ala.m, seniya, ti.t.thateta.m; maa  ma.m ^a^M2.0052^ea^ eta.m pucchii''ti. ``naaha.m, bhante, eta.m rodaami ya.m ma.m bhagavaa  evamaaha; api ca me ida.m, bhante, govata.m diigharatta.m samatta.m samaadinna.m.  eva.m pasanno aha.m, bhante, bhagavati; pahoti bhagavaa tathaa dhamma.m desetu.m  yathaa aha.m cevima.m govata.m pajaheyya.m, aya~nceva acelo seniyo  kukkuravatiko ta.m kukkuravata.m pajaheyyaa''ti. ``tena hi, pu.n.na,  su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m,  bhante''ti kho pu.n.no koliyaputto govatiko bhagavato paccassosi.  bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, pu.n.na, kammaani mayaa saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa paveditaani. katamaani cattaari? atthi,  pu.n.na, kamma.m ka.nha.m ka.nhavipaaka.m; atthi, pu.n.na, kamma.m sukka.m  sukkavipaaka.m; atthi, pu.n.na, kamma.m ka.nhasukka.m ka.nhasukkavipaaka.m; atthi,  pu.n.na, kamma.m aka.nha.m asukka.m aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m, kammakkhayaaya  sa.mvattati ^a^T2.0083^ea^.

[03] ``katama~nca, pu.n.na, kamma.m ka.nha.m ka.nhavipaaka.m? idha, pu.n.na,  ekacco sabyaabajjha.m {sabyaapajjha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} kaayasa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti, sabyaabajjha.m  vaciisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti, sabyaabajjha.m manosa"nkhaara.m  abhisa"nkharoti. so sabyaabajjha.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa,  sabyaabajjha.m vaciisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa, sabyaabajjha.m manosa"nkhaara.m  abhisa"nkharitvaa, sabyaabajjha.m loka.m upapajjati. tamena.m sabyaabajjha.m  loka.m upapanna.m samaana.m sabyaabajjhaa phassaa phusanti. so  sabyaabajjhehi phassehi phu.t.tho samaano sabyaabajjha.m vedana.m vedeti  ekantadukkha.m, seyyathaapi sattaa nerayikaa ^a^P1.0390^ea^. iti  kho, pu.n.na, bhuutaa bhuutassa upapatti hoti; ya.m karoti tena upapajjati,  upapannamena.m phassaa phusanti. eva.mpaaha.m, pu.n.na, `kammadaayaadaa sattaa'ti  vadaami. ida.m vuccati, pu.n.na, kamma.m ka.nha.m ka.nhavipaaka.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, pu.n.na, kamma.m sukka.m sukkavipaaka.m? idha, pu.n.na,  ekacco abyaabajjha.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti, abyaabajjha.m  vaciisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharoti, abyaabajjha.m manosa"nkhaara.m  abhisa"nkharoti. so abyaabajjha.m kaayasa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa,  abyaabajjha.m vaciisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkharitvaa, abyaabajjha.m manosa"nkhaara.m  abhisa"nkharitvaa abyaabajjha.m loka.m upapajjati. tamena.m abyaabajjha.m  loka.m upapanna.m ^a^M2.0053^ea^ samaana.m abyaabajjhaa phassaa phusanti. so  abyaabajjhehi phassehi phu.t.tho ^a^V2.0060^ea^ samaano abyaabajjha.m vedana.m vedeti  ekantasukha.m, seyyathaapi devaa subhaki.nhaa. iti kho ^a^T2.0084^ea^, pu.n.na, bhuutaa  bhuutassa upapatti hoti; ya.m karoti tena upapajjati, upapannamena.m phassaa  phusanti. eva.mpaaha.m, pu.n.na, `kammadaayaadaa sattaa'ti vadaami. ida.m  vuccati, pu.n.na, kamma.m sukka.m sukkavipaaka.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, pu.n.na, kamma.m ka.nhasukka.m ka.nhasukkavipaaka.m? idha,  pu.n.na, ekacco sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi kaayasa"nkhaara.m  abhisa"nkharoti, sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi vaciisa"nkhaara.m  abhisa"nkharoti, sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi manosa"nkhaara.m  abhisa"nkharoti. so sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi kaayasa"nkhaara.m  abhisa"nkharitvaa, sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi vaciisa"nkhaara.m  abhi"nkharitvaa, sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi manosa"nkhaara.m  abhisa"nkharitvaa sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi loka.m upapajjati.  tamena.m sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi loka.m upapanna.m samaana.m  sabyaabajjhaapi abyaabajjhaapi phassaa phusanti. so sabyaabajjhehipi  abyaabajjhehipi phassehi phu.t.tho samaano sabyaabajjhampi abyaabajjhampi  vedana.m vedeti voki.n.nasukhadukkha.m, seyyathaapi manussaa ekacce ca devaa  ekacce ca vinipaatikaa. iti kho, pu.n.na, bhuutaa bhuutassa upapatti  hoti; ya.m karoti tena upapajjati. upapannamena.m phassaa phusanti.  eva.mpaaha.m, pu.n.na, `kammadaayaadaa sattaa'ti vadaami. ida.m vuccati,  pu.n.na, kamma.m ka.nhasukka.m ka.nhasukkavipaaka.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^P1.0391^ea^, pu.n.na, kamma.m aka.nha.m asukka.m  aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m, kammakkhayaaya sa.mvattati? tatra, pu.n.na, yamida.m ^a^T2.0085^ea^  kamma.m ka.nha.m ka.nhavipaaka.m tassa pahaanaaya yaa cetanaa, yamida.m {yampida.m (sii0  pii0)} kamma.m  sukka.m sukkavipaaka.m tassa pahaanaaya yaa cetanaa, yamida.m {yampida.m (sii0 pii0)} kamma.m ka.nhasukka.m  ka.nhasukkavipaaka.m tassa pahaanaaya yaa cetanaa -- ida.m vuccati, pu.n.na,  kamma.m aka.nha.m asukka.m aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m, kammakkhayaaya sa.mvattatiiti.  imaani kho, pu.n.na, cattaari kammaani mayaa saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa paveditaanii''ti.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, pu.n.no koliyaputto govatiko  bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante!  seyyathaapi, bhante...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m ^a^V2.0061^ea^   sara.na.m gata''nti. acelo ^a^M2.0054^ea^ pana seniyo kukkuravatiko bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi,  bhante...pe0... pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami  dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike  pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. ``yo kho, seniya ^a^T2.0086^ea^,  a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhati pabbajja.m,  aaka"nkhati upasampada.m so cattaaro maase parivasati. catunna.m maasaana.m  accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajenti, upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya.  api ca mettha puggalavemattataa viditaa''ti.

[03] ``sace, bhante, a~n~natitthiyapubbaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye  aaka"nkhantaa pabbajja.m aaka"nkhantaa upasampada.m te cattaaro maase  parivasanti catunna.m maasaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajenti  upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya, aha.m cattaari vassaani parivasissaami.  catunna.m vassaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajentu, upasampaadentu  bhikkhubhaavaayaa''ti. alattha kho acelo seniyo kukkuravatiko  bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno kho  panaayasmaa seniyo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto ^a^P1.0392^ea^  aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa  sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m --  brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m  kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro kho  panaayasmaa seniyo arahata.m ahosiiti.
[06] kukkuravatikasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0087^ea^ ^a^V2.0062^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe  viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho abhayo raajakumaaro  yena niga.n.tho naa.taputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho abhaya.m  raajakumaara.m niga.n.tho naa.taputto etadavoca -- ``ehi tva.m, raajakumaara,  sama.nassa gotamassa vaada.m ^a^M2.0055^ea^ aaropehi. eva.m te kalyaa.no kittisaddo  abbhuggacchissati -- `abhayena raajakumaarena sama.nassa gotamassa eva.m  mahiddhikassa eva.m mahaanubhaavassa vaado aaropito'''ti. ``yathaa  katha.m panaaha.m, bhante, sama.nassa gotamassa eva.m mahiddhikassa eva.m  mahaanubhaavassa vaada.m aaropessaamii''ti? ``ehi tva.m, raajakumaara,  yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa sama.na.m gotama.m eva.m  vadehi -- `bhaaseyya nu kho, bhante, tathaagato ta.m vaaca.m yaa saa vaacaa  paresa.m appiyaa amanaapaa'ti? sace te sama.no gotamo eva.m pu.t.tho eva.m  byaakaroti -- `bhaaseyya, raajakumaara, tathaagato ta.m vaaca.m yaa saa  vaacaa paresa.m appiyaa amanaapaa'ti, tamena.m tva.m eva.m vadeyyaasi --  `atha ki~ncarahi te, bhante, puthujjanena naanaakara.na.m? puthujjanopi hi  ta.m vaaca.m bhaaseyya yaa saa vaacaa paresa.m appiyaa amanaapaa'ti. sace ^a^T2.0088^ea^  pana te sama.no gotamo eva.m pu.t.tho eva.m byaakaroti -- `na,  raajakumaara, tathaagato ta.m vaaca.m bhaaseyya yaa saa vaacaa paresa.m ^a^P1.0393^ea^  appiyaa amanaapaa'ti, tamena.m tva.m eva.m vadeyyaasi -- `atha  ki~ncarahi te, bhante, devadatto byaakato -- ``aapaayiko devadatto,  nerayiko devadatto, kappa.t.tho devadatto, atekiccho devadatto''ti? taaya  ca pana te vaacaaya devadatto kupito ahosi anattamano'ti. ima.m  kho te, raajakumaara, sama.no gotamo ubhatoko.tika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho samaano  neva sakkhiti uggilitu.m na sakkhiti ogilitu.m. seyyathaapi naama  purisassa ayosi"nghaa.taka.m ka.n.the vilagga.m, so neva sakku.neyya  uggilitu.m na sakku.neyya ogilitu.m; evameva kho te, raajakumaara,  sama.no gotamo ima.m ubhatoko.tika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho samaano neva sakkhiti  uggilitu.m na sakkhiti ogilitu''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho  abhayo raajakumaaro niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa  niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m ^a^V2.0063^ea^ nisinnassa kho abhayassa  raajakumaarassa suuriya.m {suriya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ulloketvaa etadahosi -- ``akaalo   kho ajja  bhagavato vaada.m aaropetu.m ^a^M2.0056^ea^. sve daanaaha.m sake nivesane bhagavato vaada.m  aaropessaamii''ti bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante,  bhagavaa svaatanaaya attacatuttho bhatta''nti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa  tu.nhiibhaavena. atha ^a^T2.0089^ea^ kho abhayo raajakumaaro bhagavato adhivaasana.m  viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.  atha kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa  pattaciivaramaadaaya yena abhayassa raajakumaarassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho abhayo  raajakumaaro bhagavanta.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa  santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho abhayo raajakumaaro bhagavanta.m  bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho abhayo raajakumaaro  bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhaaseyya nu kho, bhante, tathaagato ta.m vaaca.m  yaa saa vaacaa paresa.m appiyaa amanaapaa''ti? ``na khvettha,  raajakumaara, eka.msenaa''ti. ``ettha, bhante, anassu.m niga.n.thaa''ti.  ``ki.m pana tva.m, raajakumaara, eva.m vadesi -- `ettha ^a^P1.0394^ea^,  bhante, anassu.m niga.n.thaa'''ti? ``idhaaha.m, bhante, yena  niga.n.tho naa.taputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.m. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ma.m, bhante,  niga.n.tho naa.taputto etadavoca -- `ehi tva.m, raajakumaara, sama.nassa  gotamassa vaada.m aaropehi. eva.m te kalyaa.no kittisaddo  abbhuggacchissati -- abhayena raajakumaarena sama.nassa gotamassa eva.m  mahiddhikassa eva.m mahaanubhaavassa vaado aaropito'ti. eva.m vutte,  aha.m, bhante, niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etadavoca.m -- `yathaa katha.m panaaha.m ^a^T2.0090^ea^, bhante,  sama.nassa gotamassa eva.m mahiddhikassa eva.m mahaanubhaavassa vaada.m  aaropessaamii'ti? `ehi tva.m, raajakumaara, yena sama.no gotamo  tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa sama.na.m gotama.m eva.m vadehi -- bhaaseyya nu  kho, bhante, tathaagato ta.m vaaca.m yaa saa vaacaa paresa.m appiyaa  amanaapaati? sace te sama.no gotamo eva.m pu.t.tho eva.m byaakaroti --  bhaaseyya, raajakumaara, tathaagato ta.m vaaca.m yaa saa vaacaa paresa.m appiyaa  amanaapaati, tamena.m tva.m eva.m vadeyyaasi -- atha ki~ncarahi te, bhante,  puthujjanena naanaakara.na.m? puthujjanopi hi ta.m vaaca.m bhaaseyya ^a^M2.0057^ea^ yaa saa  vaacaa paresa.m appiyaa amanaapaati. sace pana te sama.no gotamo eva.m  pu.t.tho eva.m byaakaroti -- na, raajakumaara, tathaagato ta.m vaaca.m bhaaseyya  yaa saa ^a^V2.0064^ea^ vaacaa paresa.m appiyaa amanaapaati, tamena.m tva.m eva.m vadeyyaasi  -- atha ki~ncarahi te, bhante, devadatto byaakato -- aapaayiko  devadatto, nerayiko devadatto, kappa.t.tho devadatto, atekiccho devadattoti?  taaya ca pana te vaacaaya devadatto kupito ahosi anattamanoti.  ima.m kho te, raajakumaara, sama.no gotamo ubhatoko.tika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho  samaano ^a^T2.0091^ea^ neva sakkhiti uggilitu.m na sakkhiti ogilitu.m.  seyyathaapi naama purisassa ayosi"nghaa.taka.m ka.n.the vilagga.m, so neva  sakku.neyya uggilitu.m na sakku.neyya ogilitu.m; evameva kho te,  raajakumaara, sama.no gotamo ima.m ubhatoko.tika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho samaano  neva sakkhiti uggilitu.m na sakkhiti ogilitu'''nti.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena daharo kumaaro mando  uttaanaseyyako abhayassa raajakumaarassa a"nke nisinno hoti. atha  kho bhagavaa abhaya.m raajakumaara.m etadavoca -- ``ta.m ki.m ^a^P1.0395^ea^  ma~n~nasi, raajakumaara, sacaaya.m kumaaro tuyha.m vaa  pamaadamanvaaya dhaatiyaa vaa pamaadamanvaaya ka.t.tha.m vaa ka.thala.m {kathala.m (ka0)} vaa mukhe  aahareyya, kinti na.m kareyyaasii''ti? ``aahareyyassaaha.m, bhante.  sace, bhante, na sakku.neyya.m aadikeneva aahattu.m {aaharitu.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}, vaamena hatthena siisa.m  pariggahetvaa {paggahetvaa (sii0)} dakkhi.nena hatthena va"nka"nguli.m karitvaa salohitampi  aahareyya.m. ta.m kissa hetu? atthi me, bhante, kumaare anukampaa''ti.  ``evameva kho, raajakumaara, ya.m tathaagato vaaca.m jaanaati abhuuta.m  ataccha.m anatthasa.mhita.m saa ca paresa.m appiyaa amanaapaa, na ta.m tathaagato  vaaca.m bhaasati. yampi tathaagato vaaca.m jaanaati bhuuta.m taccha.m  anatthasa.mhita.m saa ca paresa.m appiyaa amanaapaa, tampi tathaagato vaaca.m  na bhaasati. ya~nca kho tathaagato vaaca.m jaanaati bhuuta.m taccha.m  atthasa.mhita.m saa ca paresa.m appiyaa amanaapaa, tatra kaala~n~nuu tathaagato  hoti tassaa vaacaaya veyyaakara.naaya. ya.m tathaagato vaaca.m jaanaati  abhuuta.m ataccha.m ^a^M2.0058^ea^ anatthasa.mhita.m saa ca paresa.m piyaa manaapaa, na ta.m  tathaagato vaaca.m bhaasati. yampi tathaagato vaaca.m jaanaati bhuuta.m taccha.m  anatthasa.mhita.m saa ca paresa.m piyaa manaapaa tampi tathaagato vaaca.m na  bhaasati. ya~nca tathaagato vaaca.m jaanaati bhuuta.m taccha.m atthasa.mhita.m saa ^a^T2.0092^ea^  ca paresa.m piyaa manaapaa, tatra kaala~n~nuu tathaagato hoti tassaa vaacaaya  veyyaakara.naaya. ta.m kissa hetu? atthi, raajakumaara, tathaagatassa  sattesu anukampaa''ti.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ ``yeme, bhante, khattiyapa.n.ditaapi  braahma.napa.n.ditaapi gahapatipa.n.ditaapi sama.napa.n.ditaapi pa~nha.m  abhisa"nkharitvaa tathaagata.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchanti, pubbeva nu kho,  eta.m, bhante ^a^V2.0065^ea^, bhagavato cetaso parivitakkita.m hoti `ye ma.m upasa"nkamitvaa  eva.m pucchissanti tesaaha.m eva.m pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissaamii'ti, udaahu  .thaanasoveta.m tathaagata.m pa.tibhaatii''ti?
[03] ``tena hi, raajakumaara, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami, yathaa te  khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raajakumaara,  kusalo tva.m rathassa a"ngapacca"ngaana''nti?
[03] ``eva.m, bhante, kusalo aha.m rathassa a"ngapacca"ngaana''nti.

[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi,  raajakumaara, ye ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `ki.m naamida.m  rathassa a"ngapacca"nga'nti? pubbeva nu kho te eta.m cetaso parivitakkita.m  ^a^P1.0396^ea^ assa `ye ma.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m pucchissanti  tesaaha.m eva.m pu.t.tho eva.m byaakarissaamii'ti, udaahu .thaanasoveta.m  pa.tibhaaseyyaa''ti?
[03] ``aha~nhi, bhante, rathiko sa~n~naato kusalo rathassa  a"ngapacca"ngaana.m. sabbaani me rathassa a"ngapacca"ngaani suviditaani.  .thaanasoveta.m ma.m pa.tibhaaseyyaa''ti ^a^T2.0093^ea^.

[03] ``evameva kho, raajakumaara, ye te khattiyapa.n.ditaapi  braahma.napa.n.ditaapi gahapatipa.n.ditaapi sama.napa.n.ditaapi pa~nha.m  abhisa"nkharitvaa tathaagata.m upasa"nkamitvaa pucchanti, .thaanasoveta.m tathaagata.m  pa.tibhaati. ta.m kissa hetu? saa hi, raajakumaara, tathaagatassa  dhammadhaatu suppa.tividdhaa yassaa dhammadhaatuyaa suppa.tividdhattaa .thaanasoveta.m  tathaagata.m pa.tibhaatii''ti.
[03] eva.m vutte, abhayo raajakumaaro bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m  sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] abhayaraajakumaarasutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0094^ea^ ^a^M2.0059^ea^ ^a^V2.0066^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho pa~ncaka"ngo  thapati yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m  udaayi.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho  pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``kati nu kho,  bhante udaayi, vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa''ti? ``tisso kho, thapati {gahapati  (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)},  vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa  vedanaa -- imaa ^a^P1.0397^ea^ kho, thapati, tisso vedanaa vuttaa  bhagavataa''ti. eva.m vutte, pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m udaayi.m  etadavoca -- ``na kho, bhante udaayi, tisso vedanaa vuttaa  bhagavataa; dve vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa.  yaaya.m, bhante, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa santasmi.m esaa pa.niite sukhe vuttaa  bhagavataa''ti. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa udaayii pa~ncaka"nga.m thapati.m  etadavoca -- ``na kho, gahapati, dve vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa; tisso  vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa  vedanaa -- imaa kho, thapati, tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa''ti.  dutiyampi kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca --  ``na kho, bhante udaayi, tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa; dve vedanaa  vuttaa bhagavataa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa. yaaya.m, bhante ^a^T2.0095^ea^,  adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa santasmi.m esaa pa.niite sukhe vuttaa bhagavataa''ti.  tatiyampi kho aayasmaa udaayii pa~ncaka"nga.m thapati.m etadavoca --  ``na kho, thapati, dve vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa; tisso vedanaa vuttaa  bhagavataa. sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa --  imaa kho, thapati, tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa''ti. tatiyampi  kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``na kho,  bhante udaayi, tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa, dve vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa  -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa. yaaya.m, bhante, adukkhamasukhaa  vedanaa santasmi.m esaa pa.niite sukhe vuttaa bhagavataa''ti. neva kho  sakkhi aayasmaa udaayii pa~ncaka"nga.m thapati.m sa~n~naapetu.m na panaasakkhi  pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m udaayi.m sa~n~naapetu.m.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ assosi ^a^V2.0067^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmato  udaayissa pa~ncaka"ngena thapatinaa saddhi.m ima.m kathaasallaapa.m. atha kho  aayasmaa aanando ^a^M2.0060^ea^ yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa  aanando yaavatako ahosi aayasmato udaayissa pa~ncaka"ngena thapatinaa  saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa  aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``santa~n~neva kho, aananda,  pariyaaya.m pa~ncaka"ngo thapati udaayissa naabbhanumodi, santa~n~neva ^a^T2.0096^ea^ ca  pana pariyaaya.m udaayii pa~ncaka"ngassa thapatissa naabbhanumodi.  dvepaananda, vedanaa vuttaa mayaa pariyaayena ^a^P1.0398^ea^, tissopi  vedanaa vuttaa mayaa pariyaayena, pa~ncapi vedanaa vuttaa mayaa pariyaayena,  chapi vedanaa vuttaa mayaa pariyaayena, a.t.thaarasapi vedanaa vuttaa mayaa  pariyaayena, chatti.msapi vedanaa vuttaa mayaa pariyaayena, a.t.thasatampi  vedanaa vuttaa mayaa pariyaayena. eva.m pariyaayadesito kho, aananda,  mayaa dhammo. eva.m pariyaayadesite kho, aananda, mayaa dhamme ye  a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m sulapita.m na samanujaanissanti na  samanuma~n~nissanti na samanumodissanti tesameta.m paa.tika"nkha.m --  bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa  viharissanti. eva.m pariyaayadesito kho, aananda, mayaa dhammo.  eva.m pariyaayadesite kho, aananda, mayaa dhamme ye a~n~nama~n~nassa  subhaasita.m sulapita.m samanujaanissanti samanuma~n~nissanti  samanumodissanti tesameta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- samaggaa sammodamaanaa  avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa  viharissanti''.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca kho ime, aananda, kaamagu.naa.  katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa  kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa  gandhaa...pe0... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa  i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa ^a^T2.0097^ea^ piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa -- ime kho,  aananda, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ya.m kho, aananda, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne  pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m ida.m vuccati kaamasukha.m.

[01] ``yo kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyya -- `etaparama.m sattaa  sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti, idamassa naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa  hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m ^a^V2.0068^ea^ sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca  pa.niitatara~nca. katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m  abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi  vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati ^a^M2.0061^ea^. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa  a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``yo kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyya -- `etaparama.m sattaa sukha.m  somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti, idamassa naanujaanaami. ta.m ^a^P1.0399^ea^  kissa hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m  abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca. katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m  sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m  abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``yo kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyya...pe0.... katama~ncaananda,  etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda,  bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.  ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca  pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``yo kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyya...pe0.... katama~ncaananda,  etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda,  bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.  ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``yo kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyya...pe0.... katama~ncaananda,  etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca ^a^T2.0098^ea^? idhaananda,  bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa, pa.tighasa~n~naana.m ^a^V2.0069^ea^ attha"ngamaa,  naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa  sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``yo kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyya...pe0.... katama~ncaananda,  etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda,  bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m  vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho,  aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``yo kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyya...pe0.... katama~ncaananda,  etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda,  bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa  sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``yo ^a^M2.0062^ea^ ^a^P1.0400^ea^ kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyya...pe0....  katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca  pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho,  aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``yo kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyya -- `etaparama.m sattaa sukha.m  somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti, idamassa naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu?  atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.  katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca  pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m ^a^T2.0099^ea^  samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho,  aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0100^ea^ ^a^V2.0071^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu  caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena saalaa naama  kosalaana.m braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. assosu.m kho saaleyyakaa  braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto  sakyakulaa pabbajito kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa ^a^P1.0401^ea^  bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m saala.m ^a^M2.0063^ea^ anuppatto. ta.m kho pana  bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so  bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu  anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti.  so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m  sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti  aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m,  kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana  tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti. atha kho saaleyyakaa  braahma.nagahapatikaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa appekacce  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m  sammodi.msu; sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu. appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu. appekacce ^a^T2.0101^ea^ bhagavato santike naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu. appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinne kho saaleyyake  braahma.nagahapatike bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``atthi pana vo, gahapatayo,  koci manaapo satthaa yasmi.m vo aakaaravatii saddhaa pa.tiladdhaa''ti?  ``natthi kho no, bhante, koci manaapo satthaa yasmi.m no  aakaaravatii saddhaa pa.tiladdhaa''ti. ``manaapa.m vo, gahapatayo, satthaara.m  alabhantehi aya.m apa.n.nako dhammo samaadaaya vattitabbo. apa.n.nako  hi, gahapatayo, dhammo samatto samaadinno, so vo bhavissati  diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya. katamo ca, gahapatayo, apa.n.nako dhammo''?

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ ``santi ^a^V2.0072^ea^, gahapatayo, eke sama.nabraahma.naa  eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m;  natthi sukatadukka.taana.m {suka.tadukka.taana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi aya.m loko,  natthi paro loko; natthi maataa, natthi pitaa; natthi sattaa   opapaatikaa; natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa {samaggataa (ka0)} sammaa pa.tipannaa  ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti.  tesa.myeva kho, gahapatayo, sama.nabraahma.naana.m ^a^M2.0064^ea^ eke sama.nabraahma.naa  ^a^P1.0402^ea^ ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa. te evamaaha.msu -- `atthi  dinna.m, atthi yi.t.tha.m, atthi huta.m; atthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m  vipaako; atthi aya.m loko, atthi paro loko; atthi maataa, atthi  pitaa; atthi sattaa ^a^T2.0102^ea^ opapaatikaa; atthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa  sammaggataa sammaa pa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, gahapatayo --  `nanume sama.nabraahma.naa a~n~nama~n~nassa ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa'''ti?  ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, gahapatayo, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa  eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m...pe0... ye  ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti  tesameta.m paa.tika"nkha.m: yamida.m {yadida.m (ka0)} kaayasucarita.m, vaciisucarita.m, manosucarita.m  -- ime tayo kusale dhamme abhinivajjetvaa {abhinibbajjetvaa (syaa0 ka.m0),  abhinibbijjitvaa (ka0)} yamida.m {yadida.m (ka0)} kaayaduccarita.m,  vaciiduccarita.m, manoduccarita.m -- ime tayo akusale dhamme samaadaaya  vattissanti. ta.m kissa hetu? na hi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa  passanti akusalaana.m dhammaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, kusalaana.m  dhammaana.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m vodaanapakkha.m. santa.myeva pana para.m loka.m  `natthi paro loko' tissa di.t.thi hoti; saassa hoti micchaadi.t.thi.  santa.myeva kho pana para.m loka.m `natthi paro loko'ti sa"nkappeti;  svaassa hoti micchaasa"nkappo. santa.myeva kho pana para.m loka.m `natthi  paro loko'ti vaaca.m bhaasati; saassa hoti micchaavaacaa. santa.myeva  kho pana para.m loka.m `natthi paro loko'ti aaha; ye te arahanto  paralokaviduno tesamaya.m paccaniika.m karoti. santa.myeva kho pana para.m  loka.m `natthi paro loko'ti para.m ^a^T2.0103^ea^ sa~n~naapeti {pa~n~naapeti (ka0)}; saassa hoti  asaddhammasa~n~natti {assaddhammapa~n~natti (ka0)}. taaya ca pana asaddhammasa~n~nattiyaa attaanukka.mseti,  para.m vambheti. iti pubbeva kho panassa susiilya.m pahiina.m hoti,  dussiilya.m paccupa.t.thita.m -- aya~nca micchaadi.t.thi micchaasa"nkappo  micchaavaacaa ariyaana.m paccaniikataa asaddhammasa~n~natti attukka.msanaa  paravambhanaa. evamassime {eva.m'si'me' (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aneke paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti  micchaadi.t.thipaccayaa.

[03] ``tatra ^a^M2.0065^ea^ ^a^V2.0073^ea^ ^a^P1.0403^ea^, gahapatayo, vi~n~nuu puriso iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sace kho natthi paro loko evamaya.m bhava.m  purisapuggalo kaayassa bhedaa sotthimattaana.m karissati; sace kho  atthi paro loko evamaya.m bhava.m purisapuggalo kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjissati. kaama.m kho  pana maahu paro loko, hotu nesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m sacca.m vacana.m;  atha ca panaaya.m bhava.m purisapuggalo di.t.theva dhamme vi~n~nuuna.m gaarayho --  dussiilo purisapuggalo micchaadi.t.thi natthikavaado'ti. sace kho  attheva paro loko, eva.m imassa bhoto purisapuggalassa ubhayattha  kaliggaho -- ya~nca di.t.theva dhamme vi~n~nuuna.m gaarayho, ya~nca kaayassa  bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjissati.  evamassaaya.m apa.n.nako dhammo dussamatto samaadinno, eka.msa.m pharitvaa  ti.t.thati, ri~ncati kusala.m .thaana.m.

passanti hi te bhonto  sama.nabraahma.naa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m,  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m vodaanapakkha.m. santa.myeva kho  pana kiriya.m `atthi kiriyaa' tissa di.t.thi hoti; saassa hoti  sammaadi.t.thi. santa.myeva kho pana kiriya.m `atthi kiriyaa'ti  sa"nkappeti; svaassa hoti sammaasa"nkappo. santa.myeva kho pana kiriya.m  `atthi kiriyaa'ti vaaca.m bhaasati; saassa hoti sammaavaacaa.  santa.myeva kho pana kiriya.m `atthi kiriyaa'ti aaha; ye te arahanto  kiriyavaadaa tesamaya.m na paccaniika.m karoti. santa.myeva kho pana  kiriya.m `atthi kiriyaa'ti para.m sa~n~naapeti; saassa ^a^V2.0077^ea^ hoti  saddhammasa~n~natti. taaya ^a^P1.0407^ea^ ca pana  saddhammasa~n~nattiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti, na para.m vambheti. iti pubbeva kho  panassa dussiilya.m pahiina.m hoti, susiilya.m paccupa.t.thita.m -- aya~nca  sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa ariyaana.m apaccaniikataa  saddhammasa~n~natti anattukka.msanaa aparavambhanaa. evamassime aneke  kusalaa dhammaa sambhavanti sammaadi.t.thipaccayaa.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ``santi, gahapatayo, eke sama.nabraahma.naa  eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino ^a^T2.0116^ea^ -- `natthi sabbaso aaruppaa'ti. tesa.myeva  kho, gahapatayo, sama.nabraahma.naana.m eke sama.nabraahma.naa  ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa. te evamaaha.msu -- `atthi sabbaso aaruppaa'ti.  ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, gahapatayo, nanume sama.nabraahma.naa a~n~nama~n~nassa  ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``tatra ^a^M2.0073^ea^, gahapatayo,  vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- ye kho te bhonto  sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi sabbaso  aaruppaa'ti, ida.m me adi.t.tha.m; yepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino  eva.mdi.t.thino -- `atthi sabbaso aaruppaa'ti, ida.m me avidita.m.  aha~nceva {aha~nce (?)} kho pana ajaananto apassanto eka.msena aadaaya vohareyya.m --  idameva sacca.m, moghama~n~nanti, na meta.m assa patiruupa.m. ye kho te  bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `natthi sabbaso  aaruppaa'ti, sace tesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m sacca.m vacana.m, .thaanameta.m  vijjati -- ye te devaa ruupino manomayaa, apa.n.naka.m me tatruupapatti  bhavissati. ye pana te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino  -- `atthi sabbaso aaruppaa'ti, sace tesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m  sacca.m vacana.m, .thaanameta.m vijjati -- ye te devaa aruupino sa~n~naamayaa,  apa.n.naka.m me tatruupapatti bhavissati. dissanti kho pana  ruupaadhikara.na.m {ruupakaara.naa (ka0)}  da.n.daadaana-satthaadaana-kalaha-viggaha-vivaada-tuva.mtuva.m-pesu~n~na-musaavaadaa.  `natthi kho paneta.m sabbaso aruupe'''ti. so iti ^a^T2.0117^ea^ pa.tisa"nkhaaya  ruupaana.myeva nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, gahapatayo, puggalaa santo  sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco  puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. idha,  gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo parantapo hoti paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.  idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo attantapo ca hoti  attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.  idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo nevattantapo hoti  naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto; so anattantapo ^a^P1.0412^ea^  aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii  brahmabhuutena attanaa viharati.

[03] ``katamo ^a^M2.0075^ea^ ^a^V2.0082^ea^ ca, gahapatayo, puggalo parantapo  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo  orabbhiko hoti suukariko...pe0... ye vaa pana~n~nepi keci  kuruurakammantaa. aya.m vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo parantapo  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] ``katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo attantapo ca  attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto?  idha, gahapatayo, ekacco puggalo raajaa vaa hoti khattiyo  muddhaavasitto...pe0... tepi da.n.datajjitaa bhayatajjitaa assumukhaa  rudamaanaa parikammaani karonti. aya.m vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo  attantapo ca attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[01] ``katamo ca, gahapatayo, puggalo nevattantapo  naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto; so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme  nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa  viharati? idha, gahapatayo, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m  sammaasambuddho...pe0... so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso ^a^T2.0120^ea^  upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi vivicca  akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m  cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m  jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m  pubbenivaasa.m anussarati seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi  jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussarati. so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe ^a^P1.0413^ea^  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite  aane~njappatte sattaana.m ^a^V2.0083^ea^ cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so  dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane  upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate...pe0... yathaakammuupage  satte pajaanaati. so eva.m samaahite ^a^M2.0076^ea^ citte parisuddhe pariyodaate  ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m  khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii ^a^T2.0121^ea^ pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati,  vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati.  aya.m vuccati, gahapatayo, puggalo nevattantapo  naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto; so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme  nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa  viharatii''ti.

[01] eva.m vutte, saaleyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa bhagavanta.m  etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama!  seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa  vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m  dhaareyya `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena  anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. ete maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m  gacchaama dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu  ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gate''ti.
[06] apa.n.nakasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.
[06] gahapativaggo ni.t.thito pa.thamo.

[21] kandaranaagarasekhavato ^a^T2.0122^ea^ ca, potaliyo puna jiivakabhacco.
