[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ^a^M2.0077^ea^ ^a^V2.0084^ea^ eva.m ^a^T2.0123^ea^ ^a^P1.0414^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m  samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho  pana samayena aayasmaa raahulo ambala.t.thikaaya.m viharati. atha kho  bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena ambala.t.thikaa yenaayasmaa  raahulo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho aayasmaa raahulo bhagavanta.m duuratova  aagacchanta.m. disvaana aasana.m pa~n~naapesi, udaka~nca paadaana.m.  nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja paade pakkhaalesi.  aayasmaapi kho raahulo bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa paritta.m udakaavasesa.m udakaadhaane  .thapetvaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``passasi no tva.m, raahula,  ima.m paritta.m udakaavasesa.m udakaadhaane .thapita''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''.  ``eva.m parittaka.m kho, raahula, tesa.m saama~n~na.m yesa.m natthi  sampajaanamusaavaade lajjaa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa paritta.m udakaavasesa.m  cha.d.detvaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``passasi no tva.m, raahula,  paritta.m udakaavasesa.m cha.d.dita''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eva.m cha.d.dita.m  kho, raahula, tesa.m saama~n~na.m yesa.m natthi sampajaanamusaavaade lajjaa''ti.  atha kho bhagavaa ^a^T2.0124^ea^ ta.m udakaadhaana.m nikkujjitvaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m  aamantesi -- ``passasi no tva.m, raahula, ima.m udakaadhaana.m  nikkujjita''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eva.m nikkujjita.m kho, raahula,  tesa.m saama~n~na.m yesa.m natthi sampajaanamusaavaade lajjaa''ti. atha kho  bhagavaa ta.m udakaadhaana.m ukkujjitvaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi --  ``passasi no tva.m, raahula, ima.m udakaadhaana.m ritta.m tuccha''nti?  ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eva.m ritta.m tuccha.m kho, raahula, tesa.m saama~n~na.m  yesa.m natthi ^a^V2.0085^ea^ sampajaanamusaavaade lajjaati. seyyathaapi, raahula, ra~n~no  naago iisaadanto uruu.lhavaa {ubbuu.lhavaa (sii0 pii0)} abhijaato sa"ngaamaavacaro sa"ngaamagato  purimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti, pacchimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti,  purimenapi kaayena kamma.m karoti, pacchimenapi kaayena kamma.m karoti,  siisenapi kamma.m karoti, ka.n.nehipi ^a^M2.0078^ea^ kamma.m karoti, dantehipi kamma.m  karoti, na"ngu.t.thenapi kamma.m ^a^P1.0415^ea^ karoti; rakkhateva  so.n.da.m. tattha hatthaarohassa eva.m hoti -- `aya.m kho ra~n~no naago  iisaadanto uruu.lhavaa abhijaato sa"ngaamaavacaro sa"ngaamagato purimehipi  paadehi kamma.m karoti, pacchimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti...pe0...  na"ngu.t.thenapi kamma.m karoti; rakkhateva so.n.da.m ^a^T2.0125^ea^. apariccatta.m kho ra~n~no  naagassa jiivita'nti. yato kho, raahula, ra~n~no naago iisaadanto  uruu.lhavaa abhijaato sa"ngaamaavacaro sa"ngaamagato purimehipi paadehi  kamma.m karoti, pacchimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti...pe0... na"ngu.t.thenapi  kamma.m karoti, so.n.daayapi kamma.m karoti, tattha hatthaarohassa eva.m  hoti -- `aya.m kho ra~n~no naago iisaadanto uruu.lhavaa abhijaato  sa"ngaamaavacaro sa"ngaamagato purimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti,  pacchimehipi paadehi kamma.m karoti, purimenapi kaayena kamma.m karoti,  pacchimenapi kaayena kamma.m karoti, siisenapi kamma.m karoti,  ka.n.nehipi kamma.m karoti, dantehipi kamma.m karoti, na"ngu.t.thenapi kamma.m  karoti, so.n.daayapi kamma.m karoti. pariccatta.m kho ra~n~no naagassa  jiivita.m. natthi daani ki~nci ra~n~no naagassa akara.niiya'nti.  evameva kho, raahula, yassa kassaci sampajaanamusaavaade natthi lajjaa,  naaha.m tassa ki~nci paapa.m akara.niiyanti vadaami. tasmaatiha te,  raahula, `hassaapi na musaa bha.nissaamii'ti -- eva~nhi te, raahula,  sikkhitabba.m.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, raahula, kimatthiyo  aadaaso''ti? ``paccavekkha.nattho, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho,  raahula, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa kaayena kamma.m kattabba.m,  paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa vaacaaya kamma.m kattabba.m, paccavekkhitvaa  paccavekkhitvaa manasaa kamma.m kattabba.m. yadeva ^a^T2.0126^ea^ tva.m, raahula, kaayena  kamma.m kattukaamo ahosi, tadeva te kaayakamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m  nu kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me kaayakamma.m  attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m {dukkhundraya.m,  dukkhudaya.m (ka0)}  dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m  jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me  kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^V2.0086^ea^ sa.mvatteyya, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^M2.0079^ea^ sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, kaayena kamma.m sasakka.m na  kara.niiya.m {sa.msakka.m na ca kara.niiya.m (ka0)}. sace ^a^P1.0416^ea^ pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano  eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m  me kaayakamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, na parabyaabaadhaayapi  sa.mvatteyya, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- kusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m  sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, kaayena kamma.m kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``karontenapi te, raahula, kaayena kamma.m tadeva te kaayakamma.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m karomi ida.m  me kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^T2.0127^ea^ sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m  jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m karomi ida.m me  kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti, pa.tisa.mhareyyaasi tva.m, raahula, evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m.  sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho  aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m karomi ida.m me kaayakamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^T2.0128^ea^  sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi  sa.mvattati -- kusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti,  anupadajjeyyaasi tva.m, raahula, evaruupa.m kaayakamma.m.

[03] ``katvaapi te, raahula, kaayena kamma.m tadeva te kaayakamma.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m  me kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati {sa.mvatti (pii0)}, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace kho tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m  jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m akaasi.m, ida.m me  kaayakamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, kaayakamma.m satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu  vaa sabrahmacaariisu ^a^M2.0080^ea^ desetabba.m, vivaritabba.m, uttaaniikaatabba.m; desetvaa  vivaritvaa uttaaniikatvaa aayati.m sa.mvara.m ^a^P1.0417^ea^  aapajjitabba.m ^a^V2.0087^ea^. sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi  -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m kaayena kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me kaayakamma.m  nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- kusala.m ida.m kaayakamma.m sukhudraya.m  sukhavipaaka'nti, teneva tva.m, raahula, piitipaamojjena vihareyyaasi  ahorattaanusikkhii kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ ``yadeva tva.m, raahula, vaacaaya kamma.m kattukaamo  ahosi, tadeva te vaciikamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m  ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi  sa.mvatteyya, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya --  akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace tva.m,  raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya  kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya,  parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m  ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula,  vaacaaya kamma.m sasakka.m na kara.niiya.m. sace pana tva.m, raahula,  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m  kattukaamo ida.m me vaciikamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, na  parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- kusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m sukhudraya.m  sukhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, vaacaaya kamma.m kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``karontenapi, raahula, vaacaaya kamma.m tadeva te vaciikamma.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m karomi ida.m  me vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^T2.0129^ea^ sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m  jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m karomi ida.m me  vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti, pa.tisa.mhareyyaasi tva.m, raahula, evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m.  sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho  aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m karomi ida.m me vaciikamma.m ^a^M2.0081^ea^ nevattabyaabaadhaayapi  sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na ^a^P1.0418^ea^  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati ^a^V2.0088^ea^ -- kusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m sukhudraya.m  sukhavipaaka'nti, anupadajjeyyaasi, tva.m raahula, evaruupa.m vaciikamma.m.

[03] ``katvaapi te, raahula, vaacaaya kamma.m tadeva te vaciikamma.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m  me vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati {sa.mvatti (sii0 pii0)}, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace kho tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m  jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me  vaciikamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m vaciikamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula, vaciikamma.m satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu  vaa sabrahmacaariisu desetabba.m, vivaritabba.m, uttaaniikattabba.m ^a^T2.0130^ea^; desetvaa  vivaritvaa uttaaniikatvaa aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjitabba.m. sace pana tva.m,  raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m vaacaaya  kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me vaciikamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na  parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- kusala.m  ida.m vaciikamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti, teneva tva.m, raahula,  piitipaamojjena vihareyyaasi ahorattaanusikkhii kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ ``yadeva tva.m, raahula, manasaa kamma.m kattukaamo  ahosi, tadeva te manokamma.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m  manasaa kamma.m kattukaamo ida.m me manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya,  parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m  ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace tva.m, raahula,  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m  kattukaamo ida.m me manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya,  parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- akusala.m  ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m te, raahula,  manasaa kamma.m sasakka.m na kara.niiya.m. sace pana tva.m, raahula,  paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ^a^M2.0082^ea^ ida.m manasaa kamma.m  kattukaamo ida.m me manokamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya, na  parabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^V2.0089^ea^ sa.mvatteyya, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvatteyya -- kusala.m  ida.m manokamma.m ^a^T2.0131^ea^ sukhudraya.m ^a^P1.0419^ea^ sukhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m  te, raahula, manasaa kamma.m kara.niiya.m.

[03] ``karontenapi te, raahula, manasaa kamma.m tadeva te manokamma.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m karomi ida.m  me manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m  jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m karomi ida.m me  manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti, pa.tisa.mhareyyaasi tva.m, raahula, evaruupa.m manokamma.m.  sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho  aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m karomi ida.m me manokamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi  sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi  sa.mvattati -- kusala.m ida.m manokamma.m sukhudraya.m sukhavipaaka'nti,  anupadajjeyyaasi tva.m, raahula, evaruupa.m manokamma.m.

[03] ``katvaapi te, raahula, manasaa kamma.m tadeva te manokamma.m  paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m nu kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m  me manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati {sa.mvatti (sii0 pii0)}, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti? sace kho tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m  jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m ^a^T2.0132^ea^ kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m akaasi.m ida.m me  manokamma.m attabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- akusala.m ida.m manokamma.m dukkhudraya.m  dukkhavipaaka'nti, evaruupa.m pana {evaruupe (sii0 pii0), evaruupe pana (syaa0  ka.m0)} te, raahula, manokamma.m {manokamme (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} a.t.tiiyitabba.m  haraayitabba.m jigucchitabba.m; a.t.tiiyitvaa haraayitvaa jigucchitvaa aayati.m  sa.mvara.m aapajjitabba.m. sace pana tva.m, raahula, paccavekkhamaano eva.m  jaaneyyaasi -- `ya.m kho aha.m ida.m manasaa kamma.m akaasi.m ^a^M2.0083^ea^ ida.m me  manokamma.m nevattabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati, na parabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati,  na ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi sa.mvattati -- kusala.m ida.m manokamma.m sukhudraya.m  sukhavipaaka'nti, teneva tva.m, raahula, piitipaamojjena vihareyyaasi  ahorattaanusikkhii kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ``ye ^a^V2.0090^ea^ ^a^P1.0420^ea^ hi keci, raahula,  atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayakamma.m parisodhesu.m, vaciikamma.m  parisodhesu.m, manokamma.m parisodhesu.m, sabbe te evameva.m paccavekkhitvaa  paccavekkhitvaa kaayakamma.m parisodhesu.m, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa  vaciikamma.m parisodhesu.m, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa manokamma.m  parisodhesu.m. yepi hi keci, raahula, anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa  braahma.naa vaa kaayakamma.m parisodhessanti, vaciikamma.m parisodhessanti,  manokamma.m parisodhessanti, sabbe te evameva.m paccavekkhitvaa  paccavekkhitvaa kaayakamma.m parisodhessanti, paccavekkhitvaa  paccavekkhitvaa vaciikamma.m parisodhessanti ^a^T2.0133^ea^, paccavekkhitvaa  paccavekkhitvaa manokamma.m parisodhessanti. yepi hi keci, raahula,  etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayakamma.m parisodhenti, vaciikamma.m  parisodhenti, manokamma.m parisodhenti, sabbe te evameva.m paccavekkhitvaa  paccavekkhitvaa kaayakamma.m parisodhenti, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa  vaciikamma.m parisodhenti, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa manokamma.m  parisodhenti. tasmaatiha, raahula, `paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa  kaayakamma.m parisodhessaami, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa vaciikamma.m  parisodhessaami, paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa manokamma.m  parisodhessaamii'ti -- eva~nhi te, raahula, sikkhitabba''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa raahulo bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] ambala.t.thikaraahulovaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0134^ea^ ^a^V2.0091^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho bhagavaa  pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.  aayasmaapi kho ^a^M2.0084^ea^ raahulo pubba.nhasamaya.m ^a^P1.0421^ea^  nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi.  atha kho bhagavaa apaloketvaa aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``ya.m  ki~nci, raahula, ruupa.m -- atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa  vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa  -- sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m  yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba''nti. ``ruupameva nu kho, bhagavaa,  ruupameva nu kho, sugataa''ti? ``ruupampi, raahula, vedanaapi, raahula,  sa~n~naapi, raahula, sa"nkhaaraapi, raahula, vi~n~naa.nampi, raahulaa''ti.  atha kho aayasmaa raahulo ``ko najja {ko nujja (syaa0 ka.m0)} bhagavataa sammukhaa ovaadena  ovadito gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisissatii''ti tato pa.tinivattitvaa  a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m  pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. addasaa kho aayasmaa saariputto  aayasmanta.m raahula.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa  uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa ^a^T2.0135^ea^. disvaana aayasmanta.m  raahula.m aamantesi -- ``aanaapaanassati.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi.  aanaapaanassati, raahula, bhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti  mahaanisa.msaa''ti.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa raahulo saayanhasamaya.m  pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa  raahulo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katha.m bhaavitaa nu kho, bhante,  aanaapaanassati, katha.m bahuliikataa mahapphalaa hoti mahaanisa.msaa''ti?  ``ya.m ki~nci, raahula, ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m upaadinna.m,  seyyathida.m -- kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0 syaa0  ka.m0 pii0)} a.t.thi  a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m  udariya.m kariisa.m, ya.m ^a^V2.0092^ea^ vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m  kharigata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati, raahula, ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu {pa.thaviidhaatu  (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.  yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu yaa ca baahiraa pathaviidhaatu,  pathaviidhaaturevesaa. ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti  -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m ^a^P1.0422^ea^  yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa pathaviidhaatuyaa nibbindati,  pathaviidhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti''.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ^a^M2.0085^ea^ ca, raahula, aapodhaatu? aapodhaatu  siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, raahula, ajjhattikaa  aapodhaatu ^a^T2.0136^ea^? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m  -- pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo  si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m  aapo aapogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati, raahula, ajjhattikaa  aapodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa  aapodhaatu aapodhaaturevesaa. ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso  attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m  sammappa~n~naaya disvaa aapodhaatuyaa nibbindati, aapodhaatuyaa citta.m  viraajeti.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, raahula, tejodhaatu? tejodhaatu  siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, raahula, ajjhattikaa  tejodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m  -- yena ca santappati yena ca jiiriiyati yena ca pari.dayhati yena ca  asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi  ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati,  raahula, ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa  tejodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa tejodhaatu tejodhaaturevesaa. ta.m `neta.m mama,  nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya  da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa tejodhaatuyaa  nibbindati, tejodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ^a^T2.0137^ea^ ca, raahula, vaayodhaatu? vaayodhaatu  siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, raahula, ajjhattikaa  vaayodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m  -- uddha"ngamaa vaataa, adhogamaa vaataa, kucchisayaa vaataa, ko.t.thaasayaa {ko.t.thasayaa  (sii0 pii0)}  vaataa ^a^V2.0093^ea^, a"ngama"ngaanusaarino vaataa, assaaso passaaso, iti ya.m vaa  pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m  vuccati, raahula, ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana  ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa vaayodhaatu vaayodhaaturevesaa. ta.m  `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi ^a^M2.0086^ea^, na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m  sammappa~n~naaya ^a^P1.0423^ea^ da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m  sammappa~n~naaya disvaa vaayodhaatuyaa nibbindati, vaayodhaatuyaa citta.m  viraajeti.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ``katamaa ca, raahula, aakaasadhaatu?  aakaasadhaatu siyaa ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa. katamaa ca, raahula,  ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aakaasa.m aakaasagata.m  upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- ka.n.nacchidda.m naasacchidda.m mukhadvaara.m, yena ca  asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m ajjhoharati, yattha ca  asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m santi.t.thati, yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m  adhobhaaga.m {adhobhaagaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} nikkhamati, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi ki~nci ajjhatta.m paccatta.m  aakaasa.m aakaasagata.m, agha.m aghagata.m, vivara.m vivaragata.m, asamphu.t.tha.m,  ma.msalohitehi upaadinna.m ^a^T2.0138^ea^ {aakaasagata.m upaadinna.m (sii0 pii0)} -- aya.m vuccati, raahula, ajjhattikaa  aakaasadhaatu. yaa ceva kho pana ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu yaa ca  baahiraa aakaasadhaatu aakaasadhaaturevesaa. ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi,  na meso attaa'ti -- evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m.  evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa aakaasadhaatuyaa citta.m  nibbindati, aakaasadhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ ``pathaviisama.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi.  pathaviisama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa  phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti. seyyathaapi, raahula, pathaviyaa  sucimpi nikkhipanti, asucimpi nikkhipanti, guuthagatampi  nikkhipanti, muttagatampi nikkhipanti, khe.lagatampi nikkhipanti,  pubbagatampi nikkhipanti, lohitagatampi nikkhipanti, na ca tena  pathavii a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva kho tva.m,  raahula, pathaviisama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi. pathaviisama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m  bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti.

[03] ``aaposama.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. aaposama~nhi te,  raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na  pariyaadaaya .thassanti. seyyathaapi, raahula, aapasmi.m sucimpi ^a^V2.0094^ea^   dhovanti, asucimpi dhovanti, guuthagatampi dhovanti, muttagatampi  dhovanti, khe.lagatampi dhovanti, pubbagatampi dhovanti, lohitagatampi  dhovanti, na ca ^a^T2.0139^ea^ tena aapo a.t.tiiyati ^a^M2.0087^ea^ vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa;  evameva kho ^a^P1.0424^ea^ tva.m, raahula, aaposama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi.  aaposama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa  phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti.

[03] ``tejosama.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. tejosama~nhi te,  raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na  pariyaadaaya .thassanti. seyyathaapi, raahula, tejo sucimpi dahati,  asucimpi dahati, guuthagatampi dahati, muttagatampi dahati, khe.lagatampi  dahati, pubbagatampi dahati, lohitagatampi dahati, na ca tena tejo  a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa jigucchati vaa; evameva kho tva.m, raahula,  tejosama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi. tejosama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato  uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti.

[03] ``vaayosama.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. vaayosama~nhi te,  raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na  pariyaadaaya .thassanti. seyyathaapi, raahula, vaayo sucimpi  upavaayati, asucimpi upavaayati, guuthagatampi upavaayati, muttagatampi  upavaayati, khe.lagatampi upavaayati, pubbagatampi upavaayati,  lohitagatampi upavaayati, na ca tena vaayo a.t.tiiyati vaa haraayati vaa  jigucchati vaa; evameva kho tva.m, raahula, vaayosama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi.  vaayosama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa  phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ^a^T2.0140^ea^ .thassanti.

[03] ``aakaasasama.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. aakaasasama~nhi te,  raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na  pariyaadaaya .thassanti. seyyathaapi, raahula, aakaaso na katthaci  pati.t.thito; evameva kho tva.m, raahula, aakaasasama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi.  aakaasasama~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa  phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassanti.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ ``metta.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. metta~nhi te,  raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato yo byaapaado ^a^V2.0095^ea^ so pahiiyissati. karu.na.m,  raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. karu.na~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato yaa  vihesaa saa pahiiyissati. mudita.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi.  mudita~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato yaa arati saa pahiiyissati.  upekkha.m ^a^M2.0088^ea^, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi. upekkha~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m  bhaavayato yo pa.tigho so pahiiyissati. asubha.m, raahula, bhaavana.m  bhaavehi. asubha~nhi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato yo raago so  pahiiyissati. aniccasa~n~na.m, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi.  aniccasa~n~na~nhi ^a^P1.0425^ea^ te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato  yo asmimaano so pahiiyissati.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0143^ea^ ^a^V2.0097^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmato  maalukyaputtassa {maalu"nkyaputtassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko  udapaadi -- ``yaanimaani di.t.thigataani bhagavataa abyaakataani  .thapitaani pa.tikkhittaani -- `sassato loko'tipi, `asassato  loko'tipi, `antavaa loko'tipi, `anantavaa loko'tipi, `ta.m  jiiva.m ta.m sariira'ntipi, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'ntipi, `hoti  tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi,  `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi, `neva hoti na na  hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi -- taani me bhagavaa na byaakaroti.  yaani me bhagavaa na byaakaroti ta.m me na ruccati, ta.m me nakkhamati.  soha.m bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pucchissaami. sace me  bhagavaa byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa `asassato  loko'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m  mara.naa'ti vaa -- evaaha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m ^a^M2.0090^ea^ carissaami; no ce me  bhagavaa byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa `asassato  loko'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato ^a^T2.0144^ea^ para.m  mara.naa'ti vaa -- evaaha.m sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissaamii''ti.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0427^ea^ kho aayasmaa  maalukyaputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca  --

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa  eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- yaanimaani di.t.thigataani bhagavataa  abyaakataani .thapitaani pa.tikkhittaani -- `sassato loko'tipi,  `asassato loko'tipi...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato  para.m mara.naa'tipi -- taani me bhagavaa na byaakaroti. yaani me  bhagavaa na byaakaroti ta.m me ^a^V2.0098^ea^ na ruccati, ta.m me nakkhamati. soha.m  bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pucchissaami. sace me bhagavaa  byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti  vaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0145^ea^ `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa --  evaaha.m bhagavati, brahmacariya.m carissaami. no ce me bhagavaa  byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti  vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa --  evaaha.m sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissaamiiti. sace bhagavaa  jaanaati -- `sassato loko'ti, `sassato loko'ti me bhagavaa  byaakarotu; sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `asassato loko'ti,  `asassato loko'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu. no ce bhagavaa jaanaati  -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa, ajaanato  kho pana apassato etadeva ujuka.m hoti yadida.m -- `na jaanaami, na  passaamii'ti. sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `antavaa loko'ti,  `anantavaa loko'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu; sace bhagavaa jaanaati --  `anantavaa loko'ti, `anantavaa loko'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu.  no ce bhagavaa jaanaati -- `antavaa loko'ti vaa, `anantavaa  loko'ti vaa, ajaanato kho pana apassato etadeva ^a^M2.0091^ea^ ujuka.m hoti  yadida.m -- `na jaanaami, na passaamii'ti. sace bhagavaa jaanaati --  `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti, `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti me bhagavaa  byaakarotu; sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti,  `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti me bhagavaa byaakarotu. no ce bhagavaa  jaanaati -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m  sariira'nti vaa, ajaanato kho pana apassato etadeva ujuka.m hoti  yadida.m -- `na ^a^T2.0146^ea^ jaanaami, na passaamii'ti. sace bhagavaa jaanaati --  `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti me  bhagavaa ^a^P1.0428^ea^ byaakarotu; sace bhagavaa jaanaati -- `neva hoti  na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, `neva hoti na na hoti  tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti me bhagavaa byaakarotu. no ce bhagavaa  jaanaati -- `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa,  `neva hoti na ^a^V2.0099^ea^ na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, ajaanato kho  pana apassato etadeva ujuka.m hoti yadida.m -- `na jaanaami, na  passaamii'''ti.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m nu {ki.m nu kho (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} taaha.m, maalukyaputta, eva.m avaca.m --  `ehi tva.m, maalukyaputta, mayi brahmacariya.m cara, aha.m te byaakarissaami  -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa, `antavaa  loko'ti vaa, `anantavaa loko'ti vaa, `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti  vaa, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa, `hoti tathaagato para.m  mara.naa'ti vaa, `na hoti ^a^T2.0147^ea^ tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na  ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti na na hoti  tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``tva.m vaa  pana ma.m eva.m avaca -- aha.m, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariya.m carissaami ^a^M2.0092^ea^,  bhagavaa me byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato  loko'ti vaa, `antavaa loko'ti vaa, `anantavaa loko'ti vaa,  `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa,  `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `na hoti tathaagato para.m  mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa,  `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti? ``no  heta.m, bhante''. ``iti kira, maalukyaputta, nevaaha.m ta.m vadaami --  ehi tva.m, maalukyaputta, mayi brahmacariya.m cara, aha.m te byaakarissaami  -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa...pe0... `neva  hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa'ti; napi kira ma.m tva.m  vadesi -- aha.m, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariya.m carissaami, bhagavaa me  byaakarissati -- `sassato loko'ti vaa `asassato loko'ti  vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti.  eva.m sante, moghapurisa, ko santo ka.m paccaacikkhasi?

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ ``yo kho, maalukyaputta, eva.m vadeyya -- `na  taavaaha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m carissaami yaava me bhagavaa na  byaakarissati -- ``sassato loko''ti vaa, ``asassato loko''ti  vaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0148^ea^ ``neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti vaati,  abyaakatameva ^a^P1.0429^ea^ ta.m, maalukyaputta, tathaagatena assa,  atha so puggalo kaala.m kareyya. seyyathaapi, maalukyaputta, puriso  sallena viddho assa savisena gaa.lhapalepanena. tassa mittaamaccaa  ~naatisaalohitaa bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upa.t.thapeyyu.m. so eva.m vadeyya --  `na taavaaha.m ima.m ^a^V2.0100^ea^ salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m purisa.m jaanaami  yenamhi viddho, khattiyo vaa braahma.no vaa vesso vaa suddo vaa'ti;  so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m  purisa.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto iti vaa'ti; so  eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m  purisa.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, diigho vaa rasso vaa majjhimo  vaa'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava  na ta.m purisa.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, kaa.lo vaa saamo vaa  ma"nguracchavii vaa'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m  aaharissaami yaava na ta.m purisa.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, amukasmi.m  gaame ^a^M2.0093^ea^ vaa nigame vaa nagare vaa'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m  ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m dhanu.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho,  yadi vaa caapo yadi vaa koda.n.do'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na  taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m jiya.m jaanaami yaayamhi  viddho ^a^T2.0149^ea^, yadi vaa akkassa yadi vaa sa.nhassa {sa.n.thassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}   yadi vaa nhaarussa yadi vaa maruvaaya yadi vaa khiirapa.n.nino'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na  taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m ka.n.da.m jaanaami yenamhi  viddho, yadi vaa gaccha.m yadi vaa ropima'nti; so eva.m vadeyya --  `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m ka.n.da.m jaanaami  yenamhi viddho, yassa pattehi vaajita.m {vaakhitta.m (ka0)} yadi vaa gijjhassa yadi vaa  ka"nkassa yadi vaa kulalassa yadi vaa morassa yadi vaa  sithilahanuno'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m ima.m salla.m  aaharissaami yaava na ta.m ka.n.da.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho, yassa  nhaarunaa parikkhitta.m yadi vaa gavassa yadi vaa mahi.msassa yadi vaa  bheravassa {roruvassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yadi vaa semhaarassaa'ti; so eva.m vadeyya -- `na taavaaha.m  ima.m salla.m aaharissaami yaava na ta.m salla.m jaanaami yenamhi viddho,  yadi vaa salla.m yadi vaa khurappa.m yadi vaa veka.n.da.m yadi vaa naaraaca.m  yadi vaa vacchadanta.m yadi vaa karaviirapatta'nti ^a^P1.0430^ea^ --  a~n~naatameva ta.m, maalukyaputta, tena purisena assa, atha so puriso  kaala.m kareyya. evameva kho, maalukyaputta, yo eva.m vadeyya -- `na  taavaaha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m carissaami yaava me bhagavaa na  byaakarissati -- ``sassato loko''ti vaa ``asassato loko''ti   ^a^T2.0150^ea^ vaa...pe0... ``neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti vaati  -- abyaakatameva ta.m, maalukyaputta, tathaagatena assa, atha so puggalo  kaala"nkareyya.
