yesaaha.m di.t.theva dhamme  nighaata.m pa~n~napemi ^a^M2.0094^ea^. `antavaa loko'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati  brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, eva.m `no anantavaa loko'ti,  maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, evampi  `no antavaa loko'ti vaa, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati, `anantavaa  loko'ti vaa di.t.thiyaa sati attheva jaati, atthi jaraa, atthi  mara.na.m, santi sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa; yesaaha.m di.t.theva dhamme  nighaata.m pa~n~napemi. `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa  sati brahmacariyavaaso ^a^T2.0151^ea^ abhavissaati, eva.m `no a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m  sariira'nti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati,  evampi `no ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati,  `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa di.t.thiyaa sati attheva  jaati...pe0... nighaata.m pa~n~napemi. `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti,  maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, eva.m `no  na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati  brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati, evampi `no hoti tathaagato para.m  mara.naa'ti vaa, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati, `na hoti tathaagato para.m  mara.naa'ti vaa di.t.thiyaa sati attheva jaati...pe0... ^a^P1.0431^ea^  yesaaha.m di.t.theva dhamme nighaata.m pa~n~napemi. `hoti ca na ca hoti  tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso  abhavissaati, eva.m `no neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m  mara.naa'ti, maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati brahmacariyavaaso abhavissaati,  evampi `no hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti,  maalukyaputta, di.t.thiyaa sati, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m  mara.naa'ti vaa di.t.thiyaa sati attheva jaati...pe0... yesaaha.m di.t.theva  dhamme nighaata.m pa~n~napemi.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ ``tasmaatiha, maalukyaputta, abyaakata~nca me  abyaakatato ^a^T2.0152^ea^ dhaaretha; byaakata~nca me byaakatato dhaaretha. ki~nca,  maalukyaputta, mayaa abyaakata.m? `sassato loko'ti maalukyaputta,  mayaa abyaakata.m; `asassato loko'ti -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `antavaa  loko'ti -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `anantavaa loko'ti -- mayaa  abyaakata.m; `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti ^a^V2.0102^ea^ -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `a~n~na.m jiiva.m  a~n~na.m sariira'nti -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti  -- mayaa abyaakata.m; `na hoti tathaagato para.m ^a^M2.0095^ea^ mara.naa'ti -- mayaa  abyaakata.m; `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti -- mayaa  abyaakata.m; `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti -- mayaa  abyaakata.m. kasmaa ceta.m, maalukyaputta, mayaa abyaakata.m? na heta.m,  maalukyaputta, atthasa.mhita.m na aadibrahmacariyaka.m na {neta.m (sii0)} nibbidaaya na  viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na  nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. tasmaa ta.m mayaa abyaakata.m. ki~nca,  maalukyaputta, mayaa byaakata.m? `ida.m dukkha'nti, maalukyaputta, mayaa  byaakata.m; `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti -- mayaa byaakata.m; `aya.m  dukkhanirodho'ti -- mayaa byaakata.m; `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa'ti -- mayaa byaakata.m. kasmaa ceta.m, maalukyaputta, mayaa  byaakata.m? eta~nhi, maalukyaputta, atthasa.mhita.m eta.m aadibrahmacariyaka.m  nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya  nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. tasmaa ta.m mayaa byaakata.m. tasmaatiha,  maalukyaputta ^a^P1.0432^ea^, abyaakata~nca me ^a^T2.0153^ea^ abyaakatato dhaaretha;  byaakata~nca me byaakatato dhaarethaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa maalukyaputto bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] cuu.lamaalukyasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0154^ea^ ^a^V2.0103^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``dhaaretha no tumhe,  bhikkhave, mayaa desitaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaanii''ti?

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa maalukyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m  kho, bhante, dhaaremi bhagavataa desitaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani  sa.myojanaanii''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana tva.m, maalukyaputta, dhaaresi mayaa  desitaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaanii''ti? ``sakkaayadi.t.thi.m kho  aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa orambhaagiya.m ^a^M2.0096^ea^ sa.myojana.m desita.m dhaaremi;  vicikiccha.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m desita.m  dhaaremi; siilabbataparaamaasa.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa orambhaagiya.m  sa.myojana.m desita.m dhaaremi; kaamacchanda.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa  orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m desita.m dhaaremi; byaapaada.m kho aha.m, bhante,  bhagavataa orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m desita.m dhaaremi. eva.m kho aha.m,  bhante, dhaaremi bhagavataa desitaani pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaanii''ti.

[03] ``kassa kho naama tva.m, maalukyaputta, imaani eva.m  pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani desitaani dhaaresi? nanu,  maalukyaputta ^a^T2.0155^ea^, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa iminaa taru.nuupamena  upaarambhena upaarambhissanti? daharassa hi, maalukyaputta, kumaarassa  mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa sakkaayotipi na hoti, kuto ^a^P1.0433^ea^  panassa uppajjissati sakkaayadi.t.thi? anusetvevassa {anuseti tvevassa (sii0  pii0)}  sakkaayadi.t.thaanusayo. daharassa hi, maalukyaputta, kumaarassa mandassa  uttaanaseyyakassa dhammaatipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati  dhammesu vicikicchaa? anusetvevassa vicikicchaanusayo. daharassa  hi, maalukyaputta, kumaarassa mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa siilaatipi na  hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati siilesu siilabbataparaamaaso?  anusetvevassa siilabbataparaamaasaanusayo ^a^V2.0104^ea^. daharassa hi, maalukyaputta,  kumaarassa mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa kaamaatipi na hoti, kuto  panassa uppajjissati kaamesu kaamacchando? anusetvevassa  kaamaraagaanusayo. daharassa hi, maalukyaputta, kumaarassa mandassa  uttaanaseyyakassa sattaatipi na hoti, kuto panassa uppajjissati  sattesu byaapaado? anusetvevassa byaapaadaanusayo. nanu,  maalukyaputta, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa iminaa taru.nuupamena  upaarambhena upaarambhissantii''ti? eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando  bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etassa, bhagavaa, kaalo, etassa, sugata,  kaalo ya.m bhagavaa pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani deseyya. bhagavato  sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena haananda, su.naahi, saadhuka.m  manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa ^a^T2.0156^ea^  aanando bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ``idhaananda ^a^M2.0097^ea^, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m  adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito,  sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme  aviniito sakkaayadi.t.thipariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati sakkaayadi.t.thiparetena;  uppannaaya ca sakkaayadi.t.thiyaa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa  saa sakkaayadi.t.thi thaamagataa appa.tiviniitaa orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m.  vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena; uppannaaya  ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa saa  vicikicchaa thaamagataa appa.tiviniitaa orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m.  siilabbataparaamaasapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati  siilabbataparaamaasaparetena; uppannassa ca siilabbataparaamaasassa nissara.na.m  yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa so siilabbataparaamaaso thaamagato  appa.tiviniito orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m. kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa  viharati kaamaraagaparetena ^a^P1.0434^ea^; uppannassa ca  kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa so kaamaraago  thaamagato appa.tiviniito orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m. byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena  cetasaa viharati byaapaadaparetena; uppannassa ca byaapaadassa nissara.na.m  yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa so byaapaado thaamagato appa.tiviniito  orambhaagiya.m sa.myojana.m.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ``sutavaa ca kho, aananda, ariyasaavako ^a^T2.0157^ea^  ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ^a^V2.0105^ea^ ariyadhamme suviniito,  sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme  suviniito na sakkaayadi.t.thipariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na  sakkaayadi.t.thiparetena; uppannaaya ca sakkaayadi.t.thiyaa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati. tassa saa sakkaayadi.t.thi saanusayaa pahiiyati. na  vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na vicikicchaaparetena;  uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa  saa vicikicchaa saanusayaa pahiiyati. na  siilabbataparaamaasapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na  siilabbataparaamaasaparetena; uppannassa ca siilabbataparaamaasassa nissara.na.m  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa so siilabbataparaamaaso saanusayo  pahiiyati. na kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na  kaamaraagaparetena; uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati. tassa so kaamaraago saanusayo pahiiyati ^a^M2.0098^ea^. na  byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na byaapaadaparetena; uppannassa ca  byaapaadassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa so byaapaado  saanusayo pahiiyati.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ ``yo, aananda, maggo yaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m  orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya ta.m magga.m ta.m pa.tipada.m anaagamma  pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa pajahissati  vaati -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, aananda, mahato rukkhassa  ti.t.thato ^a^T2.0158^ea^ saaravato taca.m acchetvaa pheggu.m acchetvaa saaracchedo  bhavissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati; evameva kho, aananda, yo  maggo yaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya ta.m  magga.m ta.m pa.tipada.m anaagamma pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ~nassati  vaa dakkhati vaa pajahissati vaati -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``yo ca kho, aananda, maggo yaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m  orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya ta.m ^a^P1.0435^ea^ magga.m ta.m  pa.tipada.m aagamma pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ~nassati vaa dakkhati  vaa pajahissati vaati -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, aananda,  mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato taca.m chetvaa pheggu.m chetvaa saaracchedo  bhavissatiiti -- .thaanameta.m vijjati; evameva kho, aananda, yo maggo  yaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya ta.m magga.m ta.m  pa.tipada.m aagamma pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani ~nassati vaa dakkhati  vaa pajahissati vaati -- .thaanameta.m vijjati. seyyathaapi, aananda,  ga"ngaa nadii puuraa udakassa samatittikaa ^a^V2.0106^ea^ kaakapeyyaa. atha dubbalako  puriso aagaccheyya -- `aha.m imissaa ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiriya.m baahaaya  sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gacchissaamii'ti {gacchaamiiti (sii0 pii0)}; so na sakku.neyya  ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiriya.m baahaaya sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gantu.m.  evameva kho, aananda, yesa.m kesa~nci {yassa kassaci (sabbattha)} sakkaayanirodhaaya dhamme  desiyamaane citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati na  vimuccati; seyyathaapi ^a^T2.0159^ea^ so dubbalako puriso evamete da.t.thabbaa.  seyyathaapi, aananda, ga"ngaa nadii puuraa udakassa samatittikaa  kaakapeyyaa. atha balavaa puriso aagaccheyya -- `aha.m imissaa  ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiriya.m baahaaya ^a^M2.0099^ea^ sota.m chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m  gacchissaamii'ti; so sakku.neyya ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiriya.m baahaaya sota.m  chetvaa sotthinaa paara.m gantu.m. evameva kho, aananda, yesa.m kesa~nci  sakkaayanirodhaaya dhamme desiyamaane citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati  santi.t.thati vimuccati; seyyathaapi so balavaa puriso evamete da.t.thabbaa.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ``katamo caananda, maggo, katamaa pa.tipadaa  pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya? idhaananda, bhikkhu  upadhivivekaa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaa sabbaso kaayadu.t.thullaana.m  pa.tippassaddhiyaa vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi  savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti ruupagata.m vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m  sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato  sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato  samanupassati. so tehi dhammehi citta.m pa.tivaapeti {pa.tipaapeti (syaa0),  pati.t.thaapeti (ka0)}. so tehi  dhammehi citta.m pa.tivaapetvaa amataaya dhaatuyaa ^a^P1.0436^ea^ citta.m  upasa.mharati -- `eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho  sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ^a^T2.0160^ea^ ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana'nti.  so tattha .thito aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.naati; no ce aasavaana.m khaya.m  paapu.naati teneva dhammaraagena taaya dhammanandiyaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m  sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii,  anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho, aananda, maggo aya.m  pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m  vuupasamaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0161^ea^ dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati... ^a^V2.0107^ea^   tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so yadeva tattha  hoti ruupagata.m vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m...  anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho, aananda, maggo aya.m  pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m  samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa  `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so  yadeva tattha hoti vedanaagata.m ^a^M2.0100^ea^ sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m  vi~n~naa.nagata.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0162^ea^ anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho,  aananda, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m  pahaanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja  viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m  vi~n~naa.nagata.m...pe0... ^a^V2.0108^ea^ anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa.  ayampi kho, aananda, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m  sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati.  so yadeva tattha hoti vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m  vi~n~naa.nagata.m...pe0... ^a^P1.0437^ea^ anaavattidhammo tasmaa  lokaa. ayampi kho, aananda, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m  orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``eso ce, bhante, maggo esaa pa.tipadaa pa~ncanna.m  orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya, atha ki~ncarahi idhekacce bhikkhuu  cetovimuttino ekacce bhikkhuu pa~n~naavimuttino''ti? ``ettha kho  panesaaha.m {ettha kho tesaaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, aananda, indriyavemattata.m vadaamii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa aanando bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] mahaamaalukyasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0163^ea^ ^a^V2.0109^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu  bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, bhikkhave,  ekaasanabhojana.m bhu~njaami; ekaasanabhojana.m kho, aha.m, bhikkhave,  bhu~njamaano appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaami ^a^M2.0101^ea^ appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca  phaasuvihaara~nca. etha, tumhepi, bhikkhave, ekaasanabhojana.m bhu~njatha;  ekaasanabhojana.m kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca  sa~njaanissatha appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~ncaa''ti.  eva.m vutte, aayasmaa bhaddaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho,  bhante, na ussahaami ekaasanabhojana.m bhu~njitu.m; ekaasanabhojana~nhi me,  bhante, bhu~njato siyaa kukkucca.m, siyaa vippa.tisaaro''ti. ``tena hi  tva.m, bhaddaali, yattha nimantito assasi tattha ekadesa.m bhu~njitvaa  ekadesa.m niiharitvaapi bhu~njeyyaasi. evampi kho ^a^P1.0438^ea^  tva.m, bhaddaali, bhu~njamaano ekaasano yaapessasii''ti {bhu~njamaano yaapessasiiti  (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ``evampi kho  aha.m, bhante, na ussahaami bhu~njitu.m; evampi hi me, bhante, bhu~njato  siyaa kukkucca.m, siyaa vippa.tisaaro''ti. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddaali  bhagavataa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane  anussaaha.m pavedesi. atha ^a^T2.0164^ea^ kho aayasmaa bhaddaali sabba.m ta.m temaasa.m na  bhagavato sammukhiibhaava.m adaasi, yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya  aparipuurakaarii.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu  bhagavato ciivarakamma.m karonti -- ni.t.thitaciivaro bhagavaa temaasaccayena  caarika.m pakkamissatiiti. atha kho aayasmaa bhaddaali yena te bhikkhuu  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa tehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m sammodi.  sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m bhaddaali.m te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m --  ``ida.m kho, aavuso bhaddaali, bhagavato ciivarakamma.m kariiyati {kara.niiya.m (ka0)}.  ni.t.thitaciivaro bhagavaa temaasaccayena caarika.m pakkamissati. i"nghaavuso  bhaddaali, eta.m dosaka.m saadhuka.m manasi karohi, maa te pacchaa dukkaratara.m  ahosii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa ^a^V2.0110^ea^ bhaddaali tesa.m  bhikkhuuna.m pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa  bhaddaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa  yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yoha.m bhagavataa sikkhaapade  pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi.m.  tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m  sa.mvaraayaa''ti.

[03] ``taggha ^a^M2.0102^ea^ tva.m, bhaddaali, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m  ^a^T2.0165^ea^ yathaaakusala.m, ya.m tva.m mayaa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe  sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi. samayopi kho te,  bhaddaali, appa.tividdho ahosi -- `bhagavaa kho saavatthiya.m viharati,  bhagavaapi ma.m jaanissati -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu satthusaasane  sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali, samayo  appa.tividdho ahosi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali, appa.tividdho  ahosi -- `sambahulaa kho ^a^P1.0439^ea^ bhikkhu saavatthiya.m  vassa.m upagataa, tepi ma.m jaanissanti -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu  satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali,  samayo appa.tividdho ahosi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali,  appa.tividdho ahosi -- `sambahulaa kho bhikkhuniyo saavatthiya.m  vassa.m upagataa, taapi ma.m jaanissanti -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu  satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali,  samayo appa.tividdho ahosi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali,  appa.tividdho ahosi -- `sambahulaa kho upaasakaa saavatthiya.m  pa.tivasanti, tepi ma.m jaanissanti -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu  satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali,  samayo appa.tividdho ahosi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali,  appa.tividdho ahosi -- `sambahulaa kho upaasikaa saavatthiya.m  pa.tivasanti, taapi ma.m jaanissanti -- bhaddaali naama bhikkhu  satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali ^a^T2.0166^ea^,  samayo appa.tividdho ahosi. samayopi kho te, bhaddaali,  appa.tividdho ahosi -- `sambahulaa kho naanaatitthiyaa sama.nabraahma.naa  saavatthiya.m vassa.m upagataa, tepi ma.m jaanissanti -- bhaddaali naama  bhikkhu sama.nassa gotamassa saavako thera~n~nataro bhikkhu saasane  sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho te, bhaddaali, samayo  appa.tividdho ahosii''ti.

[03] ``accayo ^a^V2.0111^ea^ ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m  yathaaakusala.m, yoha.m bhagavataa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe  sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi.m. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa  accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha tva.m,  bhaddaali, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, ya.m tva.m  mayaa sikkhaapade ^a^M2.0103^ea^ pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane  anussaaha.m pavedesi''.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, bhaddaali, idhassa bhikkhu  ubhatobhaagavimutto, tamaha.m eva.m vadeyya.m -- `ehi me tva.m, bhikkhu, pa"nke  sa"nkamo hohii'ti, api nu kho so sa"nkameyya vaa a~n~nena vaa kaaya.m  sannaameyya, `no'ti vaa vadeyyaa''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, bhaddaali, idhassa bhikkhu pa~n~naavimutto...  kaayasakkhi... di.t.thippatto... saddhaavimutto... dhammaanusaarii...  saddhaanusaarii, tamaha.m eva.m vadeyya.m -- `ehi me tva.m, bhikkhu, pa"nke  sa"nkamo hohii'ti, api nu kho so sa"nkameyya vaa a~n~nena vaa kaaya.m  sannaameyya, `no'ti vaa vadeyyaa''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ^a^T2.0167^ea^ ma~n~nasi, bhaddaali, api nu tva.m, bhaddaali, tasmi.m  samaye ubhatobhaagavimutto vaa hosi pa~n~naavimutto ^a^P1.0440^ea^  vaa kaayasakkhi vaa di.t.thippatto vaa saddhaavimutto vaa dhammaanusaarii vaa  saddhaanusaarii vaa''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``nanu tva.m, bhaddaali, tasmi.m samaye ritto tuccho aparaddho''ti?

[03] ``eva.m ^a^V2.0112^ea^, bhante. accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m  yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yoha.m bhagavataa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane  bhikkhusa"nghe sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi.m. tassa me,  bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti.  ``taggha tva.m, bhaddaali, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m  yathaaakusala.m, ya.m tva.m mayaa sikkhaapade pa~n~naapiyamaane bhikkhusa"nghe  sikkha.m samaadiyamaane anussaaha.m pavedesi. yato ca kho tva.m,  bhaddaali, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarosi, ta.m te maya.m  pa.tigga.nhaama. vuddhihesaa, bhaddaali, ariyassa vinaye yo accaya.m  accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti, aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjati''.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu satthusaasane  sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m  vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajeyya.m ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m  susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m ^a^T2.0168^ea^ palaalapu~nja.m. appeva naamaaha.m uttari {uttari.m (sii0  syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}  manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikareyya'nti. so  vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m ^a^M2.0104^ea^ kandara.m giriguha.m  susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. tassa tathaavuupaka.t.thassa  viharato satthaapi upavadati, anuviccapi vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii  upavadanti, devataapi upavadanti, attaapi attaana.m upavadati. so  satthaaraapi upavadito, anuviccapi vi~n~nuuhi sabrahmacaariihi upavadito,  devataahipi upavadito, attanaapi attaana.m upavadito na uttari  manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikaroti. ta.m kissa  hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya  aparipuurakaarissa.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu  satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarii hoti. tassa eva.m hoti --  `ya.mnuunaaha.m vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajeyya.m ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m  giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m ^a^P1.0441^ea^ palaalapu~nja.m.  appeva naamaaha.m uttari manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m  sacchikareyya'nti. so vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m  pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m.  tassa tathaavuupaka.t.thassa viharato satthaapi na upavadati, anuviccapi  vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii na upavadanti, devataapi na upavadanti, attaapi  attaana.m na upavadati. so satthaaraapi anupavadito ^a^V2.0113^ea^, anuviccapi  vi~n~nuuhi sabrahmacaariihi anupavadito, devataahipi anupavadito,  attanaapi attaana.m anupavadito uttari manussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikaroti. so vivicceva kaamehi  vivicca ^a^T2.0169^ea^ akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m,  bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissa.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m  vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m  samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ta.m kissa  hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya  paripuurakaarissa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako  ca viharati, sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m  ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m  jhaana.m ^a^M2.0105^ea^ upasampajja viharati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali,  hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa  ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m  upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ta.m kissa  hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya  paripuurakaarissa.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m  pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi  jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussarati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ^a^P1.0442^ea^ ta.m,  bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissa.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne ^a^T2.0170^ea^  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m  cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa  visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine  pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati  -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa...pe0...  vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena  samannaagataa...pe0... sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti iti dibbena  cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte  pajaanaati. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m  satthusaasane sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissa.

[03] ``so ^a^V2.0114^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m  khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m  dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati,  `aya.m ^a^M2.0106^ea^ aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati,  vusita.m ^a^T2.0171^ea^ brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati.  ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nhi ta.m, bhaddaali, hoti yathaa ta.m satthusaasane  sikkhaaya paripuurakaarissaa''ti.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa bhaddaali bhagavanta.m etadavoca  -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacca.m bhikkhu.m  pasayha pasayha {pavayha pavayha (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kaara.na.m karonti? ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo  yena midhekacca.m bhikkhu.m no tathaa pasayha pasayha kaara.na.m karontii''ti?  ``idha, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu abhi.nhaapattiko hoti  aapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati,  bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti,  na sammaa vattati, na loma.m paateti, na netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho  attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti naaha. tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m  hoti -- aya.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu ^a^V2.0115^ea^ abhi.nhaapattiko aapattibahulo.  so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m  apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, na sammaa  vattati, na loma.m paateti, na netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano  hoti ^a^P1.0443^ea^ ta.m karomii'ti naaha. saadhu vataayasmanto  imassa bhikkhuno tathaa tathaa upaparikkhatha yathaassida.m {yathayida.m (syaa0 ka.m0  ka0)} adhikara.na.m na  khippameva vuupasameyyaati. tassa kho eva.m, bhaddaali, bhikkhuno  bhikkhuu ^a^T2.0172^ea^ tathaa tathaa upaparikkhanti yathaassida.m adhikara.na.m na khippameva  vuupasammati.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu  abhi.nhaapattiko hoti aapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano  naa~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m na apanaameti, na kopa~nca  dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti,  netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano ^a^M2.0107^ea^ hoti ta.m karomii'ti aaha.  tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- aya.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu  abhi.nhaapattiko aapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano naa~n~nena~n~na.m  pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m na apanaameti, na kopa~nca dosa~nca  appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m  vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti aaha. saadhu  vataayasmanto, imassa bhikkhuno tathaa tathaa upaparikkhatha yathaassida.m  adhikara.na.m khippameva vuupasameyyaati. tassa kho eva.m, bhaddaali,  bhikkhuno bhikkhuu tathaa tathaa upaparikkhanti yathaassida.m adhikara.na.m  khippameva vuupasammati.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``idha, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu  adhiccaapattiko hoti anaapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano  a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca  appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, na sammaa vattati, na loma.m paateti, na  netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti naaha.  tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- aya.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu  adhiccaapattiko anaapattibahulo ^a^T2.0173^ea^. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano a~n~nena~n~na.m  pa.ticarati, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca  paatukaroti, na sammaa vattati, na loma.m paateti, na netthaara.m vattati,  `yena sa"ngho attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti naaha. saadhu  vataayasmanto, imassa bhikkhuno tathaa tathaa upaparikkhatha yathaassida.m ^a^V2.0116^ea^  adhikara.na.m na khippameva vuupasameyyaati. tassa kho eva.m, bhaddaali,  bhikkhuno bhikkhuu tathaa tathaa upaparikkhanti yathaassida.m adhikara.na.m  ^a^P1.0444^ea^ na khippameva vuupasammati.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu  adhiccaapattiko hoti anaapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano  naa~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticarati, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, na kopa~nca  dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti,  netthaara.m vattati, `yena sa"ngho attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti aaha.  tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- aya.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu  adhiccaapattiko anaapattibahulo. so bhikkhuuhi vuccamaano naa~n~nena~n~na.m  pa.ticarati, na bahiddhaa katha.m apanaameti, na kopa~nca dosa~nca  appaccaya~nca paatukaroti, sammaa vattati, loma.m paateti, netthaara.m  vattati, `yena sa"ngho ^a^M2.0108^ea^ attamano hoti ta.m karomii'ti aaha. saadhu  vataayasmanto, imassa bhikkhuno tathaa tathaa upaparikkhatha yathaassida.m   adhikara.na.m khippameva vuupasameyyaati. tassa kho eva.m, bhaddaali,  bhikkhuno bhikkhuu tathaa tathaa upaparikkhanti yathaassida.m adhikara.na.m  khippameva vuupasammati.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^T2.0174^ea^, bhaddaali, ekacco bhikkhu saddhaamattakena  vahati pemamattakena. tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- `aya.m  kho, aavuso, bhikkhu saddhaamattakena vahati pemamattakena. sace maya.m  ima.m bhikkhu.m pasayha pasayha kaara.na.m karissaama -- maa yampissa ta.m  saddhaamattaka.m pemamattaka.m tamhaapi parihaayii'ti. seyyathaapi, bhaddaali,  purisassa eka.m cakkhu.m, tassa mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa ta.m eka.m  cakkhu.m rakkheyyu.m -- `maa yampissa ta.m eka.m cakkhu.m tamhaapi  parihaayii'ti; evameva kho, bhaddaali, idhekacco bhikkhu saddhaamattakena  vahati pemamattakena. tatra, bhaddaali, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m hoti -- `aya.m  kho, aavuso, bhikkhu saddhaamattakena vahati pemamattakena. sace maya.m  ima.m bhikkhu.m pasayha pasayha kaara.na.m karissaama -- maa yampissa ta.m  saddhaamattaka.m pemamattaka.m tamhaapi parihaayii'ti. aya.m kho, bhaddaali,  hetu aya.m paccayo yena midhekacca.m bhikkhu.m pasayha pasayha kaara.na.m  karonti. aya.m pana, bhaddaali, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena midhekacca.m  bhikkhu.m no tathaa pasayha pasayha kaara.na.m karontii''ti.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ ```ko ^a^V2.0117^ea^ nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena  pubbe appataraani ^a^P1.0445^ea^ ceva sikkhaapadaani ahesu.m  bahutaraa ca bhikkhuu a~n~naaya sa.n.thahi.msu? ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko  paccayo yena etarahi bahutaraani ceva sikkhaapadaani honti appataraa  ca bhikkhuu a~n~naaya sa.n.thahantii'ti? ``evameta.m, bhaddaali, hoti sattesu  haayamaanesu, saddhamme ^a^T2.0175^ea^ antaradhaayamaane, bahutaraani ceva sikkhaapadaani  honti appataraa ca bhikkhuu a~n~naaya sa.n.thahantiiti. na taava,  bhaddaali, satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~naapeti yaava na idhekacce  aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti. yato ca kho, bhaddaali,  idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti, atha satthaa  saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~naapeti tesa.myeva aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m  pa.tighaataaya. na taava, bhaddaali, idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe  paatubhavanti yaava na sa"ngho mahatta.m patto hoti. yato ca kho,  bhaddaali, sa"ngho mahatta.m patto hoti, atha idhekacce ^a^M2.0109^ea^ aasava.t.thaaniiyaa  dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti. atha satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m  pa~n~naapeti tesa.myeva aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tighaataaya. na taava,  bhaddaali, idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe paatubhavanti yaava na  sa"ngho laabhagga.m patto hoti, yasagga.m patto hoti, baahusacca.m patto  hoti, ratta~n~nuta.m patto hoti. yato ca kho, bhaddaali, sa"ngho  ratta~n~nuta.m patto hoti, atha idhekacce aasava.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa sa"nghe  paatubhavanti, atha satthaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~naapeti tesa.myeva  aasava.t.thaaniiyaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tighaataaya.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ ``appakaa kho tumhe, bhaddaali, tena samayena  ahuvattha yadaa vo aha.m aajaaniiyasusuupama.m dhammapariyaaya.m desesi.m. ta.m  sarasi {sarasi tva.m (sii0 pii0), sarasi ta.m (?)} bhaddaalii''ti ^a^T2.0176^ea^?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``tatra, bhaddaali, ka.m hetu.m paccesii''ti?
[03] ``so hi nuunaaha.m, bhante, diigharatta.m satthusaasane sikkhaaya  aparipuurakaarii ahosi''nti.

[03] ``na kho, bhaddaali, eseva hetu, esa paccayo. api ca me  tva.m, bhaddaali, diigharatta.m cetasaa ^a^V2.0118^ea^ cetoparicca vidito -- `na caaya.m  moghapuriso mayaa dhamme desiyamaane a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa  sabbacetaso {sabba.m cetaso (ka0)} samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naatii'ti. api ca  te aha.m, bhaddaali, aajaaniiyasusuupama.m dhammapariyaaya.m desessaami. ta.m  su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi ^a^P1.0446^ea^;  bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa bhaddaali bhagavato  paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhaddaali, dakkho assadamako  bhadra.m assaajaaniiya.m labhitvaa pa.thameneva mukhaadhaane kaara.na.m kaareti.  tassa mukhaadhaane kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa hontiyeva visuukaayitaani  visevitaani vipphanditaani kaanici kaanici, yathaa ta.m akaaritapubba.m  kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa. so abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m  .thaane parinibbaayati. yato kho, bhaddaali, bhadro assaajaaniiyo  abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m .thaane parinibbuto hoti, tamena.m  assadamako uttari kaara.na.m kaareti yugaadhaane. tassa yugaadhaane  kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa hontiyeva visuukaayitaani visevitaani  vipphanditaani kaanici kaanici, yathaa ta.m akaaritapubba.m kaara.na.m  kaariyamaanassa. so abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m ^a^T2.0177^ea^ .thaane  parinibbaayati ^a^M2.0110^ea^. yato kho, bhaddaali, bhadro assaajaaniiyo  abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m .thaane parinibbuto hoti, tamena.m  assadamako uttari kaara.na.m kaareti anukkame ma.n.dale khurakaase {khurakaaye (sii0  pii0)} dhaave  davatte {ravatthe (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} raajagu.ne raajava.mse uttame jave uttame haye uttame saakhalye.  tassa uttame jave uttame haye uttame saakhalye kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa  hontiyeva visuukaayitaani visevitaani vipphanditaani kaanici  kaanici, yathaa ta.m akaaritapubba.m kaara.na.m kaariyamaanassa. so  abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa tasmi.m .thaane parinibbaayati. yato  kho, bhaddaali, bhadro assaajaaniiyo abhi.nhakaara.naa anupubbakaara.naa  tasmi.m .thaane parinibbuto hoti, tamena.m assadamako uttari va.n.niya~nca  paa.niya~nca {valiya~nca (sii0 pii0), baliya~nca (syaa0 ka.m0)} anuppavecchati. imehi   kho, bhaddaali, dasaha"ngehi  samannaagato bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo ra~n~no  a"nganteva sa"nkhya.m gacchati.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhaddaali, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu  aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m  pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi dasahi? idha, bhaddaali, bhikkhu  asekhaaya sammaadi.t.thiyaa samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaasa"nkappena  samannaagato hoti, asekhaaya ^a^V2.0119^ea^ sammaavaacaaya samannaagato hoti, asekhena  sammaakammantena samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaaaajiivena  samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaavaayaamena samannaagato hoti ^a^T2.0178^ea^,  asekhaaya sammaasatiyaa ^a^P1.0447^ea^ samannaagato hoti,  asekhena sammaasamaadhinaa samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaa~naa.nena  samannaagato hoti, asekhaaya sammaavimuttiyaa samannaagato hoti --  imehi kho, bhaddaali, dasahi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo  hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m  lokassaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa bhaddaali bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] bhaddaalisutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0179^ea^ ^a^M2.0111^ea^ ^a^V2.0120^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa  a"nguttaraapesu viharati aapa.na.m naama a"nguttaraapaana.m nigamo. atha kho  bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aapa.na.m pi.n.daaya  paavisi. aapa.ne pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto  yena~n~nataro vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. ta.m vanasa.n.da.m  ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisiidi.  aayasmaapi kho udaayii pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya  aapa.na.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. aapa.ne pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m  pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena so vanasa.n.do tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya.  ta.m vanasa.n.da.m ajjhogaahetvaa a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m  nisiidi. atha kho aayasmato udaayissa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa  eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``bahuuna.m {bahunna.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)  evamiidise avi~n~naa.nakappakara.ne} vata no bhagavaa  dukkhadhammaana.m apahattaa, bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa sukhadhammaana.m upahattaa;  bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m apahattaa, bahuuna.m vata no  bhagavaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upahattaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii  saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^P1.0448^ea^.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa udaayii  bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^T2.0180^ea^ -- ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa  eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa  dukkhadhammaana.m apahattaa, bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa sukhadhammaana.m upahattaa;  bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa akusalaana.m dhammaana.m apahattaa, bahuuna.m vata no  bhagavaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upahattaa'ti. maya~nhi, bhante, pubbe  saaya~nceva bhu~njaama paato ca divaa ca vikaale. ahu kho so, bhante,  samayo ya.m bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- `i"ngha tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m  divaavikaalabhojana.m pajahathaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, ahudeva  a~n~nathatta.m, ahudeva {ahu (sii0 pii0)} domanassa.m -- `yampi no saddhaa gahapatikaa divaa  vikaale pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m denti tassapi no bhagavaa  pahaanamaaha, tassapi no sugato pa.tinissaggamaahaa'ti. te ^a^M2.0112^ea^ maya.m,  bhante, bhagavati pema~nca gaarava~nca hiri~nca ottappa~nca sampassamaanaa ^a^V2.0121^ea^   eva.m ta.m divaavikaalabhojana.m pajahimhaa. te maya.m, bhante, saaya~nceva  bhu~njaama paato ca. ahu kho so, bhante, samayo ya.m bhagavaa bhikkhuu  aamantesi -- `i"ngha tumhe, bhikkhave, eta.m ratti.mvikaalabhojana.m  pajahathaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhante, ahudeva a~n~nathatta.m ahudeva domanassa.m  -- `yampi no imesa.m dvinna.m bhattaana.m pa.niitasa"nkhaatatara.m tassapi no  bhagavaa pahaanamaaha, tassapi no sugato pa.tinissaggamaahaa'ti.  bhuutapubba.m, bhante, a~n~nataro puriso divaa suupeyya.m labhitvaa evamaaha --  `handa ca ima.m nikkhipatha, saaya.m sabbeva samaggaa ^a^T2.0181^ea^ bhu~njissaamaa'ti.  yaa kaaci, bhante, sa"nkhatiyo sabbaa taa ratti.m, appaa divaa. te  maya.m, bhante, bhagavati pema~nca gaarava~nca hiri~nca ottappa~nca  sampassamaanaa eva.m ta.m ratti.mvikaalabhojana.m pajahimhaa. bhuutapubba.m, bhante,  bhikkhuu rattandhakaaratimisaaya.m pi.n.daaya carantaa candanikampi  pavisanti, oligallepi papatanti, ka.n.takaavaa.tampi {ka.n.takavattampi (sii0 pii0),  ka.n.takaraajimpi (syaa0 ka.m0)} aarohanti, suttampi  gaavi.m aarohanti, maa.navehipi samaagacchanti katakammehipi  akatakammehipi, maatugaamopi te {tena (ka0)} asaddhammena nimanteti. bhuutapubbaaha.m,  bhante, rattandhakaaratimisaaya.m pi.n.daaya caraami. addasaa kho ma.m, bhante,  a~n~nataraa itthii vijjantarikaaya bhaajana.m dhovantii. disvaa ma.m bhiitaa  vissaramakaasi -- `abhumme {abbhumme (sii0 pii0)} pisaaco vata ma'nti! eva.m vutte, aha.m,  bhante, ta.m itthi.m etadavoca.m -- `naaha.m, bhagini, pisaaco; bhikkhu  pi.n.daaya ^a^P1.0449^ea^ .thito'ti. `bhikkhussa aatumaarii,  bhikkhussa maatumaarii {.thito'ti. bhikkhussa aatumaatumaarii (ka0)}! vara.m te,   bhikkhu, ti.nhena govikantanena  kucchi parikanto, na tveva vara.m ya.m {na tveva yaa (sii0 pii0)} rattandhakaaratimisaaya.m kucchihetu  pi.n.daaya carasii'ti {carasaati (sii0 pii0)}. tassa mayha.m, bhante, tadanussarato eva.m  hoti -- `bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa dukkhadhammaana.m apahattaa, bahuuna.m vata  no bhagavaa sukhadhammaana.m upahattaa; bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m apahattaa, bahuuna.m vata no bhagavaa kusalaana.m dhammaana.m  upahattaa'''ti.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ ``evameva panudaayi, idhekacce moghapurisaa  `ida.m pajahathaa'ti mayaa ^a^T2.0182^ea^ vuccamaanaa te evamaaha.msu -- `ki.m panimassa  appamattakassa oramattakassa adhisallikhatevaaya.m sama.no'ti. te  ta~nceva nappajahanti, mayi ^a^M2.0113^ea^ ca appaccaya.m upa.t.thaapenti. ye ca bhikkhuu  sikkhaakaamaa tesa.m ta.m, udaayi, hoti balava.m bandhana.m, da.lha.m bandhana.m,  thira.m bandhana.m, apuutika.m bandhana.m, thuulo, kali"ngaro -- seyyathaapi,  udaayi, la.tukikaa saku.nikaa puutilataaya bandhanena baddhaa tattheva vadha.m  vaa bandha.m vaa mara.na.m vaa aagameti. yo nu kho, udaayi, eva.m vadeyya  -- `yena saa la.tukikaa saku.nikaa puutilataaya bandhanena baddhaa tattheva  vadha.m vaa bandha.m vaa mara.na.m vaa aagameti, ta~nhi tassaa abala.m bandhana.m ^a^V2.0122^ea^,  dubbala.m bandhana.m, puutika.m bandhana.m, asaaraka.m bandhana'nti; sammaa nu kho  so, udaayi, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante. yena saa,  bhante, la.tukikaa saku.nikaa puutilataaya bandhanena baddhaa tattheva vadha.m vaa  bandha.m vaa mara.na.m vaa aagameti, ta~nhi tassaa balava.m bandhana.m, da.lha.m  bandhana.m, thira.m bandhana.m apuutika.m bandhana.m, thuulo, kali"ngaro''ti.  ``evameva kho, udaayi, idhekacce moghapurisaa `ida.m pajahathaa'ti mayaa  vuccamaanaa te evamaaha.msu -- `ki.m panimassa appamattakassa  oramattakassa adhisallikhatevaaya.m sama.no'ti? te ta~nceva  nappajahanti, mayi ca appaccaya.m upa.t.thaapenti. ye ca bhikkhuu  sikkhaakaamaa tesa.m ta.m, udaayi, hoti balava.m bandhana.m, da.lha.m bandhana.m,  thira.m bandhana.m, apuutika.m bandhana.m, thuulo, kali"ngaro''.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^T2.0183^ea^ panudaayi, ekacce kulaputtaa `ida.m  pajahathaa'ti mayaa ^a^P1.0450^ea^ vuccamaanaa te evamaaha.msu --  `ki.m panimassa appamattakassa oramattakassa pahaatabbassa yassa no  bhagavaa pahaanamaaha, yassa no sugato pa.tinissaggamaahaa'ti? [03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa udaayii bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0193^ea^ ^a^V2.0129^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa caatumaaya.m  viharati aamalakiivane. tena kho pana samayena  saariputtamoggallaanappamukhaani pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani caatuma.m  anuppattaani honti bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. te ca aagantukaa bhikkhuu  nevaasikehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammodamaanaa senaasanaani  pa~n~naapayamaanaa pattaciivaraani pa.tisaamayamaanaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa ahesu.m.  atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ke panete,  aananda, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa, keva.t.taa ma~n~ne macchavilope''ti?  ``etaani, bhante, saariputtamoggallaanappamukhaani pa~ncamattaani  bhikkhusataani caatuma.m ^a^M2.0120^ea^ anuppattaani bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. te aagantukaa  bhikkhuu nevaasikehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammodamaanaa senaasanaani  pa~n~naapayamaanaa pattaciivaraani pa.tisaamayamaanaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa''ti.  ``tenahaananda, mama vacanena te bhikkhuu aamantehi -- `satthaa  aayasmante aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa  aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``satthaa aayasmante  aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu ^a^P1.0457^ea^  aayasmato aanandassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te ^a^T2.0194^ea^ bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca --  ``ki.m nu tumhe, bhikkhave, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa, keva.t.taa ma~n~ne  macchavilope''ti? ``imaani, bhante, saariputtamoggallaanappamukhaani  pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani caatuma.m anuppattaani bhagavanta.m dassanaaya.  teme aagantukaa bhikkhuu nevaasikehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammodamaanaa  senaasanaani pa~n~naapayamaanaa pattaciivaraani pa.tisaamayamaanaa uccaasaddaa  mahaasaddaa''ti. ``gacchatha, bhikkhave, pa.naamemi vo, na vo mama  santike vatthabba''nti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato  pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa  senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya pakkami.msu.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena caatumeyyakaa sakyaa  santhaagaare {sandhaagaare (ka0)} sannipatitaa honti kenacideva ^a^V2.0130^ea^ kara.niiyena. addasa.msu kho  caatumeyyakaa sakyaa te bhikkhuu duuratova aagacchante; disvaana yena te  bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavocu.m --  ``handa, kaha.m pana tumhe aayasmanto gacchathaa''ti? ``bhagavataa kho,  aavuso, bhikkhusa"ngho pa.naamito''ti. ``tenahaayasmanto muhutta.m  nisiidatha, appeva naama maya.m sakku.neyyaama bhagavanta.m pasaadetu''nti.  ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu caatumeyyakaana.m sakyaana.m paccassosu.m.  atha kho caatumeyyakaa sakyaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m ^a^T2.0195^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m  nisinnaa kho caatumeyyakaa sakyaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --  ``abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m; abhivadatu, bhante, bhagavaa  bhikkhusa"ngha.m. seyyathaapi, bhante ^a^M2.0121^ea^, bhagavataa pubbe bhikkhusa"ngho  anuggahito, evameva bhagavaa etarahi anugga.nhaatu bhikkhusa"ngha.m.  santettha, bhante, bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m  dhammavinaya.m. tesa.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya alabhantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m,  siyaa vipari.naamo. seyyathaapi, bhante, biijaana.m taru.naana.m udaka.m  alabhantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m siyaa vipari.naamo; evameva kho, bhante,  santettha bhikkhuu ^a^P1.0458^ea^ navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa  ima.m dhammavinaya.m, tesa.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya alabhantaana.m siyaa  a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo. seyyathaapi, bhante, vacchassa taru.nassa  maatara.m apassantassa siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo; evameva  kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m  dhammavinaya.m, tesa.m bhagavanta.m apassantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa  vipari.naamo. abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m; abhivadatu,  bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m. seyyathaapi, bhante, bhagavataa pubbe  bhikkhusa"ngho anuggahito; evameva bhagavaa etarahi anugga.nhaatu  bhikkhusa"ngha''nti.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ atha kho brahmaa sahampati bhagavato cetasaa  cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m {sammi~njita.m  (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}  vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva --  brahmaloke ^a^T2.0196^ea^ antarahito bhagavato purato paaturahosi. atha kho brahmaa  sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa  bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m;  abhivadatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m. seyyathaapi, bhante, bhagavataa  pubbe bhikkhusa"ngho anuggahito; evameva bhagavaa etarahi anugga.nhaatu  bhikkhusa"ngha.m. santettha, bhante, bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa  adhunaagataa ima.m dhammavinaya.m, tesa.m bhagavanta.m ^a^V2.0131^ea^ dassanaaya alabhantaana.m  siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo. seyyathaapi, bhante, biijaana.m  taru.naana.m udaka.m alabhantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo;  evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhuu navaa acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa  ima.m dhammavinaya.m, tesa.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya alabhantaana.m siyaa  a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo. seyyathaapi bhante, vacchassa taru.nassa  maatara.m apassantassa siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa vipari.naamo; evameva  kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhuu navaa ^a^M2.0122^ea^ acirapabbajitaa adhunaagataa ima.m  dhammavinaya.m, tesa.m bhagavanta.m apassantaana.m siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, siyaa  vipari.naamo. abhinandatu, bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m; abhivadatu,  bhante, bhagavaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m. seyyathaapi, bhante, bhagavataa pubbe  bhikkhusa"ngho ^a^P1.0459^ea^ anuggahito; evameva bhagavaa etarahi  anugga.nhaatu bhikkhusa"ngha''nti.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ asakkhi.msu kho caatumeyyakaa ca sakyaa brahmaa  ca sahampati bhagavanta.m pasaadetu.m biijuupamena ca taru.nuupamena ca. atha ^a^T2.0197^ea^  kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``u.t.thethaavuso,  ga.nhatha pattaciivara.m. pasaadito bhagavaa caatumeyyakehi ca sakyehi  brahmunaa ca sahampatinaa biijuupamena ca taru.nuupamena caa''ti.  ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa  pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m  nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m saariputta.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kinti te,  saariputta, ahosi mayaa bhikkhusa"nghe pa.naamite''ti? ``eva.m kho  me, bhante, ahosi -- `bhagavataa bhikkhusa"ngho pa.naamito.  appossukko daani bhagavaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m anuyutto viharissati,  mayampi daani appossukkaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaramanuyuttaa  viharissaamaa'''ti. ``aagamehi tva.m, saariputta, aagamehi tva.m,  saariputta, di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara''nti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m  mahaamoggallaana.m aamantesi -- ``kinti te, moggallaana, ahosi mayaa  bhikkhusa"nghe pa.naamite''ti? ``eva.m kho me, bhante, ahosi --  `bhagavataa bhikkhusa"ngho pa.naamito. appossukko daani bhagavaa  di.t.thadhammasukhavihaara.m anuyutto viharissati, aha~nca daani aayasmaa ca  saariputto bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamaa'''ti. ``saadhu saadhu,  moggallaana! aha.m vaa hi, moggallaana ^a^T2.0198^ea^, bhikkhusa"ngha.m parihareyya.m  saariputtamoggallaanaa vaa''ti.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0132^ea^ kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --  ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, bhayaani udakorohante paa.tika"nkhitabbaani.  katamaani cattaari? uumibhaya.m {ummiibhaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}, kumbhiilabhaya.m, aava.t.tabhaya.m, susukaabhaya.m  -- imaani, bhikkhave, cattaari bhayaani udakorohante  paa.tika"nkhitabbaani. evameva kho, bhikkhave, cattaarimaani bhayaani ^a^M2.0123^ea^   idhekacce puggale imasmi.m dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajite  paa.tika"nkhitabbaani. katamaani ^a^P1.0460^ea^ cattaari?  uumibhaya.m, kumbhiilabhaya.m, aava.t.tabhaya.m, susukaabhaya.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, uumibhaya.m? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito  hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi  dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva  naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti.  tamena.m tathaa pabbajita.m samaana.m sabrahmacaarii ovadanti, anusaasanti --  `eva.m te abhikkamitabba.m, eva.m te pa.tikkamitabba.m, eva.m te aalokitabba.m,  eva.m te vilokitabba.m, eva.m te sami~njitabba.m, eva.m te pasaaritabba.m, eva.m  te sa"nghaa.tipattaciivara.m dhaaretabba'nti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `maya.m kho  pubbe agaariyabhuutaa samaanaa a~n~ne ovadaama, anusaasaama {ovadaamapi  anusaasaamapi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ime  panamhaaka.m puttamattaa ma~n~ne, nattamattaa ma~n~ne, amhe {eva.m (ka0)} ovaditabba.m   ^a^T2.0199^ea^ anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nantii'ti. so sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati.  aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, uumibhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya  hiinaayaavatto. `uumibhaya'nti kho, bhikkhave, kodhupaayaasasseta.m  adhivacana.m.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, kumbhiilabhaya.m? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito  hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi  dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva  naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti.  tamena.m tathaa pabbajita.m samaana.m sabrahmacaarii ovadanti anusaasanti --  `ida.m te khaaditabba.m, ida.m te na khaaditabba.m; ida.m te bhu~njitabba.m, ida.m  te na bhu~njitabba.m; ida.m te saayitabba.m, ida.m te na saayitabba.m; ida.m te  paatabba.m, ida.m te na paatabba.m; kappiya.m te khaaditabba.m, akappiya.m te na  khaaditabba.m; kappiya.m te bhu~njitabba.m, akappiya.m te na bhu~njitabba.m;  kappiya.m te saayitabba.m, akappiya.m te na saayitabba.m ^a^V2.0133^ea^; kappiya.m te  paatabba.m, akappiya.m te na paatabba.m; kaale te khaaditabba.m, vikaale te na  khaaditabba.m; kaale te bhu~njitabba.m, vikaale te ^a^M2.0124^ea^ na bhu~njitabba.m; kaale te  saayitabba.m, vikaale te na saayitabba.m; kaale te paatabba.m, vikaale te  na paatabba'nti. tassa eva.m ^a^P1.0461^ea^ hoti -- `maya.m kho  pubbe agaariyabhuutaa samaanaa ya.m icchaama ta.m khaadaama, ya.m na icchaama na  ta.m khaadaama; ya.m icchaama ta.m bhu~njaama, ya.m ^a^T2.0200^ea^ na icchaama na ta.m bhu~njaama; ya.m  icchaama ta.m saayaama, ya.m na icchaama na ta.m saayaama; ya.m icchaama ta.m  pivaama {pipaama (sii0 pii0)}, ya.m na icchaama na ta.m pivaama; kappiyampi khaadaama,  akappiyampi khaadaama; kappiyampi bhu~njaama, akappiyampi bhu~njaama;  kappiyampi saayaama, akappiyampi saayaama; kappiyampi pivaama,  akappiyampi pivaama; kaalepi khaadaama, vikaalepi khaadaama; kaalepi  bhu~njaama vikaalepi bhu~njaama; kaalepi saayaama, vikaalepi saayaama;  kaalepi pivaama, vikaalepi pivaama. yampi no saddhaa gahapatikaa  divaa vikaale pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m denti tatthapime mukhaavara.na.m  ma~n~ne karontii'ti. so sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. aya.m  vuccati, bhikkhave, kumbhiilabhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya  hiinaayaavatto. `kumbhiilabhaya'nti kho, bhikkhave, odarikattasseta.m  adhivacana.m.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, aava.t.tabhaya.m? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito  hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi  dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva  naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti.  so eva.m pabbajito samaano pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya  gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati. arakkhiteneva kaayena  arakkhitaaya ^a^T2.0201^ea^ vaacaaya anupa.t.thitaaya satiyaa asa.mvutehi indriyehi so  tattha passati gahapati.m vaa gahapatiputta.m vaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi  samappita.m sama"ngiibhuuta.m paricaarayamaana.m {paricaariyamaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. tassa eva.m hoti -- `maya.m  kho pubbe agaariyabhuutaa samaanaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa  sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaarimhaa. sa.mvijjanti kho pana me kule {sa.mvijjanti kho kule  (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhogaa.  sakkaa bhoge ca bhu~njitu.m pu~n~naani ca kaatu'nti. so sikkha.m  paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aava.t.tabhayassa  bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto. `aava.t.tabhaya'nti kho,  bhikkhave, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca ^a^M2.0125^ea^ ^a^V2.0134^ea^, bhikkhave, susukaabhaya.m? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco ^a^P1.0462^ea^ kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya  mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi  dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva naama imassa kevalassa  dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti. so eva.m pabbajito  samaano pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa  pi.n.daaya pavisati. arakkhiteneva kaayena arakkhitaaya vaacaaya  anupa.t.thitaaya satiyaa asa.mvutehi indriyehi so tattha passati maatugaama.m  dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa. tassa maatugaama.m disvaa dunnivattha.m vaa  duppaaruta.m vaa raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. so raagaanuddha.msena {anuddhastena (sii0  pii0)} cittena  sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati ^a^T2.0202^ea^. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave,  susukaabhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto.  `susukaabhaya'nti kho, bhikkhave, maatugaamasseta.m adhivacana.m. imaani  kho, bhikkhave, cattaari bhayaani, idhekacce puggale imasmi.m dhammavinaye  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajite paa.tika"nkhitabbaanii''ti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
[06] caatumasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0203^ea^ ^a^V2.0135^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu  viharati na.lakapaane palaasavane. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa  abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa kulaputtaa bhagavanta.m uddissa saddhaa agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajitaa honti -- aayasmaa ca anuruddho, aayasmaa ca  bhaddiyo {nandiyo (sii0 pii0) vinaye ca ma0 ni0 1 cuu.lagosi"nge ca}, aayasmaa ca kimilo  {kimbilo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, aayasmaa ca bhagu, aayasmaa ca  ko.n.da~n~no {ku.n.dadhaano (sii0 pii0)}, aayasmaa ca revato, aayasmaa ca aanando, a~n~ne ca  abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa kulaputtaa. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa  bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto ^a^P1.0463^ea^ abbhokaase nisinno hoti.  atha kho bhagavaa te kulaputte ^a^M2.0126^ea^ aarabbha bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ye  te, bhikkhave, kulaputtaa mama.m uddissa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajitaa, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu abhirataa brahmacariye''ti?  eva.m vutte, te bhikkhuu tu.nhii ahesu.m. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa te  kulaputte aarabbha bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputtaa  mama.m uddissa saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, kacci te,  bhikkhave, bhikkhuu abhirataa brahmacariye''ti? dutiyampi kho te  bhikkhuu tu.nhii ahesu.m. tatiyampi kho bhagavaa te kulaputte aarabbha  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputtaa mama.m uddissa  saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa ^a^T2.0204^ea^, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu  abhirataa brahmacariye''ti? tatiyampi kho te bhikkhuu tu.nhii ahesu.m.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m  te kulaputte puccheyya''nti! atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m anuruddha.m  aamantesi -- ``kacci tumhe, anuruddhaa, abhirataa brahmacariye''ti?  ``taggha maya.m, bhante, abhirataa brahmacariye''ti. ``saadhu saadhu,  anuruddhaa! eta.m kho, anuruddhaa, tumhaaka.m patiruupa.m kulaputtaana.m saddhaa  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaana.m ya.m tumhe abhirameyyaatha brahmacariye.  yena tumhe anuruddhaa, bhadrena yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa  susukaa.lakesaa kaame paribhu~njeyyaatha tena tumhe, anuruddhaa, bhadrenapi  yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa susukaa.lakesaa agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajitaa. te ca kho pana tumhe, anuruddhaa, neva  raajaabhiniitaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, na coraabhiniitaa  agaarasmaa ^a^V2.0136^ea^ anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, na i.na.t.taa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajitaa, na bhaya.t.taa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa,  naajiivikaapakataa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa. api ca khomhi  oti.n.no jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi  domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva naama  imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaati -- nanu  tumhe, anuruddhaa, eva.m saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa''ti?  ``eva.m, bhante''. ``eva.m ^a^T2.0205^ea^ pabbajitena ca pana, anuruddhaa, kulaputtena  kimassa kara.niiya.m? viveka.m, anuruddhaa, kaamehi viveka.m akusalehi  dhammehi piitisukha.m naadhigacchati a~n~na.m vaa {a~n~na.m ca (ka0)} tato santatara.m, tassa  abhijjhaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, byaapaadopi citta.m ^a^M2.0127^ea^ pariyaadaaya  ti.t.thati, thiinamiddhampi {thiinamiddhampi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} citta.m pariyaadaaya   ti.t.thati uddhaccakukkuccampi citta.m  pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, vicikicchaapi citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati,  aratiipi ^a^P1.0464^ea^ citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati, tandiipi citta.m  pariyaadaaya ti.t.thati. viveka.m, anuruddhaa, kaamehi viveka.m akusalehi  dhammehi piitisukha.m naadhigacchati a~n~na.m vaa tato santatara.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuruddhaa, ka.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano  tathaagato saavake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu byaakaroti -- `asu  amutra upapanno; asu amutra upapanno'''ti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa ^a^P1.0465^ea^  no, bhante, dhammaa bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu  vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho.  bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti ^a^T2.0207^ea^. ``na kho, anuruddhaa,  tathaagato janakuhanattha.m na janalapanattha.m na laabhasakkaarasilokaanisa.msattha.m  na `iti ma.m jano jaanaatuu'ti saavake abbhatiite kaala"nkate upapattiisu  byaakaroti -- `asu amutra upapanno, asu amutra upapanno'ti.  santi ca kho, anuruddhaa, kulaputtaa saddhaa u.laaravedaa u.laarapaamojjaa.  te ta.m sutvaa tadatthaaya citta.m upasa.mharanti. tesa.m ta.m, anuruddhaa, hoti  diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya''.
