[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena  sabrahmacaariisu sagaaravena bhavitabba.m sappatissena. sace, aavuso,  aara~n~niko bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto sabrahmacaariisu  agaaravo hoti appatisso, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m  panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena, yo  ayamaayasmaa sabrahmacaariisu agaaravo hoti appatisso'ti -- tassa  {appatissotissa (sii0 pii0)}  bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe  viharantena sabrahmacaariisu sagaaravena bhavitabba.m sappatissena.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena  aasanakusalena bhavitabba.m -- `iti there ca bhikkhuu naanupakhajja  nisiidissaami nave ca bhikkhuu na aasanena pa.tibaahissaamii'ti.  sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko ^a^T2.0215^ea^ bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto na  aasanakusalo hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato  aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena, yo ayamaayasmaa  aasanakusalo na hotii'ti {yo ayamaayasmaa aabhisamaacaarikampi dhamma.m na  jaanaatiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa  aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena aasanakusalena  bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena  aabhisamaacaarikopi dhammo jaanitabbo. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko  bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto aabhisamaacaarikampi dhamma.m na  jaanaati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato  aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa  aabhisamaacaarikampi dhamma.m ^a^M2.0134^ea^ na jaanaatii'ti ^a^V2.0144^ea^ -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro.  tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena  aabhisamaacaarikopi dhammo jaanitabbo {aya.m aabhisamaacaarikatatiyavaaro sii0  syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu na dissati}.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena  naatikaalena gaamo pavisitabbo naatidivaa {na divaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} pa.tikkamitabba.m. sace,  aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto atikaalena  gaama.m pavisati atidivaa pa.tikkamati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m  panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo  ayamaayasmaa atikaalena gaama.m pavisati atidivaa pa.tikkamatii'ti --  tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena  sa"nghe viharantena naatikaalena gaamo pavisitabbo, naatidivaa  pa.tikkamitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena  na ^a^T2.0216^ea^ purebhatta.m ^a^P1.0470^ea^ pacchaabhatta.m kulesu caaritta.m aapajjitabba.m.  sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto  purebhatta.m pacchaabhatta.m kulesu caaritta.m aapajjati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro.  `aya.m nuunimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena  viharato vikaalacariyaa bahuliikataa, tamena.m sa"nghagatampi  samudaacaratii'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena  bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena na purebhatta.m pacchaabhatta.m kulesu  caaritta.m aapajjitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena  anuddhatena bhavitabba.m acapalena. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu  sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto uddhato hoti capalo, tassa bhavanti  vattaaro. `ida.m nuunimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne  serivihaarena viharato uddhacca.m caapalya.m bahuliikata.m, tamena.m sa"nghagatampi  samudaacaratii'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena  bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena anuddhatena bhavitabba.m acapalena.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso ^a^M2.0135^ea^, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena  amukharena bhavitabba.m aviki.n.navaacena. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko  bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto mukharo hoti ^a^V2.0145^ea^ viki.n.navaaco,  tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa  ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa mukharo viki.n.navaaco'ti  -- tassa bhavanti ^a^T2.0217^ea^ vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena  sa"nghe viharantena amukharena bhavitabba.m aviki.n.navaacena.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena  suvacena {subbacena (sii0 ka0)} bhavitabba.m kalyaa.namittena. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko  bhikkhu sa"nghagato sa"nghe viharanto dubbaco hoti paapamitto, tassa  bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne  serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa dubbaco paapamitto'ti -- tassa bhavanti  vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa sa"nghagatena sa"nghe viharantena  suvacena bhavitabba.m kalyaa.namittena.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa indriyesu guttadvaarena bhavitabba.m.  sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu indriyesu aguttadvaaro hoti,  tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa  ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa ^a^P1.0471^ea^  indriyesu aguttadvaaro'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa  aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa indriyesu guttadvaarena bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa bhojane matta~n~nunaa bhavitabba.m.  sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhojane amatta~n~nuu hoti, tassa bhavanti  vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne  serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa bhojane amatta~n~nuu'ti -- tassa bhavanti  vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa bhojane matta~n~nunaa ^a^T2.0218^ea^ bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa jaagariya.m anuyuttena bhavitabba.m.  sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu jaagariya.m ananuyutto hoti,  tassa ^a^M2.0136^ea^ bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa  ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa jaagariya.m ananuyutto'ti  -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa jaagariya.m  anuyuttena bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso ^a^V2.0146^ea^, bhikkhunaa aaraddhaviiriyena bhavitabba.m.  sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu kusiito hoti, tassa bhavanti  vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne  serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa kusiito'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro.  tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa aaraddhaviiriyena bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa upa.t.thitassatinaa bhavitabba.m.  sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu mu.t.thassatii hoti, tassa bhavanti  vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne  serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa mu.t.thassatii'ti -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro.  tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa upa.t.thitassatinaa bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa samaahitena bhavitabba.m. sace,  aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu asamaahito hoti, tassa bhavanti  vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne  serivihaarena ^a^T2.0219^ea^ yo ayamaayasmaa asamaahito'ti -- tassa bhavanti  vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa samaahitena bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa pa~n~navataa bhavitabba.m. sace,  aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu duppa~n~no hoti, tassa bhavanti vattaaro  ^a^P1.0472^ea^. `ki.m panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa  ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa duppa~n~no'ti -- tassa  bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa pa~n~navataa bhavitabba.m.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa abhidhamme abhivinaye yogo  kara.niiyo. santaavuso, aara~n~nika.m bhikkhu.m abhidhamme abhivinaye  pa~nha.m pucchitaaro. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu abhidhamme  abhivinaye pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m  panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo  ayamaayasmaa abhidhamme abhivinaye pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayatii'ti --  tassa bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa ^a^M2.0137^ea^ aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa abhidhamme  abhivinaye yogo kara.niiyo.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso ^a^V2.0147^ea^, bhikkhunaa ye te santaa vimokkhaa  atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa tattha yogo kara.niiyo. santaavuso,  aara~n~nika.m bhikkhu.m ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa  tattha pa~nha.m pucchitaaro. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu ye te  santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa tattha pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na  sampaayati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m panimassaayasmato  aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo ayamaayasmaa ye te santaa  vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa tattha pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayatii'ti  -- tassa ^a^T2.0220^ea^ bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa ye te  santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa tattha yogo kara.niiyo.

[03] ``aara~n~nikenaavuso, bhikkhunaa uttari manussadhamme yogo  kara.niiyo. santaavuso, aara~n~nika.m bhikkhu.m uttari manussadhamme pa~nha.m  pucchitaaro. sace, aavuso, aara~n~niko bhikkhu uttari manussadhamme  pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayati, tassa bhavanti vattaaro. `ki.m  panimassaayasmato aara~n~nikassa ekassaara~n~ne serivihaarena yo  ayamaayasmaa yassatthaaya pabbajito tamattha.m na jaanaatii'ti -- tassa  bhavanti vattaaro. tasmaa aara~n~nikena bhikkhunaa uttari manussadhamme  yogo kara.niiyo''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano {mahaamoggalaano (ka0)} aayasmanta.m saariputta.m  etadavoca -- ``aara~n~nikeneva nu kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhunaa  ime dhammaa samaadaaya vattitabbaa udaahu gaamantavihaarinaapii''ti  ^a^P1.0473^ea^? ``aara~n~nikenaapi kho, aavuso moggallaana,  bhikkhunaa ime dhammaa samaadaaya vattitabbaa pageva gaamantavihaarinaa''ti.
[06] goliyaanisutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0221^ea^ ^a^M2.0138^ea^ ^a^V2.0148^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kaasiisu  caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. tatra kho bhagavaa  bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aha.m kho, bhikkhave, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa {rattibhojana.m  (ka0)}  bhu~njaami. a~n~natra kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaano  appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaami appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca  phaasuvihaara~nca. etha, tumhepi, bhikkhave, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa  bhu~njatha. a~n~natra kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhepi rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa  appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanissatha appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca  phaasuvihaara~ncaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato  paccassosu.m. atha kho bhagavaa kaasiisu anupubbena caarika.m caramaano  yena kii.taagiri naama kaasiina.m nigamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa  kii.taagirismi.m viharati kaasiina.m nigame.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena assajipunabbasukaa naama  bhikkhuu kii.taagirismi.m aavaasikaa honti. atha kho sambahulaa  bhikkhuu yena assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa  assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu etadavocu.m -- ``bhagavaa kho, aavuso,  a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njati bhikkhusa"ngho ca. a~n~natra kho  panaavuso, rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaananti  appaata"nkata~nca ^a^T2.0222^ea^ lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. etha, tumhepi,  aavuso, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njatha. a~n~natra kho panaavuso,  tumhepi rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanissatha  appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~ncaa''ti ^a^P1.0474^ea^.  eva.m vutte, assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu te bhikkhuu  etadavocu.m -- ``maya.m kho, aavuso, saaya~nceva bhu~njaama paato ca  divaa ca vikaale. te maya.m saaya~nceva bhu~njamaanaa paato ca divaa ca  vikaale appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaama appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca  phaasuvihaara~nca. te maya.m ki.m sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m  anudhaavissaama? saaya~nceva maya.m bhu~njissaama paato ca divaa ca  vikaale''ti.

[03] yato ^a^V2.0149^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu naasakkhi.msu assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu  sa~n~naapetu.m, atha yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ^a^M2.0139^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te  bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha maya.m, bhante, yena  assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkamimha; upasa"nkamitvaa  assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu etadavocumha -- `bhagavaa kho, aavuso,  a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njati bhikkhusa"ngho ca; a~n~natra kho  panaavuso, rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaananti  appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. etha, tumhepi,  aavuso ^a^T2.0223^ea^, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njatha. a~n~natra kho panaavuso,  tumhepi rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanissatha  appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~ncaa'ti. eva.m vutte,  bhante, assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu amhe etadavocu.m -- `maya.m kho,  aavuso, saaya~nceva bhu~njaama paato ca divaa ca vikaale. te maya.m  saaya~nceva bhu~njamaanaa paato ca divaa ca vikaale appaabaadhata~nca  sa~njaanaama appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. te maya.m  ki.m sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m anudhaavissaama? saaya~nceva maya.m  bhu~njissaama paato ca divaa ca vikaale'ti. yato kho maya.m, bhante,  naasakkhimha assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu sa~n~naapetu.m, atha maya.m etamattha.m  bhagavato aarocemaa''ti.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi  -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu  aamantehi -- `satthaa aayasmante aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m,  bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena  assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``satthaa aayasmante  aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho assajipunabbasukaa bhikkhuu  tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho  assajipunabbasuke bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira,  bhikkhave, sambahulaa bhikkhuu tumhe upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T2.0224^ea^ etadavocu.m -- `bhagavaa  kho, aavuso, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njati bhikkhusa"ngho ca.  a~n~natra kho panaavuso, rattibhojanaa bhu~njamaanaa appaabaadhata~nca  sa~njaananti appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca phaasuvihaara~nca. etha,  tumhepi, aavuso, a~n~natreva rattibhojanaa bhu~njatha. a~n~natra kho  panaavuso, tumhepi rattibhojanaa ^a^V2.0150^ea^ bhu~njamaanaa ^a^P1.0475^ea^  appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanissatha appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca  phaasuvihaara~ncaa'ti. eva.m vutte ^a^M2.0140^ea^ kira {ki.m nu (ka0)}, bhikkhave, tumhe te bhikkhuu eva.m  avacuttha -- `maya.m kho panaavuso, saaya~nceva bhu~njaama paato ca divaa  ca vikaale. te maya.m saaya~nceva bhu~njamaanaa paato ca divaa ca  vikaale appaabaadhata~nca sa~njaanaama appaata"nkata~nca lahu.t.thaana~nca bala~nca  phaasuvihaara~nca. te maya.m ki.m sandi.t.thika.m hitvaa kaalika.m  anudhaavissaama? saaya~nceva maya.m bhu~njissaama paato ca divaa ca  vikaale'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m nu me tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m  desita.m aajaanaatha ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa  dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tassa akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti  kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``nanu me  tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaatha idhekaccassa ya.m evaruupa.m  sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa  parihaayanti, idha panekaccassa evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa  dhammaa parihaayanti ^a^T2.0225^ea^, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, idhekaccassa  evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa  dhammaa parihaayanti, idha panekaccassa evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato  akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, idhekaccassa  evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti  kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, idha panekaccassa evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m  vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa  abhiva.d.dhantii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ ``saadhu, bhikkhave! mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave,  a~n~naata.m abhavissa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya  -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa  abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto  `evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me eta.m, bhikkhave,  patiruupa.m abhavissaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasmaa ca kho  eta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya  -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa  ^a^P1.0476^ea^ abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti,  tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadaami. mayaa ceta.m,  bhikkhave, a~n~naata.m abhavissa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m ^a^M2.0141^ea^ aphassita.m  pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m ^a^V2.0151^ea^ sukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa   ^a^T2.0226^ea^ dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto  `evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me  eta.m, bhikkhave, patiruupa.m abhavissaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.  ``yasmaa ca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m  phassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m vedayato  akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, tasmaaha.m  `evaruupa.m sukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadaami.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ ``mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave, a~n~naata.m abhavissa  adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa  evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa  dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto `evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m  pajahathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me eta.m, bhikkhave, patiruupa.m  abhavissaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasmaa ca kho eta.m,  bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya --  `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa  abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m dukkha.m  vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadaami. mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave, a~n~naata.m abhavissa  adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa  evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa  dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto `evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m  upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me eta.m, bhikkhave, patiruupa.m  abhavissaa''ti ^a^T2.0227^ea^? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasmaa ca kho eta.m,  bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya --  `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m dukkha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa  parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m dukkha.m  vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadaami.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ ``mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave, a~n~naata.m abhavissa  adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa  evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti  kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto `evaruupa.m  adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api nu me eta.m, bhikkhave,  patiruupa.m abhavissaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``yasmaa ca kho  eta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m vidita.m sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya ^a^M2.0142^ea^   -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa  dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti kusalaa dhammaa parihaayantii'ti, tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m  adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m pajahathaa'ti vadaami''. mayaa ceta.m, bhikkhave,  a~n~naata.m abhavissa adi.t.tha.m avidita.m asacchikata.m aphassita.m pa~n~naaya  ^a^V2.0152^ea^ -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m vedayato akusalaa  dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, evaaha.m ajaananto  `evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadeyya.m; api  nu me eta.m, bhikkhave, patiruupa.m abhavissaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.  ``yasmaa ca kho eta.m, bhikkhave, mayaa ~naata.m di.t.tha.m ^a^T2.0228^ea^ vidita.m  sacchikata.m phassita.m pa~n~naaya -- `idhekaccassa evaruupa.m adukkhamasukha.m  vedana.m vedayato akusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti kusalaa dhammaa  abhiva.d.dhantii'ti, tasmaaha.m `evaruupa.m ^a^P1.0477^ea^  adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti vadaami.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, sabbesa.myeva bhikkhuuna.m  `appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami; na panaaha.m, bhikkhave, sabbesa.myeva  bhikkhuuna.m `na appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ye te, bhikkhave,  bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa  anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa,  tathaaruupaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m `na appamaadena kara.niiya'nti  vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? kata.m tesa.m appamaadena. abhabbaa te  pamajjitu.m. ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sekkhaa appattamaanasaa  anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanaa viharanti, tathaaruupaanaaha.m, bhikkhave,  bhikkhuuna.m `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu?  appeva naamime aayasmanto anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaanaa  kalyaa.namitte bhajamaanaa indriyaani samannaanayamaanaa -- yassatthaaya  kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m --  brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja vihareyyunti! ima.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m bhikkhuuna.m  appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ ``sattime ^a^T2.0229^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo  sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame satta? ubhatobhaagavimutto,  pa~n~naavimutto, kaayasakkhi, di.t.thippatto, saddhaavimutto, dhammaanusaarii,  saddhaanusaarii.

[03] ``katamo ^a^M2.0143^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, puggalo ubhatobhaagavimutto? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe  aaruppaa te kaayena phusitvaa {phassitvaa (sii0 pii0)} viharati pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ^a^V2.0153^ea^ aasavaa  parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo  ubhatobhaagavimutto imassa kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `na  appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? kata.m tassa  appamaadena. abhabbo so pamajjitu.m.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo pa~n~naavimutto? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe  aaruppaa te na kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa  aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo  ^a^P1.0478^ea^ pa~n~naavimutto. imassapi kho aha.m, bhikkhave,  bhikkhuno `na appamaadena kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu?  kata.m tassa appamaadena. abhabbo so pamajjitu.m.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo kaayasakkhi? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe  aaruppaa ^a^T2.0230^ea^ te kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce  aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo  kaayasakkhi. imassa kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `appamaadena  kara.niiya'nti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? appeva naama ayamaayasmaa  anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano  indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m  di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaati!  ima.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno appamaadaphala.m  sampassamaano `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo di.t.thippatto? idha, bhikkhave,  ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe aaruppaa te  na kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce aasavaa  parikkhii.naa honti, tathaagatappaveditaa cassa dhammaa pa~n~naaya vodi.t.thaa  honti vocaritaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo di.t.thippatto.  imassapi kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `appamaadena kara.niiya'nti  vadaami. ta.m kissa ^a^M2.0144^ea^ hetu? appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani  senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani  samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m ^a^T2.0231^ea^ ^a^V2.0154^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme  saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaati! ima.m kho aha.m,  bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena  kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo saddhaavimutto. idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe  aaruppaa te na kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa  ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti, tathaagate cassa saddhaa nivi.t.thaa  hoti muulajaataa pati.t.thitaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo  saddhaavimutto. imassapi kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `appamaadena  kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? appeva naama ayamaayasmaa  anulomikaani senaasanaani ^a^P1.0479^ea^ pa.tisevamaano  kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya  kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m --  brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja vihareyyaati! ima.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno  appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo dhammaanusaarii? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe  aaruppaa te na kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa  ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa {disvaa aasavaa aparikkhii.naa (sii0 pii0)} honti,   tathaagatappaveditaa cassa ^a^T2.0232^ea^ dhammaa  pa~n~naaya mattaso nijjhaana.m khamanti, api cassa ime dhammaa honti,  seyyathida.m -- saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m,  pa~n~nindriya.m. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo dhammaanusaarii.  imassapi kho aha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno `appamaadena kara.niiya'nti  vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani  senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani  samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme  saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaati ^a^M2.0145^ea^! ima.m kho aha.m,  bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena  kara.niiya'nti vadaami.

[03] ``katamo ^a^V2.0155^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, puggalo saddhaanusaarii? idha,  bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ye te santaa vimokkhaa atikkamma ruupe  aaruppaa te na kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa  ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa {disvaa aasavaa aparikkhii.naa (sii0 pii0)} honti, tathaagate cassa saddhaamatta.m hoti  pemamatta.m, api cassa ime dhammaa honti, seyyathida.m -- saddhindriya.m,  viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m. aya.m vuccati,  bhikkhave, puggalo saddhaanusaarii. imassapi kho aha.m, bhikkhave,  bhikkhuno `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu?  appeva naama ayamaayasmaa anulomikaani senaasanaani pa.tisevamaano ^a^T2.0233^ea^  kalyaa.namitte bhajamaano indriyaani samannaanayamaano -- yassatthaaya  kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m --  brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja vihareyyaati! ima.m kho aha.m, bhikkhave, imassa bhikkhuno  appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano `appamaadena kara.niiya'ntntti vadaami.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, aadikeneva a~n~naaraadhana.m  vadaami; api ca, bhikkhave, anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa  anupubbapa.tipadaa ^a^P1.0480^ea^ a~n~naaraadhanaa hoti. katha~nca,  bhikkhave, anupubbasikkhaa anupubbakiriyaa anupubbapa.tipadaa  a~n~naaraadhanaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, saddhaajaato upasa"nkamati,  upasa"nkamanto payirupaasati, payirupaasanto sota.m odahati,  ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati, sutvaa dhamma.m dhaareti, dhataana.m {dhaataana.m (ka0)} dhammaana.m  attha.m upaparikkhati, attha.m upaparikkhato dhammaa nijjhaana.m khamanti,  dhammanijjhaanakkhantiyaa sati chando jaayati, chandajaato ussahati,  ussaahetvaa tuleti, tulayitvaa padahati, pahitatto samaano kaayena ceva  paramasacca.m sacchikaroti, pa~n~naaya ca na.m ativijjha passati. saapi  naama, bhikkhave, saddhaa naahosi; tampi naama, bhikkhave, upasa"nkamana.m  naahosi; saapi naama, bhikkhave, payirupaasanaa naahosi; tampi naama,  bhikkhave, sotaavadhaana.m naahosi ^a^M2.0146^ea^; tampi naama, bhikkhave, dhammassavana.m  naahosi; saapi naama, bhikkhave, dhammadhaara.naa naahosi; saapi naama,  bhikkhave, atthuupaparikkhaa naahosi; saapi naama, bhikkhave,  dhammanijjhaanakkhanti ^a^T2.0234^ea^ naahosi; sopi naama, bhikkhave, chando  naahosi; sopi naama, bhikkhave, ussaaho naahosi; saapi naama,  bhikkhave, tulanaa naahosi; tampi naama, bhikkhave, padhaana.m naahosi.  vippa.tipannaattha, bhikkhave, micchaapa.tipannaattha, bhikkhave. kiiva  duurevime, bhikkhave, moghapurisaa apakkantaa imamhaa dhammavinayaa.
