[03] ``ime ^a^M2.0188^ea^ kho te, sandaka, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa  sammaasambuddhena cattaaro abrahmacariyavaasaa ^a^T2.0300^ea^ akkhaataa yattha ^a^P1.0519^ea^  vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca  naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti.

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^V2.0198^ea^, bho aananda, abbhuta.m, bho aananda! yaava~ncida.m  tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro  abrahmacariyavaasaava samaanaa `abrahmacariyavaasaa'ti akkhaataa yattha  vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya  ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusalanti. katamaani pana taani, bho aananda, tena  bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaari  anassaasikaani brahmacariyaani akkhaataani yattha vi~n~nuu puriso  sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m  kusala''nti?

[03] 229^b^.^eb^ ``idha, sandaka, ekacco satthaa sabba~n~nuu  sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati -- `carato ca me  ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m  paccupa.t.thita'nti. so su~n~nampi agaara.m pavisati, pi.n.dampi na labhati,  kukkuropi .da.msati, ca.n.denapi hatthinaa samaagacchati, ca.n.denapi assena  samaagacchati, ca.n.denapi go.nena samaagacchati, itthiyaapi purisassapi  naamampi gottampi pucchati, gaamassapi nigamassapi naamampi maggampi  pucchati. so `kimida'nti pu.t.tho samaano `su~n~na.m me agaara.m  pavisitabba.m ahosi', tena paavisi.m; `pi.n.dampi aladdhabba.m ahosi',  tena naalattha.m ^a^T2.0301^ea^; `kukkurena .da.msitabba.m ahosi', tenamhi {tena (ka0), tenaasi.m (?)} da.t.tho; `ca.n.dena  hatthinaa samaagantabba.m ahosi', tena samaagami.m; `ca.n.dena assena  samaagantabba.m ahosi', tena samaagami.m; `ca.n.dena go.nena samaagantabba.m  ahosi', tena samaagami.m; `itthiyaapi purisassapi naamampi gottampi  pucchitabba.m ahosi', tena pucchi.m; `gaamassapi nigamassapi naamampi  maggampi pucchitabba.m ahosi', tena pucchinti. tatra, sandaka, vi~n~nuu  puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa sabba~n~nuu  sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanaati...pe0... ^a^T2.0302^ea^ `gaamassapi  nigamassapi naamampi maggampi pucchitabba.m ahosi, tena pucchi'nti ^a^M2.0189^ea^.  so `anassaasika.m ida.m brahmacariya'nti -- iti viditvaa tasmaa  brahmacariyaa nibbijja pakkamati. ida.m kho, sandaka, tena bhagavataa  jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa.thama.m anassaasika.m brahmacariya.m  akkhaata.m ^a^P1.0520^ea^ yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m  na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, sandaka, idhekacco satthaa  anussaviko hoti anussavasacco. so anussavena  itihitihaparamparaaya pi.takasampadaaya dhamma.m deseti. anussavikassa  kho pana, sandaka ^a^V2.0199^ea^, satthuno anussavasaccassa sussutampi hoti  dussutampi hoti tathaapi hoti a~n~nathaapi hoti. tatra, sandaka,  vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa  anussaviko anussavasacco so anussavena itihitihaparamparaaya  pi.takasampadaaya dhamma.m deseti. anussavikassa kho pana satthuno  anussavasaccassa sussutampi hoti dussutampi hoti tathaapi hoti  a~n~nathaapi hoti'. so `anassaasika.m ida.m brahmacariya'nti -- iti  viditvaa tasmaa brahmacariyaa nibbijja pakkamati. ida.m kho, sandaka,  tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena dutiya.m  anassaasika.m brahmacariya.m akkhaata.m yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m  brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] 231^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^T2.0303^ea^ capara.m, sandaka, idhekacco satthaa takkii  hoti viima.msii. so takkapariyaahata.m viima.msaanucarita.m saya.mpa.tibhaana.m dhamma.m  deseti. takkissa kho pana, sandaka, satthuno viima.msissa  sutakkitampi hoti duttakkitampi hoti tathaapi hoti a~n~nathaapi  hoti. tatra, sandaka, vi~n~nuu puriso iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati --  `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa takkii viima.msii. so takkapariyaahata.m  viima.msaanucarita.m saya.mpa.tibhaana.m dhamma.m deseti. takkissa kho pana  satthuno viima.msissa sutakkitampi hoti duttakkitampi hoti tathaapi  hoti a~n~nathaapi hoti'. so `anassaasika.m ida.m brahmacariya'nti --  iti viditvaa tasmaa brahmacariyaa nibbijja pakkamati. ida.m kho,  sandaka, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena tatiya.m  anassaasika.m brahmacariya.m akkhaata.m yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m  brahmacariya.m na vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^M2.0190^ea^ capara.m, sandaka, idhekacco satthaa mando  hoti momuuho. so mandattaa momuuhattaa tattha tattha {tathaa tathaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} pa~nha.m pu.t.tho  ^a^P1.0521^ea^ samaano vaacaavikkhepa.m aapajjati amaraavikkhepa.m --  `evantipi {evampi (sii0 pii0)} me no, tathaatipi {tathaapi (sii0  pii0)} me no, a~n~nathaatipi  {a~n~nathaapi (sii0 pii0) ( ) sabbattha natthi} me no, notipi  me no, no notipi me no'ti. tatra, sandaka, vi~n~nuu puriso iti  pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aya.m kho bhava.m satthaa mando momuuho. so  mandattaa momuuhattaa tattha tattha pa~nha.m pu.t.tho samaano vaacaavikkhepa.m  aapajjati amaraavikkhepa.m ^a^T2.0304^ea^ -- evantipi me no, tathaatipi me no,  a~n~nathaatipi me no, notipi me no, no notipi me no'ti. so  `anassaasika.m ida.m brahmacariya'nti -- iti viditvaa ^a^V2.0200^ea^ tasmaa  brahmacariyaa nibbijja pakkamati. ida.m kho, sandaka, tena bhagavataa  jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena catuttha.m anassaasika.m  brahmacariya.m akkhaata.m yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na  vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``imaani kho, (taani sandaka, tena bhagavataa jaanataa  passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaari anassaasikaani  brahmacariyaani akkhaataani yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na  vaseyya, vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bho aananda, abbhuta.m, bho aananda! yaava~ncida.m  tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaari  anassaasikaaneva brahmacariyaani anassaasikaani brahmacariyaaniiti  akkhaataani yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m na vaseyya,  vasanto ca naaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m. so pana, bho aananda,  satthaa ki.m vaadii ki.m akkhaayii yattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m  brahmacariya.m vaseyya, vasanto ca aaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ ``idha, sandaka, tathaagato loke uppajjati  araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro  purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa...pe0... {vitthaaro  ma0 ni0 2.9-10 kandarakasutte} so ime ^a^T2.0305^ea^  pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne  vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi ^a^M2.0191^ea^ dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m  vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. yasmi.m kho {yasmi.m kho  pana (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)},  sandaka, satthari saavako evaruupa.m u.laaravisesa.m adhigacchati tattha  ^a^P1.0522^ea^ vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m vaseyya, vasanto  ca aaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, sandaka, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0..   dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. yasmi.m kho, sandaka,  satthari saavako evaruupa.m u.laaravisesa.m adhigacchati tattha vi~n~nuu  puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m vaseyya, vasanto ca aaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m  kusala.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0201^ea^ capara.m, sandaka, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako  ca viharati...pe0... tatiya.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. yasmi.m kho, sandaka, satthari saavako  evaruupa.m u.laaravisesa.m adhigacchati tattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m  brahmacariya.m vaseyya, vasanto ca aaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, sandaka, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0...   catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. yasmi.m  kho, sandaka, satthari saavako evaruupa.m u.laaravisesa.m adhigacchati  tattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m vaseyya, vasanto ca aaraadheyya  ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne ^a^T2.0306^ea^  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m  pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi  jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussarati. yasmi.m kho, sandaka, satthari saavako evaruupa.m  u.laaravisesa.m adhigacchati tattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m  vaseyya, vasanto ca aaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m  cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa  visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine  pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte  pajaanaati. yasmi.m kho, sandaka, satthari saavako evaruupa.m  u.laaravisesa.m adhigacchati ^a^M2.0192^ea^ tattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m  vaseyya, vasanto ca aaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m  khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m  dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati,  `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti  yathaabhuuta.m ^a^V2.0202^ea^ pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii ^a^T2.0307^ea^ pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati,  vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati.  yasmi.m kho, sandaka, satthari saavako evaruupa.m u.laaravisesa.m  adhigacchati tattha vi~n~nuu puriso sasakka.m brahmacariya.m vaseyya, vasanto  ca aaraadheyya ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ ``yo pana so, bho aananda, bhikkhu araha.m  khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho  parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto paribhu~njeyya ^a^P1.0523^ea^  so kaame''ti? ``yo so, sandaka, bhikkhu araha.m  khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho  parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto abhabbo so pa~nca.t.thaanaani  ajjhaacaritu.m. abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa  voropetu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadaatu.m,  abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevetu.m, abhabbo  khii.naasavo bhikkhu sampajaanamusaa bhaasitu.m, abhabbo khii.naasavo  bhikkhu sannidhikaaraka.m kaame paribhu~njitu.m, seyyathaapi pubbe  agaariyabhuuto. yo so, sandaka, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa  katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano  sammada~n~naa vimutto abhabbo so ^a^T2.0308^ea^ imaani pa~nca.t.thaanaani  ajjhaacaritu''nti.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^M2.0193^ea^ pana so, bho aananda, bhikkhu araha.m  khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho  parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto tassa carato ceva ti.t.thato  ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m paccupa.t.thita.m --  `khii.naa me aasavaa'''ti? ``tena hi, sandaka, upama.m te  karissaami; upamaayapidhekacce vi~n~nuu purisaa bhaasitassa attha.m  aajaananti. seyyathaapi, sandaka, purisassa hatthapaadaa chinnaa; tassa  carato ceva ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m  (jaanaati -- `chinnaa me hatthapaadaa'ti, udaahu paccavekkhamaano  jaanaati -- `chinnaa me hatthapaadaa'''ti? ``na kho, bho aananda, so  puriso satata.m samita.m jaanaati -- `chinnaa me hatthapaadaa' ti.) {(chinnaava  hatthapaadaa,) (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}  api ca kho pana na.m paccavekkhamaano jaanaati -- `chinnaa me  hatthapaadaa'''ti. ``evameva kho, sandaka, yo so ^a^V2.0203^ea^ bhikkhu araha.m  khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho  parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto tassa carato ceva ti.t.thato  ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m (~naa.nadassana.m na paccupa.t.thita.m  -- `khii.naa me aasavaa'ti;) {(khii.naava aasavaa,) (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} api   ca kho pana na.m paccavekkhamaano jaanaati -- `khii.naa me aasavaa'''ti.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ ``kiivabahukaa pana, bho aananda, imasmi.m  dhammavinaye niyyaataaro''ti? ``na kho, sandaka, eka.myeva sata.m na  dve sataani na tii.ni sataani na cattaari sataani na pa~nca sataani,  atha kho bhiyyova ye imasmi.m dhammavinaye niyyaataaro''ti.  ``acchariya.m, bho aananda, abbhuta.m, bho aananda! na ca naama  sadhammokka.msanaa bhavissati, na ^a^T2.0309^ea^ paradhammavambhanaa, aayatane ca  dhammadesanaa taava bahukaa ^a^P1.0524^ea^ ca niyyaataaro  pa~n~naayissanti. ime panaajiivakaa puttamataaya puttaa attaana~nceva  ukka.msenti, pare ca vambhenti tayo ceva niyyaataaro pa~n~napenti,  seyyathida.m -- nanda.m vaccha.m, kisa.m sa.mkicca.m, makkhali.m gosaala''nti.  atha kho sandako paribbaajako saka.m parisa.m aamantesi -- ``carantu  bhonto sama.ne gotame brahmacariyavaaso. na daani sukara.m amhehi  laabhasakkaarasiloke pariccajitu''nti. iti hida.m sandako  paribbaajako saka.m parisa.m uyyojesi bhagavati brahmacariyeti.
[06] sandakasutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0310^ea^ ^a^M2.0194^ea^ ^a^V2.0204^ea^ ^a^P2.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m  bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana  samayena sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa paribbaajakaa moranivaape  paribbaajakaaraame pa.tivasanti, seyyathida.m -- annabhaaro varadharo  sakuludaayii ca paribbaajako a~n~ne ca abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa  paribbaajakaa. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa  pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho bhagavato  etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava raajagahe pi.n.daaya caritu.m.  ya.mnuunaaha.m yena moranivaapo paribbaajakaaraamo yena sakuludaayii  paribbaajako tenupasa"nkameyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa yena moranivaapo  paribbaajakaaraamo tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena sakuludaayii  paribbaajako mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m nisinno hoti  unnaadiniyaa uccaasaddamahaasaddaaya anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m  kathentiyaa, seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m mahaamattakatha.m senaakatha.m  bhayakatha.m yuddhakatha.m annakatha.m paanakatha.m vatthakatha.m sayanakatha.m maalaakatha.m  gandhakatha.m ~naatikatha.m yaanakatha.m gaamakatha.m nigamakatha.m nagarakatha.m janapadakatha.m  itthikatha.m suurakatha.m visikhaakatha.m kumbha.t.thaanakatha.m pubbapetakatha.m ^a^P2.0002^ea^  naanattakatha.m lokakkhaayika.m samuddakkhaayika.m itibhavaabhavakatha.m ^a^T2.0311^ea^  iti vaa. addasaa kho sakuludaayii paribbaajako bhagavanta.m duuratova  aagacchanta.m. disvaana saka.m parisa.m sa.n.thaapeti -- ``appasaddaa bhonto  hontu; maa bhonto saddamakattha. aya.m sama.no gotamo aagacchati;  appasaddakaamo kho pana so aayasmaa appasaddassa va.n.navaadii. appeva  naama appasadda.m parisa.m viditvaa upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti. atha  kho te paribbaajakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho bhagavaa yena  sakuludaayii paribbaajako tenupasa"nkami. atha kho sakuludaayii  paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etu kho, bhante, bhagavaa.  svaagata.m, bhante, bhagavato. cirassa.m kho, bhante, bhagavaa ima.m  pariyaayamakaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. nisiidatu, bhante, bhagavaa;  idamaasana.m pa~n~natta''nti. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane.  sakuludaayiipi kho paribbaajako a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho sakuludaayi.m paribbaajaka.m  bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ ``kaayanuttha ^a^M2.0195^ea^ ^a^V2.0205^ea^, udaayi, etarahi kathaaya  sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti?  ``ti.t.thatesaa, bhante, kathaa yaaya maya.m etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa.  nesaa, bhante, kathaa bhagavato dullabhaa bhavissati pacchaapi savanaaya.  purimaani, bhante, divasaani purimataraani naanaatitthiyaana.m  sama.nabraahma.naana.m kutuuhalasaalaaya.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m  ayamantaraakathaa ^a^T2.0312^ea^ udapaadi -- `laabhaa vata, bho, a"ngamagadhaana.m,  suladdhalaabhaa vata, bho, a"ngamagadhaana.m! tatrime {yatthime (sii0)} sama.nabraahma.naa sa"nghino  ga.nino ga.naacariyaa ~naataa yasassino titthakaraa saadhusammataa  bahujanassa raajagaha.m vassaavaasa.m osa.taa. ayampi kho puura.no  kassapo sa"nghii ceva ga.nii ca ga.naacariyo ca ~naato yasassii  titthakaro saadhusammato bahujanassa; sopi raajagaha.m vassaavaasa.m osa.to.  ayampi kho makkhali gosaalo...pe0... ajito kesakambalo...  pakudho kaccaayano... sa~njayo bela.t.thaputto... niga.n.tho naa.taputto sa"nghii  ceva ga.nii ca ga.naacariyo ca ~naato ^a^P2.0003^ea^ yasassii  titthakaro saadhusammato bahujanassa; sopi raajagaha.m vassaavaasa.m osa.to.  ayampi kho sama.no gotamo sa"nghii ceva ga.nii ca ga.naacariyo ca  ~naato yasassii titthakaro saadhusammato bahujanassa; sopi raajagaha.m  vassaavaasa.m osa.to. ko nu kho imesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m  sa"nghiina.m ga.niina.m ga.naacariyaana.m ~naataana.m yasassiina.m titthakaraana.m  saadhusammataana.m bahujanassa saavakaana.m sakkato garukato maanito puujito,  ka~nca pana saavakaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa {garukatvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} upanissaaya viharantii'''ti?

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ ``tatrekacce evamaaha.msu -- `aya.m kho puura.no  kassapo sa"nghii ceva ga.nii ca ga.naacariyo ca ~naato yasassii  titthakaro saadhusammato bahujanassa; so ca kho saavakaana.m na sakkato  na garukato na maanito na ^a^T2.0313^ea^ puujito, na ca pana puura.na.m kassapa.m saavakaa  sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanti. bhuutapubba.m puura.no kassapo  anekasataaya parisaaya dhamma.m deseti. tatra~n~nataro puura.nassa kassapassa  saavako saddamakaasi -- ``maa bhonto puura.na.m kassapa.m etamattha.m pucchittha;  neso eta.m jaanaati; mayameta.m jaanaama, amhe etamattha.m pucchatha; mayameta.m  bhavantaana.m byaakarissaamaa''ti. bhuutapubba.m puura.no kassapo ^a^M2.0196^ea^ baahaa paggayha  kandanto na labhati -- ``appasaddaa bhonto hontu, maa bhonto  saddamakattha. nete, bhavante, pucchanti, amhe ete pucchanti; mayametesa.m  byaakarissaamaa''ti. bahuu kho pana puura.nassa kassapassa saavakaa vaada.m  aaropetvaa apakkantaa -- ``na tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaasi, aha.m ima.m  dhammavinaya.m aajaanaami ^a^V2.0206^ea^, ki.m tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanissasi?  micchaapa.tipanno tvamasi, ahamasmi sammaapa.tipanno, sahita.m me,  asahita.m te, purevacaniiya.m pacchaa avaca, pacchaavacaniiya.m pure avaca,  adhici.n.na.m te viparaavatta.m, aaropito te vaado, niggahitosi, cara  vaadappamokkhaaya, nibbe.thehi vaa sace pahosii''ti. iti puura.no  kassapo saavakaana.m na sakkato na garukato na maanito na puujito, na  ca pana puura.na.m kassapa.m saavakaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya  viharanti. akku.t.tho ca pana puura.no kassapo dhammakkosenaa'''ti.

[03] ``ekacce ^a^P2.0004^ea^ evamaaha.msu -- `ayampi kho  makkhali gosaalo...pe0... ajito kesakambalo... pakudho  kaccaayano... sa~njayo ^a^T2.0314^ea^ bela.t.thaputto... niga.n.tho naa.taputto sa"nghii ceva  ga.nii ca ga.naacariyo ca ~naato yasassii titthakaro saadhusammato  bahujanassa; so ca kho saavakaana.m na sakkato na garukato na maanito  na puujito, na ca pana niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m saavakaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa  upanissaaya viharanti. bhuutapubba.m niga.n.tho naa.taputto anekasataaya  parisaaya dhamma.m deseti. tatra~n~nataro niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa saavako  saddamakaasi -- maa bhonto niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m etamattha.m pucchittha; neso  eta.m jaanaati; mayameta.m jaanaama, amhe etamattha.m pucchatha; mayameta.m  bhavantaana.m byaakarissaamaati. bhuutapubba.m niga.n.tho naa.taputto baahaa  paggayha kandanto na labhati -- ``appasaddaa bhonto hontu, maa bhonto  saddamakattha. nete bhavante pucchanti, amhe ete pucchanti; mayametesa.m  byaakarissaamaa''ti. bahuu kho pana niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa saavakaa  vaada.m aaropetvaa apakkantaa -- ``na tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaasi, aha.m  ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaami. ki.m tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m  aajaanissasi? micchaapa.tipanno tvamasi. ahamasmi sammaapa.tipanno.  sahita.m me asahita.m te, purevacaniiya.m pacchaa avaca, pacchaavacaniiya.m  pure avaca, adhici.n.na.m te viparaavatta.m, aaropito te vaado,  niggahitosi, cara vaadappamokkhaaya, nibbe.thehi ^a^M2.0197^ea^ vaa sace pahosii''ti.  iti niga.n.tho naa.taputto saavakaana.m na sakkato na garukato na maanito  na puujito, na ca pana niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m ^a^T2.0315^ea^ saavakaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa  upanissaaya viharanti. akku.t.tho ca pana niga.n.tho naa.taputto  dhammakkosenaa'''ti.

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ ``ekacce evamaaha.msu -- `ayampi kho sama.no  gotamo sa"nghii ceva ga.nii ca ga.naacariyo ^a^V2.0207^ea^ ca ~naato yasassii  titthakaro saadhusammato bahujanassa; so ca kho saavakaana.m sakkato  garukato maanito puujito, sama.na~nca pana gotama.m saavakaa sakkatvaa garu.m  katvaa upanissaaya viharanti. bhuutapubba.m sama.no gotamo anekasataaya  parisaaya dhamma.m desesi. tatra~n~nataro sama.nassa gotamassa saavako  ukkaasi. tamenaa~n~nataro sabrahmacaarii ja.n.nukena {ja.n.nuke (sii0)} gha.t.tesi -- ``appasaddo  aayasmaa ^a^P2.0005^ea^ hotu, maayasmaa saddamakaasi, satthaa no  bhagavaa dhamma.m desesii''ti. yasmi.m samaye sama.no gotamo anekasataaya  parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, neva tasmi.m samaye sama.nassa gotamassa  saavakaana.m khipitasaddo vaa hoti ukkaasitasaddo vaa. tamena.m  mahaajanakaayo paccaasiisamaanaruupo {paccaasi.m samaanaruupo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paccupa.t.thito hoti -- ``ya.m no bhagavaa  dhamma.m bhaasissati ta.m no sossaamaa''ti. seyyathaapi naama puriso  caatummahaapathe khuddamadhu.m {khudda.m madhu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} anelaka.m pii.leyya  {uppii.leyya (sii0)}. tamena.m mahaajanakaayo  paccaasiisamaanaruupo paccupa.t.thito assa. evameva yasmi.m samaye sama.no  gotamo anekasataaya parisaaya dhamma.m deseti, neva tasmi.m samaye  sama.nassa gotamassa saavakaana.m khipitasaddo vaa hoti ukkaasitasaddo  vaa. tamena.m mahaajanakaayo paccaasiisamaanaruupo paccupa.t.thito hoti ^a^T2.0316^ea^ --  ``ya.m no bhagavaa dhamma.m bhaasissati ta.m no sossaamaa''ti. yepi  sama.nassa gotamassa saavakaa sabrahmacaariihi sampayojetvaa sikkha.m  paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattanti tepi satthu ceva va.n.navaadino honti,  dhammassa ca va.n.navaadino honti, sa"nghassa ca va.n.navaadino honti,  attagarahinoyeva honti ana~n~nagarahino, ``mayamevamhaa alakkhikaa maya.m  appapu~n~naa te maya.m eva.m svaakkhaate dhammavinaye pabbajitvaa  naasakkhimhaa yaavajiiva.m ^a^M2.0198^ea^ paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caritu''nti. te  aaraamikabhuutaa vaa upaasakabhuutaa vaa pa~ncasikkhaapade samaadaaya vattanti.  iti sama.no gotamo saavakaana.m sakkato garukato maanito puujito,  sama.na~nca pana gotama.m saavakaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya  viharantii'''ti.

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ ``kati pana tva.m, udaayi, mayi dhamme  samanupassasi, yehi mama.m {mama (sabbattha)} saavakaa sakkaronti garu.m karonti  {garukaronti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maanenti  puujenti, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharantii''ti? ``pa~nca  kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavati dhamme samanupassaami yehi bhagavanta.m saavakaa  sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa  upanissaaya viharanti. katame pa~nca? bhagavaa hi, bhante,  appaahaaro, appaahaarataaya ca va.n.navaadii. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa  appaahaaro, appaahaarataaya ca va.n.navaadii ima.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavati ^a^V2.0208^ea^   pa.thama.m dhamma.m samanupassaami yena bhagavanta.m saavakaa sakkaronti garu.m  karonti maanenti puujenti, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa ^a^T2.0317^ea^ upanissaaya  viharanti.

[03] ``puna ^a^P2.0006^ea^ capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa santu.t.tho  itariitarena ciivarena, itariitaraciivarasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii. yampi,  bhante, bhagavaa santu.t.tho itariitarena ciivarena, itariitaraciivarasantu.t.thiyaa  ca va.n.navaadii, ima.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavati dutiya.m dhamma.m  samanupassaami yena bhagavanta.m saavakaa sakkaronti garu.m karonti  maanenti puujenti, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanti.
