[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, bhagavaa pavivitto, pavivekassa ca  va.n.navaadii ^a^T2.0318^ea^. yampi, bhante, bhagavaa pavivitto, pavivekassa ca  va.n.navaadii, ima.m kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavati pa~ncama.m dhamma.m samanupassaami  yena bhagavanta.m saavakaa sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti,  sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanti.

[03] ``ime kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavati pa~nca dhamme samanupassaami  yehi bhagavanta.m saavakaa sakkaronti ^a^V2.0209^ea^ garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti,  sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharantii''ti.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ ```appaahaaro sama.no gotamo, appaahaarataaya  ca va.n.navaadii'ti, iti ce ma.m, udaayi, saavakaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m  maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu.m, santi  kho pana me, udaayi, saavakaa kosakaahaaraapi a.d.dhakosakaahaaraapi  beluvaahaaraapi a.d.dhabeluvaahaaraapi. aha.m ^a^P2.0007^ea^ kho pana,  udaayi, appekadaa iminaa pattena samatittikampi bhu~njaami bhiyyopi  bhu~njaami. `appaahaaro sama.no gotamo, appaahaarataaya ca  va.n.navaadii'ti, iti ce ma.m, udaayi, saavakaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m  maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu.m, ye te,  udaayi, mama saavakaa kosakaahaaraapi a.d.dhakosakaahaaraapi beluvaahaaraapi  a.d.dhabeluvaahaaraapi na ma.m te iminaa dhammena sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m  maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu.m.

[03] ```santu.t.tho sama.no gotamo itariitarena ciivarena,  itariitaraciivarasantu.t.thiyaa ^a^T2.0319^ea^ ca va.n.navaadii'ti, iti ce ma.m, udaayi,  saavakaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa  upanissaaya vihareyyu.m, santi kho pana me, udaayi, saavakaa  pa.msukuulikaa luukhaciivaradharaa te susaanaa vaa sa"nkaarakuu.taa vaa paapa.nikaa  vaa nantakaani {paapa.nikaani vaa nantakaani vaa (sii0)} uccinitvaa  {ucchinditvaa (ka0)} sa"nghaa.ti.m karitvaa dhaarenti. aha.m kho  panudaayi, appekadaa gahapaticiivaraani dhaaremi ^a^M2.0200^ea^ da.lhaani satthaluukhaani  alaabulomasaani. `santu.t.tho sama.no gotamo itariitarena ciivarena,  itariitaraciivarasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii'ti, iti ce ma.m, udaayi,  saavakaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa  upanissaaya vihareyyu.m, ye te, udaayi, mama saavakaa pa.msukuulikaa  luukhaciivaradharaa te susaanaa vaa sa"nkaarakuu.taa vaa paapa.nikaa vaa  nantakaani uccinitvaa sa"nghaa.ti.m karitvaa dhaarenti, na ma.m te iminaa  dhammena sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa  upanissaaya vihareyyu.m.

[03] ```santu.t.tho sama.no gotamo itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena,  itariitarapi.n.dapaatasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii'ti, iti ce ma.m, udaayi,  saavakaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa ^a^V2.0210^ea^ garu.m katvaa  upanissaaya vihareyyu.m, santi kho pana me, udaayi, saavakaa  pi.n.dapaatikaa sapadaanacaarino u~nchaasake vate rataa, te antaraghara.m  pavi.t.thaa samaanaa aasanenapi nimantiyamaanaa na saadiyanti. aha.m kho  panudaayi, appekadaa nimantanepi {nimantanassaapi (ka0)} bhu~njaami saaliina.m odana.m  vicitakaa.laka.m ^a^T2.0320^ea^ ^a^P2.0008^ea^ anekasuupa.m anekabya~njana.m. `santu.t.tho  sama.no gotamo itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, itariitarapi.n.dapaatasantu.t.thiyaa ca  va.n.navaadii'ti, iti ce ma.m, udaayi, saavakaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m  maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu.m, ye te,  udaayi, mama saavakaa pi.n.dapaatikaa sapadaanacaarino u~nchaasake vate  rataa te antaraghara.m pavi.t.thaa samaanaa aasanenapi nimantiyamaanaa na  saadiyanti, na ma.m te iminaa dhammena sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m  puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu.m.

[03] ```santu.t.tho sama.no gotamo itariitarena senaasanena,  itariitarasenaasanasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii'ti, iti ce ma.m, udaayi,  saavakaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa  upanissaaya vihareyyu.m, santi kho pana me, udaayi, saavakaa  rukkhamuulikaa abbhokaasikaa, te a.t.thamaase channa.m na upenti. aha.m  kho panudaayi, appekadaa kuu.taagaaresupi viharaami ullittaavalittesu  nivaatesu phusitagga.lesu {phussitagga.lesu (sii0 pii0)} pihitavaatapaanesu. `santu.t.tho sama.no gotamo  itariitarena ^a^M2.0201^ea^ senaasanena, itariitarasenaasanasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii'ti,  iti ce ma.m, udaayi, saavakaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m,  sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu.m, ye te, udaayi, mama  saavakaa rukkhamuulikaa abbhokaasikaa te a.t.thamaase channa.m na upenti, na  ma.m te iminaa dhammena sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa ^a^T2.0321^ea^  garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu.m.

[03] ```pavivitto sama.no gotamo, pavivekassa ca va.n.navaadii'ti,  iti ce ma.m, udaayi, saavakaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m,  sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu.m, santi kho pana me,  udaayi, saavakaa aara~n~nikaa pantasenaasanaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani  senaasanaani ajjhogaahetvaa viharanti, te anvaddhamaasa.m sa"nghamajjhe  osaranti paatimokkhuddesaaya. aha.m kho panudaayi, appekadaa  aaki.n.no viharaami bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi ^a^V2.0211^ea^ upaasakehi upaasikaahi  ra~n~naa raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi. `pavivitto  sama.no gotamo, pavivekassa ca va.n.navaadii'ti, iti ce ^a^P2.0009^ea^  ma.m, udaayi, saavakaa sakkareyyu.m garu.m kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m,  sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu.m, ye te, udaayi, mama  saavakaa aara~n~nakaa pantasenaasanaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani  senaasanaani ajjhogaahetvaa viharanti te anvaddhamaasa.m sa"nghamajjhe  osaranti paatimokkhuddesaaya, na ma.m te iminaa dhammena sakkareyyu.m garu.m  kareyyu.m maaneyyu.m puujeyyu.m, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyyu.m.
[03] ``iti kho, udaayi, na mama.m saavakaa imehi pa~ncahi dhammehi  sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa  upanissaaya viharanti.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ ``atthi kho, udaayi, a~n~ne ca pa~nca dhammaa  yehi pa~ncahi dhammehi mama.m saavakaa sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti  puujenti ^a^T2.0322^ea^, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanti. katame pa~nca?  idhudaayi, mama.m saavakaa adhisiile sambhaaventi -- `siilavaa sama.no  gotamo paramena siilakkhandhena samannaagato'ti. yampudaayi {yamudaayi (syaa0  ka0)}, mama.m  saavakaa adhisiile sambhaaventi -- `siilavaa sama.no gotamo paramena  siilakkhandhena samannaagato'ti, aya.m kho, udaayi ^a^M2.0202^ea^, pa.thamo dhammo yena  mama.m saavakaa sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti, sakkatvaa garu.m  katvaa upanissaaya viharanti.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, mama.m saavakaa abhikkante  ~naa.nadassane sambhaaventi -- `jaana.myevaaha sama.no gotamo --  jaanaamiiti, passa.myevaaha sama.no gotamo -- passaamiiti; abhi~n~naaya  sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti no anabhi~n~naaya; sanidaana.m sama.no  gotamo dhamma.m deseti no anidaana.m; sappaa.tihaariya.m sama.no gotamo  dhamma.m deseti no appaa.tihaariya'nti. yampudaayi, mama.m saavakaa  abhikkante ~naa.nadassane sambhaaventi -- `jaana.myevaaha sama.no gotamo --  jaanaamiiti, passa.myevaaha sama.no gotamo -- passaamiiti; abhi~n~naaya  sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti no anabhi~n~naaya; sanidaana.m sama.no  gotamo dhamma.m deseti no anidaana.m; sappaa.tihaariya.m sama.no gotamo  dhamma.m deseti no appaa.tihaariya'nti, aya.m kho, udaayi, dutiyo  dhammo yena mama.m saavakaa ^a^V2.0212^ea^ ^a^P2.0010^ea^ sakkaronti garu.m karonti  maanenti puujenti, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanti.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^T2.0323^ea^ capara.m, udaayi, mama.m saavakaa  adhipa~n~naaya sambhaaventi -- `pa~n~navaa sama.no gotamo paramena  pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato; ta.m vata anaagata.m vaadapatha.m na dakkhati,  uppanna.m vaa parappavaada.m na sahadhammena suniggahita.m nigga.nhissatiiti --  neta.m .thaana.m vijjati'. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, api nu me saavakaa  eva.m jaanantaa eva.m passantaa antarantaraa katha.m opaateyyu''nti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``na kho panaaha.m, udaayi, saavakesu anusaasani.m paccaasiisaami {paccaasi.msaami  (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)};  a~n~nadatthu mamayeva saavakaa anusaasani.m paccaasiisanti.

[03] ``yampudaayi, mama.m saavakaa adhipa~n~naaya sambhaaventi --  `pa~n~navaa sama.no gotamo paramena pa~n~naakkhandhena samannaagato; ta.m vata  anaagata.m vaadapatha.m na dakkhati, uppanna.m vaa parappavaada.m na sahadhammena  niggahita.m nigga.nhissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati'. aya.m kho,  udaayi, tatiyo dhammo yena mama.m saavakaa sakkaronti garu.m karonti  maanenti puujenti, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanti.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^M2.0203^ea^ capara.m, udaayi, mama saavakaa yena  dukkhena dukkhoti.n.naa dukkhaparetaa te ma.m upasa"nkamitvaa dukkha.m  ariyasacca.m pucchanti, tesaaha.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m pu.t.tho byaakaromi,  tesaaha.m citta.m aaraadhemi pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena; te ma.m dukkhasamudaya.m...  dukkhanirodha.m... dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ariyasacca.m pucchanti,  tesaaha.m dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ariyasacca.m pu.t.tho byaakaromi ^a^T2.0324^ea^,  tesaaha.m citta.m aaraadhemi pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena. yampudaayi, mama  saavakaa yena dukkhena dukkhoti.n.naa dukkhaparetaa te ma.m upasa"nkamitvaa  dukkha.m ariyasacca.m pucchanti, tesaaha.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m pu.t.tho  byaakaromi, tesaaha.m citta.m aaraadhemi pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena. te ma.m  dukkhasamudaya.m ^a^V2.0213^ea^... dukkhanirodha.m... dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m  ariyasacca.m pucchanti. tesaaha.m dukkhanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m  ariyasacca.m pu.t.tho byaakaromi. tesaaha.m citta.m aaraadhemi pa~nhassa  veyyaakara.nena. aya.m kho, udaayi, catuttho dhammo yena ^a^P2.0011^ea^  mama.m saavakaa sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti,  sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanti.

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa cattaaro satipa.t.thaane  bhaaventi. idhudaayi, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii  sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu  vedanaanupassii viharati... citte cittaanupassii viharati... dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyy loke  abhijjhaadomanassa.m. tatra ca pana me saavakaa bahuu  abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa,  yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa cattaaro sammappadhaane bhaaventi. idhudaayi ^a^T2.0325^ea^,  bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m  janeti, vaayamati, viiriya.m aarabhati, citta.m pagga.nhaati, padahati;  uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti,  vaayamati, viiriya.m aarabhati, citta.m pagga.nhaati, padahati; anuppannaana.m  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, viiriya.m  aarabhati, citta.m pagga.nhaati, padahati; uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m  .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa  chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, viiriya.m aarabhati, citta.m pagga.nhaati, padahati.  tatra ca pana me saavakaa bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0204^ea^ capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa,  yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa cattaaro iddhipaade bhaaventi. idhudaayi,  bhikkhu chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti,  viiriyasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti,  cittasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti,  viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. tatra ca  pana me saavakaa bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] ``puna ^a^V2.0214^ea^ capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa,  yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa pa~ncindriyaani bhaaventi. idhudaayi ^a^P2.0012^ea^,  bhikkhu saddhindriya.m bhaaveti upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m;  viiriyindriya.m bhaaveti...pe0... satindriya.m bhaaveti... samaadhindriya.m  bhaaveti... pa~n~nindriya.m bhaaveti ^a^T2.0326^ea^ upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m. tatra ca  pana me saavakaa bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa,  yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa pa~nca balaani bhaaventi. idhudaayi, bhikkhu  saddhaabala.m bhaaveti upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m; viiriyabala.m  bhaaveti...pe0... satibala.m bhaaveti... samaadhibala.m bhaaveti... pa~n~naabala.m  bhaaveti upasamagaami.m sambodhagaami.m. tatra ca pana me saavakaa bahuu  abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa,  yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa sattabojjha"nge bhaaventi. idhudaayi, bhikkhu  satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m  nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m; dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0...  viiriyasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... piitisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...  passaddhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... samaadhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...  upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m  nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. tatra ca pana me saavakaa bahuu  abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa,  yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa ariya.m a.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m bhaaventi. idhudaayi,  bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti, sammaasa"nkappa.m bhaaveti, sammaavaaca.m bhaaveti  ^a^T2.0327^ea^, sammaakammanta.m bhaaveti, sammaaaajiiva.m bhaaveti, sammaavaayaama.m bhaaveti,  sammaasati.m ^a^M2.0205^ea^ bhaaveti, sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti. tatra ca pana me saavakaa  bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^V2.0215^ea^ capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa a.t.tha vimokkhe bhaaventi.  ruupii ruupaani passati, aya.m pa.thamo vimokkho; ajjhatta.m  aruupasa~n~nii bahiddhaa ruupaani passati, aya.m dutiyo vimokkho;  subhanteva adhimutto hoti, aya.m tatiyo vimokkho; sabbaso  ruupasa~n~naana.m ^a^P2.0013^ea^ samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa  naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m catuttho vimokkho;  sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m pa~ncamo vimokkho;  sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati, aya.m cha.t.tho vimokkho;  sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m  upasampajja viharati, aya.m sattamo vimokkho; sabbaso  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja  viharati, aya.m a.t.thamo vimokkho. tatra ca pana me saavakaa bahuu  abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa ^a^T2.0328^ea^ me saavakaa a.t.tha abhibhaayatanaani  bhaaventi. ajjhatta.m ruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati  parittaani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami,  passaamii'ti eva.m sa~n~nii hoti. ida.m pa.thama.m abhibhaayatana.m.
[03] ``ajjhatta.m ruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati  appamaa.naani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami,  passaamii'ti eva.m sa~n~nii hoti. ida.m dutiya.m abhibhaayatana.m.
[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati  parittaani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami,  passaamii'ti eva.m sa~n~nii hoti. ida.m tatiya.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati  appamaa.naani suva.n.nadubba.n.naani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami,  passaamii'ti eva.m sa~n~nii hoti. ida.m catuttha.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m ^a^M2.0206^ea^ ^a^V2.0216^ea^ aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati  niilaani niilava.n.naani niilanidassanaani niilanibhaasaani.  seyyathaapi naama umaapuppha.m niila.m niilava.n.na.m niilanidassana.m  niilanibhaasa.m, seyyathaapi vaa pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m  ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m niila.m niilava.n.na.m niilanidassana.m niilanibhaasa.m; evameva  ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati niilaani  niilava.n.naani niilanidassanaani niilanibhaasaani. `taani abhibhuyya  jaanaami, passaamii'ti eva.m sa~n~nii hoti. ida.m pa~ncama.m abhibhaayatana.m  ^a^P2.0014^ea^.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati  piitaani piitava.n.naani piitanidassanaani piitanibhaasaani. seyyathaapi  naama ka.nikaarapuppha.m ^a^T2.0329^ea^ piita.m piitava.n.na.m piitanidassana.m piitanibhaasa.m,  seyyathaapi vaa pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m piita.m  piitava.n.na.m piitanidassana.m piitanibhaasa.m; evameva ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii  eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati piitaani piitava.n.naani piitanidassanaani  piitanibhaasaani. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami, passaamii'ti eva.m  sa~n~nii hoti. ida.m cha.t.tha.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati  lohitakaani lohitakava.n.naani lohitakanidassanaani  lohitakanibhaasaani. seyyathaapi naama bandhujiivakapuppha.m lohitaka.m  lohitakava.n.na.m lohitakanidassana.m lohitakanibhaasa.m, seyyathaapi vaa  pana ta.m vattha.m baaraa.naseyyaka.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m lohitaka.m lohitakava.n.na.m  lohitakanidassana.m lohitakanibhaasa.m; evameva ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii  eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati lohitakaani lohitakava.n.naani  lohitakanidassanaani lohitakanibhaasaani. `taani abhibhuyya  jaanaami, passaamii'ti eva.m sa~n~nii hoti. ida.m sattama.m abhibhaayatana.m.

[03] ``ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani passati  odaataani odaatava.n.naani odaatanidassanaani odaatanibhaasaani.  seyyathaapi naama osadhitaarakaa odaataa odaatava.n.naa  odaatanidassanaa odaatanibhaasaa, seyyathaapi vaa pana ta.m vattha.m  baaraa.naseyyaka.m ubhatobhaagavima.t.tha.m odaata.m odaatava.n.na.m odaatanidassana.m  odaatanibhaasa.m; evameva ajjhatta.m aruupasa~n~nii eko bahiddhaa ruupaani  passati odaataani odaatava.n.naani odaatanidassanaani  odaatanibhaasaani ^a^T2.0330^ea^ ^a^V2.0217^ea^. `taani abhibhuyya jaanaami ^a^M2.0207^ea^, passaamii'ti  eva.msa~n~nii hoti. ida.m a.t.thama.m abhibhaayatana.m. tatra ca pana me  saavakaa bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa dasa kasi.naayatanaani  bhaaventi. pathaviikasi.nameko sa~njaanaati uddhamadho tiriya.m advaya.m  appamaa.na.m; aapokasi.nameko sa~njaanaati...pe0... tejokasi.nameko  sa~njaanaati... vaayokasi.nameko sa~njaanaati... niilakasi.nameko  sa~njaanaati... piitakasi.nameko sa~njaanaati... lohitakasi.nameko  sa~njaanaati... odaatakasi.nameko sa~njaanaati... aakaasakasi.nameko  sa~njaanaati ^a^P2.0015^ea^... vi~n~naa.nakasi.nameko sa~njaanaati uddhamadho tiriya.m advaya.m  appamaa.na.m. tatra ca pana me saavakaa bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa  viharanti.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa cattaari jhaanaani  bhaaventi. idhudaayi, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi  dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. so imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena abhisandeti  parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa  vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, udaayi, dakkho  nhaapako {nahaapako (sii0 pii0)} vaa nhaapakantevaasii ^a^T2.0331^ea^ vaa   ka.msathaale nhaaniiyacu.n.naani {nahaaniiyacu.n.naani (sii0 pii0)}  aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m sanneyya, saaya.m  nhaaniiyapi.n.di {saassa nahaaniiyapi.n.dii (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} snehaanugataa snehapareto santarabaahiraa phu.taa snehena na ca  pagghari.nii; evameva kho, udaayi, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m vivekajena  piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa  ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, udaayi, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa  ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m  samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti  parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa samaadhijena  piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti ^a^M2.0208^ea^. seyyathaapi, udaayi, udakarahado gambhiiro  ubbhidodako {ubbhitodako (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}. tassa nevassa puratthimaaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m ^a^V2.0218^ea^,  na pacchimaaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, na uttaraaya disaaya  udakassa aayamukha.m, na dakkhi.naaya disaaya udakassa ^a^P2.0016^ea^  aayamukha.m, devo ca na kaalena kaala.m sammaa dhaara.m  anuppaveccheyya; atha kho tamhaava udakarahadaa siitaa vaaridhaaraa  ubbhijjitvaa tameva udakarahada.m siitena vaarinaa abhisandeyya  parisandeyya paripuureyya paripphareyya, naassa {na nesa.m (sii0)} ki~nci sabbaavato  udakarahadassa siitena vaarinaa apphu.ta.m assa. evameva kho, udaayi,  bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti  parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato ^a^T2.0332^ea^ kaayassa  samaadhijena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, udaayi, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m nippiitikena sukhena  abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci  sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi,  udaayi, uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m vaa  appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake  jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani anto nimuggaposiini,  taani yaava caggaa yaava ca muulaa siitena vaarinaa abhisannaani  parisannaani paripuuraani paripphu.taani, naassa ki~nci sabbaavata.m,  uppalaana.m vaa padumaana.m vaa pu.n.dariikaana.m vaa siitena vaarinaa apphu.ta.m  assa; evameva kho, udaayi, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m nippiitikena  sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci  sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, udaayi, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa  ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m  upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so  imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa nisinno  hoti, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa  pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti. seyyathaapi, udaayi, puriso odaatena  vatthena sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nisinno assa, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato  kaayassa odaatena vatthena ^a^M2.0209^ea^ apphu.ta.m assa; evameva kho, udaayi,  bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m ^a^V2.0219^ea^ parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa  nisinno hoti, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena  ^a^P2.0017^ea^ cetasaa pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti. tatra ca pana  me saavakaa bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa eva.m pajaananti -- `aya.m  kho me kaayo ruupii caatumahaabhuutiko maataapettikasambhavo  odanakummaasuupacayo aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddha.msanadhammo;  ida~nca pana me vi~n~naa.na.m ettha sita.m ettha pa.tibaddha.m'. seyyathaapi,  udaayi, ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato accho  vippasanno sabbaakaarasampanno; tatrida.m sutta.m aavuta.m niila.m vaa piita.m vaa  lohita.m vaa odaata.m vaa pa.n.dusutta.m vaa. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso hatthe  karitvaa paccavekkheyya -- `aya.m kho ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa  a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato accho vippasanno sabbaakaarasampanno; tatrida.m  sutta.m aavuta.m niila.m vaa piita.m vaa lohita.m vaa odaata.m vaa pa.n.dusutta.m  vaa'ti. evameva kho, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa,  yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa eva.m pajaananti -- `aya.m kho me kaayo  ruupii caatumahaabhuutiko maataapettikasambhavo odanakummaasuupacayo  aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddha.msanadhammo; ida~nca ^a^T2.0334^ea^ pana me vi~n~naa.na.m  ettha sita.m ettha pa.tibaddha'nti. tatra ca pana me saavakaa bahuu  abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa imamhaa kaayaa a~n~na.m  kaaya.m abhinimminanti ruupi.m manomaya.m sabba"ngapacca"ngi.m ahiinindriya.m.  seyyathaapi, udaayi, puriso mu~njamhaa iisika.m pabbaaheyya; tassa  evamassa -- `aya.m mu~njo, aya.m iisikaa; a~n~no mu~njo, a~n~naa  iisikaa; mu~njamhaatveva iisikaa pabbaa.lhaa'ti. seyyathaa vaa panudaayi,  puriso asi.m kosiyaa pabbaaheyya; tassa evamassa -- `aya.m asi,  aya.m kosi; a~n~no asi a~n~naa kosi; kosiyaatveva asi  pabbaa.lho'ti. seyyathaa vaa, panudaayi ^a^P2.0018^ea^, puriso  ahi.m kara.n.daa uddhareyya; tassa evamassa -- `aya.m ahi, aya.m kara.n.do;  a~n~no ^a^M2.0210^ea^ ahi, a~n~no kara.n.do; kara.n.daatveva ahi ubbhato'ti. evameva  kho, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me  saavakaa imamhaa kaayaa a~n~na.m kaaya.m ^a^V2.0220^ea^ abhinimminanti ruupi.m manomaya.m  sabba"ngapacca"ngi.m ahiinindriya.m. tatra ca pana me saavakaa bahuu  abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa anekavihita.m iddhividha.m  paccanubhonti -- ekopi ^a^T2.0335^ea^ hutvaa bahudhaa honti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko  hoti; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m  asajjamaanaa gacchanti, seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m  karonti, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane {abhijjamaanaa (ka0)} gacchanti,  seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamanti, seyyathaapi pakkhii  saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa  parimasanti parimajjanti, yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattenti.  seyyathaapi, udaayi, dakkho kumbhakaaro vaa kumbhakaarantevaasii vaa  suparikammakataaya mattikaaya ya.m yadeva bhaajanavikati.m aaka"nkheyya ta.m  tadeva kareyya abhinipphaadeyya; seyyathaa vaa panudaayi, dakkho  dantakaaro vaa dantakaarantevaasii vaa suparikammakatasmi.m dantasmi.m ya.m  yadeva dantavikati.m aaka"nkheyya ta.m tadeva kareyya abhinipphaadeyya;  seyyathaa vaa panudaayi, dakkho suva.n.nakaaro vaa suva.n.nakaarantevaasii  vaa suparikammakatasmi.m suva.n.nasmi.m ya.m yadeva suva.n.navikati.m  aaka"nkheyya ta.m tadeva kareyya abhinipphaadeyya. evameva kho,  udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa  anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhonti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa honti,  bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti; aavibhaava.m, tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m  tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaanaa gacchanti, seyyathaapi aakaase;  pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karonti, seyyathaapi udake; udakepi  abhijjamaane gacchanti ^a^T2.0336^ea^, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena  kamanti, seyyathaapi pakkhii ^a^P2.0019^ea^ saku.no; imepi  candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa parimasanti  parimajjanti, yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena ^a^M2.0211^ea^ vasa.m vattenti. tatra ca pana  me saavakaa bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa  visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.nanti -- dibbe ca  maanuse ca, ye duure santike ca. seyyathaapi, udaayi, balavaa  sa"nkhadhamo appakasireneva caatuddisaa vi~n~naapeyya; evameva kho,  udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa ^a^V2.0221^ea^ me saavakaa  dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde  su.nanti -- dibbe ca maanuse ca, ye duure santike ca. tatra ca pana  me saavakaa bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m  cetasaa ceto paricca pajaananti -- saraaga.m vaa citta.m `saraaga.m  citta'nti pajaananti, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m `viitaraaga.m citta'nti  pajaananti; sadosa.m vaa citta.m `sadosa.m citta'nti pajaananti, viitadosa.m  vaa citta.m `viitadosa.m citta'nti pajaananti; samoha.m vaa citta.m `samoha.m  citta'nti ^a^T2.0337^ea^ pajaananti, viitamoha.m vaa citta.m `viitamoha.m citta'nti  pajaananti; sa.mkhitta.m vaa citta.m `sa"nkhitta.m citta'nti pajaananti,  vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m `vikkhitta.m citta'nti pajaananti; mahaggata.m vaa  citta.m `mahaggata.m citta'nti pajaananti, amahaggata.m vaa citta.m  `amahaggata.m citta'nti pajaananti; sauttara.m vaa citta.m `sauttara.m  citta'nti pajaananti, anuttara.m vaa citta.m `anuttara.m citta'nti  pajaananti; samaahita.m vaa citta.m `samaahita.m citta'nti pajaananti,  asamaahita.m vaa citta.m `asamaahita.m citta'nti pajaananti; vimutta.m vaa  citta.m `vimutta.m citta'nti pajaananti, avimutta.m vaa citta.m `avimutta.m  citta'nti pajaananti. seyyathaapi, udaayi, itthii vaa puriso vaa  daharo yuvaa ma.n.danakajaatiko aadaase vaa parisuddhe pariyodaate acche  vaa udakapatte saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano saka.nika.m vaa  `saka.nika'nti {saka.nika"nga.m vaa saka.nika"nganti (sii0)} jaaneyya ^a^P2.0020^ea^, aka.nika.m vaa  `aka.nika'nti {aka.nika"nga.m vaa aka.nika"nganti (sii0)} jaaneyya; evameva kho, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m  cetasaa ceto paricca pajaananti -- saraaga.m ^a^M2.0212^ea^ vaa citta.m `saraaga.m  citta'nti pajaananti, viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m...pe0... sadosa.m vaa  citta.m... viitadosa.m vaa citta.m... samoha.m vaa citta.m... viitamoha.m vaa  citta.m... sa"nkhitta.m vaa citta.m... vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m... mahaggata.m vaa ^a^T2.0338^ea^  citta.m... amahaggata.m vaa citta.m... sauttara.m vaa citta.m... anuttara.m vaa  citta.m... samaahita.m vaa citta.m... asamaahita.m vaa citta.m... vimutta.m vaa  citta.m... avimutta.m vaa citta.m `avimutta.m citta'nti pajaananti. tatra  ca pana me saavakaa bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa ^a^V2.0222^ea^ anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussaranti, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi  jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo  viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo  pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi  jaatisatasahassampi, anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi  sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no  evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto  amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro  eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto  idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussarati. seyyathaapi, udaayi, puriso sakamhaa gaamaa a~n~na.m gaama.m  gaccheyya, tamhaapi gaamaa a~n~na.m gaama.m gaccheyya; so tamhaa gaamaa  saka.myeva gaama.m paccaagaccheyya; tassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho sakamhaa  gaamaa a~n~na.m gaama.m ^a^T2.0339^ea^ agacchi.m, tatra eva.m a.t.thaasi.m eva.m nisiidi.m eva.m  abhaasi.m eva.m tu.nhii ahosi.m; tamhaapi gaamaa amu.m gaama.m agacchi.m,  tatraapi eva.m a.t.thaasi.m ^a^P2.0021^ea^ eva.m nisiidi.m eva.m abhaasi.m eva.m  tu.nhii ahosi.m, somhi tamhaa gaamaa saka.myeva gaama.m paccaagato'ti.  evameva kho, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa,  yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaranti,  seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m  anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussaranti. tatra ca pana me saavakaa bahuu  abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa  saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa dibbena cakkhunaa  visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte ^a^M2.0213^ea^ passanti cavamaane upapajjamaane  hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte  pajaananti -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa  vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m  upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa; ime vaa pana  bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa  manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa  sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m  loka.m ^a^T2.0340^ea^ upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena satte passanti cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite  suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage ^a^V2.0223^ea^ satte pajaananti.  seyyathaapi, udaayi, dve agaaraa sadvaaraa {sannadvaaraa (ka0)}. tatra cakkhumaa puriso majjhe  .thito passeyya manusse geha.m pavisantepi nikkhamantepi anuca"nkamantepi  anuvicarantepi; evameva kho, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m  pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena satte passanti cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite  suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaananti...pe0...  tatra ca pa me saavakaa bahuu abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti.

[03] 259^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^P2.0022^ea^ capara.m, udaayi,  akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa me saavakaa aasavaana.m  khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. seyyathaapi, udaayi,  pabbatasa"nkhepe udakarahado accho vippasanno anaavilo, tattha  cakkhumaa puriso tiire .thito passeyya sippisambukampi {sippikasambukampi  (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}  sakkharaka.thalampi macchagumbampi carantampi ti.t.thantampi. tassa  evamassa -- `aya.m kho udakarahado accho vippasanno anaavilo,  tatrime sippisambukaapi sakkharaka.thalaapi macchagumbaapi carantipi  ti.t.thantipii'ti. evameva kho, udaayi, akkhaataa mayaa saavakaana.m  pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipannaa ^a^T2.0341^ea^ me saavakaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m  cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja viharanti. tatra ca pana me ^a^M2.0214^ea^ saavakaa bahuu  abhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa viharanti. aya.m kho, udaayi, pa~ncamo  dhammo yena mama saavakaa sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti,  sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharanti.
[03] ``ime kho, udaayi, pa~nca dhammaa yehi mama.m saavakaa  sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti, sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa  upanissaaya viharantii''ti.
[01] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano sakuludaayii paribbaajako  bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] mahaasakuludaayisutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0342^ea^ ^a^V2.0224^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena  uggaahamaano paribbaajako sama.namu.n.dikaaputto {sama.nama.n.dikaaputto (sii0 pii0)} samayappavaadake  tindukaaciire ekasaalake mallikaaya aaraame pa.tivasati ^a^P2.0023^ea^  mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi  paribbaajakasatehi. atha kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati saavatthiyaa  nikkhami divaa divassa bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. atha kho pa~ncaka"ngassa  thapatissa etadahosi -- ``akaalo kho taava bhagavanta.m dassanaaya;  pa.tisalliino bhagavaa. manobhaavaniyaanampi bhikkhuuna.m asamayo  dassanaaya; pa.tisalliinaa manobhaavaniyaa bhikkhuu. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena  samayappavaadako tindukaaciiro ekasaalako mallikaaya aaraamo yena  uggaahamaano paribbaajako sama.namu.n.dikaaputto tenupasa"nkameyya''nti.  atha kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati yena samayappavaadako tindukaaciiro  ekasaalako mallikaaya aaraamo yena uggaahamaano paribbaajako  sama.namu.n.dikaaputto tenupasa"nkami.

[03] tena kho pana samayena uggaahamaano paribbaajako  sama.namu.n.dikaaputto mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m nisinno  hoti unnaadiniyaa uccaasaddamahaasaddaaya anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m  kathentiyaa, seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m mahaamattakatha.m senaakatha.m  bhayakatha.m ^a^T2.0343^ea^ yuddhakatha.m ^a^M2.0215^ea^ annakatha.m paanakatha.m vatthakatha.m sayanakatha.m maalaakatha.m  gandhakatha.m ~naatikatha.m yaanakatha.m gaamakatha.m nigamakatha.m nagarakatha.m janapadakatha.m  itthikatha.m suurakatha.m visikhaakatha.m kumbha.t.thaanakatha.m pubbapetakatha.m naanattakatha.m  lokakkhaayika.m samuddakkhaayika.m itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa.

[03] addasaa kho uggaahamaano paribbaajako sama.namu.n.dikaaputto  pa~ncaka"nga.m thapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana saka.m parisa.m  sa.n.thaapesi -- ``appasaddaa bhonto hontu, maa bhonto saddamakattha;  aya.m sama.nassa gotamassa saavako aagacchati pa~ncaka"ngo thapati.  yaavataa kho pana sama.nassa gotamassa saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa  saavatthiya.m pa.tivasanti aya.m tesa.m a~n~nataro ^a^V2.0225^ea^ pa~ncaka"ngo thapati.  appasaddakaamaa kho pana te aayasmanto appasaddaviniitaa appasaddassa  va.n.navaadino; appeva naama appasadda.m parisa.m viditvaa upasa"nkamitabba.m  ma~n~neyyaa''ti. atha kho te paribbaajakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m.

[03] 261^b^.^eb^ atha kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati yena uggaahamaano  paribbaajako sama.namu.n.dikaaputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  uggaahamaanena paribbaajakena sama.namu.n.dikaaputtena saddhi.m sammodi  ^a^P2.0024^ea^. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho pa~ncaka"nga.m thapati.m  uggaahamaano paribbaajako sama.namu.n.dikaaputto etadavoca -- ``catuuhi  kho aha.m, gahapati, dhammehi samannaagata.m purisapuggala.m pa~n~napemi  sampannakusala.m paramakusala.m ^a^T2.0344^ea^ uttamapattipatta.m sama.na.m ayojjha.m. katamehi  catuuhi? idha, gahapati, na kaayena paapakamma.m karoti, na paapaka.m vaaca.m  bhaasati, na paapaka.m sa"nkappa.m sa"nkappeti, na paapaka.m aajiiva.m aajiivati  -- imehi kho aha.m, gahapati, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagata.m purisapuggala.m  pa~n~napemi sampannakusala.m paramakusala.m uttamapattipatta.m sama.na.m ayojjha''nti.

[03] atha kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati uggaahamaanassa paribbaajakassa  sama.namu.n.dikaaputtassa bhaasita.m neva abhinandi nappa.tikkosi.  anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami -- ``bhagavato  santike etassa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaanissaamii''ti. atha kho  pa~ncaka"ngo thapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho pa~ncaka"ngo  thapati yaavatako ahosi uggaahamaanena ^a^M2.0216^ea^ paribbaajakena  sama.namu.n.dikaaputtena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi.

[03] 262^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, bhagavaa pa~ncaka"nga.m thapati.m etadavoca  -- ``eva.m sante kho, thapati, daharo kumaaro mando uttaanaseyyako  sampannakusalo bhavissati paramakusalo uttamapattipatto sama.no  ayojjho, yathaa uggaahamaanassa paribbaajakassa sama.namu.n.dikaaputtassa  vacana.m. daharassa hi, thapati, kumaarassa mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa  kaayotipi na hoti, kuto pana kaayena paapakamma.m karissati, a~n~natra  phanditamattaa! daharassa hi, thapati, kumaarassa mandassa  uttaanaseyyakassa ^a^T2.0345^ea^ vaacaatipi na hoti, kuto pana paapaka.m vaaca.m  bhaasissati, a~n~natra roditamattaa ^a^V2.0226^ea^! daharassa hi, thapati, kumaarassa  mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa sa"nkappotipi na hoti, kuto pana paapaka.m  sa"nkappa.m sa"nkappissati, a~n~natra vikuujitamattaa {vikujjitamattaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)}! daharassa hi, thapati,  kumaarassa mandassa uttaanaseyyakassa aajiivotipi na hoti, kuto  pana paapaka.m ^a^P2.0025^ea^ aajiiva.m aajiivissati, a~n~natra  maatutha~n~naa! eva.m sante kho, thapati, daharo kumaaro mando  uttaanaseyyako sampannakusalo bhavissati paramakusalo uttamapattipatto  sama.no ayojjho, yathaa uggaahamaanassa paribbaajakassa  sama.namu.n.dikaaputtassa vacana.m.

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi kho aha.m, thapati, dhammehi samannaagata.m  purisapuggala.m pa~n~napemi na ceva sampannakusala.m na paramakusala.m na  uttamapattipatta.m sama.na.m ayojjha.m, api cima.m dahara.m kumaara.m manda.m  uttaanaseyyaka.m samadhigayha ti.t.thati. katamehi catuuhi? idha, thapati,  na kaayena paapakamma.m karoti, na paapaka.m vaaca.m bhaasati, na paapaka.m  sa"nkappa.m sa"nkappeti, na paapaka.m aajiiva.m aajiivati -- imehi kho aha.m,  thapati, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagata.m purisapuggala.m pa~n~napemi na ceva  sampannakusala.m na paramakusala.m na uttamapattipatta.m sama.na.m ayojjha.m, api  cima.m dahara.m kumaara.m manda.m uttaanaseyyaka.m samadhigayha ti.t.thati.

[03] ``dasahi ^a^T2.0346^ea^ kho aha.m, thapati, dhammehi samannaagata.m purisapuggala.m  pa~n~napemi sampannakusala.m paramakusala.m uttamapattipatta.m sama.na.m ayojjha.m.  ime akusalaa siilaa; tamaha.m {kaha.m (sii0), taha.m (pii0)}, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami.  itosamu.t.thaanaa akusalaa ^a^M2.0217^ea^ siilaa; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami.  idha akusalaa siilaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti; tamaha.m, thapati,  veditabbanti vadaami. eva.m pa.tipanno akusalaana.m siilaana.m nirodhaaya  pa.tipanno hoti; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami.

[03] ``ime kusalaa siilaa; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami.  itosamu.t.thaanaa kusalaa siilaa; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami.  idha kusalaa siilaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti; tamaha.m, thapati,  veditabbanti vadaami. eva.m pa.tipanno kusalaana.m siilaana.m nirodhaaya  pa.tipanno hoti; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami.

[03] ``ime akusalaa sa"nkappaa; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami.  itosamu.t.thaanaa akusalaa sa"nkappaa ^a^V2.0227^ea^; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti  vadaami. idha akusalaa ^a^P2.0026^ea^ sa"nkappaa aparisesaa  nirujjhanti; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami. eva.m pa.tipanno  akusalaana.m sa"nkappaana.m nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti; tamaha.m, thapati,  veditabbanti vadaami.

[03] ``ime kusalaa sa"nkappaa; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami.  itosamu.t.thaanaa kusalaa sa"nkappaa ^a^T2.0347^ea^; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami.  idha kusalaa sa"nkappaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti; tamaha.m, thapati,  veditabbanti vadaami. eva.m pa.tipanno kusalaana.m sa"nkappaana.m nirodhaaya  pa.tipanno hoti; tamaha.m, thapati, veditabbanti vadaami.
[03] 264^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, thapati, akusalaa siilaa?  akusala.m kaayakamma.m, akusala.m vaciikamma.m, paapako aajiivo -- ime  vuccanti, thapati, akusalaa siilaa.

[03] ``ime ca, thapati, akusalaa siilaa ki.msamu.t.thaanaa?  samu.t.thaanampi nesa.m vutta.m. `cittasamu.t.thaanaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. katama.m  citta.m? cittampi hi bahu.m anekavidha.m naanappakaaraka.m. ya.m citta.m  saraaga.m sadosa.m samoha.m, itosamu.t.thaanaa akusalaa siilaa.

[03] ``ime ca, thapati, akusalaa siilaa kuhi.m aparisesaa  nirujjhanti? nirodhopi nesa.m vutto. idha, thapati, bhikkhu  kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya kaayasucarita.m ^a^M2.0218^ea^ bhaaveti, vaciiduccarita.m pahaaya  vaciisucarita.m bhaaveti, manoduccarita.m pahaaya manosucarita.m bhaaveti,  micchaajiiva.m pahaaya sammaajiivena jiivita.m kappeti -- etthete akusalaa  siilaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti.

[03] ``katha.m pa.tipanno, thapati, akusalaana.m siilaana.m nirodhaaya  pa.tipanno hoti? idha, thapati, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m  aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati; uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m  pagga.nhaati padahati; anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m  janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati;  uppannaana.m ^a^T2.0348^ea^ kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya  vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti ^a^V2.0228^ea^ vaayamati viiriya.m  aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. eva.m pa.tipanno ^a^P2.0027^ea^  kho, thapati, akusalaana.m siilaana.m nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti.

[03] 265^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, thapati, kusalaa siilaa? kusala.m  kaayakamma.m, kusala.m vaciikamma.m, aajiivaparisuddhampi kho aha.m, thapati,  siilasmi.m vadaami. ime vuccanti, thapati, kusalaa siilaa.

[03] ``ime ca, thapati, kusalaa siilaa ki.msamu.t.thaanaa? samu.t.thaanampi  nesa.m vutta.m. `cittasamu.t.thaanaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. katama.m citta.m?  cittampi hi bahu.m anekavidha.m naanappakaaraka.m. ya.m citta.m viitaraaga.m  viitadosa.m viitamoha.m, itosamu.t.thaanaa kusalaa siilaa.

[03] ``ime ca, thapati, kusalaa siilaa kuhi.m aparisesaa  nirujjhanti? nirodhopi nesa.m vutto. idha, thapati, bhikkhu  siilavaa hoti no ca siilamayo, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; yatthassa te kusalaa siilaa aparisesaa  nirujjhanti.

[03] ``katha.m pa.tipanno ca, thapati, kusalaana.m siilaana.m nirodhaaya  pa.tipanno hoti? idha, thapati, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m  aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati ^a^M2.0219^ea^; uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m pahaanaaya...pe0... anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m  uppaadaaya...pe0... uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m ^a^T2.0349^ea^ .thitiyaa asammosaaya  bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati  viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. eva.m pa.tipanno kho,  thapati, kusalaana.m siilaana.m nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti.
[03] 266^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, thapati, akusalaa sa"nkappaa?  kaamasa"nkappo, byaapaadasa"nkappo, vihi.msaasa"nkappo -- ime vuccanti,  thapati, akusalaa sa"nkappaa.

[03] ``ime ca, thapati, akusalaa sa"nkappaa ki.msamu.t.thaanaa?  samu.t.thaanampi nesa.m vutta.m. `sa~n~naasamu.t.thaanaa'tissa ^a^V2.0229^ea^ vacaniiya.m. katamaa  sa~n~naa? sa~n~naapi hi bahuu anekavidhaa naanappakaarakaa. kaamasa~n~naa,  byaapaadasa~n~naa, vihi.msaasa~n~naa -- itosamu.t.thaanaa akusalaa sa"nkappaa.

[03] ``ime ca, thapati, akusalaa sa"nkappaa kuhi.m aparisesaa  nirujjhanti? nirodhopi nesa.m vutto. idha, thapati, bhikkhu  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m ^a^P2.0028^ea^ upasampajja  viharati; etthete akusalaa sa"nkappaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti.

[03] ``katha.m pa.tipanno ca, thapati, akusalaana.m sa"nkappaana.m nirodhaaya  pa.tipanno hoti? idha, thapati, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m  aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati; uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m pahaanaaya...pe0... anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m  uppaadaaya...pe0... uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya ^a^T2.0350^ea^  bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati  viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. eva.m pa.tipanno kho,  thapati, akusalaana.m sa"nkappaana.m nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti.
[03] 267^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca, thapati, kusalaa sa"nkappaa?  nekkhammasa"nkappo, abyaapaadasa"nkappo, avihi.msaasa"nkappo -- ime  vuccanti, thapati, kusalaa sa"nkappaa.

[03] ``ime ca, thapati, kusalaa sa"nkappaa ki.msamu.t.thaanaa?  samu.t.thaanampi nesa.m vutta.m. `sa~n~naasamu.t.thaanaa'tissa vacaniiya.m. katamaa  sa~n~naa? sa~n~naapi hi bahuu anekavidhaa ^a^M2.0220^ea^ naanappakaarakaa.  nekkhammasa~n~naa, abyaapaadasa~n~naa, avihi.msaasa~n~naa -- itosamu.t.thaanaa  kusalaa sa"nkappaa.

[03] ``ime ca, thapati, kusalaa sa"nkappaa kuhi.m aparisesaa  nirujjhanti? nirodhopi nesa.m vutto. idha, thapati, bhikkhu  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati;  etthete kusalaa sa"nkappaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^V2.0230^ea^ pa.tipanno ca, thapati, kusalaana.m sa"nkappaana.m nirodhaaya  pa.tipanno hoti? idha, thapati, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m  aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati; uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m pahaanaaya...pe0... anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m  uppaadaaya...pe0... uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya  bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati  viiriya.m aarabhati ^a^T2.0351^ea^ citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. eva.m pa.tipanno kho,  thapati, kusalaana.m sa"nkappaana.m nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti.

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ ``katamehi caaha.m, thapati, dasahi dhammehi  samannaagata.m purisapuggala.m pa~n~napemi ^a^P2.0029^ea^ sampannakusala.m  paramakusala.m uttamapattipatta.m sama.na.m ayojjha.m? idha, thapati, bhikkhu  asekhaaya sammaadi.t.thiyaa samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaasa"nkappena  samannaagato hoti, asekhaaya sammaavaacaaya samannaagato hoti, asekhena  sammaakammantena samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaaaajiivena  samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaavaayaamena samannaagato hoti,  asekhaaya sammaasatiyaa samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaasamaadhinaa  samannaagato hoti, asekhena sammaa~naa.nena samannaagato hoti, asekhaaya  sammaavimuttiyaa samannaagato hoti -- imehi kho aha.m, thapati, dasahi  dhammehi samannaagata.m purisapuggala.m pa~n~napemi sampannakusala.m paramakusala.m  uttamapattipatta.m sama.na.m ayojjha''nti.
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano pa~ncaka"ngo thapati bhagavato  bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] sama.namu.n.dikasutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0352^ea^ ^a^M2.0221^ea^ ^a^V2.0231^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe  viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena  sakuludaayii paribbaajako moranivaape paribbaajakaaraame pa.tivasati  mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m  nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho  bhagavato etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava raajagahe pi.n.daaya  caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena moranivaapo paribbaajakaaraamo yena  sakuludaayii paribbaajako tenupasa"nkameyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa yena  moranivaapo paribbaajakaaraamo tenupasa"nkami.

[03] tena kho pana samayena sakuludaayii paribbaajako mahatiyaa  paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m nisinno hoti unnaadiniyaa  uccaasaddamahaasaddaaya ^a^P2.0030^ea^ anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m  kathentiyaa, seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m mahaamattakatha.m senaakatha.m  bhayakatha.m yuddhakatha.m annakatha.m paanakatha.m vatthakatha.m sayanakatha.m maalaakatha.m  gandhakatha.m ~naatikatha.m yaanakatha.m gaamakatha.m nigamakatha.m nagarakatha.m janapadakatha.m  itthikatha.m suurakatha.m visikhaakatha.m kumbha.t.thaanakatha.m pubbapetakatha.m naanattakatha.m  lokakkhaayika.m samuddakkhaayika.m itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa. addasaa  kho sakuludaayii paribbaajako bhagavanta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m.  disvaana saka.m parisa.m sa.n.thaapesi -- ``appasaddaa bhonto hontu, maa  bhonto saddamakattha. aya.m sama.no gotamo aagacchati; appasaddakaamo  kho pana so aayasmaa appasaddassa va.n.navaadii. appeva naama  appasadda.m parisa.m viditvaa upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti. atha kho te  paribbaajakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m ^a^T2.0353^ea^.

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa yena sakuludaayii paribbaajako  tenupasa"nkami. atha kho sakuludaayii paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca  -- ``etu kho, bhante, bhagavaa. svaagata.m, bhante, bhagavato. cirassa.m  kho, bhante, bhagavaa ima.m pariyaayamakaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaaya.  nisiidatu, bhante, bhagavaa; idamaasana.m pa~n~natta''nti. nisiidi bhagavaa  pa~n~natte aasane. sakuludaayiipi kho ^a^V2.0232^ea^ paribbaajako a~n~natara.m niica.m  aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho  sakuludaayi.m paribbaajaka.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kaaya nuttha, udaayi,  etarahi ^a^M2.0222^ea^ kathaaya sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa  vippakataa''ti? ``ti.t.thatesaa, bhante, kathaa yaaya maya.m etarahi kathaaya  sannisinnaa. nesaa, bhante, kathaa bhagavato dullabhaa bhavissati pacchaapi  savanaaya. yadaaha.m, bhante, ima.m parisa.m anupasa"nkanto homi athaaya.m  parisaa anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathentii nisinnaa hoti; yadaa ca  kho aha.m, bhante, ima.m parisa.m upasa"nkanto homi athaaya.m parisaa  mama~n~neva mukha.m ullokentii nisinnaa hoti -- `ya.m no sama.no udaayii  dhamma.m bhaasissati ta.m {ta.m no (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sossaamaa'ti; yadaa pana ^a^P2.0031^ea^,  bhante, bhagavaa ima.m parisa.m upasa"nkanto hoti athaaha~nceva aya~nca  parisaa bhagavato mukha.m ullokentaa {olokentii (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} nisinnaa homa -- `ya.m no bhagavaa  dhamma.m bhaasissati ta.m sossaamaa'''ti.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ ``tenahudaayi, ta.myevettha pa.tibhaatu yathaa ma.m  pa.tibhaaseyyaa''si. ``purimaani ^a^T2.0354^ea^, bhante, divasaani purimataraani sabba~n~nuu  sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanamaano `carato ca me  ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m  paccupa.t.thita'nti. so mayaa {paccupa.t.thita''nti mayaa (?)} pubbanta.m aarabbha pa~nha.m pu.t.tho samaano  a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticari, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamesi, kopa~nca dosa~nca  appaccaya~nca paatvaakaasi. tassa mayha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva aarabbha  sati udapaadi -- `aho nuuna bhagavaa, aho nuuna sugato! yo imesa.m  dhammaana.m sukusalo'''ti. ``ko pana so, udaayi, sabba~n~nuu  sabbadassaavii aparisesa.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa.tijaanamaano `carato ca me  ti.t.thato ca suttassa ca jaagarassa ca satata.m samita.m ~naa.nadassana.m  paccupa.t.thita'nti, yo tayaa pubbanta.m aarabbha pa~nha.m pu.t.tho samaano  a~n~nena~n~na.m pa.ticari, bahiddhaa katha.m apanaamesi kopa~nca dosa~nca  appaccaya~nca paatvaakaasii''ti? `niga.n.tho, bhante, naa.taputto'ti.

[03] ``yo kho, udaayi, anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya,  seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m  sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussareyya, so vaa ma.m pubbanta.m  aarabbha pa~nha.m puccheyya, ta.m vaaha.m pubbanta.m aarabbha pa~nha.m puccheyya.m; so  vaa me pubbanta.m aarabbha pa~nhassa ^a^M2.0223^ea^ veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheyya, tassa  vaaha.m pubbanta.m aarabbha pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena citta.m ^a^T2.0355^ea^ aaraadheyya.m.

[03] ``yo ^a^V2.0233^ea^ {so (sii0 pii0)} kho, udaayi, dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena  atikkantamaanusakena satte passeyya cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite  suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaaneyya, so vaa  ma.m aparanta.m aarabbha pa~nha.m ^a^P2.0032^ea^ puccheyya, ta.m vaaha.m aparanta.m  aarabbha pa~nha.m puccheyya.m; so vaa me aparanta.m aarabbha pa~nhassa  veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheyya, tassa vaaha.m aparanta.m aarabbha pa~nhassa  veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheyya.m.

[03] ``api ca, udaayi, ti.t.thatu pubbanto, ti.t.thatu aparanto. dhamma.m  te desessaami -- imasmi.m sati ida.m hoti, imassuppaadaa ida.m  uppajjati; imasmi.m asati ida.m na hoti, imassa nirodhaa ida.m  nirujjhatii''ti.

[03] ``aha~nhi, bhante, yaavatakampi me iminaa attabhaavena paccanubhuuta.m  tampi nappahomi saakaara.m sauddesa.m anussaritu.m, kuto panaaha.m  anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarissaami, seyyathida.m -- ekampi  jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m  pubbenivaasa.m anussarissaami, seyyathaapi bhagavaa? aha~nhi, bhante,  etarahi pa.msupisaacakampi na passaami, kuto panaaha.m dibbena cakkhunaa  visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passissaami cavamaane upapajjamaane  hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte  pajaanissaami, seyyathaapi bhagavaa? ya.m pana ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa  evamaaha -- `api ca, udaayi, ti.t.thatu pubbanto, ti.t.thatu ^a^T2.0356^ea^ aparanto;  dhamma.m te desessaami -- imasmi.m sati ida.m hoti, imassuppaadaa ida.m  uppajjati; imasmi.m asati ida.m na hoti, imassa nirodhaa ida.m  nirujjhatii'ti ta~nca pana me bhiyyosomattaaya na pakkhaayati. appeva  naamaaha.m, bhante, sake aacariyake bhagavato citta.m aaraadheyya.m pa~nhassa  veyyaakara.nenaa''ti.
[03] 272^b^.^eb^ ``kinti pana te, udaayi, sake aacariyake  hotii''ti? ``amhaaka.m, bhante, sake aacariyake eva.m hoti -- `aya.m  paramo va.n.no, aya.m paramo va.n.no'''ti.

[03] ``ya.m ^a^M2.0224^ea^ pana te eta.m, udaayi, sake aacariyake eva.m hoti --  `aya.m paramo va.n.no, aya.m ^a^V2.0234^ea^ paramo va.n.no'ti, katamo so paramo  va.n.no''ti? ``yasmaa, bhante, va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa  pa.niitataro vaa natthi so paramo va.n.no''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana so paramo va.n.no yasmaa va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no  uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthii''ti? ``yasmaa ^a^P2.0033^ea^,  bhante, va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa  natthi so paramo va.n.no''ti.

[03] ``diighaapi kho te esaa, udaayi, phareyya -- `yasmaa, bhante,  va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthi so paramo  va.n.no'ti vadesi, ta~nca va.n.na.m na pa~n~napesi. seyyathaapi, udaayi,  puriso eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m yaa imasmi.m janapade janapadakalyaa.nii ta.m  icchaami, ta.m kaamemii'ti. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho ^a^T2.0357^ea^ purisa, ya.m  tva.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m icchasi kaamesi, jaanaasi ta.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m  -- khattiyii vaa braahma.nii vaa vessii vaa suddii vaa''ti? iti pu.t.tho  `no'ti vadeyya. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m  janapadakalyaa.ni.m icchasi kaamesi, jaanaasi ta.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m --  eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaati vaati...pe0... diighaa vaa rassaa vaa majjhimaa  vaa kaa.lii vaa saamaa vaa ma"nguracchavii vaati... amukasmi.m gaame vaa  nigame vaa nagare vaa'ti? iti pu.t.tho `no'ti vadeyya. tamena.m eva.m  vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m na jaanaasi na passasi, ta.m tva.m  icchasi kaamesii'''ti? iti pu.t.tho `aamaa'ti vadeyya.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi -- nanu eva.m sante, tassa  purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho,  bhante, eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m  sampajjatii''ti.
[03] ``evameva kho tva.m, udaayi, `yasmaa, bhante, va.n.naa a~n~no  va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthi so paramo va.n.no'ti  vadesi, ta~nca va.n.na.m na pa~n~napesii''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhante, ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso  suparikammakato pa.n.dukambale ^a^V2.0235^ea^ nikkhitto bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati  ca, eva.m va.n.no attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa''ti.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^M2.0225^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yo vaa ma.ni  ve.luriyo subho ^a^T2.0358^ea^ jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato pa.n.dukambale  nikkhitto bhaasate ^a^P2.0034^ea^ ca tapate ca virocati ca, yo  vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya kimi khajjopanako -- imesa.m ubhinna.m  va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti?  ``yvaaya.m, bhante, rattandhakaaratimisaaya kimi khajjopanako -- aya.m  imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya  kimi khajjopanako, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya telappadiipo --  imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro  caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bhante, rattandhakaaratimisaaya telappadiipo -- aya.m  imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya  telappadiipo, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya mahaaaggikkhandho -- imesa.m  ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti?  ``yvaaya.m, bhante, rattandhakaaratimisaaya mahaaaggikkhandho -- aya.m  imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya  mahaaaggikkhandho, yaa vaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m viddhe vigatavalaahake  deve osadhitaarakaa -- imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no  abhikkantataro ^a^T2.0359^ea^ ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bhante, rattiyaa  paccuusasamaya.m viddhe vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa -- aya.m imesa.m  ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yaa vaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m viddhe  vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa, yo vaa tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe  vigatavalaahake deve abhido {abhide (ka0 sii0), abhidosa.m (ka0) abhidoti  abhisaddena samaanatthanipaatapada.m (chakka"nguttara.tiikaa mahaavagga  a.t.thamasuttava.n.nanaa)} a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando ^a^V2.0236^ea^ -- imesa.m ubhinna.m  va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti?  ``yvaaya.m, bhante, tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalaahake deve  abhido ^a^M2.0226^ea^ a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando -- aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m  abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^P2.0035^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yo vaa  tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido a.d.dharattasamaya.m  cando, yo vaa vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye viddhe  vigatavalaahake deve abhido majjhanhikasamaya.m suuriyo -- imesa.m ubhinna.m  va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti?  ``yvaaya.m, bhante, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye viddhe  vigatavalaahake deve abhido majjhanhikasamaya.m suuriyo -- aya.m imesa.m  ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ato kho te, udaayi, bahuu hi bahutaraa devaa ye imesa.m  candimasuuriyaana.m aabhaa naanubhonti, tyaaha.m ^a^T2.0360^ea^ pajaanaami. atha ca panaaha.m  na vadaami -- `yasmaa va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro  vaa natthii'ti. atha ca pana tva.m, udaayi, `yvaaya.m va.n.no kiminaa  khajjopanakena nihiinataro {hiinataro (sii0 pii0)} ca patiki.t.thataro ca so paramo va.n.no'ti  vadesi, ta~nca va.n.na.m na pa~n~napesii''ti. ``acchida.m {acchira (ka0), acchida  (?)} bhagavaa katha.m,  acchida.m sugato katha''nti!

[03] ``ki.m pana tva.m, udaayi, eva.m vadesi -- `acchida.m bhagavaa  katha.m, acchida.m sugato katha.m'''ti? ``amhaaka.m, bhante, sake  aacariyake eva.m hoti -- `aya.m paramo va.n.no, aya.m paramo va.n.no'ti.  te maya.m, bhante, bhagavataa sake aacariyake samanuyu~njiyamaanaa  samanuggaahiyamaanaa samanubhaasiyamaanaa rittaa tucchaa aparaddhaa''ti.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m panudaayi, atthi ekantasukho loko,  atthi aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa  sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``amhaaka.m, bhante, sake aacariyake eva.m  hoti -- `atthi ekantasukho loko, atthi aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa  ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa'''ti.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^V2.0237^ea^ pana saa, udaayi, aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa  ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``idha, bhante,  ekacco paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti,  adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato ^a^M2.0227^ea^ hoti, kaamesumicchaacaara.m  pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato ^a^P2.0036^ea^ hoti,  musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, a~n~natara.m vaa pana  tapogu.na.m samaadaaya vattati. aya.m kho saa, bhante, aakaaravatii ^a^T2.0361^ea^  pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yasmi.m samaye paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya  paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, ekantasukhii vaa tasmi.m samaye attaa  hoti sukhadukkhii vaa''ti? ``sukhadukkhii, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yasmi.m samaye adinnaadaana.m pahaaya  adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, ekantasukhii vaa tasmi.m samaye attaa  hoti sukhadukkhii vaa''ti? ``sukhadukkhii, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yasmi.m samaye kaamesumicchaacaara.m  pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, ekantasukhii vaa tasmi.m  samaye attaa hoti sukhadukkhii vaa''ti? ``sukhadukkhii, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yasmi.m samaye musaavaada.m pahaaya  musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, ekantasukhii vaa tasmi.m samaye attaa  hoti sukhadukkhii vaa''ti? ``sukhadukkhii, bhante''.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, udaayi, yasmi.m samaye a~n~natara.m tapogu.na.m  samaadaaya vattati, ekantasukhii vaa tasmi.m samaye attaa hoti  sukhadukkhii vaa''ti? ``sukhadukkhii, bhante''.

[03] ``ki.m pana tva.m, udaayi, vadesi -- `acchida.m bhagavaa katha.m,  acchida.m sugato katha.m'''ti? ``amhaaka.m, bhante, sake aacariyake eva.m  hoti -- `atthi ekantasukho loko, atthi aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa  ekantasukhassa lokassa ^a^T2.0362^ea^ sacchikiriyaayaa'ti. te maya.m, bhante,  bhagavataa sake aacariyake samanuyu~njiyamaanaa samanuggaahiyamaanaa  samanubhaasiyamaanaa rittaa tucchaa aparaddhaa''ti {aparaddhaa (sii0), aparaddhaapi  (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m ^a^M2.0228^ea^ pana, bhante, atthi ekantasukho loko,  atthi aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa  sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``atthi ^a^P2.0037^ea^ kho, udaayi,  ekantasukho loko, atthi aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa  lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] ``katamaa pana saa, bhante, aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa  lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``idhudaayi, bhikkhu vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; vitakkavicaaraana.m  vuupasamaa... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; piitiyaa ca viraagaa...   tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati -- aya.m kho saa, udaayi, aakaaravatii   pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] ``na {ki.m nu (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} kho saa, bhante, aakaaravatii pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa  lokassa sacchikiriyaaya, sacchikato hissa, bhante, ettaavataa  ekantasukho loko hotii''ti. ``na khvaassa, udaayi, ettaavataa  ekantasukho loko sacchikato hoti; aakaaravatiitveva saa pa.tipadaa  ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^V2.0239^ea^ vutte, sakuludaayissa paribbaajakassa parisaa unnaadinii  uccaasaddamahaasaddaa ahosi -- ``ettha maya.m anassaama saacariyakaa,  ettha maya.m anassaama {panassaama (sii0)} saacariyakaa! na maya.m ito bhiyyo uttaritara.m  pajaanaamaa''ti.

[03] atha kho sakuludaayii paribbaajako te paribbaajake appasadde ^a^T2.0363^ea^  katvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa panaassa, bhante,  ekantasukho loko sacchikato hotii''ti? ``idhudaayi, bhikkhu  sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m...  upasampajja viharati. yaa taa devataa ekantasukha.m loka.m upapannaa taahi  devataahi saddhi.m santi.t.thati sallapati saakaccha.m samaapajjati. ettaavataa  khvaassa, udaayi, ekantasukho loko sacchikato hotii''ti.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ ``etassa nuuna, bhante, ekantasukhassa lokassa  sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu bhagavati brahmacariya.m carantii''ti? ``na  kho, udaayi, ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi  brahmacariya.m caranti. atthi kho, udaayi ^a^M2.0229^ea^, a~n~neva dhammaa uttaritaraa  ca pa.niitataraa ca yesa.m sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m  carantii''ti.

[03] ``katame ^a^P2.0038^ea^ pana te, bhante, dhammaa uttaritaraa  ca pa.niitataraa ca yesa.m sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu bhagavati brahmacariya.m  carantii''ti? ``idhudaayi, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m  sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro  purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa...pe0... so ime  pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.  ayampi kho, udaayi, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca yassa  sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti''.

[03] ``puna capara.m, udaayi, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m ^a^T2.0364^ea^ vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m  jhaana.m... tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi  kho, udaayi, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca yassa  sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti.

[03] ``so ^a^V2.0240^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m  pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi  jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussarati. ayampi kho, udaayi, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro  ca yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m  cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa  visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine  pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate...pe0... yathaakammuupage satte  pajaanaati. ayampi kho, udaayi, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro  ca yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m  khaya~naa.naaya ^a^M2.0230^ea^ citta.m abhininnaameti ^a^T2.0365^ea^. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti...   `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti... `ime   aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti... ^a^P2.0039^ea^   `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti... `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti   yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m  jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti  ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m,  naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. ayampi kho, udaayi, dhammo  uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi  brahmacariya.m caranti. ime kho, udaayi, dhammaa uttaritaraa ca  pa.niitataraa ca yesa.m sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m  carantii''ti.

[03] 277^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, sakuludaayii paribbaajako bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante ^a^V2.0241^ea^, abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi,  bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa  magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto  ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo  pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca  bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m,  labheyya.m upasampada''nti.

[03] eva.m ^a^T2.0366^ea^ vutte, sakuludaayissa paribbaajakassa parisaa sakuludaayi.m  paribbaajaka.m etadavocu.m -- ``maa bhava.m, udaayi, sama.ne gotame  brahmacariya.m cari; maa bhava.m, udaayi, aacariyo hutvaa antevaasiivaasa.m  vasi. seyyathaapi naama udakama.niko {ma.niko (sii0 pii0 ka0)} hutvaa uda~ncaniko  {uddekaniko (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} assa, eva.m  sampadamida.m {eva.m sampadameta.m (sii0 pii0)} bhoto udaayissa bhavissati. maa bhava.m, udaayi, sama.ne  gotame brahmacariya.m cari; maa bhava.m, udaayi, aacariyo hutvaa  antevaasiivaasa.m vasii''ti. iti hida.m sakuludaayissa paribbaajakassa  parisaa sakuludaayi.m paribbaajaka.m antaraayamakaasi bhagavati  brahmacariyeti.
[06] cuu.lasakuludaayisutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0367^ea^ ^a^M2.0231^ea^ ^a^V2.0242^ea^ ^a^P2.0040^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m  bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha  kho vekhanaso {vekhanasso (sii0 pii0)} paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa  ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho vekhanaso paribbaajako  bhagavato santike udaana.m udaanesi -- ``aya.m paramo va.n.no, aya.m  paramo va.n.no''ti.

[03] ``yasmaa, bho gotama, va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa  pa.niitataro vaa natthi so paramo va.n.no''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ^a^P2.0041^ea^ ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, nanu eva.m sante  tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa  kho, bho gotama, eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m ^a^M2.0232^ea^ bhaasita.m  sampajjatii''ti. ``evameva kho tva.m, kaccaana, `yasmaa, bho gotama,  va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthi so paramo  va.n.no'ti vadesi; ta~nca va.n.na.m na pa~n~napesii''ti. ``seyyathaapi, bho  gotama, ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato  pa.n.dukambale nikkhitto bhaasate ca tapate ca virocati ca, eva.m va.n.no  attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya  telappadiipo, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya ^a^V2.0244^ea^ mahaaaggikkhandho, imesa.m  ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti?  ``yvaaya.m, bho gotama, rattandhakaaratimisaaya mahaaaggikkhandho, aya.m  imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, yo vaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya  mahaaaggikkhandho, yaa vaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m viddhe ^a^P2.0042^ea^  vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa, imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m  katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bho  gotama, rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m ^a^T2.0370^ea^ viddhe vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa,  aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti.  ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, yaa vaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaya.m viddhe  vigatavalaahake deve osadhitaarakaa, yo vaa tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe  vigatavalaahake ^a^M2.0233^ea^ deve abhido a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando, imesa.m ubhinna.m  va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti?  ``yvaaya.m, bho gotama, tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalaahake deve  abhido a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando, aya.m imesa.m ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m  abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, kaccaana, yo  vaa tadahuposathe pannarase viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido  a.d.dharattasamaya.m cando, yo vaa vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye  viddhe vigatavalaahake deve abhido majjhanhikasamaya.m suuriyo, imesa.m  ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m katamo va.n.no abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti?  ``yvaaya.m, bho gotama, vassaana.m pacchime maase saradasamaye viddhe  vigatavalaahake deve abhido majjhanhikasamaya.m suuriyo -- aya.m imesa.m  ubhinna.m va.n.naana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro caa''ti. ``ato kho te,  kaccaana, bahuu hi bahutaraa devaa ye imesa.m candimasuuriyaana.m aabhaa  naanubhonti, tyaaha.m pajaanaami. atha ca panaaha.m na vadaami -- `yasmaa  va.n.naa a~n~no va.n.no uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ^a^T2.0371^ea^ ca natthii'ti. atha  ca pana tva.m, kaccaana, `yvaaya.m va.n.no kiminaa khajjopanakena  nihiinataro ca patiki.t.thataro ca so paramo va.n.no'ti vadesi; ta~nca  va.n.na.m na pa~n~napesi''.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca kho ime, kaccaana, kaamagu.naa. katame  pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa  kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa  gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa  ^a^P2.0043^ea^ kantaa manaapaa ^a^V2.0245^ea^ piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa --  ime kho, kaccaana, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ya.m kho, kaccaana, ime pa~nca  kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m ida.m vuccati kaamasukha.m.  iti kaamehi kaamasukha.m, kaamasukhaa kaamaggasukha.m tattha  aggamakkhaayatii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, vekhanaso paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``acchariya.m, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m  bhotaa gotamena -- `kaamehi kaamasukha.m, kaamasukhaa kaamaggasukha.m tattha  aggamakkhaayatii'ti. (`kaamehi, bho gotama, kaamasukha.m, kaamasukhaa  kaamaggasukha.m, tattha aggamakkhaayatii'ti) {( ) sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0 potthakesu natthi} -- ``dujjaana.m kho eta.m,  kaccaana, tayaa ^a^M2.0234^ea^ a~n~nadi.t.thikena a~n~nakhantikena a~n~narucikena  a~n~natrayogena a~n~natraacariyakena -- kaamaa {kaama.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa kaamasukha.m vaa  kaamaggasukha.m vaa. ye kho te, kaccaana, bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa  vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa  parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa te kho ^a^T2.0372^ea^ eta.m jaaneyyu.m --  kaamaa vaa kaamasukha.m vaa kaamaggasukha.m vaa''ti.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, vekhanaso paribbaajako kupito  anattamano bhagavanta.myeva khu.msento bhagavanta.myeva vambhento bhagavanta.myeva  vadamaano ``sama.no {sama.no ca (sii0 pii0)} gotamo paapito bhavissatii''ti bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``evameva panidhekacce {panidheke (sii0 pii0), panimeke  (uparisubhasutte)} sama.nabraahma.naa ajaanantaa pubbanta.m,  apassantaa aparanta.m atha ca pana `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m,  kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati -- pajaanaamaa'ti -- pa.tijaananti  {itthattaayaati pa.tijaananti (pii0)}.  tesamida.m bhaasita.m hassaka.myeva sampajjati, naamaka.myeva sampajjati,  rittaka.myeva sampajjati, tucchaka.myeva sampajjatii''ti. ``ye kho te,  kaccaana, sama.nabraahma.naa ajaanantaa pubbanta.m ^a^P2.0044^ea^,  apassantaa aparanta.m, `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m  kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati -- pajaanaamaa'ti -- pa.tijaananti; tesa.m  soyeva {tesa.m tesaaya.m (sii0), tesa.myeva so (?)} sahadhammiko niggaho hoti.  api ca, kaccaana, ti.t.thatu  pubbanto, ti.t.thatu aparanto. etu vi~n~nuu puriso asa.tho amaayaavii  ujujaatiko, ahamanusaasaami aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa  pa.tipajjamaano {yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjamaano (?)} nacirasseva saama~n~neva ~nassati saama.m dakkhiti -- eva.m  kira sammaa {eva.m kiraayasmaa (syaa0 ka0)} bandhanaa vippamokkho hoti, yadida.m avijjaa bandhanaa.  seyyathaapi, kaccaana, daharo kumaaro mando uttaanaseyyako  ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi baddho assa suttabandhanehi; tassa vuddhimanvaaya  indriyaana.m paripaakamanvaaya ^a^T2.0373^ea^ taani bandhanaani mucceyyu.m; so  mokkhomhiiti kho jaaneyya no ca bandhana.m ^a^V2.0246^ea^. evameva kho, kaccaana,  etu vi~n~nuu puriso asa.tho amaayaavii ujujaatiko, ahamanusaasaami,  aha.m dhamma.m desemi; yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano nacirasseva  saama~n~ne ~nassati ^a^M2.0235^ea^, saama.m dakkhiti -- `eva.m kira sammaa bandhanaa  vippamokkho hoti, yadida.m avijjaa bandhanaa'''ti.
[03] eva.m vutte, vekhanaso paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu  ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] vekhanasasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.
[06] paribbaajakavaggo ni.t.thito tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] pu.n.darii-aggisaha-kathinaamo, diighanakho puna  bhaaradvaajagotto.
[22] sandakaudaayimu.n.dikaputto, ma.niko tathaakaccaano varavaggo..
