[03] 387^b^.^eb^ ``gacchanto kho pana so bhava.m gotamo dakkhi.neneva  paadena ^a^T2.0534^ea^ pa.thama.m pakkamati. so naatiduure paada.m uddharati, naaccaasanne paada.m  nikkhipati; so naatisiigha.m gacchati, naatisa.nika.m gacchati; na ca  adduvena adduva.m sa"ngha.t.tento gacchati, na ca gopphakena gopphaka.m  sa"ngha.t.tento gacchati. so gacchanto na satthi.m unnaameti, na satthi.m  onaameti; na satthi.m sannaameti, na satthi.m vinaameti. gacchato kho  pana tassa bhoto gotamassa adharakaayova {a.d.dhakaayova (ka0), aaraddhakaayova  (syaa0 ka.m0)} i~njati, na ca kaayabalena  gacchati. apalokento kho pana so bhava.m gotamo sabbakaayeneva  apaloketi; so na uddha.m ulloketi, na adho oloketi; na ca  vipekkhamaano gacchati, yugamatta~nca pekkhati; tato cassa uttari  anaava.ta.m ~naa.nadassana.m bhavati. so antaraghara.m pavisanto na kaaya.m  unnaameti ^a^M2.0339^ea^, na kaaya.m onaameti; na kaaya.m sannaameti, na ^a^P2.0138^ea^  kaaya.m vinaameti. so naatiduure naaccaasanne aasanassa  parivattati, na ca paa.ninaa aalambitvaa aasane nisiidati, na ca  aasanasmi.m kaaya.m pakkhipati. so antaraghare nisinno samaano na  hatthakukkucca.m aapajjati, na paadakukkucca.m aapajjati; na adduvena adduva.m  aaropetvaa nisiidati; na ca gopphakena gopphaka.m aaropetvaa  nisiidati; na ca paa.ninaa hanuka.m upadahitvaa {upaadiyitvaa (sii0 pii0)} nisiidati. so  antaraghare nisinno samaano na chambhati na kampati na vedhati na  paritassati. so achambhii akampii avedhii aparitassii  vigatalomaha.mso. vivekavatto ca so bhava.m gotamo antaraghare  nisinno hoti. so pattodaka.m pa.tigga.nhanto ^a^T2.0535^ea^ na patta.m unnaameti, na  patta.m onaameti; na patta.m sannaameti, na patta.m vinaameti. so  pattodaka.m pa.tigga.nhaati naatithoka.m naatibahu.m. so na khulukhulukaaraka.m  {bulubulukaaraka.m (sii0)}  patta.m dhovati, na samparivattaka.m patta.m dhovati, na ^a^V2.0347^ea^ patta.m bhuumiya.m  nikkhipitvaa hatthe dhovati; hatthesu dhotesu patto dhoto hoti, patte  dhote hatthaa dhotaa honti. so pattodaka.m cha.d.deti naatiduure naaccaasanne,  na ca viccha.d.dayamaano. so odana.m pa.tigga.nhanto na patta.m unnaameti,  na patta.m onaameti; na patta.m sannaameti, na patta.m vinaameti. so  odana.m pa.tigga.nhaati naatithoka.m naatibahu.m. bya~njana.m kho pana bhava.m  gotamo bya~njanamattaaya aahaareti, na ca bya~njanena aalopa.m atinaameti.  dvattikkhattu.m kho bhava.m gotamo mukhe aalopa.m samparivattetvaa  ajjhoharati; na cassa kaaci odanami~njaa asambhinnaa kaaya.m  pavisati, na cassa kaaci odanami~njaa mukhe avasi.t.thaa hoti;  athaapara.m aalopa.m upanaameti. rasapa.tisa.mvedii kho pana so bhava.m  gotamo aahaara.m aahaareti, no ca rasaraagapa.tisa.mvedii.

[03] ``a.t.tha"ngasamannaagata.m {a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato (ka0)} kho pana so bhava.m gotamo aahaara.m aahaareti  -- neva davaaya, na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva  imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya, vihi.msuuparatiyaa  brahmacariyaanuggahaaya -- `iti puraa.na~nc ^a^P2.0139^ea^ vedana.m  pa.tiha"nkhaami nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me ^a^T2.0536^ea^ bhavissati  anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'ti ^a^M2.0340^ea^. so bhuttaavii pattodaka.m  pa.tigga.nhanto na patta.m unnaameti, na patta.m onaameti; na patta.m  sannaameti, na patta.m vinaameti. so pattodaka.m pa.tigga.nhaati naatithoka.m  naatibahu.m. so na khulukhulukaaraka.m patta.m dhovati, na samparivattaka.m  patta.m dhovati, na patta.m bhuumiya.m nikkhipitvaa hatthe dhovati; hatthesu  dhotesu patto dhoto hoti, patte dhote hatthaa dhotaa honti. so  pattodaka.m cha.d.deti naatiduure naaccaasanne, na ca viccha.d.dayamaano. so  bhuttaavii na patta.m bhuumiya.m nikkhipati naatiduure naaccaasanne, na ca  anatthiko pattena hoti, na ca ativelaanurakkhii pattasmi.m. so  bhuttaavii muhutta.m tu.nhii nisiidati, na ca anumodanassa kaalamatinaameti.  so bhuttaavii anumodati, na ta.m bhatta.m garahati, na a~n~na.m bhatta.m  pa.tika"nkhati; a~n~nadatthu dhammiyaa kathaaya ta.m parisa.m sandasseti  samaadapeti samuttejeti sampaha.mseti. so ta.m parisa.m dhammiyaa kathaaya  sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamati.  so naatisiigha.m gacchati, naatisa.nika.m gacchati, na ca muccitukaamo  gacchati; na ca tassa bhoto gotamassa kaaye ciivara.m accukka.t.tha.m hoti na  ca accokka.t.tha.m, na ca kaayasmi.m alliina.m na ca kaayasmaa apaka.t.tha.m; na ca  tassa bhoto gotamassa kaayamhaa vaato ciivara.m apavahati; na ca tassa  bhoto ^a^V2.0348^ea^ gotamassa kaaye rajojalla.m upalimpati ^a^T2.0537^ea^. so aaraamagato  nisiidati pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja paade pakkhaaleti; na ca so  bhava.m gotamo paadama.n.danaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. so paade  pakkhaaletvaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya  parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so neva attabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na  parabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya ceteti;  attahitaparahitaubhayahitasabbalokahitameva ^a^P2.0140^ea^ so bhava.m  gotamo cintento nisinno hoti. so aaraamagato parisati dhamma.m  deseti, na ta.m parisa.m ussaadeti, na ta.m parisa.m apasaadeti; a~n~nadatthu  dhammiyaa kathaaya ta.m parisa.m sandasseti samaadapeti samuttejeti  sampaha.mseti.

[03] ``a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato kho panassa bhoto gotamassa mukhato  ghoso niccharati -- vissa.t.tho ca, vi~n~neyyo ca, ma~nju ca, savaniiyo  ca, bindu ca, avisaarii ca, gambhiiro ca, ninnaadii ca. yathaaparisa.m  kho pana so bhava.m ^a^M2.0341^ea^ gotamo sarena vi~n~naapeti, na cassa bahiddhaa  parisaaya ghoso niccharati. te tena bhotaa gotamena dhammiyaa kathaaya  sandassitaa samaadapitaa samuttejitaa sampaha.msitaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkamanti  avalokayamaanaayeva {apalokayamaanaayeva (sii0 ka0)} avijahitattaa  {avijahantaabhaavena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. addasaama kho maya.m, bho, ta.m  bhavanta.m gotama.m gacchanta.m, addasaama .thita.m, addasaama antaraghara.m pavisanta.m,  addasaama antaraghare nisinna.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m, addasaama antaraghare bhu~njanta.m,  addasaama bhuttaavi.m nisinna.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m, addasaama bhuttaavi.m anumodanta.m,  addasaama aaraama.m ^a^T2.0538^ea^ gacchanta.m, addasaama aaraamagata.m nisinna.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m,  addasaama aaraamagata.m parisati dhamma.m desenta.m. ediso ca ediso ca  so bhava.m gotamo, tato ca bhiyyo''ti.
[03] 388^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, brahmaayu braahma.no u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m  uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa tikkhattu.m udaana.m  udaaneti --
[03] ``namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa.
[03] ``namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa.
[03] ``namo ^a^V2.0349^ea^ tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti.
[03] ``appeva naama maya.m kadaaci karahaci tena bhotaa gotamena  samaagaccheyyaama? appeva naama siyaa kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti!

[03] 389^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa videhesu anupubbena caarika.m  caramaano yena mithilaa tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa mithilaaya.m  viharati maghadevambavane. assosu.m kho mithileyyakaa {methileyyakaa (sii0  pii0)}  braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo ^a^P2.0141^ea^  sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito videhesu caarika.m caramaano  mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi mithila.m  anuppatto, mithilaaya.m viharati maghadevambavane. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m  gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa  araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro  purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. so ima.m  loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m ^a^M2.0342^ea^ paja.m sadevamanussa.m  saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti ^a^T2.0539^ea^. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m  majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m  parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m  dassana.m hotii'''ti.

[03] atha kho mithileyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu,  sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu;  appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu;  appekacce bhagavato santike naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu;  appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ assosi kho brahmaayu braahma.no -- ``sama.no khalu,  bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito mithila.m anuppatto,  mithilaaya.m viharati maghadevambavane''ti. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no  sambahulehi saavakehi saddhi.m yena maghadevambavana.m tenupasa"nkami. atha  kho brahmaayuno braahma.nassa aviduure ambavanassa etadahosi -- ``na  kho meta.m patiruupa.m yoha.m pubbe appa.tisa.mvidito ^a^V2.0350^ea^ sama.na.m gotama.m  dassanaaya upasa"nkameyya''nti. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no a~n~natara.m  maa.navaka.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, maa.navaka, yena sama.no gotamo  tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena sama.na.m gotama.m appaabaadha.m  appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha -- `brahmaayu, bho gotama,  braahma.no bhavanta.m gotama.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m  pucchatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `brahmaayu, bho ^a^T2.0540^ea^ gotama, braahma.no  ji.n.no vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto, viisavassasatiko  jaatiyaa, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m  itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu  anavayo. yaavataa, bho, braahma.nagahapatikaa mithilaaya.m pa.tivasanti,  brahmaayu tesa.m braahma.no aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m bhogehi; brahmaayu tesa.m  braahma.no aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m mantehi; brahmaayu ^a^P2.0142^ea^  tesa.m braahma.no aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m aayunaa ceva  yasasaa ca. so bhoto gotamassa dassanakaamo'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^M2.0343^ea^, bho''ti kho so maa.navako brahmaayussa braahma.nassa  pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m  sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m  a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho so maa.navako bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``brahmaayu, bho gotama, braahma.no bhavanta.m gotama.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m  lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati; eva~nca vadeti -- `brahmaayu, bho  gotama, braahma.no ji.n.no vu.d.dho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto,  viisavassasatiko jaatiyaa, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m  saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako, veyyaakara.no,  lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu ^a^T2.0541^ea^ anavayo. yaavataa, bho,  braahma.nagahapatikaa mithilaaya.m pa.tivasanti, brahmaayu tesa.m braahma.no  aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m bhogehi; brahmaayu tesa.m braahma.no  aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m mantehi; brahmaayu tesa.m braahma.no  aggamakkhaayati -- yadida.m aayunaa ceva yasasaa ca. so bhoto  gotamassa dassanakaamo'''ti. ``yassadaani, maa.nava, brahmaayu  braahma.no kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti. atha kho so maa.navako yena brahmaayu  braahma.no tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m etadavoca --  ``kataavakaaso khomhi bhavataa sama.nena gotamena. yassadaani bhava.m  kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0351^ea^ kho brahmaayu braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.  addasaa kho saa parisaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m duuratova aagacchanta.m.  disvaana oramiya {oramattha (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), oramatha, oramati (ka0),  atha na.m (sii0), oramiyaati pana tvaapaccayantatathasa.mva.n.nanaanuruupa.m  visodhitapada.m} okaasamakaasi yathaa ta.m ~naatassa yasassino.  atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no ta.m parisa.m etadavoca -- ``ala.m, bho!  nisiidatha tumhe sake aasane. idhaaha.m sama.nassa gotamassa santike  nisiidissaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho brahmaayu  braahma.no bhagavato ^a^M2.0344^ea^ kaaye ^a^P2.0143^ea^  dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani samannesi. addasaa kho brahmaayu braahma.no  bhagavato ^a^T2.0542^ea^ kaaye dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve.  dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na  sampasiidati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya ca. atha  kho brahmaayu braahma.no bhagavanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``ye me dvatti.msaati sutaa, mahaapurisalakkha.naa.
[22] duve tesa.m na passaami, bhoto kaayasmi.m gotama..
[21] ``kacci kosohita.m bhoto, vatthaguyha.m naruttama.
[22] naariisamaanasavhayaa, kacci jivhaa na dassakaa {naariisahanaama savhayaa,  kacci jivhaa narassikaa. (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}..
[21] ``kacci pahuutajivhosi, yathaa ta.m jaaniyaamase.
[22] ninnaamayeta.m pahuuta.m, ka"nkha.m vinaya no ise..
[21] ``di.t.thadhammahitatthaaya, samparaayasukhaaya ca.
[22] kataavakaasaa pucchaama, ya.m ki~nci abhipatthita''nti..

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``passati kho me  aya.m brahmaayu braahma.no dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve.  dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na  sampasiidati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya caa''ti ^a^V2.0352^ea^.  atha kho bhagavaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi yathaa addasa  brahmaayu braahma.no bhagavato kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m. atha kho bhagavaa  jivha.m ninnaametvaa ubhopi ka.n.nasotaani anumasi pa.timasi; ubhopi  naasikasotaani ^a^T2.0543^ea^ anumasi pa.timasi; kevalampi nalaa.tama.n.dala.m jivhaaya  chaadesi. atha kho bhagavaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m gaathaahi paccabhaasi --
[21] ``ye te dvatti.msaati sutaa, mahaapurisalakkha.naa.
[22] sabbe te mama kaayasmi.m, maa te {maa vo (ka0)} ka"nkhaahu braahma.na..
[21] ``abhi~n~neyya.m abhi~n~naata.m, bhaavetabba~nca bhaavita.m.
[22] pahaatabba.m pahiina.m me, tasmaa buddhosmi braahma.na..
[21] ``di.t.thadhammahitatthaaya ^a^M2.0345^ea^ ^a^P2.0144^ea^,  samparaayasukhaaya ca.
[22] kataavakaaso pucchassu, ya.m ki~nci abhipatthita''nti..

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ atha kho brahmaayussa braahma.nassa etadahosi --  ``kataavakaaso khomhi sama.nena gotamena. ki.m nu kho aha.m sama.na.m  gotama.m puccheyya.m -- `di.t.thadhammika.m vaa attha.m samparaayika.m vaa'''ti.  atha kho brahmaayussa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``kusalo kho aha.m  di.t.thadhammikaana.m atthaana.m. a~n~nepi ma.m di.t.thadhammika.m attha.m pucchanti.  ya.mnuunaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m samparaayika.myeva attha.m puccheyya''nti. atha  kho brahmaayu braahma.no bhagavanta.m gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``katha.m kho braahma.no hoti, katha.m bhavati vedaguu.
[22] tevijjo bho katha.m hoti, sotthiyo kinti vuccati..
[21] ``araha.m bho katha.m hoti, katha.m bhavati kevalii.
[22] muni ca bho katha.m hoti, buddho kinti pavuccatii''ti..
[03] 394^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0544^ea^ kho bhagavaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m gaathaahi paccabhaasi  --
[21] ``pubbenivaasa.m ^a^V2.0353^ea^ yo vedi, saggaapaaya~nca passati.
[22] atho jaatikkhaya.m patto, abhi~n~naa vosito muni..
[21] ``citta.m visuddha.m jaanaati, mutta.m raagehi sabbaso.
[27] pahiinajaatimara.no, brahmacariyassa kevalii.
[22] paaraguu sabbadhammaana.m, buddho taadii pavuccatii''ti..

[03] eva.m vutte, brahmaayu braahma.no u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m  karitvaa bhagavato paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavato paadaani mukhena  ca paricumbati, paa.niihi ca parisambaahati, naama~nca saaveti --  ``brahmaayu aha.m, bho gotama, braahma.no; brahmaayu aha.m, bho gotama,  braahma.no''ti. atha kho saa parisaa acchariyabbhutacittajaataa ahosi  -- ``acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! yatra hi naamaaya.m  brahmaayu braahma.no ~naato yasassii evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m  karissatii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m etadavoca ^a^P2.0145^ea^  -- ``ala.m, braahma.na, u.t.thaha nisiida tva.m sake aasane yato  te mayi citta.m pasanna''nti. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no u.t.thahitvaa  sake aasane nisiidi.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0346^ea^ kho bhagavaa brahmaayussa braahma.nassa anupubbi.m katha.m  kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m, siilakatha.m, saggakatha.m; kaamaana.m  aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa  bhagavaa ^a^T2.0545^ea^ a~n~naasi brahmaayu.m braahma.na.m kallacitta.m muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m  udaggacitta.m pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa ta.m  pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m. seyyathaapi naama  suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva  brahmaayussa braahma.nassa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m  udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti.  atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo  pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto  aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho  gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m  vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m  aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto  ruupaani dakkhantiiti -- evameva.m bhotaa ^a^V2.0354^ea^ gotamena anekapariyaayena  dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca  bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m  sara.na.m gata.m. adhivaasetu ca me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m  bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho  brahmaayu braahma.no bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami ^a^T2.0546^ea^. atha kho brahmaayu braahma.no  tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m  pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama,  ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.

[03] atha ^a^P2.0146^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa  pattaciivaramaadaaya yena brahmaayussa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha  kho brahmaayu braahma.no sattaaha.m buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena  khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho  bhagavaa tassa sattaahassa accayena videhesu caarika.m pakkaami. atha kho  brahmaayu braahma.no acirapakkantassa bhagavato kaalamakaasi. atha kho  sambahulaa ^a^M2.0347^ea^ bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te  bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``brahmaayu, bhante, braahma.no kaala"nkato.  tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti? ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave,  brahmaayu braahma.no paccapaadi dhammassaanudhamma.m, na ca ma.m dhammaadhikara.na.m  vihesesi. brahmaayu, bhikkhave, braahma.no pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m  sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii,  anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^T2.0547^ea^ bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m  abhinandunti.
[06] brahmaayusutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0355^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa a"nguttaraapesu  caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhate.lasehi  bhikkhusatehi yena aapa.na.m naama a"nguttaraapaana.m nigamo tadavasari.  assosi kho ke.niyo ja.tilo -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo  sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito a"nguttaraapesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa  bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhate.lasehi bhikkhusatehi aapa.na.m anuppatto.  ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato --  `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato  lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho  bhagavaati. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m  sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m  pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m  brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m  hotii'''ti.

[03] atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa ^a^M2.0348^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ke.niya.m  ja.tila.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi  sampaha.msesi ^a^T2.0549^ea^. atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya  sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito bhagavanta.m etadavoca  -- ``adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m  bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa ke.niya.m ja.tila.m etadavoca --  ``mahaa kho, ke.niya, bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusataani,  tva~nca braahma.nesu abhippasanno''ti. dutiyampi kho ke.niyo ja.tilo  bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi kho, bho gotama, mahaa  bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusataani, aha~nca braahma.nesu  abhippasanno; adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m  bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa ke.niya.m ja.tila.m  etadavoca -- ``mahaa kho, ke.niya, bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani  bhikkhusataani, tva~nca braahma.nesu abhippasanno''ti. tatiyampi kho  ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki~ncaapi kho, bho  gotama, mahaa bhikkhusa"ngho a.d.dhate.lasaani bhikkhusataani, aha~nca  braahma.nesu abhippasanno; adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m  saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti ^a^V2.0356^ea^. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha  kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena  sako assamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa mittaamacce ~naatisaalohite  aamantesi -- ``su.nantu me bhonto, mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa;  sama.no me gotamo nimantito svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena.  yena me kaayaveyyaava.tika.m {kaayaveyaava.t.tika.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), kaayaveyyaavatika.m  (ka0)} kareyyaathaa''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho ^a^T2.0550^ea^  ke.niyassa ja.tilassa mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa ke.niyassa  ja.tilassa pa.tissutvaa appekacce uddhanaani kha.nanti, appekacce ka.t.thaani  phaalenti, appekacce bhaajanaani dhovanti, appekacce udakama.nika.m  pati.t.thaapenti, appekacce aasanaani pa~n~napenti. ke.niyo pana ja.tilo  saama.myeva ma.n.dalamaala.m pa.tiyaadeti.

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena selo braahma.no aapa.ne  pa.tivasati ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m  itihaasapa~ncamaana.m ^a^M2.0349^ea^, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu  anavayo, tii.ni ca maa.navakasataani mante vaaceti. tena kho pana  samayena ke.niyo ja.tilo sele braahma.ne abhippasanno hoti. atha  kho selo braahma.no tiihi maa.navakasatehi parivuto ja"nghaavihaara.m  anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena ke.niyassa ja.tilassa assamo  tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho selo braahma.no ke.niyassa ja.tilassa  assame appekacce uddhanaani kha.nante, appekacce ka.t.thaani phaalente,  appekacce bhaajanaani dhovante, appekacce udakama.nika.m pati.t.thaapente,  appekacce aasanaani pa~n~napente, ke.niya.m pana ja.tila.m saama.myeva  ma.n.dalamaala.m pa.tiyaadenta.m. disvaana ke.niya.m ja.tila.m etadavoca --  ``ki.m nu bhoto ke.niyassa aavaaho vaa bhavissati vivaaho vaa  bhavissati mahaaya~n~no vaa paccupa.t.thito, raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo  bimbisaaro nimantito svaatanaaya saddhi.m balakaayenaa''ti? ``na me,  bho sela, aavaaho ^a^T2.0551^ea^ bhavissati napi vivaaho bhavissati napi raajaa  maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro nimantito svaatanaaya saddhi.m balakaayena;  api ca kho me mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito. atthi, bho, sama.no gotamo  sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito a"nguttaraapesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa  bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m a.d.dhate.lasehi bhikkhusatehi aapa.na.m anuppatto.  ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato --  `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato  lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho  bhagavaa'ti. so me nimantito svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m  bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti.
[03] ``buddhoti ^a^V2.0357^ea^ -- bho ke.niya, vadesi''?
[03] ``buddhoti -- bho sela, vadaami''.
[03] ``buddhoti -- bho ke.niya, vadesi''?
[03] ``buddhoti -- bho sela, vadaamii''ti.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ atha kho selassa braahma.nassa etadahosi --  ``ghosopi kho eso dullabho lokasmi.m -- yadida.m `buddho'ti {yadida.m buddho  buddhoti (ka0)}.  aagataani kho panamhaaka.m mantesu dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yehi  samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa ^a^M2.0350^ea^ dveyeva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa. sace  agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa  caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato.  tassimaani satta ratanaani bhavanti, seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.m,  hatthiratana.m, assaratana.m, ma.niratana.m, itthiratana.m, gahapatiratana.m,  pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti  suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ^a^T2.0552^ea^ ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m  ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasati. sace pana  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke  viva.t.tacchado''.

[03] ``kaha.m pana, bho ke.niya, etarahi so bhava.m gotamo viharati  araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti? eva.m vutte, ke.niyo ja.tilo dakkhi.na.m baahu.m  paggahetvaa sela.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``yenesaa, bho sela,  niilavanaraajii''ti. atha kho selo braahma.no tiihi maa.navakasatehi  saddhi.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. atha kho selo braahma.no te  maa.navake aamantesi -- ``appasaddaa bhonto aagacchantu pade pada.m {paade paada.m  (sii0)}  nikkhipantaa; duraasadaa {duurasaddaa (ka0)} hi te bhagavanto siihaava ekacaraa. yadaa  caaha.m, bho, sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m manteyya.m, maa me bhonto  antarantaraa katha.m opaatetha. kathaapariyosaana.m me bhavanto  aagamentuu''ti. atha kho selo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho selo  braahma.no bhagavato kaaye dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani samannesi.

[03] addasaa kho selo braahma.no bhagavato kaaye  dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve. dviisu  mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na  sampasiidati -- kosohite ^a^V2.0358^ea^ ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya ca. atha   ^a^T2.0553^ea^ kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``passati kho me aya.m selo braahma.no  dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani, yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve. dviisu  mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na  sampasiidati -- kosohite ^a^M2.0351^ea^ ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya caa''ti.  atha kho bhagavaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi, yathaa  addasa selo braahma.no bhagavato kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m. atha kho  bhagavaa jivha.m ninnaametvaa ubhopi ka.n.nasotaani anumasi pa.timasi;  ubhopi naasikasotaani anumasi pa.timasi; kevalampi nalaa.tama.n.dala.m  jivhaaya chaadesi. atha kho selassa braahma.nassa etadahosi --  ``samannaagato kho sama.no gotamo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi  paripu.n.nehi, no aparipu.n.nehi; no ca kho na.m jaanaami buddho vaa no  vaa. suta.m kho pana meta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m  aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `ye te bhavanti arahanto  sammaasambuddhaa te sake va.n.ne bha~n~namaane attaana.m paatukarontii'ti.  ya.mnuunaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m sammukhaa saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthaveyya''nti.
[03] 399^b^.^eb^ atha kho selo braahma.no bhagavanta.m sammukhaa  saaruppaahi gaathaahi abhitthavi --
[21] ``paripu.n.nakaayo suruci, sujaato caarudassano.

[21] ``pasannanetto ^a^T2.0554^ea^ sumukho, brahaa {brahmaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} uju pataapavaa.
[22] majjhe sama.nasa"nghassa, aadiccova virocasi..
[21] ``kalyaa.nadassano bhikkhu, ka~ncanasannibhattaco.
[22] ki.m te sama.nabhaavena, eva.m uttamava.n.nino..
[21] ``raajaa arahasi bhavitu.m, cakkavattii rathesabho.

[21] ``khattiyaa ^a^V2.0359^ea^ bhogiraajaano, anuyantaa {anuyuttaa (sii0  syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhavantu te.
[22] raajaabhiraajaa manujindo, rajja.m kaarehi gotama''..

[22] dhammena cakka.m vattemi, cakka.m appa.tivattiya.m''..

[22] `dhammena cakka.m vattemi', iti bhaasasi gotama..
[21] ``ko nu senaapati bhoto, saavako satthuranvayo.
[22] ko te tamanuvatteti, dhammacakka.m pavattita.m''..
[21] ``mayaa pavattita.m cakka.m, (selaati bhagavaa dhammacakka.m  anuttara.m.
[22] saariputto anuvatteti, anujaato tathaagata.m..
[21] ``abhi~n~neyya.m abhi~n~naata.m, bhaavetabba~nca bhaavita.m.
[22] pahaatabba.m pahiina.m me, tasmaa buddhosmi braahma.na..
[21] ``vinayassu mayi ka"nkha.m, adhimuccassu braahma.na.
[22] dullabha.m dassana.m hoti, sambuddhaana.m abhi.nhaso..

[22] soha.m braahma.na sambuddho, sallakatto anuttaro..
[21] ``brahmabhuuto atitulo, maarasenappamaddano.
[22] sabbaamitte vasii katvaa, modaami akutobhayo''..

[22] sallakatto mahaaviiro, siihova nadatii vane..

[22] brahmacariya.m carissaama, bhagavaa tava santike''..
[21] ``svaakkhaata.m ^a^M2.0353^ea^ brahmacariya.m, (selaati bhagavaa   sandi.t.thikamakaalika.m.
[22] yattha amoghaa pabbajjaa, appamattassa sikkhato''ti..

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo tassaa rattiyaa accayena  sake assame pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato  kaala.m ^a^T2.0556^ea^ aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.  atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena  ke.niyassa ja.tilassa assamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte  aasane nisiidi saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena. atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo  buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa  santappesi, sampavaaresi. atha kho ke.niyo ja.tilo bhagavanta.m  bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ke.niya.m ja.tila.m bhagavaa imaahi  gaathaahi anumodi --
[21] ``aggihuttamukhaa ya~n~naa, saavittii chandaso mukha.m.
[22] raajaa mukha.m manussaana.m, nadiina.m saagaro mukha.m..
[21] ``nakkhattaana.m ^a^V2.0361^ea^ mukha.m cando, aadicco tapata.m mukha.m.
[22] pu~n~na.m aaka"nkhamaanaana.m, sa"ngho ve yajata.m mukha''nti..

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0558^ea^ ^a^V2.0362^ea^ ^a^P2.0147^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m  bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena  kho pana samayena naanaaverajjakaana.m braahma.naana.m pa~ncamattaani  braahma.nasataani saavatthiya.m pa.tivasanti kenacideva kara.niiyena. atha  kho tesa.m braahma.naana.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho sama.no gotamo  caatuva.n.ni.m suddhi.m pa~n~napeti. ko nu kho pahoti sama.nena gotamena  saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu''nti? tena kho pana samayena  assalaayano naama maa.navo saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati daharo, vuttasiro,  so.lasavassuddesiko jaatiyaa, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m  saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako, veyyaakara.no,  lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo. atha kho tesa.m braahma.naana.m  etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho assalaayano maa.navo saavatthiya.m  pa.tivasati daharo, vuttasiro, so.lasavassuddesiko jaatiyaa, ti.n.na.m  vedaana.m paaraguu...pe0... anavayo. so kho pahoti sama.nena gotamena  saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu''nti.

[03] atha kho te braahma.naa yena assalaayano maa.navo tenupa"nkami.msu;  upasa"nkamitvaa assalaayana.m maa.nava.m etadavocu.m -- ``aya.m, bho  assalaayana ^a^M2.0355^ea^, sama.no gotamo caatuva.n.ni.m suddhi.m pa~n~napeti. etu bhava.m  assalaayano sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetuu''ti {pa.timantetunti  (pii0 ka0)}.

[03] eva.m vutte, assalaayano maa.navo te braahma.ne etadavoca ^a^T2.0559^ea^ --  ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo dhammavaadii; dhammavaadino ca pana  duppa.timantiyaa bhavanti. naaha.m sakkomi sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m  asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu''nti. dutiyampi kho te braahma.naa  assalaayana.m maa.nava.m etadavocu.m -- ``aya.m, bho assalaayana, sama.no  gotamo caatuva.n.ni.m suddhi.m pa~n~napeti. etu bhava.m assalaayano sama.nena  gotamena ^a^P2.0148^ea^ saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu {pa.timantetu.m (sii0 pii0  ka0)}. carita.m  kho pana bhotaa assalaayanena paribbaajaka''nti. dutiyampi kho  assalaayano maa.navo te braahma.ne etadavoca -- ``sama.no khalu, bho,  gotamo dhammavaadii; dhammavaadino ca pana duppa.timantiyaa bhavanti ^a^V2.0363^ea^.  naaha.m sakkomi sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu''nti.  tatiyampi kho te braahma.naa assalaayana.m maa.nava.m etadavocu.m --  ``aya.m, bho assalaayana, sama.no gotamo caatuva.n.ni.m suddhi.m pa~n~napeti.  etu bhava.m assalaayano sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane  pa.timantetu {pa.timantetu.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}. carita.m kho pana bhotaa assalaayanena paribbaajaka.m. maa  bhava.m assalaayano ayuddhaparaajita.m paraajayii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, assalaayano maa.navo te braahma.ne etadavoca --  ``addhaa kho aha.m bhavanto na labhaami. sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo  dhammavaadii; dhammavaadino ca pana duppa.timantiyaa bhavanti. naaha.m  sakkomi sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetunti. api  caaha.m bhavantaana.m vacanena gamissaamii''ti.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ atha kho assalaayano maa.navo mahataa braahma.naga.nena  saddhi.m ^a^T2.0560^ea^ yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m  sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho assalaayano maa.navo bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``braahma.naa, bho gotama, evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho  va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no; braahma.nova sukko va.n.no, ka.nho a~n~no  va.n.no; braahma.nova sujjhanti, no abraahma.naa; braahma.naava brahmuno puttaa ^a^M2.0356^ea^   orasaa mukhato jaataa brahmajaa brahmanimmitaa brahmadaayaadaa'ti. idha  bhava.m gotamo kimaahaa''ti? ``dissanti {dissante (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kho pana, assalaayana,  braahma.naana.m braahma.niyo utuniyopi gabbhiniyopi vijaayamaanaapi  paayamaanaapi. te ca braahma.niyonijaava samaanaa evamaaha.msu --  `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no; braahma.nova sukko  va.n.no, ka.nho a~n~no va.n.no; braahma.naava sujjhanti, no abraahma.naa;  braahma.naava brahmuno puttaa orasaa mukhato jaataa brahmajaa brahmanimmitaa  brahmadaayaadaa'''ti. ``ki~ncaapi ^a^P2.0149^ea^ bhava.m gotamo  evamaaha, atha khvettha braahma.naa evameta.m ma~n~nanti -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho  va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti.

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, suta.m te --  `yonakambojesu a~n~nesu ca paccantimesu janapadesu dveva va.n.naa --  ayyo ceva daaso ca; ayyo hutvaa daaso hoti, daaso ^a^V2.0364^ea^ hutvaa ayyo  hotii'''ti ^a^T2.0561^ea^? ``eva.m, bho, suta.m ta.m me -- `yonakambojesu a~n~nesu  ca paccantimesu janapadesu dveva va.n.naa -- ayyo ceva daaso ca; ayyo  hutvaa daaso hoti, daaso hutvaa ayyo hotii'''ti. ``ettha,  assalaayana, braahma.naana.m ki.m bala.m, ko assaaso yadettha braahma.naa  evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0...  brahmadaayaadaa'''ti? ``ki~ncaapi bhava.m gotamo evamaaha, atha khvettha  braahma.naa evameta.m ma~n~nanti -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no  va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti.

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, khattiyova nu kho  paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii musaavaadii pisu.navaaco  pharusavaaco samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thi  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya,  no braahma.no? vessova nu kho...pe0... suddova nu kho paa.naatipaatii  adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii musaavaadii pisu.navaaco pharusavaaco  samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thi kaayassa bhedaa para.m  mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya, no braahma.no''ti?  ``no hida.m, bho gotama. khattiyopi hi, bho ^a^M2.0357^ea^ gotama,  paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii musaavaadii pisu.navaaco  pharusavaaco samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thi ^a^T2.0562^ea^  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya.  braahma.nopi hi, bho gotama...pe0... vessopi hi, bho  gotama...pe0... suddopi hi, bho gotama...pe0... sabbepi hi, bho  gotama, cattaaro va.n.naa paa.naatipaatino adinnaadaayino ^a^P2.0150^ea^  kaamesumicchaacaarino musaavaadino pisu.navaacaa pharusavaacaa  samphappalaapino abhijjhaaluu byaapannacittaa micchaadi.t.thii kaayassa bhedaa  para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyyu''nti.  ``ettha, assalaayana, braahma.naana.m ki.m bala.m, ko assaaso yadettha  braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no  va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti? ``ki~ncaapi bhava.m gotamo  evamaaha, atha khvettha braahma.naa evameta.m ma~n~nanti -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho  va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti.

[03] 405^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, braahma.nova nu kho  paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato kaamesumicchaacaaraa  pa.tivirato musaavaadaa ^a^T2.0563^ea^ pa.tivirato pisu.naaya vaacaaya ^a^V2.0365^ea^ pa.tivirato  pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato anabhijjhaalu  abyaapannacitto sammaadi.t.thi kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m  loka.m upapajjeyya, no {no ca (ka0)} khattiyo no vesso, no suddo''ti? ``no  hida.m, bho gotama! khattiyopi hi, bho gotama, paa.naatipaataa  pa.tivirato adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato  musaavaadaa pa.tivirato pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato pharusaaya vaacaaya  pa.tivirato samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato anabhijjhaalu abyaapannacitto  sammaadi.t.thi kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyya.  braahma.nopi hi, bho gotama...pe0... vessopi hi, bho  gotama...pe0... suddopi hi, bho gotama...pe0... sabbepi hi, bho  gotama, cattaaro va.n.naa paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirataa adinnaadaanaa  pa.tivirataa kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirataa musaavaadaa pa.tivirataa  pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirataa pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirataa  samphappalaapaa pa.tivirataa anabhijjhaaluu abyaapannacittaa sammaadi.t.thii  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyyu''nti.  ``ettha, assalaayana ^a^M2.0358^ea^, braahma.naana.m ki.m bala.m, ko assaaso yadettha  braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no  va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti? ``ki~ncaapi bhava.m gotamo  evamaaha, atha khvettha braahma.naa ^a^P2.0151^ea^ evameta.m ma~n~nanti  -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0...  brahmadaayaadaa'''ti.

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, braahma.nova nu kho  pahoti asmi.m padese avera.m abyaabajjha.m mettacitta.m bhaavetu.m, no  khattiyo, no vesso no suddo''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama!  khattiyopi hi, bho gotama, pahoti asmi.m padese avera.m abyaabajjha.m  mettacitta.m bhaavetu.m; braahma.nopi hi, bho gotama... vessopi hi ^a^T2.0564^ea^, bho  gotama... suddopi hi, bho gotama... sabbepi hi, bho gotama, cattaaro  va.n.naa pahonti asmi.m padese avera.m abyaabajjha.m mettacitta.m bhaavetu''nti.  ``ettha, assalaayana, braahma.naana.m ki.m bala.m, ko assaaso yadettha  braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no  va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti? ``ki~ncaapi bhava.m gotamo  evamaaha, atha khvettha braahma.naa evameta.m ma~n~nanti -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho  va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti.

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, braahma.nova nu kho  pahoti sottisinaani.m aadaaya ^a^V2.0366^ea^ nadi.m gantvaa rajojalla.m pavaahetu.m, no  khattiyo, no vesso, no suddo''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama!  khattiyopi hi, bho gotama, pahoti sottisinaani.m aadaaya nadi.m  gantvaa rajojalla.m pavaahetu.m, braahma.nopi hi, bho gotama... vessopi hi,  bho gotama... suddopi hi, bho gotama... sabbepi hi, bho gotama,  cattaaro va.n.naa pahonti sottisinaani.m aadaaya nadi.m gantvaa rajojalla.m  pavaahetu''nti. ``ettha, assalaayana, braahma.naana.m ki.m bala.m, ko  assaaso yadettha braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no,  hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti? ``ki~ncaapi bhava.m  gotamo evamaaha, atha khvettha braahma.naa evameta.m ma~n~nanti --  `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... ^a^T2.0565^ea^  brahmadaayaadaa'''ti.

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, idha raajaa  khattiyo muddhaavasitto ^a^P2.0152^ea^ naanaajaccaana.m purisaana.m  purisasata.m sannipaateyya -- `aayantu bhonto ye ^a^M2.0359^ea^ tattha khattiyakulaa  braahma.nakulaa raaja~n~nakulaa uppannaa, saakassa vaa saalassa vaa {uppannaa saalassa vaa  (sii0 pii0)} sala.lassa  vaa candanassa vaa padumakassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya, aggi.m  abhinibbattentu, tejo paatukarontu. aayantu pana bhonto ye tattha  ca.n.daalakulaa nesaadakulaa venakulaa {ve.nakulaa (sii0 pii0), ve.nukulaa (syaa0  ka.m0)} rathakaarakulaa pukkusakulaa uppannaa,  saapaanado.niyaa vaa suukarado.niyaa vaa rajakado.niyaa vaa era.n.daka.t.thassa  vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya, aggi.m abhinibbattentu, tejo paatukarontuu'ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, yo eva.m nu kho so {yo ca nu kho (syaa0  ka.m0 ka0)}  khattiyakulaa braahma.nakulaa raaja~n~nakulaa uppannehi saakassa vaa saalassa  vaa sala.lassa vaa candanassa vaa padumakassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya  aggi abhinibbatto, tejo paatukato, so eva nu khvaassa aggi  accimaa ceva {ca (sii0 pii0)} va.n.navaa {va.n.nimaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} ca   pabhassaro ca, tena ca sakkaa agginaa  aggikara.niiya.m kaatu.m; yo pana so ca.n.daalakulaa nesaadakulaa venakulaa  rathakaarakulaa pukkusakulaa uppannehi saapaanado.niyaa vaa suukarado.niyaa  vaa rajakado.niyaa vaa era.n.daka.t.thassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi  abhinibbatto, tejo paatukato svaassa aggi na ceva accimaa na ca  va.n.navaa na ca pabhassaro, na ca tena sakkaa agginaa ^a^T2.0566^ea^ aggikara.niiya.m  kaatu''nti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama! yopi hi so {yo so (sii0 pii0)}, bho gotama,  khattiyakulaa braahma.nakulaa raaja~n~nakulaa uppannehi saakassa vaa saalassa  vaa sala.lassa vaa candanassa vaa padumakassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya  aggi abhinibbatto, tejo paatukato svaassa {so cassa (sii0 pii0), sopissa  (syaa0 ka.m0)} aggi accimaa ceva  va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro ca, tena ca sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m kaatu.m;  yopi so ca.n.daalakulaa nesaadakulaa venakulaa rathakaarakulaa pukkusakulaa  uppannehi saapaanado.niyaa vaa suukarado.niyaa vaa rajakado.niyaa vaa  era.n.daka.t.thassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi ^a^V2.0367^ea^ abhinibbatto, tejo  paatukato, svaassa aggi accimaa ceva va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro ca, tena  ca sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m kaatu.m. sabbopi hi, bho gotama,  aggi accimaa ceva ^a^P2.0153^ea^ va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro ca,  sabbenapi sakkaa ^a^M2.0360^ea^ agginaa aggikara.niiya.m kaatu''nti. ``ettha,  assalaayana, braahma.naana.m ki.m bala.m, ko assaaso yadettha braahma.naa  evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no;  braahma.nova sukko va.n.no, ka.nho a~n~no va.n.no; braahma.naava sujjhanti,  no abraahma.naa; braahma.naava brahmuno puttaa orasaa mukhato jaataa brahmajaa  brahmanimmitaa brahmadaayaadaa'''ti? ``ki~ncaapi bhava.m gotamo evamaaha,  atha khvettha braahma.naa evameta.m ma~n~nanti -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no,  hiino a~n~no va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'''ti.

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^T2.0567^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, idha khattiyakumaaro  braahma.naka~n~naaya saddhi.m sa.mvaasa.m kappeyya, tesa.m sa.mvaasamanvaaya putto  jaayetha; yo so khattiyakumaarena braahma.naka~n~naaya putto uppanno, siyaa  so maatupi sadiso pitupi sadiso, `khattiyo'tipi vattabbo  `braahma.no'tipi vattabbo''ti? ``yo so, bho gotama,  khattiyakumaarena braahma.naka~n~naaya putto uppanno, siyaa so maatupi  sadiso pitupi sadiso, `khattiyo'tipi vattabbo `braahma.no'tipi  vattabbo''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, idha braahma.nakumaaro  khattiyaka~n~naaya saddhi.m sa.mvaasa.m kappeyya, tesa.m sa.mvaasamanvaaya putto  jaayetha; yo so braahma.nakumaarena khattiyaka~n~naaya putto uppanno, siyaa  so maatupi sadiso pitupi sadiso, `khattiyo'tipi vattabbo  `braahma.no'tipi vattabbo''ti? ``yo so, bho gotama,  braahma.nakumaarena khattiyaka~n~naaya putto uppanno, siyaa so maatupi  sadiso pitupi sadiso, `khattiyo'tipi vattabbo `braahma.no'tipi  vattabbo''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^V2.0368^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana idha va.lava.m gadrabhena  sampayojeyyu.m {sa.myojeyya (ka0)}, tesa.m sampayogamanvaaya kisoro jaayetha; yo so  va.lavaaya gadrabhena kisoro uppanno, siyaa so maatupi sadiso pitupi  sadiso, `asso'tipi vattabbo `gadrabho'tipi vattabbo''ti?  ``ku.n.da~nhi ^a^T2.0568^ea^ so {vekura~njaaya hi so (sii0 pii0), so kumaara.n.dupi so (syaa0  ka.m0), vekulajo hi so (?)}, bho gotama, assataro hoti. ida.m hissa ^a^P2.0154^ea^,  bho gotama, naanaakara.na.m ^a^M2.0361^ea^ passaami; amutra ca panesaana.m na  ki~nci naanaakara.na.m passaamii''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, idhaassu dve maa.navakaa bhaataro  saudariyaa, eko ajjhaayako upaniito eko anajjhaayako anupaniito.  kamettha braahma.naa pa.thama.m bhojeyyu.m saddhe vaa thaalipaake vaa ya~n~ne vaa  paahune vaa''ti? ``yo so, bho gotama, maa.navako ajjhaayako  upaniito tamettha braahma.naa pa.thama.m bhojeyyu.m saddhe vaa thaalipaake vaa ya~n~ne  vaa paahune vaa. ki~nhi, bho gotama, anajjhaayake anupaniite dinna.m  mahapphala.m bhavissatii''ti?

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, assalaayana, idhaassu dve maa.navakaa bhaataro  saudariyaa, eko ajjhaayako upaniito dussiilo paapadhammo, eko  anajjhaayako anupaniito siilavaa kalyaa.nadhammo. kamettha braahma.naa  pa.thama.m bhojeyyu.m saddhe vaa thaalipaake vaa ya~n~ne vaa paahune vaa''ti?  ``yo so, bho gotama, maa.navako anajjhaayako anupaniito siilavaa  kalyaa.nadhammo tamettha braahma.naa pa.thama.m bhojeyyu.m saddhe vaa thaalipaake vaa  ya~n~ne vaa paahune vaa. ki~nhi, bho gotama, dussiile paapadhamme dinna.m  mahapphala.m bhavissatii''ti?

[03] ``pubbe kho tva.m, assalaayana, jaati.m agamaasi; jaati.m gantvaa  mante agamaasi; mante gantvaa ^a^T2.0569^ea^ tape agamaasi; tape gantvaa {mante gantvaa tameta.m tva.m  (sii0 pii0), mante gantvaa tameva .thapetvaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} caatuva.n.ni.m  suddhi.m paccaagato, yamaha.m pa~n~napemii''ti. eva.m vutte, assalaayano  maa.navo tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto  appa.tibhaano nisiidi.

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa assalaayana.m maa.nava.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m  ma"nkubhuuta.m pattakkhandha.m adhomukha.m pajjhaayanta.m appa.tibhaana.m viditvaa  assalaayana.m maa.nava.m etadavoca -- ``bhuutapubba.m, assalaayana, sattanna.m  braahma.nisiina.m ara~n~naayatane pa.n.naku.tiisu sammantaana.m {vasantaana.m (sii0)} evaruupa.m paapaka.m  di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti ^a^V2.0369^ea^ -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no  ^a^P2.0155^ea^ va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'ti. assosi kho ^a^M2.0362^ea^,  assalaayana, asito devalo isi -- `sattanna.m kira braahma.nisiina.m  ara~n~naayatane pa.n.naku.tiisu sammantaana.m evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m  -- braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no...pe0... brahmadaayaadaa'ti. atha kho,  assalaayana, asito devalo isi kesamassu.m kappetvaa ma~nji.t.thava.n.naani  dussaani nivaasetvaa pa.taliyo {a.taliyo (sii0 pii0), agaliyo (syaa0  ka.m0)} upaahanaa aaruhitvaa jaataruupamaya.m da.n.da.m  gahetvaa sattanna.m braahma.nisiina.m pattha.n.dile paaturahosi. atha kho,  assalaayana, asito devalo isi sattanna.m braahma.nisiina.m pattha.n.dile  ca"nkamamaano evamaaha -- `handa, ko nu kho ime bhavanto  braahma.nisayo gataa {gantaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}; handa, ko nu kho ime bhavanto braahma.nisayo  gataa'ti? atha kho, assalaayana, sattanna.m braahma.nisiina.m etadahosi  -- `ko ^a^T2.0570^ea^ naaya.m gaama.n.dalaruupo viya sattanna.m braahma.nisiina.m pattha.n.dile  ca"nkamamaano evamaaha -- `handa, ko nu kho ime bhavanto braahma.nisayo  gataa; handa, ko nu kho ime bhavanto braahma.nisayo gataati? handa,  na.m abhisapaamaa'ti. atha kho, assalaayana, satta braahma.nisayo  asita.m devala.m isi.m abhisapi.msu -- `bhasmaa, vasala {vasalii (pii0), vasali  (ka0), capalii (syaa0 ka.m0)}, hohi; bhasmaa,  vasala, hohii'ti {bhasmaa vasala hohiiti abhisapavacana.m sii0 pii0 potthakesu  sakideva aagata.m}. yathaa yathaa kho, assalaayana, satta braahma.nisayo  asita.m devala.m isi.m abhisapi.msu tathaa tathaa asito devalo isi  abhiruupataro ceva hoti dassaniiyataro ca paasaadikataro ca. atha  kho, assalaayana, sattanna.m braahma.nisiina.m etadahosi -- `mogha.m vata no  tapo, aphala.m brahmacariya.m. maya~nhi pubbe ya.m abhisapaama -- bhasmaa,  vasala, hohi; bhasmaa, vasala, hohiiti bhasmaava bhavati ekacco. ima.m  pana maya.m yathaa yathaa abhisapaama tathaa tathaa abhiruupataro ceva hoti  dassaniiyataro ca paasaadikataro caa'ti. `na bhavantaana.m mogha.m tapo,  naaphala.m brahmacariya.m. i"ngha bhavanto, yo mayi manopadoso ta.m  pajahathaa'ti. `yo ^a^P2.0156^ea^ bhavati manopadoso ta.m  pajahaama. ko nu bhava.m hotii'ti? `suto nu bhavata.m -- asito  devalo isii'ti? `eva.m, bho'. `so khvaaha.m, bho, homii'ti.  atha kho, assalaayana, satta braahma.nisayo asita.m devala.m isi.m  abhivaadetu.m upakkami.msu.

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^M2.0363^ea^ kho, assalaayana, asito devalo isi satta  braahma.nisayo etadavoca -- `suta.m meta.m, bho, sattanna.m kira braahma.nisiina.m  ara~n~naayatane pa.n.naku.tiisu sammantaana.m evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m ^a^T2.0571^ea^  -- braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no; braahma.nova sukko  va.n.no ^a^V2.0370^ea^, ka.nho a~n~no va.n.no; braahma.naava sujjhanti, no abraahma.naa;  braahma.naava brahmuno puttaa orasaa mukhato jaataa brahmajaa brahmanimmitaa  brahmadaayaadaa'ti. `eva.m, bho'.
[03] ```jaananti pana bhonto -- yaa janikaa maataa {janimaataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} braahma.na.myeva  agamaasi, no abraahma.na'nti? `no hida.m, bho'.
[03] ```jaananti pana bhonto -- yaa janikaamaatu {janimaatu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} maataa yaava sattamaa  maatumaataamahayugaa braahma.na.myeva agamaasi, no abraahma.na'nti? `no  hida.m, bho'.
[03] ```jaananti pana bhonto -- yo janako pitaa {janipitaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} braahma.ni.myeva  agamaasi, no abraahma.ni'nti? `no hida.m, bho'.
[03] ```jaananti pana bhonto -- yo janakapitu {janipitu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} pitaa yaava sattamaa  pitupitaamahayugaa braahma.ni.myeva agamaasi, no abraahma.ni'nti? `no  hida.m, bho'.

[03] ```jaananti pana bhonto -- yathaa gabbhassa avakkanti hotii'ti {na maya.m jaanaama  bho yathaa gabbhassa avakkanti hotiiti. yathaa katha.m pana bho gabbhassa  avakkanti hotiiti. (ka0)}?  `jaanaama maya.m, bho -- yathaa gabbhassa avakkanti hoti {na maya.m jaanaama bho  yathaa gabbhassa avakkanti hotiiti. yathaa katha.m pana bho gabbhassa  avakkanti hotiiti. (ka0)}. idha  ^a^P2.0157^ea^ maataapitaro ca sannipatitaa honti, maataa ca  utunii hoti, gandhabbo ca paccupa.t.thito hoti; eva.m ti.n.na.m sannipaataa  gabbhassa avakkanti hotii'ti.

[03] ```jaananti pana bhonto -- taggha {yagghe (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, so gandhabbo khattiyo vaa  braahma.no vaa vesso vaa suddo vaa'ti? `na maya.m, bho, jaanaama --  taggha so gandhabbo khattiyo vaa braahma.no vaa vesso vaa suddo vaa'ti.  `eva.m sante, bho, jaanaatha -- ke tumhe hothaa'ti? `eva.m sante,  bho ^a^T2.0572^ea^, na maya.m jaanaama ^a^M2.0364^ea^ -- ke maya.m homaa'ti. te hi naama,  assalaayana, satta braahma.nisayo asitena devalena isinaa sake  jaativaade samanuyu~njiiyamaanaa samanuggaahiiyamaanaa samanubhaasiiyamaanaa na  sampaayissanti; ki.m pana tva.m etarahi mayaa sakasmi.m jaativaade  samanuyu~njiiyamaano ^a^V2.0371^ea^ samanuggaahiiyamaano samanubhaasiiyamaano  sampaayissasi, yesa.m tva.m saacariyako na pu.n.no dabbigaaho''ti.
[03] eva.m vutte, assalaayano maa.navo bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu  ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] assalaayanasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0573^ea^ ^a^V2.0372^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa udeno  baaraa.nasiya.m viharati khemiyambavane. tena kho pana samayena  gho.tamukho braahma.no baaraa.nasi.m anuppatto hoti kenacideva kara.niiyena.  atha kho gho.tamukho braahma.no ja"nghaavihaara.m ^a^P2.0158^ea^  anuca"nkamamaano anuvicaramaano yena khemiyambavana.m tenupasa"nkami.  tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa udeno abbhokaase ca"nkamati. atha  kho gho.tamukho braahma.no yenaayasmaa udeno tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa  aayasmataa udenena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa aayasmanta.m udena.m ca"nkamanta.m anuca"nkamamaano evamaaha --  ``ambho sama.na, `natthi dhammiko paribbajo' {paribbaajo (sii0 pii0)} -- eva.m me ettha  hoti. ta~nca kho bhavantaruupaana.m vaa adassanaa, yo vaa panettha  dhammo''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa udeno ca"nkamaa orohitvaa vihaara.m  pavisitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. gho.tamukhopi kho braahma.no  ca"nkamaa orohitvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m  .thita.m kho gho.tamukha.m braahma.na.m aayasmaa udeno etadavoca --  ``sa.mvijjanti {sa.mvijjante (bahuusu)} kho, braahma.na, aasanaani. sace aaka"nkhasi,  nisiidaa''ti. ``etadeva kho pana maya.m ^a^M2.0365^ea^ bhoto udenassa  aagamayamaanaa (na) nisiidaama. katha~nhi naama maadiso pubbe  animantito aasane ^a^T2.0574^ea^ nisiiditabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti? atha kho  gho.tamukho braahma.no a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinno kho gho.tamukho braahma.no aayasmanta.m udena.m  etadavoca -- ``ambho sama.na, `natthi dhammiko paribbajo' -- eva.m  me ettha hoti. ta~nca kho bhavantaruupaana.m vaa adassanaa, yo vaa  panettha dhammo''ti. ``sace kho pana me tva.m, braahma.na, anu~n~neyya.m  anujaaneyyaasi, pa.tikkositabba~nca pa.tikkoseyyaasi; yassa ca pana me  bhaasitassa attha.m na jaaneyyaasi, mama.myeva tattha uttari pa.tipuccheyyaasi  -- `ida.m, bho udena, katha.m, imassa kvattho'ti? eva.m katvaa siyaa  no ettha kathaasallaapo''ti. ``anu~n~neyya.m khvaaha.m bhoto udenassa  anujaanissaami, pa.tikkositabba~nca pa.tikkosissaami; yassa ca panaaha.m  bhoto ^a^P2.0159^ea^ udenassa ^a^V2.0373^ea^ bhaasitassa attha.m na jaanissaami,  bhavanta.myeva tattha udena.m uttari pa.tipucchissaami -- `ida.m, bho udena,  katha.m, imassa kvattho'ti? eva.m katvaa hotu no ettha kathaasallaapo''ti.

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, braahma.na, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa  lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, braahma.na, ekacco puggalo  attantapo hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. idha pana, braahma.na,  ekacco puggalo parantapo hoti paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. idha  pana, braahma.na, ekacco puggalo attantapo ca hoti  attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.  idha pana, braahma.na ^a^T2.0575^ea^, ekacco puggalo nevattantapo hoti  naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, na parantapo na  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme  nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa  viharati. imesa.m, braahma.na, catunna.m puggalaana.m katamo te puggalo citta.m  aaraadhetii''ti?

[03] ``yvaaya.m, bho udena, puggalo attantapo  attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto aya.m me puggalo citta.m naaraadheti;  yopaaya.m, bho udena, puggalo parantapo paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto  ayampi me puggalo citta.m naaraadheti; yopaaya.m, bho udena, puggalo  attantapo ca attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto ^a^M2.0366^ea^ parantapo ca  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto ayampi me puggalo citta.m naaraadheti; yo  ca kho aya.m, bho udena, puggalo nevattantapo  naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme  nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa  viharati. ayameva me puggalo citta.m aaraadhetii''ti.

[03] ``kasmaa pana te, braahma.na, ime tayo puggalaa citta.m  naaraadhentii''ti? ``yvaaya.m, bho udena, puggalo attantapo  attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto so attaana.m sukhakaama.m dukkhapa.tikkuula.m  aataapeti paritaapeti; iminaa me aya.m puggalo citta.m naaraadheti.  yopaaya.m ^a^P2.0160^ea^, bho udena, puggalo parantapo  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto so para.m sukhakaama.m dukkhapa.tikkuula.m ^a^T2.0576^ea^  aataapeti paritaapeti; iminaa me aya.m puggalo citta.m naaraadheti.  yopaaya.m, bho udena, puggalo attantapo ca attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto  parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto so ^a^V2.0374^ea^ attaana~nca para~nca  sukhakaama.m dukkhapa.tikkuula.m aataapeti paritaapeti; iminaa me aya.m  puggalo citta.m naaraadheti. yo ca kho aya.m, bho udena, puggalo  nevattantapo naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme  nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa  viharati, so attaana~nca para~nca sukhakaama.m dukkhapa.tikkuula.m neva  aataapeti na paritaapeti; iminaa me aya.m puggalo citta.m aaraadhetii''ti.

[03] 414^b^.^eb^ ``dvemaa, braahma.na, parisaa. katamaa dve? idha,  braahma.na, ekaccaa parisaa saarattarattaa ma.niku.n.dalesu puttabhariya.m  pariyesati, daasidaasa.m pariyesati, khettavatthu.m pariyesati,  jaataruuparajata.m pariyesati.

[03] ``idha pana, braahma.na, ekaccaa parisaa asaarattarattaa  ma.niku.n.dalesu puttabhariya.m pahaaya, daasidaasa.m pahaaya, khettavatthu.m pahaaya,  jaataruuparajata.m pahaaya, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa. svaaya.m,  braahma.na, puggalo nevattantapo naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo  na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva  dhamme nicchaato ^a^M2.0367^ea^ nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii ^a^T2.0577^ea^   brahmabhuutena attanaa viharati. idha katama.m tva.m, braahma.na, puggala.m katamaaya parisaaya  bahula.m samanupassasi -- yaa caaya.m parisaa saarattarattaa ma.niku.n.dalesu  puttabhariya.m pariyesati daasidaasa.m pariyesati khettavatthu.m pariyesati  jaataruuparajata.m pariyesati, yaa caaya.m parisaa asaarattarattaa  ma.niku.n.dalesu puttabhariya.m pahaaya daasidaasa.m pahaaya khettavatthu.m pahaaya  jaataruuparajata.m pahaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa''ti?

[03] ``yvaaya.m ^a^P2.0161^ea^, bho udena, puggalo nevattantapo  naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme  nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa  viharati; imaaha.m puggala.m yaaya.m parisaa asaarattarattaa ma.niku.n.dalesu  puttabhariya.m pahaaya daasidaasa.m pahaaya khettavatthu.m pahaaya jaataruuparajata.m  pahaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa imissa.m parisaaya.m bahula.m  samanupassaamii''ti.

[03] ``idaaneva ^a^V2.0375^ea^ kho pana te, braahma.na, bhaasita.m -- `maya.m eva.m  aajaanaama -- ambho sama.na, natthi dhammiko paribbajo, eva.m me ettha  hoti. ta~nca kho bhavantaruupaana.m vaa adassanaa, yo vaa panettha  dhammo'''ti. ``addhaa mesaa, bho udena, saanuggahaa vaacaa bhaasitaa.  `atthi dhammiko paribbajo' -- eva.m me ettha hoti. eva~nca pana  ma.m bhava.m udeno dhaaretu. ye ca me bhotaa udenena cattaaro puggalaa  sa.mkhittena vuttaa vitthaarena avibhattaa, saadhu me bhava.m, udeno ime  cattaaro puggale vitthaarena ^a^T2.0578^ea^ vibhajatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. ``tena  hi, braahma.na, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi, bhaasissaamii''ti.  ``eva.m, bho''ti kho gho.tamukho braahma.no aayasmato udenassa  paccassosi. aayasmaa udeno etadavoca --

[03] 415^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, braahma.na, puggalo attantapo  attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idha, braahma.na, ekacco puggalo  acelako hoti muttaacaaro hatthaapalekhano naehibhaddantiko  nati.t.thabhaddantiko, naabhiha.ta.m na uddissakata.m na nimantana.m saadiyati.  so na kumbhimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati, na ka.lopimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati, na  e.lakamantara.m, na da.n.damantara.m, na musalamantara.m, na dvinna.m bhu~njamaanaana.m,  na gabbhiniyaa, na paayamaanaaya ^a^M2.0368^ea^, na ^a^P2.0162^ea^  purisantaragataaya, na sa"nkittiisu, na yattha saa upa.t.thito hoti, na  yattha makkhikaa sa.n.dasa.n.dacaarinii, na maccha.m na ma.msa.m, na sura.m na  meraya.m na thusodaka.m pivati. so ekaagaariko vaa hoti  ekaalopiko, dvaagaariko vaa hoti dvaalopiko...pe0... sattaagaariko  vaa hoti sattaalopiko; ekissaapi dattiyaa yaapeti, dviihipi dattiihi  yaapeti...pe0... sattahipi dattiihi yaapeti; ekaahikampi aahaara.m  aahaareti, dviihikampi aahaara.m aahaareti...pe0... sattaahikampi aahaara.m  aahaareti -- iti evaruupa.m addhamaasika.m  pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. so saakabhakkho vaa  hoti, saamaakabhakkho vaa hoti, niivaarabhakkho vaa hoti,  daddulabhakkho vaa hoti ^a^T2.0579^ea^, ha.tabhakkho vaa hoti, ka.nabhakkho vaa hoti,  aacaamabhakkho vaa hoti, pi~n~naakabhakkho vaa hoti, ti.nabhakkho vaa  hoti, gomayabhakkho vaa hoti, vanamuulaphalaahaaro yaapeti  pavattaphalabhojii. so saa.naanipi dhaareti, masaa.naanipi dhaareti,  chavadussaanipi dhaareti, pa.msukuulaanipi dhaareti, tirii.taanipi dhaareti,  ajinampi dhaareti, ajinakkhipampi dhaareti, kusaciirampi dhaareti,  vaakaciirampi dhaareti, phalakaciirampi dhaareti, kesakambalampi dhaareti,  vaa.lakambalampi dhaareti, uluukapakkhampi dhaareti; kesamassulocakopi  hoti kesamassulocanaanuyogamanuyutto ^a^V2.0376^ea^, ubbha.t.thakopi hoti  aasanapa.tikkhitto, ukku.tikopi hoti ukku.tikappadhaanamanuyutto,  ka.n.takaapassayikopi hoti ka.n.takaapassaye seyya.m kappeti;  saayatatiyakampi udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati -- iti evaruupa.m  anekavihita.m kaayassa aataapanaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati.  aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, puggalo attantapo attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] 416^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ^a^T2.0580^ea^ ca, braahma.na, puggalo parantapo  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idha, braahma.na, ekacco puggalo  orabbhiko hoti suukariko saaku.niko maagaviko luddo macchaghaatako  coro coraghaatako goghaatako bandhanaagaariko -- ye vaa pana~n~nepi  keci kuruurakammantaa. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, puggalo parantapo  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] 417^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ^a^M2.0369^ea^ ca, braahma.na, puggalo attantapo ca  attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto?  idha, braahma.na, ekacco puggalo raajaa vaa hoti khattiyo  muddhaavasitto, braahma.no vaa mahaasaalo. so puratthimena nagarassa nava.m  santhaagaara.m kaaraapetvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kharaajina.m nivaasetvaa  sappitelena kaaya.m abbha~njitvaa magavisaa.nena pi.t.thi.m ka.n.duvamaano nava.m  santhaagaara.m pavisati saddhi.m mahesiyaa braahma.nena ca purohitena. so  tattha anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa haritupalittaaya seyya.m kappeti.  ekissaaya gaaviyaa saruupavacchaaya ya.m ekasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena  raajaa yaapeti, ya.m dutiyasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena mahesii yaapeti,  ya.m tatiyasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena braahma.no purohito yaapeti, ya.m  catutthasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena aggi.m juhati, avasesena vacchako  yaapeti. so evamaaha -- `ettakaa usabhaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya,  ettakaa vacchataraa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa vacchatariyo ha~n~nantu  ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa ajaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya', ettakaa urabbhaa  ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa assaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa  rukkhaa chijjantu yuupatthaaya, ettakaa dabbhaa luuyantu barihisatthaayaa'ti.  yepissa te honti `daasaa'ti vaa `pessaa'ti vaa `kammakaraa'ti  vaa tepi da.n.datajjitaa bhayatajjitaa assumukhaa rudamaanaa parikammaani  karonti. aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, puggalo attantapo ca  attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto ^a^T2.0581^ea^, parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] 418^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, braahma.na, puggalo nevattantapo  naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, na parantapo na  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto; so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme  nicchaato nibbuto ^a^V2.0377^ea^ siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa  viharati? idha, braahma.na, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m  sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro  purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m  sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m  majjhekalyaa.na.m ^a^M2.0370^ea^ pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m  parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. ta.m dhamma.m su.naati gahapati vaa  gahapatiputto vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato. so ta.m dhamma.m  sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so tena saddhaapa.tilaabhena  samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sambaadho gharaavaaso rajopatho  abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa  ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m.  ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa  agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so aparena samayena appa.m vaa  bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya, appa.m vaa  ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya ^a^T2.0582^ea^ mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya, kesamassu.m  ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajati. so eva.m pabbajito samaano bhikkhuuna.m  sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti, nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno  sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati.
[03] ``adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti  dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii. athenena sucibhuutena attanaa viharati.
[03] ``abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii hoti aaraacaarii virato  methunaa gaamadhammaa.
[03] ``musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti saccavaadii  saccasandho theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa.

[03] ``pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti;  ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na  imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa sahitaana.m  vaa anuppadaataa, samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii samaggakara.ni.m  vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``pharusa.m ^a^V2.0378^ea^ vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti.  yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii  bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] ``samphappalaapa.m ^a^M2.0371^ea^ pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti,  kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii, nidhaanavati.m  vaaca.m bhaasitaa kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m.

[03] ``so biijagaamabhuutagaamasamaarambhaa pa.tivirato hoti ^a^T2.0583^ea^.  ekabhattiko hoti rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa.  naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanaa pa.tivirato hoti.  maalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti.  uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirato hoti. jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.naa  pa.tivirato hoti. aamakadha~n~napa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti.  aamakama.msapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. itthikumaarikapa.tiggaha.naa  pa.tivirato hoti. daasidaasapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti.  aje.lakapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. kukku.tasuukarapa.tiggaha.naa  pa.tivirato hoti. hatthigavassava.lavapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti.  khettavatthupa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti. duuteyyapahi.nagamanaanuyogaa  pa.tivirato hoti. kayavikkayaa pa.tivirato hoti.  tulaakuu.taka.msakuu.tamaanakuu.taa pa.tivirato hoti.  ukko.tanava~ncananikatisaaciyogaa pa.tivirato hoti.  chedanavadhabandhanaviparaamosaaalopasahasaakaaraa pa.tivirato hoti.

[03] ``so santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena,  kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkamati samaadaayeva  pakkamati. seyyathaapi naama pakkhii saku.no yena yeneva .deti  sapattabhaarova .deti, evameva bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena  ciivarena, kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkamati  samaadaayeva pakkamati. so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena  samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] 419^b^.^eb^ ``so cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti  naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m ^a^T2.0584^ea^ asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m  abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa  sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m  aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...  jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m  vi~n~naayana na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii ^a^V2.0379^ea^.  yatvaadhikara.namena.m ^a^M2.0372^ea^ manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa  paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati,  rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. so iminaa  ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato ajjhatta.m abyaasekasukha.m  pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] ``so abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite  vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii  hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite  khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme  sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite  tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti.

[03] ``so iminaa ca ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato, (imaaya  ca ariyaaya santu.t.thiyaa samannaagato,) {passa ma0 ni0 1.296} iminaa ca ariyena  indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena satisampaja~n~nena  samannaagato vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m  giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m  pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa, uju.m ^a^T2.0585^ea^ kaaya.m  pa.nidhaaya, parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya  vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti;  byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati  sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti; thinamiddha.m  pahaaya vigatathiinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano,  thiinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti; uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati  ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti; vicikiccha.m  pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu,  vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.

[03] ``so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya  dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m  savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m  avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca  sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ^a^M2.0373^ea^, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti  -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva  somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m  catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] 420^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^T2.0586^ea^ ^a^V2.0380^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate  ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m  pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo  tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi  jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo  pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi  jaatisatasahassampi, anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi  sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no  evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto; so tato cuto  amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro  eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto; so tato cuto  idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussarati.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m  cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa  visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine  pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati  -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa...pe0...  ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa ^a^T2.0587^ea^, te  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa.  ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa...pe0...  ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa, te  kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti  dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane  upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage  satte pajaanaati.

[03] ``so ^a^M2.0374^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m  khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m  dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati,  `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti  yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m  pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m  vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi ^a^V2.0381^ea^ citta.m  vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati,  vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati.

[03] ``aya.m vuccati, braahma.na, puggalo nevattantapo  naattaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, na parantapo na ^a^T2.0588^ea^  paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme  nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa  viharatii''ti.

[03] 421^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, gho.tamukho braahma.no aayasmanta.m udena.m  etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho udena, abhikkanta.m, bho udena!  seyyathaapi, bho udena, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa  vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m  dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti -- evameva.m bhotaa  udenena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m udena.m  sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m udeno  dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. ``maa kho ma.m tva.m,  braahma.na, sara.na.m agamaasi. tameva bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaahi yamaha.m  sara.na.m gato''ti. ``kaha.m pana, bho udena, etarahi so bhava.m gotamo  viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti? ``parinibbuto kho, braahma.na,  etarahi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti.

[03] ``sacepi {sace hi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maya.m, bho udena, su.neyyaama ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dasasu  yojanesu, dasapi maya.m yojanaani gaccheyyaama ^a^T2.0589^ea^ ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m  dassanaaya ^a^M2.0375^ea^ arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m. sacepi {sace (sii0 pii0), sace  hi (syaa0 ka.m0)} maya.m, bho udena, su.neyyaama  ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m viisatiyaa yojanesu... ti.msaaya yojanesu...  cattaariisaaya yojanesu... pa~n~naasaaya yojanesu, pa~n~naasampi maya.m  yojanaani gaccheyyaama ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dassanaaya arahanta.m  sammaasambuddha.m. yojanasate cepi {yojanasatepi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} maya.m ^a^P2.0163^ea^, bho udena,  su.neyyaama ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m, yojanasatampi maya.m gaccheyyaama ta.m bhavanta.m  gotama.m dassanaaya arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m.

[03] ``yato ca kho, bho udena, parinibbuto so bhava.m gotamo,  parinibbutampi maya.m ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaama dhamma~nca  bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m udeno dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m  sara.na.m gata.m. atthi ca me, bho udena, a"ngaraajaa devasika.m  niccabhikkha.m dadaati ^a^V2.0382^ea^, tato aha.m bhoto udenassa eka.m niccabhikkha.m  dadaamii''ti. ``ki.m pana te, braahma.na, a"ngaraajaa devasika.m  niccabhikkha.m dadaatii''ti? ``pa~nca, bho udena, kahaapa.nasataanii''ti.  ``na kho no, braahma.na, kappati jaataruuparajata.m pa.tiggahetu''nti.  ``sace ta.m bhoto udenassa na kappati vihaara.m bhoto udenassa  kaaraapessaamii''ti. ``sace kho me tva.m, braahma.na, vihaara.m,  kaaraapetukaamo, paa.taliputte sa"nghassa upa.t.thaanasaala.m kaaraapehii''ti.  ``iminaapaaha.m bhoto udenassa bhiyyosomattaaya attamano abhiraddho ya.m  ma.m bhava.m udeno sa"nghe daane samaadapeti. esaaha.m, bho udena, etissaa  ca niccabhikkhaaya aparaaya ca niccabhikkhaaya paa.taliputte sa"nghassa  upa.t.thaanasaala.m kaaraapessaamii''ti. atha ^a^T2.0590^ea^ kho gho.tamukho braahma.no  etissaa ca niccabhikkhaaya aparaaya ca niccabhikkhaaya paa.taliputte  sa"nghassa upa.t.thaanasaala.m kaaraapesi. saa etarahi `gho.tamukhii'ti  vuccatiiti.
[06] gho.tamukhasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 422^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0591^ea^ ^a^V2.0383^ea^ ^a^P2.0164^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m  bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena  opaasaada.m naama kosalaana.m ^a^M2.0376^ea^ braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa  opaasaade viharati uttarena opaasaada.m devavane saalavane. tena kho  pana samayena ca"nkii braahma.no opaasaada.m ajjhaavasati sattussada.m  sati.naka.t.thodaka.m sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m ra~n~naa pasenadinaa kosalena dinna.m  raajadaaya.m brahmadeyya.m. assosu.m kho opaasaadakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa --  ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito  kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m opaasaada.m  anuppatto, opaasaade viharati uttarena opaasaada.m devavane saalavane.  ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato --  `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato  lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho  bhagavaa'ti. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m  sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m  pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m ^a^T2.0592^ea^ sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m  brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m  hotii''ti.
