[03] 423^b^.^eb^ atha kho opaasaadakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa opaasaadaa  nikkhamitvaa sa"nghasa"nghii ga.niibhuutaa uttarenamukhaa gacchanti yena  devavana.m saalavana.m. tena kho pana samayena ca"nkii braahma.no  uparipaasaade divaaseyya.m upagato. addasaa kho ca"nkii braahma.no  opaasaadake braahma.nagahapatike opaasaadaa nikkhamitvaa sa"nghasa"nghii  ga.niibhuute uttarena mukha.m yena devavana.m saalavana.m tenupasa"nkamante. disvaa  khatta.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho, bho khatte, opaasaadakaa  braahma.nagahapatikaa opaasaadaa nikkhamitvaa sa"nghasa"nghii ga.niibhuutaa  uttarenamukhaa gacchanti yena devavana.m saalavana''nti? ``atthi, bho  ca"nkii, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito kosalesu  caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m opaasaada.m anuppatto,  opaasaade ^a^V2.0384^ea^ viharati uttarena opaasaada.m devavane saalavane. ta.m kho pana  bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so  bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu  anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti.  tamete bhavanta.m ^a^M2.0377^ea^ gotama.m dassanaaya gacchantii''ti. ``tena hi, bho  khatte, yena opaasaadakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa  opaasaadake ^a^T2.0593^ea^ braahma.nagahapatike eva.m vadehi -- `ca"nkii, bho, braahma.no  evamaaha -- aagamentu kira bhonto, ca"nkiipi braahma.no sama.na.m gotama.m  dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii'''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho so khatto  ca"nkissa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa ^a^P2.0165^ea^ yena opaasaadakaa  braahma.nagahapatikaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa opaasaadake  braahma.nagahapatike etadavoca -- ``ca"nkii, bho, braahma.no evamaaha --  `aagamentu kira bhonto, ca"nkiipi braahma.no sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya  upasa"nkamissatii'''ti.

[03] 424^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena naanaaverajjakaana.m braahma.naana.m  pa~ncamattaani braahma.nasataani opaasaade pa.tivasanti kenacideva  kara.niiyena. assosu.m kho te braahma.naa -- ``ca"nkii kira braahma.no  sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii''ti. atha kho te braahma.naa  yena ca"nkii braahma.no tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ca"nki.m braahma.na.m  etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m kira bhava.m ca"nkii sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya  upasa"nkamissatii''ti? ``eva.m kho me, bho, hoti -- `aha.m sama.na.m  gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaamii'''ti. ``maa bhava.m ca"nkii sama.na.m  gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkami. na arahati bhava.m ca"nkii sama.na.m gotama.m  dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; sama.notveva gotamo arahati bhavanta.m ca"nki.m  dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. bhava~nhi ca"nkii ubhato sujaato maatito ca  pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto  anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. yampi bhava.m ca"nkii ubhato sujaato maatito  ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto  anupakku.t.tho ^a^T2.0594^ea^ jaativaadena, iminaapa"ngena na arahati bhava.m ca"nkii sama.na.m  gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; sama.notveva gotamo arahati bhavanta.m  ca"nki.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. bhava~nhi ca"nkii a.d.dho mahaddhano  mahaabhogo...pe0... bhava~nhi ca"nkii ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu  sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako,  veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo...pe0... bhava~nhi  ca"nkii abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya  samannaagato ^a^M2.0378^ea^ brahmava.n.nii brahmavacchasii {brahmavaccasii (sii0 pii0)} akhuddaavakaaso   ^a^V2.0385^ea^ dassanaaya...pe0...  bhava~nhi ca"nkii siilavaa vuddhasiilii vuddhasiilena samannaagato...pe0...  bhava~nhi ca"nkii kalyaa.navaaco kalyaa.navaakkara.no ^a^P2.0166^ea^  poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya atthassa  vi~n~naapaniyaa...pe0... bhava~nhi ca"nkii bahuuna.m aacariyapaacariyo, tii.ni  maa.navakasataani mante vaaceti...pe0... bhava~nhi ca"nkii ra~n~no  pasenadissa kosalassa sakkato garukato maanito puujito  apacito...pe0... bhava~nhi ca"nkii braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa sakkato  garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0... bhava~nhi ca"nkii opaasaada.m  ajjhaavasati sattussada.m sati.naka.t.thodaka.m sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m ra~n~naa  pasenadinaa kosalena dinna.m raajadaaya.m brahmadeyya.m. yampi bhava.m ca"nkii  opaasaada.m ajjhaavasati sattussada.m sati.naka.t.thodaka.m ^a^T2.0595^ea^ sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m  ra~n~naa pasenadinaa kosalena dinna.m raajadaaya.m brahmadeyya.m, iminaapa"ngena na  arahati bhava.m ca"nkii sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; sama.notveva  gotamo arahati bhavanta.m ca"nki.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti.

[03] 425^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, ca"nkii braahma.no te braahma.ne etadavoca --  ``tena hi, bho, mamapi su.naatha, yathaa mayameva arahaama ta.m sama.na.m  gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; natveva arahati so bhava.m gotamo  amhaaka.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo ubhato  sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa  pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. yampi, bho, sama.no  gotamo ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava  sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena, iminaapa"ngena  na arahati so bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; atha  kho mayameva arahaama ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m {ettha dii0  ni0 1.304 a~n~nampi gu.napada.m dissati}.  sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo pahuuta.m hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m ohaaya pabbajito  bhuumigata~nca vehaasa.t.tha~nca...pe0... sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo daharova  samaano yuvaa susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena  vayasaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito...pe0... sama.no khalu, bho,  gotamo akaamakaana.m ^a^M2.0379^ea^ maataapituuna.m assumukhaana.m rudantaana.m kesamassu.m  ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajito...pe0... sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo abhiruupo dassaniiyo  paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya ^a^T2.0596^ea^ samannaagato brahmava.n.nii ^a^P2.0167^ea^  brahmavacchasii akhuddaavakaaso dassanaaya...pe0... sama.no  khalu, bho, gotamo siilavaa ariyasiilii kusalasiilii kusalena  siilena ^a^V2.0386^ea^ samannaagato...pe0... sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo kalyaa.navaaco  kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya  atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa...pe0... sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo bahuuna.m  aacariyapaacariyo...pe0... sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo  khii.nakaamaraago vigatacaapallo...pe0... sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo  kammavaadii kiriyavaadii apaapapurekkhaaro brahma~n~naaya pajaaya...pe0...  sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo uccaa kulaa pabbajito asambhinnaa  khattiyakulaa...pe0... sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo a.d.dhaa kulaa  pabbajito mahaddhanaa mahaabhogaa...pe0... sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m  tirora.t.thaa tirojanapadaa sa.mpucchitu.m aagacchanti...pe0... sama.na.m khalu,  bho, gotama.m anekaani devataasahassaani paa.nehi sara.na.m gataani...pe0...  sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato --  `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato  lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho  bhagavaa'ti...pe0... sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo  dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato...pe0... {etthaapi dii0 ni0 1.304 a~n~naanipi gu.napadaana.m  dissanti} sama.na.m khalu, bho,  gotama.m raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro saputtadaaro paa.nehi sara.na.m  gato...pe0... sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m raajaa pasenadi kosalo  saputtadaaro paa.nehi sara.na.m gato...pe0... sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m  braahma.no pokkharasaati saputtadaaro ^a^T2.0597^ea^ paa.nehi sara.na.m gato...pe0...  sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo opaasaada.m anuppatto opaasaade viharati  uttarena opaasaada.m devavane saalavane. ye kho te sama.naa vaa braahma.naa  vaa amhaaka.m gaamakkhetta.m aagacchanti, atithii no te honti. atithii  kho panamhehi sakkaatabbaa garukaatabbaa maanetabbaa puujetabbaa. yampi  sama.no gotamo opaasaada.m anuppatto ^a^M2.0380^ea^ opaasaade viharati uttarena  opaasaada.m devavane saalavane, atithimhaaka.m sama.no gotamo. atithi  kho panamhehi sakkaatabbo garukaatabbo maanetabbo puujetabbo.  iminaapa"ngena ^a^P2.0168^ea^ na arahati so bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m  dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; atha kho mayameva arahaama ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m  dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. ettake kho aha.m, bho, tassa bhoto  gotamassa va.n.ne pariyaapu.naami, no ca kho so bhava.m gotamo  ettakava.n.no; aparimaa.nava.n.no hi so bhava.m gotamo. ekamekenapi  tena {ekamekenapi bho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} a"ngena samannaagato na   arahati, so, bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m  dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; atha kho mayameva arahaama ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m  dassanaaya upasa"nkamitunti. tena hi, bho, sabbeva maya.m sama.na.m  gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaamaa''ti.

[03] 426^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0387^ea^ kho ca"nkii braahma.no mahataa braahma.naga.nena saddhi.m  yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.  sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. tena  kho pana samayena ^a^T2.0598^ea^ bhagavaa vuddhehi vuddhehi braahma.nehi saddhi.m ki~nci  ki~nci katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa nisinno hoti. tena kho pana  samayena kaapa.tiko {kaapa.thiko (sii0 pii0), kaapadiko (syaa0 ka.m0)} naama maa.navo daharo vuttasiro so.lasavassuddesiko  jaatiyaa, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m  itihaasapa~ncamaana.m, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu  anavayo tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti. so vuddhaana.m vuddhaana.m  braahma.naana.m bhagavataa saddhi.m mantayamaanaana.m antarantaraa katha.m opaateti.  atha kho bhagavaa kaapa.tika.m maa.nava.m apasaadeti -- ``maayasmaa  bhaaradvaajo vuddhaana.m vuddhaana.m braahma.naana.m mantayamaanaana.m antarantaraa katha.m  opaatetu. kathaapariyosaana.m aayasmaa bhaaradvaajo aagametuu''ti. eva.m  vutte, ca"nkii braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``maa bhava.m gotamo  kaapa.tika.m maa.nava.m apasaadesi. kulaputto ca kaapa.tiko maa.navo,  bahussuto ca kaapa.tiko maa.navo, pa.n.dito ca kaapa.tiko maa.navo,  kalyaa.navaakkara.no ca kaapa.tiko maa.navo, pahoti ca kaapa.tiko maa.navo  bhotaa gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu''nti. atha kho  bhagavato ^a^M2.0381^ea^ etadahosi -- ``addhaa kho ^a^P2.0169^ea^ kaapa.tikassa  {etadahosi ``kaapa.tikassa (ka0)}  maa.navassa tevijjake paavacane kathaa {katha.m (sii0 ka0), katha.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhavissati. tathaa hi na.m braahma.naa  sa.mpurekkharontii''ti. atha kho kaapa.tikassa maa.navassa etadahosi ^a^T2.0599^ea^  -- ``yadaa me sama.no gotamo cakkhu.m upasa.mharissati, athaaha.m sama.na.m  gotama.m pa~nha.m pucchissaamii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa kaapa.tikassa  maa.navassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya yena kaapa.tiko maa.navo tena  cakkhuuni upasa.mhaasi.

[03] 427^b^.^eb^ atha kho kaapa.tikassa maa.navassa etadahosi --  ``samannaaharati kho ma.m sama.no gotamo. ya.mnuunaaha.m sama.na.m gotama.m  pa~nha.m puccheyya''nti. atha kho kaapa.tiko maa.navo bhagavanta.m etadavoca  -- ``yadida.m, bho gotama, braahma.naana.m poraa.na.m mantapada.m  itihitihaparamparaaya pi.takasampadaaya, tattha ca braahma.naa eka.msena ni.t.tha.m  gacchanti -- `idameva sacca.m, moghama~n~na'nti. idha bhava.m gotamo  kimaahaa''ti? ``ki.m pana, bhaaradvaaja, atthi koci braahma.naana.m  ekabraahma.nopi yo evamaaha -- `ahameta.m jaanaami, ahameta.m passaami.  idameva sacca.m, moghama~n~na'''nti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.  ``ki.m pana, bhaaradvaaja, atthi koci braahma.naana.m ekaacariyopi ^a^V2.0388^ea^,  ekaacariyapaacariyopi, yaava sattamaa aacariyamahayugaapi, yo evamaaha  -- `ahameta.m jaanaami, ahameta.m passaami. idameva sacca.m,  moghama~n~na'''nti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``ki.m pana,  bhaaradvaaja, yepi te braahma.naana.m pubbakaa isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m  pavattaaro yesamida.m etarahi braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m  samihita.m tadanugaayanti tadanubhaasanti bhaasitamanubhaasanti  vaacitamanuvaacenti seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako ^a^T2.0600^ea^ vaamako vaamadevo vessaamitto  yamataggi a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo bhagu, tepi evamaaha.msu  -- `mayameta.m jaanaama, mayameta.m passaama. idameva sacca.m,  moghama~n~na'''nti? ``no ^a^P2.0170^ea^ hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``iti kira, bhaaradvaaja, natthi koci braahma.naana.m ekabraahma.nopi  yo evamaaha -- `ahameta.m jaanaami, ahameta.m passaami. idameva sacca.m,  moghama~n~na'nti; natthi koci braahma.naana.m ekaacariyopi  ekaacariyapaacariyopi, yaava sattamaa aacariyamahayugaapi, yo evamaaha  -- `ahameta.m ^a^M2.0382^ea^ jaanaami, ahameta.m passaami. idameva sacca.m,  moghama~n~na'nti; yepi te braahma.naana.m pubbakaa isayo mantaana.m kattaaro  mantaana.m pavattaaro yesamida.m etarahi braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m  pavutta.m samihita.m tadanugaayanti tadanubhaasanti bhaasitamanubhaasanti  vaacitamanuvaacenti seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako vaamako vaamadevo vessaamitto  yamataggi a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo bhagu, tepi na  evamaaha.msu -- `mayameta.m jaanaama, mayameta.m passaama. idameva sacca.m,  moghama~n~na'nti.

[03] 428^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhaaradvaaja, andhave.ni paramparaasa.msattaa  purimopi na passati majjhimopi na passati pacchimopi na passati;  evameva kho, bhaaradvaaja, andhave.nuupama.m ma~n~ne braahma.naana.m bhaasita.m  sampajjati -- purimopi na passati majjhimopi na passati  pacchimopi na passati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, bhaaradvaaja ^a^T2.0601^ea^, nanu eva.m sante  braahma.naana.m amuulikaa saddhaa sampajjatii''ti? ``na khvettha, bho  gotama, braahma.naa saddhaayeva payirupaasanti, anussavaapettha braahma.naa  payirupaasantii''ti. ``pubbeva kho tva.m, bhaaradvaaja, saddha.m agamaasi,  anussava.m idaani vadesi. pa~nca kho ime, bhaaradvaaja, dhammaa di.t.theva  dhamme dvedhaa vipaakaa. katame pa~nca? saddhaa, ruci, anussavo,  aakaaraparivitakko, di.t.thinijjhaanakkhanti -- ime kho, bhaaradvaaja ^a^V2.0389^ea^,  pa~nca dhammaa di.t.theva dhamme dvedhaa vipaakaa. api ca, bhaaradvaaja,  susaddahita.myeva hoti, ta~nca hoti ritta.m tuccha.m musaa; no cepi  susaddahita.m hoti, ta~nca hoti bhuuta.m taccha.m ana~n~nathaa. api ca,  bhaaradvaaja ^a^P2.0171^ea^, surucita.myeva hoti...pe0...  svaanussuta.myeva hoti...pe0... suparivitakkita.myeva hoti...pe0...  sunijjhaayita.myeva hoti, ta~nca hoti ritta.m tuccha.m musaa; no cepi  sunijjhaayita.m hoti, ta~nca hoti bhuuta.m taccha.m ana~n~nathaa.  saccamanurakkhataa, bhaaradvaaja, vi~n~nunaa purisena naalamettha eka.msena ni.t.tha.m  gantu.m -- `idameva sacca.m, moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] 429^b^.^eb^ ``kittaavataa pana, bho gotama, saccaanurakkha.naa  hoti, kittaavataa saccamanurakkhati? saccaanurakkha.na.m maya.m bhavanta.m  gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti. ``saddhaa cepi, bhaaradvaaja, purisassa hoti;  `eva.m me saddhaa'ti -- iti vada.m saccamanurakkhati {evameva sijjhatiiti iti vaa,  ta.m saccamanurakkhati (ka0)}, natveva taava  eka.msena ni.t.tha.m gacchati ^a^T2.0602^ea^ -- `idameva sacca.m, moghama~n~na'nti ^a^M2.0383^ea^ ( )  {(ettaavataa kho bhaaradvaaja saccaanurakkha.naa hoti, ettaavataa  saccamanurakkhati, ettaavataa ca maya.m saccaanurakkha.na.m pa~n~naapema, na tveva  taava saccaanubodho hoti) (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ruci  cepi, bhaaradvaaja, purisassa hoti...pe0... anussavo cepi, bhaaradvaaja,  purisassa hoti...pe0... aakaaraparivitakko cepi, bhaaradvaaja,  purisassa hoti...pe0... di.t.thinijjhaanakkhanti cepi, bhaaradvaaja,  purisassa hoti; `eva.m me di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantii'ti -- iti vada.m  saccamanurakkhati, natveva taava eka.msena ni.t.tha.m gacchati -- `idameva  sacca.m, moghama~n~na'nti. ettaavataa kho, bhaaradvaaja, saccaanurakkha.naa  hoti, ettaavataa saccamanurakkhati, ettaavataa ca maya.m saccaanurakkha.na.m  pa~n~napema; na tveva taava saccaanubodho hotii''ti.

[03] 430^b^.^eb^ ``ettaavataa, bho gotama, saccaanurakkha.naa hoti,  ettaavataa saccamanurakkhati, ettaavataa ca maya.m saccaanurakkha.na.m pekkhaama.  kittaavataa pana, bho gotama, saccaanubodho hoti, kittaavataa  saccamanubujjhati? saccaanubodha.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``idha {idha kira (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, bhaaradvaaja, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa upanissaaya  viharati. tamena.m gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa upasa"nkamitvaa tiisu  dhammesu samannesati -- lobhaniiyesu ^a^P2.0172^ea^ dhammesu,  dosaniiyesu dhammesu, mohaniiyesu dhammesu. atthi nu kho  imassaayasmato tathaaruupaa lobhaniiyaa dhammaa yathaaruupehi lobhaniiyehi  dhammehi pariyaadinnacitto ^a^T2.0603^ea^ ajaana.m vaa vadeyya -- jaanaamiiti, apassa.m  vaa vadeyya -- passaamiiti, para.m vaa tadatthaaya samaadapeyya ya.m paresa.m  assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya ^a^V2.0390^ea^ dukkhaayaati? tamena.m samannesamaano eva.m  jaanaati -- `natthi kho imassaayasmato tathaaruupaa lobhaniiyaa dhammaa  yathaaruupehi lobhaniiyehi dhammehi pariyaadinnacitto ajaana.m vaa vadeyya  -- jaanaamiiti, apassa.m vaa vadeyya -- passaamiiti, para.m vaa tadatthaaya  samaadapeyya ya.m paresa.m assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya {dukkhaayaati (sabbattha)}. tathaaruupo  {tathaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}  kho panimassaayasmato kaayasamaacaaro tathaaruupo {tathaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaciisamaacaaro yathaa  ta.m aluddhassa. ya.m kho pana ayamaayasmaa dhamma.m deseti, gambhiiro so  dhammo duddaso duranubodho ^a^M2.0384^ea^ santo pa.niito atakkaavacaro nipu.no  pa.n.ditavedaniiyo; na so dhammo sudesiyo luddhenaa'''ti.

[03] 431^b^.^eb^ ``yato na.m samannesamaano visuddha.m lobhaniiyehi  dhammehi samanupassati tato na.m uttari samannesati dosaniiyesu dhammesu.  atthi nu kho imassaayasmato tathaaruupaa dosaniiyaa dhammaa  yathaaruupehi dosaniiyehi dhammehi pariyaadinnacitto ajaana.m vaa vadeyya  -- jaanaamiiti, apassa.m vaa vadeyya -- passaamiiti, para.m vaa tadatthaaya  samaadapeyya ya.m paresa.m assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaati? tamena.m  samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `natthi kho imassaayasmato tathaaruupaa  dosaniiyaa dhammaa yathaaruupehi dosaniiyehi dhammehi pariyaadinnacitto  ajaana.m vaa vadeyya -- jaanaamiiti, apassa.m vaa vadeyya -- passaamiiti,  para.m vaa tadatthaaya samaadapeyya ^a^T2.0604^ea^ ya.m paresa.m assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya  dukkhaaya. tathaaruupo kho panimassaayasmato kaayasamaacaaro tathaaruupo  vaciisamaacaaro yathaa ta.m adu.t.thassa. ya.m kho pana ayamaayasmaa dhamma.m  deseti, gambhiiro so dhammo duddaso duranubodho santo pa.niito  atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo; na so dhammo sudesiyo  du.t.thenaa'''ti.

[03] 432^b^.^eb^ ``yato na.m samannesamaano visuddha.m dosaniiyehi  dhammehi samanupassati ^a^P2.0173^ea^, tato na.m uttari samannesati  mohaniiyesu dhammesu. atthi nu kho imassaayasmato tathaaruupaa  mohaniiyaa dhammaa yathaaruupehi mohaniiyehi dhammehi pariyaadinnacitto  ajaana.m vaa vadeyya -- jaanaamiiti, apassa.m vaa vadeyya -- passaamiiti,  para.m vaa tadatthaaya samaadapeyya ya.m paresa.m assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya  dukkhaayaati? tamena.m samannesamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `natthi kho  imassaayasmato tathaaruupaa mohaniiyaa dhammaa yathaaruupehi mohaniiyehi  dhammehi pariyaadinnacitto ajaana.m vaa vadeyya -- jaanaamiiti, apassa.m  vaa vadeyya -- passaamiiti, para.m vaa tadatthaaya samaadapeyya ya.m paresa.m ^a^V2.0391^ea^  assa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. tathaaruupo kho panimassaayasmato  kaayasamaacaaro tathaaruupo vaciisamaacaaro yathaa ta.m amuu.lhassa. ya.m  kho pana ayamaayasmaa dhamma.m deseti, gambhiiro so dhammo duddaso  duranubodho santo pa.niito ^a^M2.0385^ea^ atakkaavacaro nipu.no pa.n.ditavedaniiyo; na  so dhammo sudesiyo muu.lhenaa'''ti.

[03] ``yato na.m samannesamaano visuddha.m mohaniiyehi dhammehi  samanupassati ^a^T2.0605^ea^; atha tamhi saddha.m niveseti, saddhaajaato upasa"nkamati,  upasa"nkamanto payirupaasati, payirupaasanto sota.m odahati,  ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati, sutvaa dhamma.m dhaareti, dhataana.m {dhaaritaana.m (ka0)} dhammaana.m  attha.m upaparikkhati, attha.m upaparikkhato dhammaa nijjhaana.m khamanti,  dhammanijjhaanakkhantiyaa sati chando jaayati, chandajaato ussahati,  ussahitvaa tuleti, tulayitvaa padahati, pahitatto samaano kaayena ceva  paramasacca.m sacchikaroti pa~n~naaya ca na.m ativijjha passati.  ettaavataa kho, bhaaradvaaja, saccaanubodho hoti, ettaavataa  saccamanubujjhati, ettaavataa ca maya.m saccaanubodha.m pa~n~napema; na tveva  taava saccaanuppatti hotii''ti.

[03] 433^b^.^eb^ ``ettaavattaa, bho gotama, saccaanubodho hoti,  ettaavataa saccamanubujjhati, ettaavataa ca maya.m saccaanubodha.m pekkhaama.  kittaavataa pana, bho gotama, saccaanuppatti hoti, kittaavataa  saccamanupaapu.naati? saccaanuppatti.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``tesa.mye ^a^P2.0174^ea^, bhaaradvaaja, dhammaana.m aasevanaa bhaavanaa  bahuliikamma.m saccaanuppatti hoti. ettaavataa kho, bhaaradvaaja,  saccaanuppatti hoti, ettaavataa saccamanupaapu.naati, ettaavataa ca maya.m  saccaanuppatti.m pa~n~napemaa''ti.

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ ``ettaavataa, bho gotama, saccaanuppatti hoti,  ettaavataa saccamanupaapu.naati, ettaavataa ca maya.m saccaanuppatti.m pekkhaama.  saccaanuppattiyaa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro?  saccaanuppattiyaa bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``saccaanuppattiyaa ^a^T2.0606^ea^ kho, bhaaradvaaja, padhaana.m bahukaara.m. no ceta.m  padaheyya, nayida.m saccamanupaapu.neyya. yasmaa ca kho padahati tasmaa  saccamanupaapu.naati. tasmaa saccaanuppattiyaa padhaana.m bahukaara''nti.

[03] ``padhaanassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro?  padhaanassa bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m ^a^V2.0392^ea^ gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``padhaanassa kho, bhaaradvaaja, tulanaa ^a^M2.0386^ea^ bahukaaraa. no ceta.m tuleyya,  nayida.m padaheyya. yasmaa ca kho tuleti tasmaa padahati. tasmaa  padhaanassa tulanaa bahukaaraa''ti.

[03] ``tulanaaya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro?  tulanaaya bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``tulanaaya kho, bhaaradvaaja, ussaaho bahukaaro. no ceta.m ussaheyya,  nayida.m tuleyya. yasmaa ca kho ussahati tasmaa tuleti. tasmaa  tulanaaya ussaaho bahukaaro''ti.

[03] ``ussaahassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro?  ussaahassa bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``ussaahassa kho, bhaaradvaaja, chando bahukaaro. no ceta.m chando  jaayetha, nayida.m ussaheyya. yasmaa ca kho chando jaayati tasmaa  ussahati. tasmaa ussaahassa chando bahukaaro''ti.

[03] ``chandassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro ^a^P2.0175^ea^?  chandassa bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m  pucchaamaa''ti. ``chandassa kho, bhaaradvaaja, dhammanijjhaanakkhanti  bahukaaraa. no cete dhammaa nijjhaana.m khameyyu.m, nayida.m chando jaayetha.  yasmaa ca kho dhammaa ^a^T2.0607^ea^ nijjhaana.m khamanti tasmaa chando jaayati.  tasmaa chandassa dhammanijjhaanakkhanti bahukaaraa''ti.

[03] ``dhammanijjhaanakkhantiyaa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo  bahukaaro? dhammanijjhaanakkhantiyaa bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m  gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti. ``dhammanijjhaanakkhantiyaa kho, bhaaradvaaja,  atthuupaparikkhaa bahukaaraa. no ceta.m attha.m upaparikkheyya, nayida.m  dhammaa nijjhaana.m khameyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho attha.m upaparikkhati tasmaa  dhammaa nijjhaana.m khamanti. tasmaa dhammanijjhaanakkhantiyaa  atthuupaparikkhaa bahukaaraa''ti.

[03] ``atthuupaparikkhaaya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro?  atthuupaparikkhaaya bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``atthuupaparikkhaaya kho, bhaaradvaaja, dhammadhaara.naa ^a^V2.0393^ea^ bahukaaraa. no ceta.m  dhamma.m dhaareyya, nayida.m attha.m upaparikkheyya. yasmaa ca kho dhamma.m  dhaareti tasmaa attha.m upaparikkhati. tasmaa atthuupaparikkhaaya  dhammadhaara.naa bahukaaraa''ti.

[03] ``dhammadhaara.naaya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro?  dhammadhaara.naaya bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``dhammadhaara.naaya ^a^M2.0387^ea^ kho, bhaaradvaaja, dhammassavana.m bahukaara.m. no ceta.m  dhamma.m su.neyya, nayida.m dhamma.m dhaareyya. yasmaa ca kho dhamma.m su.naati  tasmaa dhamma.m dhaareti. tasmaa dhammadhaara.naaya dhammassavana.m bahukaara''nti.

[03] ``dhammassavanassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro?  dhammassavanassa bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti ^a^T2.0608^ea^.  ``dhammassavanassa kho, bhaaradvaaja, sotaavadhaana.m bahukaara.m ^a^P2.0176^ea^.  no ceta.m sota.m odaheyya, nayida.m dhamma.m su.neyya.  yasmaa ca kho sota.m odahati tasmaa dhamma.m su.naati. tasmaa  dhammassavanassa sotaavadhaana.m bahukaara''nti.

[03] ``sotaavadhaanassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro?  sotaavadhaanassa bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``sotaavadhaanassa kho, bhaaradvaaja, payirupaasanaa bahukaaraa. no ceta.m  payirupaaseyya, nayida.m sota.m odaheyya. yasmaa ca kho payirupaasati  tasmaa sota.m odahati. tasmaa sotaavadhaanassa payirupaasanaa  bahukaaraa''ti.

[03] ``payirupaasanaaya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro?  payirupaasanaaya bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``payirupaasanaaya kho, bhaaradvaaja, upasa"nkamana.m bahukaara.m. no ceta.m  upasa"nkameyya, nayida.m payirupaaseyya. yasmaa ca kho upasa"nkamati  tasmaa payirupaasati. tasmaa payirupaasanaaya upasa"nkamana.m bahukaara''nti.

[03] ``upasa"nkamanassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukaaro?  upasa"nkamanassa bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m pucchaamaa''ti.  ``upasa"nkamanassa kho, bhaaradvaaja, saddhaa bahukaaraa. no ceta.m saddhaa  jaayetha, nayida.m upasa"nkameyya. yasmaa ca kho saddhaa jaayati tasmaa  upasa"nkamati. tasmaa upasa"nkamanassa saddhaa bahukaaraa''ti.

[03] 435^b^.^eb^ ``saccaanurakkha.na.m ^a^V2.0394^ea^ maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m  apucchimha, saccaanurakkha.na.m ^a^T2.0609^ea^ bhava.m gotamo byaakaasi; ta~nca panamhaaka.m  ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamanaa. saccaanubodha.m maya.m  bhavanta.m gotama.m apucchimha, saccaanubodha.m bhava.m gotamo byaakaasi; ta~nca  panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamanaa. saccaanuppatti.m  maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m apucchimha, saccaanuppatti.m bhava.m gotamo byaakaasi;  ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamanaa ^a^M2.0388^ea^.  saccaanuppattiyaa bahukaara.m dhamma.m maya.m bhavanta.m ^a^P2.0177^ea^  gotama.m apucchimha, saccaanuppattiyaa bahukaara.m dhamma.m bhava.m gotamo  byaakaasi; ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha  attamanaa. ya.myadeva ca maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m apucchimha ta.mtadeva bhava.m  gotamo byaakaasi; ta~nca panamhaaka.m ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha  attamanaa. maya~nhi, bho gotama, pubbe eva.m jaanaama -- `ke ca  mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa ibbhaa ka.nhaa bandhupaadaapaccaa, ke ca dhammassa  a~n~naataaro'ti? ajanesi vata me bhava.m gotamo sama.nesu sama.napema.m,  sama.nesu sama.napasaada.m, sama.nesu sama.nagaarava.m. abhikkanta.m, bho  gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m  sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] ca"nkiisutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 436^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0610^ea^ ^a^V2.0395^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho esukaarii  braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m  sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m  nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho esukaarii braahma.no bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``braahma.naa, bho gotama, catasso paaricariyaa pa~n~napenti  -- braahma.nassa paaricariya.m pa~n~napenti, khattiyassa paaricariya.m  pa~n~napenti, vessassa paaricariya.m pa~n~napenti, suddassa paaricariya.m  pa~n~napenti. tatrida.m, bho gotama, braahma.naa braahma.nassa paaricariya.m  pa~n~napenti -- `braahma.no vaa braahma.na.m paricareyya, khattiyo vaa braahma.na.m  paricareyya, vesso vaa braahma.na.m paricareyya, suddo vaa braahma.na.m  paricareyyaa'ti. ida.m kho, bho gotama, braahma.naa braahma.nassa  paaricariya.m ^a^P2.0178^ea^ pa~n~napenti. tatrida.m, bho gotama,  braahma.naa khattiyassa paaricariya.m pa~n~napenti -- `khattiyo vaa khattiya.m  paricareyya, vesso vaa khattiya.m paricareyya, suddo vaa khattiya.m  paricareyyaa'ti. ida.m kho, bho gotama, braahma.naa khattiyassa  paaricariya.m pa~n~napenti. tatrida.m, bho gotama, braahma.naa vessassa  paaricariya.m pa~n~napenti -- `vesso vaa vessa.m paricareyya, suddo vaa  vessa.m ^a^T2.0611^ea^ paricareyyaa'ti. ida.m kho, bho gotama, braahma.naa vessassa  paaricariya.m pa~n~napenti ^a^M2.0389^ea^. tatrida.m, bho gotama, braahma.naa suddassa  paaricariya.m pa~n~napenti -- `suddova sudda.m paricareyya. ko pana~n~no  sudda.m paricarissatii'ti? ida.m kho, bho gotama, braahma.naa suddassa  paaricariya.m pa~n~napenti. braahma.naa, bho gotama, imaa catasso  paaricariyaa pa~n~napenti. idha bhava.m gotamo kimaahaa''ti?

[03] 437^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m pana, braahma.na, sabbo loko braahma.naana.m  etadabbhanujaanaati -- `imaa catasso paaricariyaa pa~n~napentuu'''ti {pa~n~napentiiti  (sii0 ka0)}?  ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``seyyathaapi, braahma.na, puriso daliddo {da.liddo  (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}  assako anaa.lhiyo. tassa akaamassa bila.m olaggeyyu.m -- `ida.m  te, ambho purisa, ma.msa.m khaaditabba.m, muula~nca anuppadaatabba'nti.  evameva kho, braahma.na, braahma.naa appa.ti~n~naaya tesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m, atha  ca panimaa catasso paaricariyaa pa~n~napenti. naaha.m, braahma.na, `sabba.m  paricaritabba'nti ^a^V2.0396^ea^ vadaami; naaha.m, braahma.na, `sabba.m na paricaritabba'nti  vadaami. ya.m hissa, braahma.na, paricarato paaricariyaahetu paapiyo  assa na seyyo, naaha.m ta.m `paricaritabba'nti vadaami; ya~nca khvaassa,  braahma.na, paricarato paaricariyaahetu seyyo assa na paapiyo tamaha.m  `paricaritabba'nti vadaami. khattiya.m cepi, braahma.na, eva.m puccheyyu.m --  `ya.m vaa te paricarato paaricariyaahetu paapiyo assa na seyyo, ya.m  vaa te paricarato paaricariyaahetu seyyo assa ^a^T2.0612^ea^ na paapiyo; kamettha  paricareyyaasii'ti, khattiyopi hi, braahma.na ^a^P2.0179^ea^, sammaa  byaakaramaano eva.m byaakareyya -- `ya~nhi me paricarato paaricariyaahetu  paapiyo assa na seyyo, naaha.m ta.m paricareyya.m; ya~nca kho me  paricarato paaricariyaahetu seyyo assa na paapiyo tamaha.m  paricareyya'nti. braahma.na.m cepi, braahma.na...pe0... vessa.m cepi,  braahma.na...pe0... sudda.m cepi, braahma.na, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `ya.m vaa te  paricarato paaricariyaahetu paapiyo assa na seyyo, ya.m vaa te  paricarato paaricariyaahetu seyyo assa na paapiyo; kamettha  paricareyyaasii'ti, suddopi hi, braahma.na, sammaa byaakaramaano eva.m  byaakareyya -- `ya~nhi me paricarato paaricariyaahetu paapiyo assa na  seyyo, naaha.m ta.m paricareyya.m; ya~nca kho me paricarato paaricariyaahetu  seyyo assa na paapiyo tamaha.m paricareyya'nti. naaha.m, braahma.na,  `uccaakuliinataa seyya.mso'ti vadaami, na panaaha.m, braahma.na,  `uccaakuliinataa paapiya.mso'ti ^a^M2.0390^ea^ vadaami; naaha.m, braahma.na, `u.laarava.n.nataa  seyya.mso'ti vadaami, na panaaha.m, braahma.na, `u.laarava.n.nataa paapiya.mso'ti  vadaami; naaha.m, braahma.na, `u.laarabhogataa seyya.mso'ti vadaami, na panaaha.m,  braahma.na, `u.laarabhogataa paapiya.mso'ti vadaami.

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ ``uccaakuliinopi hi, braahma.na, idhekacco  paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti,  musaavaadii hoti, pisu.naavaaco hoti, pharusaavaaco hoti,  samphappalaapii hoti, abhijjhaalu hoti ^a^T2.0613^ea^, byaapannacitto hoti,  micchaadi.t.thi hoti. tasmaa `na uccaakuliinataa seyya.mso'ti vadaami.  uccaakuliinopi hi, braahma.na, idhekacco paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato  hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato  hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato  hoti, anabhijjhaalu hoti, abyaapannacitto hoti, sammaadi.t.thi hoti.  tasmaa `na uccaakuliinataa paapiya.mso'ti vadaami.

[03] 439^b^.^eb^ ``u.laarava.n.nopi ^a^V2.0397^ea^ hi, braahma.na...pe0...  u.laarabhogopi hi, braahma.na, idhekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti...pe0...  micchaadi.t.thi hoti. tasmaa ^a^T2.0614^ea^ `na u.laarabhogataa seyya.mso'ti vadaami.  u.laarabhogopi hi, braahma.na, idhekacco paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti...pe0... sammaadi.t.thi hoti. tasmaa `na u.laarabhogataa ^a^P2.0180^ea^  paapiya.mso'ti vadaami. naaha.m, braahma.na, `sabba.m  paricaritabba'nti vadaami, na panaaha.m, braahma.na, `sabba.m na  paricaritabba'nti vadaami. ya.m hissa, braahma.na, paricarato  paaricariyaahetu saddhaa va.d.dhati, siila.m va.d.dhati, suta.m va.d.dhati, caago  va.d.dhati, ^b^pa~n~naa va.d.dhati,^eb^ tamaha.m `paricaritabba'nti (vadaami.  ya.m hissa, braahma.na, paricarato paaricariyaahetu na saddhaa va.d.dhati, na  siila.m va.d.dhati, na suta.m va.d.dhati, na caago va.d.dhati, na pa~n~naa  va.d.dhati, naaha.m ta.m `paricaritabba'nti) {( ) etthantare paa.tho sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0 potthakesu natthi} vadaamii''ti.

[03] 440^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, esukaarii braahma.no bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``braahma.naa, bho gotama, cattaari dhanaani pa~n~napenti --  braahma.nassa sandhana.m pa~n~napenti, khattiyassa sandhana.m pa~n~napenti,  vessassa sandhana.m pa~n~napenti, suddassa ^a^M2.0391^ea^ sandhana.m pa~n~napenti. tatrida.m, bho  gotama, braahma.naa braahma.nassa sandhana.m pa~n~napenti bhikkhaacariya.m;  bhikkhaacariya~nca pana braahma.no sandhana.m atima~n~namaano akiccakaarii  hoti gopova adinna.m aadiyamaanoti. ida.m kho, bho gotama,  braahma.naa braahma.nassa sandhana.m pa~n~napenti. tatrida.m, bho gotama, braahma.naa  khattiyassa sandhana.m pa~n~napenti dhanukalaapa.m; dhanukalaapa~nca ^a^T2.0615^ea^ pana khattiyo  sandhana.m atima~n~namaano akiccakaarii hoti gopova adinna.m  aadiyamaanoti. ida.m kho, bho gotama, braahma.naa khattiyassa sandhana.m  pa~n~napenti. tatrida.m, bho gotama, braahma.naa vessassa sandhana.m pa~n~napenti  kasigorakkha.m; kasigorakkha~nca pana vesso sandhana.m atima~n~namaano  akiccakaarii hoti gopova adinna.m aadiyamaanoti. ida.m kho, bho  gotama, braahma.naa vessassa sandhana.m pa~n~napenti. tatrida.m, bho gotama,  braahma.naa suddassa sandhana.m pa~n~napenti asitabyaabha"ngi.m;  asitabyaabha"ngi~nca pana suddo sandhana.m atima~n~namaano akiccakaarii  hoti gopova adinna.m aadiyamaanoti. ida.m kho, bho gotama,  braahma.naa suddassa sandhana.m pa~n~napenti. braahma.naa, bho gotama, imaani  cattaari dhanaani pa~n~napenti. idha bhava.m gotamo kimaahaa''ti?

[03] 441^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m pana, braahma.na, sabbo loko braahma.naana.m  etadabbhanujaanaati -- `imaani cattaari dhanaani pa~n~napentuu'''ti?  ``no ^a^P2.0181^ea^ hida.m, bho gotama''. ``seyyathaapi,  braahma.na, puriso daliddo ^a^V2.0398^ea^ assako anaa.lhiyo. tassa akaamassa  bila.m olaggeyyu.m -- `ida.m te, ambho purisa, ma.msa.m khaaditabba.m,  muula~nca anuppadaatabba'nti. evameva kho, braahma.na, braahma.naa  appa.ti~n~naaya tesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m, atha ca panimaani cattaari dhanaani  pa~n~napenti. ariya.m kho aha.m, braahma.na, lokuttara.m dhamma.m purisassa  sandhana.m pa~n~napemi. poraa.na.m kho panassa maataapettika.m kulava.msa.m  anussarato yattha yattheva ^a^T2.0616^ea^ attabhaavassa abhinibbatti hoti tena teneva  sa"nkhya.m gacchati. khattiyakule ce attabhaavassa abhinibbatti hoti  `khattiyo'tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; braahma.nakule ce attabhaavassa  abhinibbatti hoti `braahma.no'tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; vessakule ce  attabhaavassa abhinibbatti hoti `vesso'tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati;  suddakule ce attabhaavassa abhinibbatti hoti `suddo'tveva ^a^M2.0392^ea^ sa"nkhya.m  gacchati. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, ya.myadeva paccaya.m pa.ticca aggi jalati  tena teneva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. ka.t.tha~nce pa.ticca aggi jalati  `ka.t.thaggi'tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; sakalika~nce pa.ticca aggi jalati  `sakalikaggi'tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; ti.na~nce pa.ticca aggi jalati  `ti.naggi'tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; gomaya~nce pa.ticca aggi jalati  `gomayaggi'tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati. evameva kho aha.m, braahma.na,  ariya.m lokuttara.m dhamma.m purisassa sandhana.m pa~n~napemi. poraa.na.m kho  panassa maataapettika.m kulava.msa.m anussarato yattha yattheva attabhaavassa  abhinibbatti hoti tena teneva sa"nkhya.m gacchati.

[03] ``khattiyakule ce attabhaavassa abhinibbatti hoti  `khattiyo'tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; braahma.nakule ce attabhaavassa  abhinibbatti hoti `braahma.no'tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati; vessakule ce  attabhaavassa abhinibbatti hoti `vesso'tveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati;  suddakule ce attabhaavassa abhinibbatti hoti `suddo'tveva sa"nkhya.m  gacchati.

[03] ``khattiyakulaa ^a^T2.0617^ea^ cepi, braahma.na, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito  hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma paa.naatipaataa  pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, abrahmacariyaa  pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya vaacaaya  pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapaa  pa.tivirato hoti, anabhijjhaalu hoti, abyaapannacitto hoti,  sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``braahma.nakulaa ^a^V2.0399^ea^ ^a^P2.0182^ea^ cepi, braahma.na, agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m  aagamma paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... sammaadi.t.thi hoti,  aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``vessakulaa cepi, braahma.na, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito  hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma paa.naatipaataa  pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m  dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] ``suddakulaa cepi, braahma.na, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito  hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma paa.naatipaataa  pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... ^a^T2.0618^ea^ sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m  dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] 442^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^M2.0393^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, braahma.nova nu kho  pahoti asmi.m padese avera.m abyaabajjha.m mettacitta.m bhaavetu.m, no khattiyo  no vesso no suddo''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama. khattiyopi  hi, bho gotama, pahoti asmi.m padese avera.m abyaabajjha.m mettacitta.m  bhaavetu.m; braahma.nopi hi, bho gotama... vessopi hi, bho gotama...  suddopi hi, bho gotama... sabbepi hi, bho gotama, cattaaro va.n.naa  pahonti asmi.m padese avera.m abyaabajjha.m mettacitta.m bhaavetu''nti.  ``evameva kho, braahma.na, khattiyakulaa cepi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajito hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma  paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako  hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[01] ``braahma.nakulaa cepi, braahma.na... vessakulaa cepi,  braahma.na... suddakulaa cepi, braahma.na, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito  hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma paa.naatipaataa  pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... ^a^T2.0619^ea^ sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m  dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] 443^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, braahma.nova nu kho  pahoti sottisinaani.m aadaaya nadi.m gantvaa rajojalla.m pavaahetu.m, no  khattiyo no vesso no suddo''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama ^a^V2.0400^ea^.  khattiyopi hi, bho gotama, pahoti sottisinaani.m aadaaya nadi.m  gantvaa rajojalla.m pavaahetu.m; braahma.nopi hi, bho gotama... vessopi hi,  bho gotama ^a^P2.0183^ea^... suddopi hi, bho gotama... sabbepi  hi, bho gotama, cattaaro va.n.naa pahonti sottisinaani.m aadaaya nadi.m  gantvaa rajojalla.m pavaahetu''nti. ``evameva kho, braahma.na,  khattiyakulaa cepi agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca  tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti...pe0... sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m  kusala.m.

[03] ``braahma.nakulaa cepi, braahma.na... vessakulaa cepi, braahma.na...  suddakulaa cepi ^a^T2.0620^ea^, braahma.na, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so  ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato  hoti...pe0... sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.

[03] 444^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^M2.0394^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, idha raajaa  khattiyo muddhaavasitto naanaajaccaana.m purisaana.m purisasata.m sannipaateyya  -- `aayantu bhonto ye tattha khattiyakulaa braahma.nakulaa raaja~n~nakulaa  uppannaa saakassa vaa saalassa vaa sala.lassa vaa candanassa vaa  padumakassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi.m abhinibbattentu, tejo  paatukarontu; aayantu pana bhonto ye tattha ca.n.daalakulaa nesaadakulaa  venakulaa rathakaarakulaa pukkusakulaa uppannaa saapaanado.niyaa vaa  suukarado.niyaa vaa rajakado.niyaa vaa era.n.daka.t.thassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m  aadaaya aggi.m abhinibbattentu, tejo paatukarontuu'''ti?

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, braahma.na, yo eva.m nu kho so khattiyakulaa  braahma.nakulaa raaja~n~nakulaa uppannehi saakassa vaa saalassa vaa  sala.lassa vaa candanassa vaa padumakassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi  abhinibbatto tejo paatukato so eva nu khvaassa aggi accimaa ceva  va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro ca tena ca sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m ^a^T2.0621^ea^ kaatu.m;  yo pana so ca.n.daalakulaa nesaadakulaa venakulaa rathakaarakulaa  pukkusakulaa uppannehi saapaanado.niyaa vaa suukarado.niyaa vaa  rajakado.niyaa vaa era.n.daka.t.thassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi  abhinibbatto tejo paatukato svaassa aggi na ceva accimaa na ca  va.n.navaa na ca ^a^V2.0401^ea^ pabhassaro na ca tena sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m  kaatu''nti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama. yopi hi so, bho gotama,  khattiyakulaa braahma.nakulaa raaja~n~nakulaa uppannehi saakassa vaa saalassa  ^a^P2.0184^ea^ vaa sala.lassa vaa candanassa vaa padumakassa vaa  uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi abhinibbatto tejo paatukato svaassa aggi  accimaa ceva va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro ca tena ca sakkaa agginaa  aggikara.niiya.m kaatu.m; yopi so ca.n.daalakulaa nesaadakulaa venakulaa  rathakaarakulaa pukkusakulaa uppannehi saapaanado.niyaa vaa suukarado.niyaa  vaa rajakado.niyaa vaa era.n.daka.t.thassa vaa uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya aggi  abhinibbatto tejo paatukato svaassa aggi accimaa ceva va.n.navaa ca  pabhassaro ca tena ca sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m kaatu.m. sabbopi  hi, bho gotama, aggi accimaa ceva va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro ca  sabbenapi sakkaa agginaa aggikara.niiya.m kaatu''nti.

[01] ``evameva ^a^M2.0395^ea^ kho, braahma.na, khattiyakulaa cepi agaarasmaa  anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m  aagamma ^a^T2.0622^ea^ paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... sammaadi.t.thi hoti,  aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m. braahma.nakulaa cepi, braahma.na...  vessakulaa cepi, braahma.na... suddakulaa cepi, braahma.na, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m  pabbajito hoti, so ca tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma  paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti,  abrahmacariyaa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti, pisu.naaya  vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti,  samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, anabhijjhaalu hoti, abyaapannacitto  hoti, sammaadi.t.thi hoti, aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti.

[01] eva.m vutte, esukaarii braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m  bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] esukaariisutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 445^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0623^ea^ ^a^V2.0402^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe  viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa  saariputto dakkhi.naagirismi.m caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena  saddhi.m. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu ^a^P2.0185^ea^ raajagahe  vassa.mvu.t.tho {vassa.mvuttho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yena dakkhi.naagiri yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m  katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m  kho ta.m bhikkhu.m aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca -- ``kaccaavuso,  bhagavaa arogo ca balavaa caa''ti? ``arogo caavuso, bhagavaa  balavaa caa''ti. ``kacci panaavuso, bhikkhusa"ngho arogo ca  balavaa caa''ti? ``bhikkhusa"nghopi kho, aavuso, arogo ca  balavaa caa''ti. ``ettha, aavuso, ta.n.dulapaalidvaaraaya dhana~njaani {dhaana~njaani  (sii0 pii0)}  naama braahma.no atthi. kaccaavuso ^a^M2.0396^ea^, dhana~njaani braahma.no arogo ca  balavaa caa''ti? ``dhana~njaanipi kho, aavuso, braahma.no arogo ca  balavaa caa''ti. ``kacci panaavuso, dhana~njaani braahma.no  appamatto''ti? ``kuto panaavuso, dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa  appamaado? dhana~njaani, aavuso, braahma.no raajaana.m nissaaya  braahma.nagahapatike vilumpati, braahma.nagahapatike nissaaya raajaana.m  vilumpati ^a^T2.0624^ea^. yaapissa bhariyaa saddhaa saddhakulaa aaniitaa saapi  kaala"nkataa; a~n~naassa bhariyaa assaddhaa assaddhakulaa aaniitaa''.  ``dussuta.m vataavuso, assumha, dussuta.m vataavuso, assumha; ye maya.m  dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m pamatta.m assumha. appeva ca naama maya.m kadaaci  karahaci dhana~njaaninaa braahma.nena saddhi.m samaagaccheyyaama, appeva naama  siyaa kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti?

[03] 446^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto  dakkhi.naagirismi.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena raajagaha.m tena caarika.m  pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena raajagaha.m tadavasari.  tatra suda.m aayasmaa saariputto raajagahe viharati ve.luvane  kalandakanivaape. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto pubba.nhasamaya.m  nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi ^a^P2.0186^ea^.  tena kho pana samayena dhana~njaani braahma.no bahinagare  gaavo go.t.the duhaapeti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto ^a^V2.0403^ea^ raajagahe pi.n.daaya  caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto yena dhana~njaani braahma.no  tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho dhana~njaani braahma.no aayasmanta.m saariputta.m  duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``ito, bho  saariputta, payo, piiyata.m taava bhattassa kaalo bhavissatii''ti.  ``ala.m, braahma.na. kata.m me ajja bhattakicca.m. amukasmi.m me  rukkhamuule divaavihaaro bhavissati. tattha aagaccheyyaasii''ti.  ``eva.m, bho''ti kho dhana~njaani ^a^T2.0625^ea^ braahma.no aayasmato saariputtassa  paccassosi. atha kho dhana~njaani braahma.no pacchaabhatta.m bhuttapaataraaso  yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa  saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho dhana~njaani.m  braahma.na.m aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca -- ``kaccaasi, dhana~njaani,  appamatto''ti? ``kuto, bho saariputta, amhaaka.m appamaado yesa.m no  maataapitaro ^a^M2.0397^ea^ posetabbaa, puttadaaro posetabbo, daasakammakaraa posetabbaa,  mittaamaccaana.m mittaamaccakara.niiya.m kaatabba.m, ~naatisaalohitaana.m  ~naatisaalohitakara.niiya.m kaatabba.m, atithiina.m atithikara.niiya.m kaatabba.m,  pubbapetaana.m pubbapetakara.niiya.m kaatabba.m, devataana.m devataakara.niiya.m kaatabba.m,  ra~n~no raajakara.niiya.m kaatabba.m, ayampi kaayo pii.netabbo bruuhetabbo''ti?

[03] 447^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, idhekacco  maataapituuna.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, tamena.m  adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahetu niraya.m nirayapaalaa upaka.d.dheyyu.m.  labheyya nu kho so `aha.m kho maataapituuna.m hetu adhammacaarii  visamacaarii ahosi.m, maa ma.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'ti ^a^P2.0187^ea^,  maataapitaro vaa panassa labheyyu.m `eso kho amhaaka.m hetu  adhammacaarii visamacaarii ahosi, maa na.m niraya.m nirayapaalaa'''ti?  ``no hida.m, bho saariputta. atha kho na.m vikkandanta.myeva niraye ^a^T2.0626^ea^  nirayapaalaa pakkhipeyyu.m''.

[03] 448^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^V2.0406^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa  maataapituuna.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa maataapituuna.m  hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho  saariputta, maataapituuna.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m  seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, maataapituuna.m hetu dhammacaarii  samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho  saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho,  dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa ^a^M2.0400^ea^ kammantaa, yehi sakkaa maataapitaro  ceva posetu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^T2.0630^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa puttadaarassa hetu  adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa puttadaarassa hetu dhammacaarii  samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo ^a^P2.0189^ea^ hi,  bho saariputta, puttadaarassa hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m  seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta, puttadaarassa hetu dhammacaarii  samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho  saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho,  dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa yehi sakkaa puttadaara~nceva  posetu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M2.0401^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa ~naatisaalohitaana.m hetu  adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa ~naatisaalohitaana.m hetu  dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo ^a^P2.0190^ea^  hi, bho saariputta, ~naatisaalohitaana.m hetu adhammacaarii  visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta,  ~naatisaalohitaana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo.  adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa  seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa  kammantaa, yehi sakkaa ~naatisaalohitaana~nceva ~naatisaalohitakara.niiya.m  kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa atithiina.m hetu  adhammacaarii ^a^T2.0632^ea^ visamacaarii assa, yo vaa atithiina.m hetu dhammacaarii  samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta,  atithiina.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca  kho, bho saariputta, atithiina.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa,  tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta,  dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani,  a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa, yehi sakkaa atithiina~nceva  atithikara.niiya.m kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m  pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa pubbapetaana.m hetu  adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa pubbapetaana.m hetu dhammacaarii  samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta,  pubbapetaana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca  kho, bho saariputta, pubbapetaana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa,  tadevettha seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi ^a^V2.0408^ea^, bho saariputta,  dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani,  a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa, yehi sakkaa pubbapetaana~nceva  pubbapetakara.niiya.m kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m  pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa devataana.m hetu  adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa devataana.m hetu dhammacaarii  samacaarii ^a^T2.0633^ea^ assa; katama.m ^a^M2.0402^ea^ seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta,  devataana.m hetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca  kho, bho saariputta, devataana.m hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha  seyyo ^a^P2.0191^ea^. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho  saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho,  dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa, yehi sakkaa  devataana~nceva devataakara.niiya.m kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca  pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa ra~n~no hetu adhammacaarii  visamacaarii assa, yo vaa ra~n~no hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa;  katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo hi, bho saariputta, ra~n~no hetu  adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho  saariputta, ra~n~no hetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha seyyo.  adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta, dhammacariyaasamacariyaa  seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani, a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa  kammantaa, yehi sakkaa ra~n~no ceva raajakara.niiya.m kaatu.m, na ca paapakamma.m  kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu.m.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, yo vaa kaayassa pii.nanaahetu  bruuhanaahetu adhammacaarii visamacaarii assa, yo vaa kaayassa pii.nanaahetu  bruuhanaahetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa; katama.m seyyo''ti? ``yo  hi, bho saariputta, kaayassa pii.nanaahetu bruuhanaahetu adhammacaarii  visamacaarii ^a^T2.0634^ea^ assa, na ta.m seyyo; yo ca kho, bho saariputta,  kaayassa pii.nanaahetu bruuhanaahetu dhammacaarii samacaarii assa, tadevettha  seyyo. adhammacariyaavisamacariyaahi, bho saariputta,  dhammacariyaasamacariyaa seyyo''ti. ``atthi kho, dhana~njaani,  a~n~nesa.m hetukaa dhammikaa kammantaa ^a^V2.0409^ea^, yehi sakkaa kaaya~nceva pii.netu.m  bruuhetu.m, na ca paapakamma.m kaatu.m, pu~n~na~nca pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitu''nti.

[03] 449^b^.^eb^ atha kho dhana~njaani braahma.no aayasmato  saariputtassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.  atha kho dhana~njaani braahma.no aparena samayena aabaadhiko ahosi  dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho dhana~njaani braahma.no a~n~natara.m  purisa.m aamantesi ^a^M2.0403^ea^ -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa ^a^P2.0192^ea^,  yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade  sirasaa vandaahi -- `dhana~njaani, bhante, braahma.no aabaadhiko dukkhito  baa.lhagilaano. so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. yena  caayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena  aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa vandaahi -- `dhana~njaani, bhante,  braahma.no aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato  saariputtassa paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `saadhu  kira, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto yena dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa  nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. ``eva.m ^a^T2.0635^ea^, bhante''ti  kho so puriso dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.  ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso bhagavanta.m etadavoca --  ``dhana~njaani, bhante, braahma.no aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano.  so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii''ti. yena caayasmaa saariputto  tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m abhivaadetvaa  ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso aayasmanta.m  saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``dhana~njaani, bhante, braahma.no aabaadhiko  dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. so aayasmato saariputtassa paade sirasaa  vandati, eva~nca vadeti -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa saariputto  yena dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m  upaadaayaa'''ti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa saariputto tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 450^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto nivaasetvaa  pattaciivaramaadaaya yena dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho aayasmaa  saariputto dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, dhana~njaani,  khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m? kacci dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti, no  abhikkamanti? pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati ^a^V2.0410^ea^, no abhikkamo''ti? ``na  me, bho saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa  abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti. abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no  pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bho saariputta ^a^P2.0193^ea^, balavaa  puriso ti.nhena sikharena muddhani {muddhaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} abhimattheyya;   evameva kho ^a^M2.0404^ea^, bho  saariputta, adhimattaa vaataa muddhani ca uuhananti. na me, bho  saariputta, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me ^a^T2.0636^ea^ dukkhaa vedanaa  abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti. abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no  pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bho saariputta, balavaa puriso da.lhena  varattakkha.n.dena {varattabandhanena (sii0 pii0)} siise siisave.tha.m dadeyya; evameva kho, bho saariputta,  adhimattaa siise siisavedanaa. na me, bho saariputta, khamaniiya.m na  yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamanti.  abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, bho  saariputta, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa ti.nhena  govikantanena kucchi.m parikanteyya; evameva kho, bho saariputta,  adhimattaa vaataa kucchi.m parikantanti. na me, bho saariputta,  khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no  pa.tikkamanti. abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati, no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi,  bho saariputta, dve balavanto purisaa dubbalatara.m purisa.m naanaabaahaasu  gahetvaa a"ngaarakaasuyaa santaapeyyu.m samparitaapeyyu.m; evameva kho, bho  saariputta, adhimatto kaayasmi.m .daaho. na me, bho saariputta,  khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m. baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no  pa.tikkamanti. abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati ^a^T2.0637^ea^, no pa.tikkamo''ti.

[03] 451^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo  -- nirayo vaa tiracchaanayoni vaa''ti? ``nirayaa, bho saariputta,  tiracchaanayoni seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m  seyyo -- tiracchaanayoni vaa pettivisayo vaa''ti?  ``tiracchaanayoniyaa, bho saariputta, pettivisayo seyyo''ti. ``ta.m  ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- pettivisayo vaa manussaa  vaa''ti? ``pettivisayaa, bho saariputta, manussaa seyyo''ti.  ``ta.m ^a^P2.0194^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani ^a^V2.0411^ea^, katama.m seyyo --  manussaa vaa caatumahaaraajikaa {caatummahaaraajikaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa   devaa''ti? ``manussehi ^a^M2.0405^ea^, bho  saariputta, caatumahaaraajikaa devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi,  dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- caatumahaaraajikaa vaa devaa taavati.msaa vaa  devaa''ti? ``caatumahaaraajikehi, bho saariputta, devehi taavati.msaa  devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo --  taavati.msaa vaa devaa yaamaa vaa devaa''ti? ``taavati.msehi, bho  saariputta, devehi yaamaa devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi,  dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- yaamaa vaa devaa tusitaa vaa devaa''ti?  ``yaamehi, bho saariputta, devehi tusitaa devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m  ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo -- tusitaa vaa devaa  nimmaanaratii vaa devaa''ti? ``tusitehi, bho saariputta, devehi  nimmaanaratii devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, dhana~njaani,  katama.m seyyo -- nimmaanaratii vaa devaa paranimmitavasavattii vaa  devaa''ti? ``nimmaanaratiihi ^a^T2.0638^ea^, bho saariputta, devehi  paranimmitavasavattii devaa seyyo''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi,  dhana~njaani, katama.m seyyo paranimmitavasavattii vaa devaa brahmaloko  vaa''ti? ```brahmaloko'ti {bhava.m saariputto aahaati, katama.m saariputto aaha  brahmalokoti. (ka0)} -- bhava.m saariputto aaha; `brahmaloko'ti  -- bhava.m saariputto aahaa''ti {bhava.m saariputto aahaati, katama.m saariputto aaha  brahmalokoti. (ka0)}.

[03] atha kho aayasmato saariputtassa etadahosi -- ``ime kho  braahma.naa brahmalokaadhimuttaa. ya.mnuunaaha.m dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa brahmaana.m  sahabyataaya magga.m deseyya''nti. ``brahmaana.m te, dhana~njaani,  sahabyataaya magga.m desessaami; ta.m su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi,  bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho dhana~njaani braahma.no  aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosi. aayasmaa ^a^P2.0195^ea^  saariputto etadavoca -- ``katamo ca, dhana~njaani, brahmaana.m sahabyataaya  maggo? idha, dhana~njaani, bhikkhu mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m  pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti  uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena  cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa  viharati. aya.m kho, dhana~njaani, brahmaana.m sahabyataaya maggo''.

[03] 452^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, dhana~njaani, bhikkhu  karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...  upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m,  tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi  sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m ^a^T2.0639^ea^ upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena  mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. aya.m  kho, dhana~njaani, brahmaana.m sahabyataaya maggo''ti. tena hi, bho  saariputta, mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandaahi --  `dhana~njaani ^a^M2.0406^ea^, bhante, braahma.no aabaadhiko ^a^V2.0412^ea^ dukkhito baa.lhagilaano.  so bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto  dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m sati uttarikara.niiye hiine brahmaloke pati.t.thaapetvaa  u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho dhana~njaani braahma.no acirapakkante  aayasmante saariputte kaalamakaasi, brahmaloka~nca upapajji.

[03] 453^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --  ``eso, bhikkhave, saariputto dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m sati uttarikara.niiye  hiine brahmaloke pati.t.thaapetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto''ti. atha kho  aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa  saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``dhana~njaani, bhante, braahma.no  aabaadhiko dukkhito baa.lhagilaano, so bhagavato paade sirasaa  vandatii''ti. ``ki.m pana tva.m saariputta dhana~njaani.m braahma.na.m sati  ^a^P2.0196^ea^ uttarikara.niiye hiine brahmaloke pati.t.thaapetvaa  u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto''ti? ``mayha.m kho, bhante, eva.m ahosi -- `ime  kho braahma.naa brahmalokaadhimuttaa, ya.mnuunaaha.m dhana~njaanissa braahma.nassa ^a^T2.0640^ea^  brahmaana.m sahabyataaya magga.m deseyya'nti. ``kaala"nkatoca {kaala"nkatova (syaa0 ka.m0  ka0)}, saariputta,  dhana~njaani braahma.no, brahmaloka~nca upapanno''ti.
[06] dhana~njaanisutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 454^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0641^ea^ ^a^V2.0413^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa  icchaana"ngale {icchaana"nkale (sii0 pii0)} viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. tena kho pana samayena  sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa braahma.namahaasaalaa icchaana"ngale  pa.tivasanti, seyyathida.m -- ca"nkii braahma.no, taarukkho braahma.no,  pokkharasaati braahma.no, jaa.nusso.ni {jaa.nusso.nii (pii0), jaa.nuso.nii (ka0)} braahma.no,   todeyyo braahma.no, a~n~ne  ca abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa braahma.namahaasaalaa. atha kho  vaase.t.thabhaaradvaajaana.m maa.navaana.m ja"nghaavihaara.m anuca"nkamantaana.m  anuvicarantaana.m {anuca"nkamamaanaana.m anuvicaramaanaana.m (sii0 pii0)} ayamantaraakathaa   ^a^M2.0407^ea^ udapaadi -- ``katha.m, bho, braahma.no  hotii''ti? bhaaradvaajo maa.navo evamaaha -- ``yato kho, bho,  ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa  pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena -- ettaavataa kho, bho,  braahma.no hotii''ti. vaase.t.tho maa.navo evamaaha -- ``yato kho, bho,  siilavaa ca hoti vattasampanno {vatasampanno (pii0)} ca -- ettaavataa kho, bho, braahma.no  hotii''ti. neva kho asakkhi bhaaradvaajo maa.navo vaase.t.tha.m maa.nava.m  sa~n~naapetu.m, na pana asakkhi vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhaaradvaaja.m maa.nava.m  sa~n~naapetu.m. atha kho vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhaaradvaaja.m maa.nava.m aamantesi --  ``aya.m kho, bho bhaaradvaaja, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa ^a^T2.0642^ea^  pabbajito icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. ta.m kho pana  bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so  bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu  anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti.  aayaama, bho bhaaradvaaja, yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkamissaama;  upasa"nkamitvaa sama.na.m gotama.m etamattha.m pucchissaama. yathaa no sama.no  gotamo byaakarissati tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti  kho bhaaradvaajo maa.navo vaase.t.thassa maa.navassa paccassosi.
