[03] 462^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V2.0421^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena  subho maa.navo todeyyaputto saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati a~n~natarassa  gahapatissa nivesane kenacideva kara.niiyena. atha kho subho maa.navo  todeyyaputto yassa gahapatissa nivesane pa.tivasati ta.m gahapati.m  etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, gahapati -- `avivittaa saavatthii  arahantehii'ti. ka.m nu khvajja sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa  payirupaaseyyaamaa''ti? ``aya.m, bhante, bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati  jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. ta.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m  payirupaasassuu''ti. atha ^a^P2.0197^ea^ kho subho maa.navo  todeyyaputto tassa gahapatissa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m  viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho subho  maa.navo todeyyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``braahma.naa, bho gotama,  evamaaha.msu -- `gaha.t.tho aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m, na  pabbajito aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala'nti. idha bhava.m  gotamo kimaahaa''ti?

[03] 463^b^.^eb^ ``vibhajjavaado kho ahamettha, maa.nava;  naahamettha eka.msavaado. gihissa vaaha.m, maa.nava, pabbajitassa vaa  micchaapa.tipatti.m na va.n.nemi. gihii vaa ^a^M2.0414^ea^ hi *2.0651, maa.nava, pabbajito vaa  micchaapa.tipanno micchaapa.tipattaadhikara.nahetu na aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m  dhamma.m kusala.m. gihissa vaaha.m, maa.nava, pabbajitassa vaa  sammaapa.tipatti.m va.n.nemi. gihii vaa hi, maa.nava, pabbajito vaa  sammaapa.tipanno sammaapa.tipattaadhikara.nahetu aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m  kusala''nti.

[03] ``braahma.naa, bho gotama, evamaaha.msu -- `maha.t.thamida.m mahaakicca.m  mahaadhikara.na.m mahaasamaarambha.m gharaavaasakamma.t.thaana.m mahapphala.m hoti;  appa.t.thamida.m appakicca.m appaadhikara.na.m appasamaarambha.m pabbajjaa kamma.t.thaana.m  appaphala.m hotii'ti. idha bhava.m gotamo kimaahaa''ti.

[03] ``etthaapi ^a^V2.0422^ea^ kho aha.m, maa.nava, vibhajjavaado; naahamettha  eka.msavaado. atthi, maa.nava, kamma.t.thaana.m maha.t.tha.m mahaakicca.m mahaadhikara.na.m  mahaasamaarambha.m vipajjamaana.m appaphala.m hoti; atthi, maa.nava, kamma.t.thaana.m  maha.t.tha.m mahaakicca.m mahaadhikara.na.m mahaasamaarambha.m sampajjamaana.m mahapphala.m  hoti; atthi, maa.nava, kamma.t.thaana.m appa.t.tha.m appakicca.m appaadhikara.na.m  appasamaarambha.m vipajjamaana.m appaphala.m hoti; atthi, maa.nava, kamma.t.thaana.m  appa.t.tha.m appakicca.m appaadhikara.na.m appasamaarambha.m sampajjamaana.m mahapphala.m  hoti. katama~nca, maa.nava ^a^P2.0198^ea^, kamma.t.thaana.m maha.t.tha.m  mahaakicca.m mahaadhikara.na.m mahaasamaarambha.m vipajjamaana.m appaphala.m ^a^T2.0652^ea^ hoti?  kasi kho, maa.nava, kamma.t.thaana.m maha.t.tha.m mahaakicca.m mahaadhikara.na.m  mahaasamaarambha.m vipajjamaana.m appaphala.m hoti. katama~nca, maa.nava,  kamma.t.thaana.m maha.t.tha.m mahaakicca.m mahaadhikara.na.m mahaasamaarambha.m sampajjamaana.m  mahapphala.m hoti? kasiyeva kho, maa.nava, kamma.t.thaana.m maha.t.tha.m mahaakicca.m  mahaadhikara.na.m mahaasamaarambha.m sampajjamaana.m mahapphala.m hoti. katama~nca,  maa.nava, kamma.t.thaana.m appa.t.tha.m appakicca.m appaadhikara.na.m appasamaarambha.m  vipajjamaana.m appaphala.m hoti? va.nijjaa kho, maa.nava, kamma.t.thaana.m appa.t.tha.m  appakicca.m appaadhikara.na.m appasamaarambha.m vipajjamaana.m appaphala.m hoti.  katama~nca maa.nava, kamma.t.thaana.m appa.t.tha.m appakicca.m appaadhikara.na.m  appasamaarambha.m sampajjamaana.m mahapphala.m hoti? va.nijjaayeva kho,  maa.nava, kamma.t.thaana.m appa.t.tha.m appakicca.m appaadhikara.na.m appasamaarambha.m  sampajjamaana.m mahapphala.m hoti.

[03] 464^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, kasi kamma.t.thaana.m maha.t.tha.m  mahaakicca.m mahaadhikara.na.m mahaasamaarambha.m vipajjamaana.m appaphala.m hoti;  evameva kho, maa.nava, gharaavaasakamma.t.thaana.m maha.t.tha.m mahaakicca.m mahaadhikara.na.m  mahaasamaarambha.m vipajjamaana.m ^a^M2.0415^ea^ appaphala.m hoti. seyyathaapi, maa.nava,  kasiyeva kamma.t.thaana.m maha.t.tha.m mahaakicca.m mahaadhikara.na.m mahaasamaarambha.m  sampajjamaana.m mahapphala.m hoti; evameva kho, maa.nava, gharaavaasakamma.t.thaana.m  maha.t.tha.m mahaakicca.m mahaadhikara.na.m mahaasamaarambha.m sampajjamaana.m mahapphala.m  hoti. seyyathaapi, maa.nava, va.nijjaa kamma.t.thaana.m appa.t.tha.m appakicca.m  appaadhikara.na.m appasamaarambha.m vipajjamaana.m appaphala.m hoti; evameva ^a^T2.0653^ea^ kho,  maa.nava, pabbajjaa kamma.t.thaana.m appa.t.tha.m appakicca.m appaadhikara.na.m  appasamaarambha.m vipajjamaana.m appaphala.m hoti. seyyathaapi, maa.nava,  va.nijjaayeva kamma.t.thaana.m appa.t.tha.m appakicca.m appaadhikara.na.m appasamaarambha.m  sampajjamaana.m mahapphala.m hoti; evameva kho ^a^P2.0199^ea^, maa.nava,  pabbajjaa kamma.t.thaana.m appa.t.tha.m appakicca.m appaadhikara.na.m appasamaarambha.m  sampajjamaana.m mahapphala.m hotii''ti.

[03] ``braahma.naa ^a^V2.0423^ea^, bho gotama, pa~nca dhamme pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa  kiriyaaya, kusalassa aaraadhanaayaa''ti. ``ye te, maa.nava, braahma.naa  pa~nca dhamme pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya, kusalassa aaraadhanaaya --  sace te agaru -- saadhu te pa~nca dhamme imasmi.m parisati bhaasassuu''ti.  ``na kho me, bho gotama, garu yatthassu bhavanto vaa nisinno  bhavantaruupo vaa''ti {nisinnaa bhavantaruupaa vaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ``tena hi, maa.nava, bhaasassuu''ti. ``sacca.m  kho, bho gotama, braahma.naa pa.thama.m dhamma.m pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya,  kusalassa aaraadhanaaya. tapa.m kho, bho gotama, braahma.naa dutiya.m dhamma.m  pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya, kusalassa aaraadhanaaya. brahmacariya.m  kho, bho gotama, braahma.naa tatiya.m dhamma.m pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa  kiriyaaya, kusalassa aaraadhanaaya. ajjhena.m kho, bho gotama,  braahma.naa catuttha.m dhamma.m pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya, kusalassa  aaraadhanaaya. caaga.m kho, bho gotama, braahma.naa ^a^T2.0654^ea^ pa~ncama.m dhamma.m  pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya, kusalassa aaraadhanaaya. braahma.naa, bho  gotama, ime pa~nca dhamme pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya, kusalassa  aaraadhanaayaati. idha bhava.m gotamo kimaahaa''ti?

[03] 465^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m pana, maa.nava, atthi koci braahma.naana.m  ekabraahma.nopi yo evamaaha -- `aha.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m dhammaana.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa vipaaka.m pavedemii'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho  gotama''. ``ki.m pana, maa.nava, atthi koci braahma.naana.m  ekaacariyopi ekaacariyapaacariyopi yaava sattamaa aacariyamahayugaapi  yo evamaaha -- `aha.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m dhammaana.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa ^a^M2.0416^ea^ vipaaka.m pavedemii'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.  ``ki.m ^a^P2.0200^ea^ pana, maa.nava, yepi te braahma.naana.m pubbakaa  isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro yesamida.m etarahi braahma.naa  poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m tadanugaayanti tadanubhaasanti  bhaasitamanubhaasanti vaacitamanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako vaamako  vaamadevo vessaamitto yamataggi a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo  bhagu, tepi evamaaha.msu -- `maya.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m dhammaana.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa vipaaka.m pavedemaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``iti kira, maa.nava, natthi koci braahma.naana.m ekabraahma.nopi  yo evamaaha -- `aha.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m dhammaana.m saya.m abhi~n~naa ^a^T2.0655^ea^  sacchikatvaa vipaaka.m pavedemii'ti; natthi koci braahma.naana.m  ekaacariyopi ekaacariyapaacariyopi yaava sattamaa aacariyamahayugaapi  yo evamaaha ^a^V2.0424^ea^ -- `aha.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m dhammaana.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa vipaaka.m pavedemii'ti; yepi te braahma.naana.m pubbakaa isayo  mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro, yesamida.m etarahi braahma.naa poraa.na.m  mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m, tadanugaayanti tadanubhaasanti  bhaasitamanubhaasanti vaacitamanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako vaamako  vaamadevo vessaamitto yamataggi a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo  bhagu. tepi na evamaaha.msu -- `maya.m imesa.m pa~ncanna.m dhammaana.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa vipaaka.m pavedemaa'ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, andhave.ni paramparaasa.msattaa purimopi na  passati majjhimopi na passati pacchimopi na passati; evameva  kho, maa.nava, andhave.nuupama.m ma~n~ne braahma.naana.m bhaasita.m sampajjati --  purimopi na passati majjhimopi na passati pacchimopi na  passatii''ti.

[03] 466^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhagavataa  andhave.nuupamena vuccamaano kupito anattamano bhagavanta.myeva khu.msento  bhagavanta.myeva vambhento bhagavanta.myeva vadamaano -- `sama.no gotamo  paapito bhavissatii'ti bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``braahma.no, bho gotama,  pokkharasaati opama~n~no subhagavaniko evamaaha -- `evameva ^a^M2.0417^ea^   panidhekacce {panimeke (sabbattha)} sama.nabraahma.naa uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m ^a^T2.0656^ea^ pa.tijaananti. tesamida.m bhaasita.m ^a^P2.0201^ea^  hassaka.myeva sampajjati, naamaka.myeva sampajjati, rittaka.myeva  sampajjati, tucchaka.myeva sampajjati. katha~nhi naama manussabhuuto  uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m ~nassati vaa dakkhati  vaa sacchi vaa karissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'''ti?

[03] ``ki.m pana, maa.nava, braahma.no pokkharasaati opama~n~no  subhagavaniko sabbesa.myeva sama.nabraahma.naana.m cetasaa ceto paricca  pajaanaatii''ti? ``sakaayapi hi, bho gotama, pu.n.nikaaya daasiyaa  braahma.no pokkharasaati opama~n~no subhagavaniko cetasaa ceto paricca  na pajaanaati, kuto pana sabbesa.myeva sama.nabraahma.naana.m cetasaa ceto  paricca pajaanissatii''ti?

[03] ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, jaccandho puriso na passeyya  ka.nhasukkaani ruupaani, na passeyya niilakaani ^a^V2.0425^ea^ ruupaani, na passeyya  piitakaani ruupaani, na passeyya lohitakaani ruupaani, na passeyya  ma~nji.t.thakaani ruupaani, na passeyya samavisama.m, na passeyya  taarakaruupaani, na passeyya candimasuuriye. so eva.m vadeyya --  `natthi ka.nhasukkaani ruupaani, natthi ka.nhasukkaana.m ruupaana.m dassaavii;  natthi niilakaani ruupaani, natthi niilakaana.m ruupaana.m dassaavii; natthi  piitakaani ruupaani, natthi piitakaana.m ruupaana.m dassaavii; natthi  lohitakaani ruupaani, natthi lohitakaana.m ruupaana.m dassaavii; natthi  ma~nji.t.thakaani ruupaani, natthi ma~nji.t.thakaana.m ruupaana.m dassaavii; natthi  samavisama.m, natthi samavisamassa ^a^T2.0657^ea^ dassaavii; natthi taarakaruupaani,  natthi taarakaruupaana.m dassaavii; natthi candimasuuriyaa, natthi  candimasuuriyaana.m dassaavii. ahameta.m na jaanaami, ahameta.m na  passaami; tasmaa ta.m natthii'ti. sammaa nu kho so, maa.nava,  vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti?

[03] ``no hida.m, bho gotama. atthi ka.nhasukkaani ruupaani, atthi  ka.nhasukkaana.m ruupaana.m dassaavii; atthi niilakaani ruupaani, atthi  niilakaana.m ruupaana.m dassaavii; atthi piitakaani ruupaani, atthi  piitakaana.m ruupaana.m dassaavii; atthi lohitakaani ruupaani, atthi  lohitakaana.m ruupaana.m dassaavii; atthi ma~nji.t.thakaani ruupaani, atthi  ma~nji.t.thakaana.m ruupaana.m dassaavii; atthi samavisama.m, atthi samavisamassa  dassaavii; atthi taarakaruupaani, atthi taarakaruupaana.m dassaavii ^a^M2.0418^ea^; atthi  candimasuuriyaa, atthi candimasuuriyaana.m dassaavii. `ahameta.m na  ^a^P2.0202^ea^ jaanaami, ahameta.m na passaami; tasmaa ta.m  natthii'ti; na hi so, bho gotama, sammaa vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti.

[03] ``evameva kho, maa.nava, braahma.no pokkharasaati opama~n~no  subhagavaniko andho acakkhuko. so vata uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa sacchi vaa  karissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati''.

[03] 467^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maa.nava, ye te kosalakaa  braahma.namahaasaalaa, seyyathida.m -- ca"nkii braahma.no taarukkho braahma.no  pokkharasaati braahma.no jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no pitaa ca {vaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} te todeyyo,  katamaa nesa.m seyyo {seyyaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, ya.m vaa te sammuccaa ^a^T2.0658^ea^   {sammusaa (sii0 pii0)} vaaca.m bhaaseyyu.m ya.m vaa  asammuccaa''ti? ``sammuccaa, bho gotama''.
[03] ``katamaa ^a^V2.0426^ea^ nesa.m seyyo, ya.m vaa te mantaa vaaca.m bhaaseyyu.m ya.m vaa  amantaa''ti? ``mantaa, bho gotama''.
[03] ``katamaa nesa.m seyyo, ya.m vaa te pa.tisa"nkhaaya vaaca.m bhaaseyyu.m  ya.m vaa appa.tisa"nkhaayaa''ti? ``pa.tisa"nkhaaya, bho gotama''.
[03] ``katamaa nesa.m seyyo, ya.m vaa te atthasa.mhita.m vaaca.m bhaaseyyu.m ya.m  vaa anatthasa.mhita''nti? ``atthasa.mhita.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maa.nava, yadi eva.m sante, braahma.nena  pokkharasaatinaa opama~n~nena subhagavanikena sammuccaa vaacaa bhaasitaa  asammuccaa''ti {asammusaa vaati (pii0) evamitarapa~nhattayepi vaasaddena saha  dissati}? ``asammuccaa, bho gotama''.
[03] ``mantaa vaacaa bhaasitaa amantaa vaa''ti? ``amantaa, bho  gotama''.
[03] ``pa.tisa"nkhaaya vaacaa bhaasitaa appa.tisa"nkhaayaa''ti?  ``appa.tisa"nkhaaya, bho gotama''.
[03] ``atthasa.mhitaa vaacaa bhaasitaa anatthasa.mhitaa''ti?  ``anatthasa.mhitaa, bho gotama''.

[03] ``pa~nca ^a^M2.0419^ea^ ^a^P2.0203^ea^ kho ime, maa.nava, niivara.naa.  katame pa~nca? kaamacchandaniivara.na.m, byaapaadaniivara.na.m, thiinamiddhaniivara.na.m  uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m, vicikicchaaniivara.na.m -- ime kho, maa.nava, pa~nca  niivara.naa. imehi kho maa.nava, pa~ncahi niivara.nehi braahma.no  pokkharasaati opama~n~no subhagavaniko aavuto nivuto ophu.to {ovuto (sii0),  ophuto (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}  pariyonaddho. so vata uttarimanussadhammaa  alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m ~nassati vaa dakkhati vaa sacchi vaa  karissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 468^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^a^T2.0659^ea^ kho ime, maa.nava, kaamagu.naa. katame  pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa  kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa ^a^V2.0427^ea^   gandhaa... jivhaa vi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa  kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa -- ime kho, maa.nava,  pa~nca kaamagu.naa. imehi kho, maa.nava, pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi braahma.no  pokkharasaati opama~n~no subhagavaniko gathito mucchito ajjhopanno  anaadiinavadassaavii anissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati. so vata  uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m ~nassati vaa dakkhati  vaa sacchi vaa karissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maa.nava, ya.m vaa ti.naka.t.thupaadaana.m pa.ticca  aggi.m jaaleyya ya.m vaa nissa.t.thati.naka.t.thupaadaana.m aggi.m jaaleyya, katamo  nu khvaassa aggi accimaa ceva va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro caa''ti?  ``sace ta.m, bho gotama, .thaana.m nissa.t.thati.naka.t.thupaadaana.m aggi.m jaaletu.m,  svaassa aggi accimaa ceva va.n.navaa ca pabhassaro caa''ti.  ``a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, maa.nava, anavakaaso ya.m nissa.t.thati.naka.t.thupaadaana.m  aggi.m jaaleyya a~n~natra iddhimataa. seyyathaapi, maa.nava,  ti.naka.t.thupaadaana.m pa.ticca aggi jalati tathuupamaaha.m, maa.nava, ima.m piiti.m  vadaami yaaya.m piiti pa~nca ^a^P2.0204^ea^ kaamagu.ne pa.ticca.  seyyathaapi, maa.nava, nissa.t.thati.naka.t.thupaadaano {nissa.t.thati.naka.t.thupaadaana.m pa.ticca (sii0  pii0 ka0)} aggi jalati tathuupamaaha.m,  maa.nava ^a^T2.0660^ea^, ima.m piiti.m vadaami yaaya.m piiti a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra  akusalehi dhammehi.

[03] ``katamaa ca, maa.nava, piiti a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra  akusalehi dhammehi? idha, maa.nava, bhikkhu vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho,  maa.nava, piiti a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra akusalehi ^a^M2.0420^ea^ dhammehi. puna  capara.m, maa.nava, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, maa.nava, piiti a~n~natreva kaamehi  a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehi.

[03] 469^b^.^eb^ ``ye te, maa.nava, braahma.naa pa~nca dhamme  pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya kusalassa aaraadhanaaya, katamettha {kamettha (ka0  sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}  braahma.naa dhamma.m mahapphalatara.m pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya kusalassa  aaraadhanaayaa''ti? ``yeme, bho gotama, braahma.naa pa~nca dhamme  pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya ^a^V2.0428^ea^ kusalassa aaraadhanaaya, caagamettha  braahma.naa dhamma.m mahapphalatara.m pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya kusalassa  aaraadhanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki ma~n~nasi, maa.nava, idha a~n~natarassa braahma.nassa  mahaaya~n~no paccupa.t.thito assa. atha dve braahma.naa aagaccheyyu.m --  `itthannaamassa braahma.nassa mahaaya~n~na.m anubhavissaamaa'ti. tatrekassa {tatthekassa  (pii0)}  braahma.nassa evamassa -- `aho vata! ahameva labheyya.m bhattagge  aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da.m, na a~n~no braahma.no labheyya bhattagge  aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da'nti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, maa.nava ^a^T2.0661^ea^,  vijjati ya.m a~n~no braahma.no labheyya bhattagge aggaasana.m aggodaka.m  aggapi.n.da.m, na so braahma.no labheyya bhattagge aggaasana.m aggodaka.m  aggapi.n.da.m. `a~n~no braahma.no labhati bhattagge aggaasana.m aggodaka.m  aggapi.n.da.m, naaha.m labhaami bhattagge aggaasana.m aggodaka.m aggapi.n.da'nti  -- iti so ^a^P2.0205^ea^ kupito hoti anattamano. imassa  pana, maa.nava, braahma.naa ki.m vipaaka.m pa~n~napentii''ti? ``na khvettha,  bho gotama, braahma.naa eva.m daana.m denti -- `iminaa paro kupito hotu  anattamano'ti. atha khvettha braahma.naa anukampaajaatika.myeva {anukampajaatika.myeva  (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} daana.m  dentii''ti. ``eva.m sante, kho, maa.nava, braahma.naana.m ida.m cha.t.tha.m  pu~n~nakiriyavatthu hoti -- yadida.m anukampaajaatika''nti. ``eva.m  sante, bho gotama, braahma.naana.m ida.m cha.t.tha.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu hoti --  yadida.m anukampaajaatika''nti.

[03] ``ye te, maa.nava, braahma.naa pa~nca dhamme pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa  kiriyaaya kusalassa aaraadhanaaya, ime tva.m pa~nca dhamme kattha bahula.m  samanupassasi -- gaha.t.thesu vaa pabbajitesu vaa''ti? ``yeme, bho  gotama, braahma.naa pa~nca dhamme pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya kusalassa  aaraadhanaaya, imaaha.m pa~nca dhamme pabbajitesu ^a^M2.0421^ea^ bahula.m samanupassaami appa.m  gaha.t.thesu. gaha.t.tho hi, bho gotama, maha.t.tho mahaakicco mahaadhikara.no  mahaasamaarambho, na satata.m samita.m saccavaadii ^a^T2.0662^ea^ hoti; pabbajito kho  pana, bho gotama, appa.t.tho appakicco appaadhikara.no appasamaarambho,  satata.m samita.m saccavaadii hoti. gaha.t.tho hi, bho gotama, maha.t.tho  mahaakicco mahaadhikara.no mahaasamaarambho na satata.m samita.m tapassii  hoti... brahmacaarii hoti... sajjhaayabahulo hoti... caagabahulo  hoti; pabbajito kho pana, bho gotama, appa.t.tho appakicco  appaadhikara.no appasamaarambho satata.m samita.m tapassii hoti...  brahmacaarii hoti... sajjhaayabahulo hoti... caagabahulo ^a^V2.0429^ea^ hoti. yeme,  bho gotama, braahma.naa pa~nca dhamme pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya  kusalassa aaraadhanaaya, imaaha.m pa~nca dhamme pabbajitesu bahula.m  samanupassaami appa.m gaha.t.thesuu''ti.

[03] ``ye te, maa.nava, braahma.naa pa~nca dhamme pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa  kiriyaaya kusalassa aaraadhanaaya cittassaaha.m ete parikkhaare ^a^P2.0206^ea^  vadaami -- yadida.m citta.m avera.m abyaabajjha.m tassa bhaavanaaya.  idha, maa.nava, bhikkhu saccavaadii hoti. so `saccavaadiimhii'ti  labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m. ya.m  ta.m kusaluupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m, cittassaaha.m eta.m parikkhaara.m vadaami --  yadida.m citta.m avera.m abyaabajjha.m tassa bhaavanaaya. idha, maa.nava,  bhikkhu tapassii hoti...pe0... brahmacaarii hoti...pe0...  sajjhaayabahulo hoti...pe0... caagabahulo hoti. so  `caagabahulomhii'ti labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati  dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m. ya.m ta.m kusaluupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m, cittassaaha.m  eta.m parikkhaara.m vadaami -- yadida.m citta.m avera.m abyaabajjha.m tassa  bhaavanaaya. ye ^a^T2.0663^ea^ te maa.nava, braahma.naa, pa~nca dhamme pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa  kiriyaaya kusalassa aaraadhanaaya, cittassaaha.m ete parikkhaare vadaami  -- yadida.m citta.m avera.m abyaabajjha.m tassa bhaavanaayaa''ti.
[03] 470^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bho gotama -- `sama.no gotamo brahmaana.m  sahabyataaya magga.m jaanaatii'''ti.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maa.nava, aasanne ito na.lakaaragaamo, na  yito duure na.lakaaragaamo''ti?
[03] ``eva.m, bho, aasanne ito na.lakaaragaamo ^a^M2.0422^ea^, na yito duure  na.lakaaragaamo''ti.

[03] ``ta.m, ki.m ma~n~nasi maa.nava, idhassa puriso na.lakaaragaame  jaatavaddho {jaatava.d.dho (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}; tamena.m na.lakaaragaamato taavadeva avasa.ta.m  {apasakka.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} na.lakaaragaamassa  magga.m puccheyyu.m; siyaa nu kho, maa.nava, tassa ^a^V2.0430^ea^ purisassa na.lakaaragaame  jaatavaddhassa na.lakaaragaamassa magga.m pu.t.thassa dandhaayitatta.m vaa  vitthaayitatta.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
[03] ``ta.m kissa hetu''?

[03] ``amu hi, bho gotama, puriso na.lakaaragaame jaatavaddho.  tassa sabbaaneva na.lakaaragaamassa maggaani suviditaanii''ti.  ``siyaa nu kho, maa.nava, tassa purisassa na.lakaaragaame jaatavaddhassa  na.lakaaragaamassa magga.m pu.t.thassa dandhaayitatta.m ^a^P2.0207^ea^ vaa  vitthaayitatta.m vaati, na tveva tathaagatassa brahmaloka.m vaa  brahmalokagaamini.m vaa pa.tipada.m pu.t.thassa dandhaayitatta.m vaa vitthaayitatta.m vaa.  brahmaana~ncaaha.m, maa.nava, pajaanaami brahmaloka~nca brahmalokagaamini~nca  pa.tipada.m; yathaapa.tipanno ca brahmaloka.m upapanno ta~nca pajaanaamii''ti ^a^T2.0664^ea^.
[03] ``suta.m meta.m, bho gotama -- `sama.no gotamo brahmaana.m  sahabyataaya magga.m desetii'ti. saadhu me bhava.m gotamo brahmaana.m  sahabyataaya magga.m desetuu''ti.
[03] ``tena hi, maa.nava, su.naahi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi,  bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m bho''ti kho subho maa.navo todeyyaputto  bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 471^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ca, maa.nava, brahmaana.m sahabyataaya  maggo? idha, maa.nava, bhikkhu mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m  pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m; iti  uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena  cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa  viharati. eva.m bhaavitaaya kho, maa.nava, mettaaya cetovimuttiyaa ya.m  pamaa.nakata.m kamma.m na ta.m tatraavasissati, na ta.m tatraavati.t.thati.  seyyathaapi, maa.nava, balavaa sa"nkhadhamo appakasireneva caatuddisaa  vi~n~naapeyya {evameva kho maa.nava eva.m bhaavitaaya mettaaya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0  dii0 ni0 1.556) tathaapi idha paa.thoyeva upamaaya sa.msandiyamaano  paripu.n.no viya dissati}; evameva kho, maa.nava...pe0... eva.m bhaavitaaya kho,  maa.nava, mettaaya {evameva kho maa.nava eva.m bhaavitaaya mettaaya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0 dii0 ni0 1.556) tathaapi idha paa.thoyeva upamaaya sa.msandiyamaano  paripu.n.no viya dissati} cetovimuttiyaa ya.m pamaa.nakata.m ^a^V2.0431^ea^ kamma.m na ta.m  tatraavasissati, na ta.m tatraavati.t.thati. ayampi kho, maa.nava, brahmaana.m  sahabyataaya maggo. ``puna ^a^M2.0423^ea^ capara.m, maa.nava, bhikkhu karu.naasahagatena  cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena  cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa  catuttha.m; iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m  upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena ^a^T2.0665^ea^ mahaggatena appamaa.nena ^a^P2.0208^ea^  averena abyaabajjhena pharitvaa viharati. eva.m bhaavitaaya  kho, maa.nava, upekkhaaya cetovimuttiyaa ya.m pamaa.nakata.m kamma.m na ta.m  tatraavasissati, na ta.m tatraavati.t.thati. seyyathaapi, maa.nava, balavaa  sa"nkhadhamo appakasireneva caatuddisaa vi~n~naapeyya; evameva kho,  maa.nava...pe0... eva.m bhaavitaaya kho, maa.nava, upekkhaaya  cetovimuttiyaa ya.m pamaa.nakata.m kamma.m na ta.m tatraavasissati, na ta.m  tatraavati.t.thati. ayampi kho, maa.nava, brahmaana.m sahabyataaya maggo''ti.

[03] 472^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama!  seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa  vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m  dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti -- evameva.m bhotaa  gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m  sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo  dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m. handa, ca daani maya.m, bho  gotama, gacchaama; bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassadaani  tva.m, maa.nava, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho subho maa.navo  todeyyaputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa  bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] tena kho pana samayena jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no sabbasetena  va.lavaabhirathena {va.labhiirathena (sii0)} saavatthiyaa niyyaati divaa divassa. addasaa kho  jaa.nusso.ni ^a^T2.0666^ea^ braahma.no subha.m maa.nava.m todeyyaputta.m duuratova aagacchanta.m.  disvaana subha.m maa.nava.m todeyyaputta.m etadavoca -- ``handa, kuto nu  bhava.m bhaaradvaajo aagacchati divaa divassaa''ti? ``ito hi kho  aha.m, bho ^a^M2.0424^ea^, aagacchaami sama.nassa gotamassa santikaa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m  ma~n~nasi, bhava.m bhaaradvaajo, sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m pa.n.dito  ma~n~neti''? ``ko ^a^P2.0209^ea^ caaha.m, bho, ko ca sama.nassa  gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m ^a^V2.0432^ea^ jaanissaami? sopi nuunassa taadisova  yo sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m jaaneyyaa''ti. ``u.laaraaya  khalu, bhava.m bhaaradvaajo, sama.na.m gotama.m pasa.msaaya pasa.msatii''ti. ``ko  caaha.m, bho, ko ca sama.na.m gotama.m pasa.msissaami? pasatthapasatthova so  bhava.m gotamo se.t.tho devamanussaana.m. ye cime, bho, braahma.naa pa~nca dhamme  pa~n~napenti pu~n~nassa kiriyaaya kusalassa aaraadhanaaya; cittassete  sama.no gotamo parikkhaare vadeti -- yadida.m citta.m avera.m abyaabajjha.m  tassa bhaavanaayaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no sabbasetaa va.lavaabhirathaa  orohitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m  pa.naametvaa udaana.m udaanesi -- ``laabhaa ra~n~no pasenadissa  kosalassa, suladdhalaabhaa ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa yassa vijite  tathaagato viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho''ti.
[06] subhasutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0667^ea^ ^a^V2.0433^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu  caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. tena kho pana samayena  dhana~njaanii {dhaana~njaanii (sii0 pii0)} naama braahma.nii ca~ncalikappe {ma.n.dalakappe  (sii0), paccalakappe (syaa0 ka.m0), ca.n.dalakappe (pii0)} pa.tivasati abhippasannaa buddhe ca  dhamme ca sa"nghe ca. atha kho dhana~njaanii braahma.nii upakkhalitvaa  tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaanesi -- ``namo tassa bhagavato arahato  sammaasambuddhassa. namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa.  namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassaa''ti ^a^P2.0210^ea^.

[03] tena kho pana samayena sa"ngaaravo naama maa.navo ca~ncalikappe  pa.tivasati ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m  itihaasapa~ncamaana.m ^a^M2.0425^ea^, padako, veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu  anavayo. assosi kho sa"ngaaravo maa.navo dhana~njaaniyaa braahma.niyaa  eva.m vaaca.m bhaasamaanaaya. sutvaa dhana~njaani.m braahma.ni.m etadavoca --  ``avabhuutaava aya.m {avabhuutaa caya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dhana~njaanii braahma.nii, parabhuutaava aya.m  {paraabhuutaa caya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dhana~njaanii  braahma.nii, vijjamaanaana.m (tevijjaana.m) {( ) sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu  natthi} braahma.naana.m, atha ca pana tassa  mu.n.dakassa sama.nakassa va.n.na.m bhaasissatii''ti {bhaasatiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii)}. ``na hi pana tva.m,  taata bhadramukha, tassa bhagavato siilapa~n~naa.na.m jaanaasi. sace tva.m,  taata bhadramukha, tassa bhagavato siilapa~n~naa.na.m jaaneyyaasi, na tva.m, taata  bhadramukha, ta.m bhagavanta.m akkositabba.m paribhaasitabba.m ma~n~neyyaasii''ti.  ``tena hi, bhoti, yadaa sama.no gotamo ca~ncalikappa.m anuppatto  hoti atha ^a^T2.0668^ea^ me aaroceyyaasii''ti. ``eva.m, bhadramukhaa''ti kho  dhana~njaanii braahma.nii sa"ngaaravassa maa.navassa paccassosi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa kosalesu anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena  ca~ncalikappa.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa ca~ncalikappe viharati  todeyyaana.m braahma.naana.m ambavane. assosi kho dhana~njaanii braahma.nii --  ``bhagavaa kira ca~ncalikappa.m anuppatto, ca~ncalikappe viharati  todeyyaana.m braahma.naana.m ambavane''ti. atha kho dhana~njaanii braahma.nii  yena sa"ngaaravo maa.navo tenupasa"nkami ^a^V2.0434^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa sa"ngaarava.m maa.nava.m  etadavoca -- ``aya.m, taata bhadramukha, so bhagavaa ca~ncalikappa.m  anuppatto, ca~ncalikappe viharati todeyyaana.m braahma.naana.m ambavane.  yassadaani, taata bhadramukha, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti.

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m, bho''ti kho sa"ngaaravo maa.navo  dhana~njaaniyaa braahma.niyaa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami;  upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m ^a^P2.0211^ea^  saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m  nisinno kho sa"ngaaravo maa.navo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``santi  kho, bho gotama, eke sama.nabraahma.naa  di.t.thadhammaabhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa, aadibrahmacariya.m pa.tijaananti.  tatra, bho gotama, ye ^a^M2.0426^ea^ te sama.nabraahma.naa  di.t.thadhammaabhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa, aadibrahmacariya.m pa.tijaananti, tesa.m  bhava.m gotamo katamo''ti? ``di.t.thadhammaabhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaana.m,  aadibrahmacariya.m pa.tijaanantaanampi ^a^T2.0669^ea^ kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, vematta.m vadaami.  santi, bhaaradvaaja, eke sama.nabraahma.naa anussavikaa. te anussavena  di.t.thadhammaabhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa, aadibrahmacariya.m pa.tijaananti;  seyyathaapi braahma.naa tevijjaa. santi pana, bhaaradvaaja, eke  sama.nabraahma.naa kevala.m saddhaamattakena di.t.thadhammaabhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa,  aadibrahmacariya.m pa.tijaananti; seyyathaapi takkii viima.msii. santi,  bhaaradvaaja, eke sama.nabraahma.naa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu saama.myeva  dhamma.m abhi~n~naaya di.t.thadhammaabhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa, aadibrahmacariya.m  pa.tijaananti. tatra, bhaaradvaaja, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa pubbe  ananussutesu dhammesu saama.myeva dhamma.m abhi~n~naaya  di.t.thadhammaabhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa, aadibrahmacariya.m pa.tijaananti,  tesaahamasmi. tadaminaapeta.m, bhaaradvaaja, pariyaayena veditabba.m, yathaa ye  te sama.nabraahma.naa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu saama.myeva dhamma.m abhi~n~naaya  di.t.thadhammaabhi~n~naavosaanapaaramippattaa, aadibrahmacariya.m pa.tijaananti,  tesaahamasmi.

[03] 475^b^.^eb^ ``idha me, bhaaradvaaja, pubbeva sambodhaa  anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `sambaadho  gharaavaaso rajaapatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m  ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m  caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani  acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^T2.0670^ea^ pabbajeyya'nti. so kho aha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, aparena ^a^P2.0212^ea^ samayena daharova samaano  susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato ^a^V2.0435^ea^ pa.thamena vayasaa akaamakaana.m  maataapituuna.m assumukhaana.m rudantaana.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani  vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji.m. so eva.m  pabbajito samaano ki.mkusalagavesii anuttara.m santivarapada.m pariyesamaano  yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m  etadavoca.m -- `icchaamaha.m, aavuso kaalaama, imasmi.m dhammavinaye  brahmacariya.m caritu'nti. eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaaja, aa.laaro kaalaamo ma.m  etadavoca -- `viharataayasmaa. taadiso aya.m dhammo yattha vi~n~nuu  puriso nacirasseva saka.m aacariyaka.m saya.m ^a^M2.0427^ea^ abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja vihareyyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, nacirasseva  khippameva ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.ni.m. so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja,  taavatakeneva o.t.thapahatamattena lapitalaapanamattena `~naa.navaada~nca vadaami,  theravaada~nca jaanaami, passaamii'ti ca pa.tijaanaami, aha~nceva a~n~ne ca.  tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `na kho aa.laaro kaalaamo  ima.m dhamma.m kevala.m saddhaamattakena saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja  viharaamiiti pavedeti; addhaa aa.laaro kaalaamo ima.m dhamma.m jaana.m passa.m  viharatii'ti.

[03] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhaaradvaaja, yena aa.laaro kaalaamo tenupasa"nkami.m;  upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca.m -- `kittaavataa no, aavuso  kaalaama, ima.m dhamma.m ^a^T2.0671^ea^ saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti  pavedesii'ti? eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaaja, aa.laaro kaalaamo  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m pavedesi. tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi --  `na kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi saddhaa, mayha.mpatthi saddhaa; na  kho aa.laarasseva kaalaamassa atthi viiriya.m...pe0... sati...  samaadhi... pa~n~naa, mayha.mpatthi pa~n~naa. ya.mnuunaaha.m ya.m dhamma.m aa.laaro  kaalaamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedeti  tassa dhammassa sacchikiriyaaya padaheyya'nti. so kho aha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja vihaasi.m. atha khvaaha.m, bhaaradvaaja, yena aa.laaro kaalaamo  tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa aa.laara.m kaalaama.m etadavoca.m -- `ettaavataa  no, aavuso kaalaama, ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja pavedesii'ti? `ettaavataa kho aha.m, aavuso, ima.m dhamma.m  saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemii'ti. `ahampi kho,  aavuso, ettaavataa ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja  viharaamii'ti. `laabhaa no, aavuso, suladdha.m no, aavuso, ye maya.m  aayasmanta.m taadisa.m sabrahmacaari.m passaama. iti yaaha.m dhamma.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedemi ta.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi; ya.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi tamaha.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja ^a^T2.0672^ea^ pavedemi. iti yaaha.m dhamma.m jaanaami ^a^V2.0436^ea^ ta.m tva.m  dhamma.m jaanaasi, ya.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi tamaha.m dhamma.m jaanaami ^a^M2.0428^ea^. iti  yaadiso aha.m taadiso tuva.m, yaadiso tuva.m taadiso aha.m. ehi  daani, aavuso, ubhova santaa ima.m ga.na.m pariharaamaa'ti. iti kho,  bhaaradvaaja, aa.laaro kaalaamo aacariyo me samaano attano antevaasi.m  ma.m samaana.m attanaa samasama.m .thapesi, u.laaraaya ca ma.m puujaaya puujesi.  tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `naaya.m dhammo nibbidaaya na  viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na  nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, yaavadeva aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupapattiyaa'ti. so  kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, ta.m dhamma.m anala"nkaritvaa tasmaa dhammaa nibbijja  apakkami.m.

[03] 476^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, ki.mkusalagavesii  anuttara.m santivarapada.m pariyesamaano yena udako raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m;  upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `icchaamaha.m, aavuso {passa ma0 ni0 1.278  paasaraasisutte},  imasmi.m dhammavinaye brahmacariya.m caritu'nti. eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaaja,  udako raamaputto ma.m etadavoca -- `viharataayasmaa. taadiso aya.m  dhammo yattha vi~n~nuu puriso nacirasseva saka.m aacariyaka.m saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihareyyaa'ti. so kho aha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, nacirasseva khippameva ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.ni.m. so kho  aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, taavatakeneva o.t.thapahatamattena lapitalaapanamattena  `~naa.navaada~nca vadaami, theravaada~nca jaanaami, passaamii'ti ca  pa.tijaanaami, aha~nceva a~n~ne ca ^a^T2.0673^ea^. tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi  -- `na kho raamo ima.m dhamma.m kevala.m saddhaamattakena saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesi; addhaa raamo ima.m dhamma.m  jaana.m passa.m vihaasii'ti. atha khvaaha.m, bhaaradvaaja, yena udako  raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m --  `kittaavataa no, aavuso, raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja viharaamiiti pavedesii'ti? eva.m vutte, bhaaradvaaja, udako  raamaputto nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m pavedesi. tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja,  etadahosi -- `na kho raamasseva ahosi saddhaa, mayha.mpatthi saddhaa;  na kho raamasseva ahosi viiriya.m...pe0... sati... samaadhi...  pa~n~naa, mayha.mpatthi pa~n~naa. ya.mnuunaaha.m ya.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa  sacchikatvaa upasampajja ^a^M2.0429^ea^ viharaamiiti pavedesi tassa dhammassa  sacchikiriyaaya padaheyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, nacirasseva  khippameva ta.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi.m.

[03] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhaaradvaaja, yena udako raamaputto tenupasa"nkami.m;  upasa"nkamitvaa udaka.m raamaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `ettaavataa no, aavuso,  raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja ^a^V2.0437^ea^ pavedesii'ti?  `ettaavataa kho, aavuso, raamo ima.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa  upasampajja pavedesii'ti. `ahampi kho, aavuso, ettaavataa ima.m dhamma.m  saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamii'ti. `laabhaa no,  aavuso, suladdha.m ^a^T2.0674^ea^ no, aavuso, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m taadisa.m sabrahmacaari.m  passaama. iti ya.m dhamma.m raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja  pavedesi ta.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi;  ya.m tva.m dhamma.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharasi ta.m dhamma.m  raamo saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja pavedesi. iti ya.m  dhamma.m raamo abhi~n~naasi ta.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi, ya.m tva.m dhamma.m jaanaasi  ta.m dhamma.m raamo abhi~n~naasi. iti yaadiso raamo ahosi taadiso  tuva.m, yaadiso tuva.m taadiso raamo ahosi. ehi daani, aavuso,  tuva.m ima.m ga.na.m pariharaa'ti. iti kho, bhaaradvaaja, udako raamaputto  sabrahmacaarii me samaano aacariya.t.thaane ma.m .thapesi, u.laaraaya ca ma.m  puujaaya puujesi. tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `naaya.m dhammo  nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na  sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, yaavadeva  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupapattiyaa'ti. so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, ta.m  dhamma.m anala"nkaritvaa tasmaa dhammaa nibbijja apakkami.m.

[03] 477^b^.^eb^ ``so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, ki.mkusalagavesii  anuttara.m santivarapada.m pariyesamaano magadhesu anupubbena caarika.m  caramaano yena uruve.laa senaanigamo tadavasari.m. tatthaddasa.m rama.niiya.m  bhuumibhaaga.m, paasaadika~nca vanasa.n.da.m, nadi~nca sandanti.m setaka.m supatittha.m  rama.niiya.m, samantaa ^a^T2.0675^ea^ ca gocaragaama.m. tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi  -- `rama.niiyo vata, bho, bhuumibhaago, paasaadiko ca vanasa.n.do, nadii  ca sandati setakaa supatitthaa rama.niiyaa, samantaa ca gocaragaamo.  ala.m vatida.m kulaputtassa padhaanatthikassa padhaanaayaa'ti ^a^M2.0430^ea^. so kho aha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, tattheva nisiidi.m -- `alamida.m padhaanaayaa'ti. apissu ma.m,  bhaaradvaaja, tisso upamaa pa.tibha.msu anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhaaradvaaja, alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m udake nikkhitta.m.  atha puriso aagaccheyya uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya -- `aggi.m  abhinibbattessaami, tejo paatukarissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi,  bhaaradvaaja, api nu so puriso amu.m alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m udake  nikkhitta.m uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya abhimanthento aggi.m abhinibbatteyya,  tejo paatukareyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama. ta.m kissa  hetu? adu~nhi, bho gotama, alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m, ta~nca ^a^V2.0438^ea^ pana udake  nikkhitta.m; yaavadeva ca pana so puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa  bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhaaradvaaja, ye hi keci sama.naa  vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayena ceva cittena ca kaamehi avuupaka.t.thaa viharanti,  yo ca nesa.m kaamesu kaamacchando kaamasneho kaamamucchaa kaamapipaasaa  kaamapari.laaho so ca ajjhatta.m na suppahiino hoti na  suppa.tippassaddho, opakkamikaa cepi te bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa dukkhaa  tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, abhabbaava te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya  anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. no capi te ^a^T2.0676^ea^ bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa  opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti abhabbaava  te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. aya.m kho ma.m,  bhaaradvaaja, pa.thamaa upamaa pa.tibhaasi anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa.

[03] 478^b^.^eb^ ``aparaapi kho ma.m, bhaaradvaaja, dutiyaa upamaa  pa.tibhaasi anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa.  seyyathaapi, bhaaradvaaja, alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m aarakaa udakaa thale  nikkhitta.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya -- `aggi.m  abhinibbattessaami, tejo paatukarissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi,  bhaaradvaaja, api nu so puriso amu.m alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m aarakaa udakaa  thale nikkhitta.m uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya abhimanthento aggi.m  abhinibbatteyya tejo paatukareyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama.  ta.m kissa hetu? adu~nhi, bho gotama, alla.m ka.t.tha.m sasneha.m,  ki~ncaapi aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta.m; yaavadeva ca pana so  puriso kilamathassa vighaatassa ^a^M2.0431^ea^ bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho,  bhaaradvaaja, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayena ceva cittena  ca kaamehi vuupaka.t.thaa viharanti, yo ca nesa.m kaamesu kaamacchando  kaamasneho kaamamucchaa kaamapipaasaa kaamapari.laaho so ca ajjhatta.m na  suppahiino hoti na suppa.tippassaddho, opakkamikaa cepi te bhonto  sama.nabraahma.naa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, abhabbaava  te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. no cepi te ^a^T2.0677^ea^ bhonto  sama.nabraahma.naa opakkamikaa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa  vedayanti, abhabbaava te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya.  aya.m kho ma.m, bhaaradvaaja, dutiyaa upamaa pa.tibhaasi anacchariyaa pubbe  assutapubbaa.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ ``aparaapi ^a^V2.0439^ea^ kho ma.m, bhaaradvaaja, tatiyaa upamaa  pa.tibhaasi anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa.  seyyathaapi, bhaaradvaaja, sukkha.m ka.t.tha.m ko.laapa.m aarakaa udakaa  thale nikkhitta.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya --  `aggi.m abhinibbattessaami, tejo paatukarissaamii'ti. ta.m ki.m  ma~n~nasi, bhaaradvaaja, api nu so puriso amu.m sukkha.m ka.t.tha.m ko.laapa.m  aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta.m uttaraara.ni.m aadaaya abhimanthento aggi.m  abhinibbatteyya, tejo paatukareyyaa''ti? ``eva.m bho gotama.  ta.m kissa hetu? adu~nhi, bho gotama, sukkha.m ka.t.tha.m ko.laapa.m,  ta~nca pana aarakaa udakaa thale nikkhitta''nti. ``evameva kho,  bhaaradvaaja, ye hi keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa kaayena ceva cittena  ca kaamehi vuupaka.t.thaa viharanti, yo ca nesa.m kaamesu kaamacchando  kaamasneho kaamamucchaa kaamapipaasaa kaamapari.laaho so ca ajjhatta.m  suppahiino hoti suppa.tippassaddho, opakkamikaa cepi te bhonto  sama.nabraahma.naa dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, bhabbaava  te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. no cepi te bhonto  sama.nabraahma.naa opakkamikaa ^a^T2.0678^ea^ dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa  vedayanti, bhabbaava te ~naa.naaya dassanaaya anuttaraaya sambodhaaya. aya.m  kho ma.m, bhaaradvaaja, tatiyaa upamaa pa.tibhaasi anacchariyaa pubbe  assutapubbaa. imaa kho ma.m, bhaaradvaaja, tisso upamaa pa.tibha.msu  anacchariyaa pubbe assutapubbaa.

[03] 480^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^M2.0432^ea^ mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi --  `ya.mnuunaaha.m dantebhidantamaadhaaya, jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca, cetasaa citta.m  abhinigga.nheyya.m abhinippii.leyya.m abhisantaapeyya'nti. so kho aha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, dantebhidantamaadhaaya, jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca, cetasaa citta.m  abhinigga.nhaami abhinippii.lemi abhisantaapemi. tassa mayha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, dantebhidantamaadhaaya, jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca, cetasaa citta.m  abhinigga.nhato abhinippii.layato abhisantaapayato kacchehi sedaa  muccanti. seyyathaapi, bhaaradvaaja, balavaa puriso dubbalatara.m purisa.m  siise vaa gahetvaa khandhe vaa gahetvaa abhinigga.nheyya abhinippii.leyya  abhisantaapeyya, evameva kho me, bhaaradvaaja, dantebhidantamaadhaaya,  jivhaaya taalu.m aahacca, cetasaa citta.m abhinigga.nhato abhinippii.layato  abhisantaapayato kacchehi sedaa muccanti. aaraddha.m kho pana me,  bhaaradvaaja, viiriya.m hoti asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa; saaraddho  ca pana me kaayo hoti appa.tippassaddho, teneva dukkhappadhaanena  padhaanaabhitunnassa sato.

[03] 481^b^.^eb^ ``tassa ^a^T2.0679^ea^ ^a^V2.0440^ea^ mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi --  `ya.mnuunaaha.m appaa.naka.myeva jhaana.m jhaayeyya'nti. so kho aha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, mukhato ca naasato ca assaasapassaase uparundhi.m. tassa  mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, mukhato ca naasato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu  ka.n.nasotehi vaataana.m nikkhamantaana.m adhimatto saddo hoti.  seyyathaapi naama kammaaragaggariyaa dhamamaanaaya adhimatto saddo hoti,  evameva kho me, bhaaradvaaja, mukhato ca naasato ca assaasapassaasesu  uparuddhesu ka.n.nasotehi vaataana.m nikkhamantaana.m adhimatto saddo hoti.  aaraddha.m kho pana me, bhaaradvaaja, viiriya.m hoti asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa  sati asammu.t.thaa; saaraddho ca pana me kaayo hoti appa.tippassaddho,  teneva dukkhappadhaanena padhaanaabhitunnassa sato.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m  appaa.naka.myeva jhaana.m jhaayeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, mukhato  ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaase uparundhi.m. tassa mayha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu  uparuddhesu adhimattaa vaataa muddhani uuhananti. seyyathaapi, bhaaradvaaja,  balavaa puriso, ti.nhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya, evameva kho  me, bhaaradvaaja, mukhato ca naasato ^a^M2.0433^ea^ ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu  uparuddhesu adhimattaa vaataa muddhani uuhananti. aaraddha.m kho pana me,  bhaaradvaaja, viiriya.m hoti asalliina.m ^a^T2.0680^ea^, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa; saaraddho  ca pana me kaayo hoti appa.tippassaddho, teneva dukkhappadhaanena  padhaanaabhitunnassa sato.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m  appaa.naka.myeva jhaana.m jhaayeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, mukhato  ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaase uparundhi.m. tassa mayha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu  uparuddhesu adhimattaa siise siisavedanaa honti. seyyathaapi, bhaaradvaaja,  balavaa puriso da.lhena varattakkha.n.dena siise siisave.tha.m dadeyya, evameva  kho, bhaaradvaaja, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu  uparuddhesu adhimattaa siise siisavedanaa honti. aaraddha.m kho pana me,  bhaaradvaaja, viiriya.m hoti asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa; saaraddho  ca pana me kaayo hoti appa.tippassaddho, teneva dukkhappadhaanena  padhaanaabhitunnassa sato.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m  appaa.naka.myeva jhaana.m jhaayeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, mukhato  ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaase uparundhi.m. tassa mayha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, mukhato ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu  uparuddhesu adhimattaa ^a^V2.0441^ea^ vaataa kucchi.m parikantanti. seyyathaapi  ^a^T2.0681^ea^, bhaaradvaaja, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa ti.nhena  govikantanena kucchi.m parikanteyya, evameva kho me, bhaaradvaaja, mukhato  ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu adhimattaa  vaataa kucchi.m parikantanti. aaraddha.m kho pana me, bhaaradvaaja, viiriya.m  hoti asalliina.m upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa; saaraddho ca pana me kaayo  hoti appa.tippassaddho, teneva dukkhappadhaanena padhaanaabhitunnassa sato.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m  appaa.naka.myeva jhaana.m jhaayeyya'nti. so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, mukhato  ca naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaase uparundhi.m. tassa mayha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, mukhato ca ^a^M2.0434^ea^ naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu  uparuddhesu adhimatto kaayasmi.m .daaho hoti. seyyathaapi, bhaaradvaaja, dve  balavanto purisaa dubbalatara.m purisa.m naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa a"ngaarakaasuyaa  santaapeyyu.m samparitaapeyyu.m, evameva kho me, bhaaradvaaja, mukhato ca  naasato ca ka.n.nato ca assaasapassaasesu uparuddhesu adhimatto  kaayasmi.m .daaho hoti. aaraddha.m kho pana me, bhaaradvaaja, viiriya.m hoti  asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, saaraddho ca pana me kaayo hoti  appa.tippassaddho, teneva dukkhappadhaanena padhaanaabhitunnassa sato.  apissu ma.m, bhaaradvaaja, devataa disvaa evamaaha.msu -- `kaala"nkato  sama.no gotamo'ti. ekaccaa ^a^T2.0682^ea^ devataa evamaaha.msu -- `na kaala"nkato  sama.no gotamo, api ca kaala"nkarotii'ti. ekaccaa devataa evamaaha.msu  -- `na kaala"nkato sama.no gotamo, naapi kaala"nkaroti; araha.m sama.no  gotamo, vihaarotveva so arahato evaruupo hotii'ti.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m sabbaso  aahaarupacchedaaya pa.tipajjeyya'nti. atha kho ma.m, bhaaradvaaja, devataa  upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- `maa kho tva.m, maarisa, sabbaso  aahaarupacchedaaya pa.tipajji. sace kho tva.m, maarisa, sabbaso  aahaarupacchedaaya pa.tipajjissasi, tassa te maya.m dibba.m oja.m  lomakuupehi ajjhohaaressaama. taaya tva.m yaapessasii'ti. tassa  mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `aha~nceva kho pana sabbaso  ajajjita.m pa.tijaaneyya.m, imaa ca me devataa dibba.m oja.m lomakuupehi  ajjhohaareyyu.m, taaya caaha.m yaapeyya.m. ta.m mamassa musaa'ti. so kho  aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, taa devataa paccaacikkhaami, `hala'nti vadaami.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m thoka.m thoka.m  aahaara.m aahaareyya.m pasata.m pasata.m ^a^V2.0442^ea^, yadi vaa muggayuusa.m, yadi vaa  kulatthayuusa.m, yadi vaa ka.laayayuusa.m, yadi vaa hare.nukayuusa'nti. so  kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, thoka.m thoka.m aahaara.m aahaaresi.m pasata.m pasata.m, yadi  vaa muggayuusa.m ^a^T2.0683^ea^, yadi vaa kulatthayuusa.m, yadi vaa ka.laayayuusa.m, yadi vaa  hare.nukayuusa.m. tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, thoka.m thoka.m aahaara.m ^a^M2.0435^ea^ aahaarayato  pasata.m pasata.m, yadi vaa muggayuusa.m, yadi vaa kulatthayuusa.m, yadi vaa  ka.laayayuusa.m, yadi vaa hare.nukayuusa.m, adhimattakasimaana.m patto kaayo  hoti. seyyathaapi naama aasiitikapabbaani vaa kaa.lapabbaani vaa,  evamevassu me a"ngapacca"ngaani bhavanti taayevappaahaarataaya; seyyathaapi  naama o.t.thapada.m, evamevassu me aanisada.m hoti taayevappaahaarataaya;  seyyathaapi naama va.t.tanaava.lii, evamevassu me pi.t.thika.n.tako u.n.nataavanato  hoti taayevappaahaarataaya; seyyathaapi naama jarasaalaaya gopaanasiyo  oluggaviluggaa bhavanti, evamevassu me phaasu.liyo oluggaviluggaa  bhavanti taayevappaahaarataaya; seyyathaapi naama gambhiire udapaane  udakataarakaa gambhiiragataa okkhaayikaa dissanti, evamevassu me  akkhikuupesu akkhitaarakaa gambhiiragataa okkhaayikaa dissanti  taayevappaahaarataaya; seyyathaapi naama tittakaalaabu aamakacchinno  vaataatapena sa.mphu.tito hoti sammilaato, evamevassu me siisacchavi  sa.mphu.titaa hoti sammilaataa taayevappaahaarataaya. so kho aha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, `udaracchavi.m parimasissaamii'ti pi.t.thika.n.taka.myeva  parigga.nhaami, `pi.t.thika.n.taka.m parimasissaamii'ti udaracchavi.myeva  parigga.nhaami; yaavassu me, bhaaradvaaja, udaracchavi pi.t.thika.n.taka.m alliinaa  hoti taayevappaahaarataaya. so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja ^a^T2.0684^ea^, `vacca.m vaa mutta.m  vaa karissaamii'ti tattheva avakujjo papataami taayevappaahaarataaya. so  kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, imameva kaaya.m assaasento paa.ninaa gattaani  anumajjaami. tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, paa.ninaa gattaani anumajjato  puutimuulaani lomaani kaayasmaa papatanti taayevappaahaarataaya. apissu  ma.m, bhaaradvaaja, manussaa disvaa evamaaha.msu -- `kaa.lo sama.no  gotamo'ti. ekacce manussaa evamaaha.msu -- `na kaa.lo sama.no  gotamo, saamo sama.no gotamo'ti. ekacce manussaa evamaaha.msu --  `na kaa.lo sama.no gotamo napi saamo, ma"nguracchavi sama.no  gotamo'ti; yaavassu me, bhaaradvaaja, taava parisuddho chaviva.n.no  pariyodaato upahato hoti taayevappaahaarataaya.

[03] 482^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `ye  kho keci atiitamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa opakkamikaa dukkhaa  tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayi.msu ^a^M2.0436^ea^, etaavaparama.m, nayito bhiyyo;  yepi hi keci anaagatamaddhaana.m sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa opakkamikaa  dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayissanti, etaavaparama.m, nayito  bhiyyo; yepi hi keci ^a^V2.0443^ea^ etarahi sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa opakkamikaa  dukkhaa tibbaa kharaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayanti, etaavaparama.m, nayito  bhiyyo. na kho panaaha.m imaaya ka.tukaaya dukkarakaarikaaya  adhigacchaami uttari manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m.  siyaa nu kho a~n~no maggo bodhaayaa'ti ^a^T2.0685^ea^? tassa mayha.m bhaaradvaaja,  etadahosi -- `abhijaanaami kho panaaha.m pitu sakkassa kammante  siitaaya jambucchaayaaya nisinno vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi  dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharitaa. siyaa nu kho eso maggo bodhaayaa'ti? tassa mayha.m,  bhaaradvaaja, sataanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m ahosi -- `eseva maggo  bodhaayaa'ti. tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `ki.m nu kho  aha.m tassa sukhassa bhaayaami ya.m ta.m sukha.m a~n~natreva kaamehi a~n~natra  akusalehi dhammehii'ti? tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `na  kho aha.m tassa sukhassa bhaayaami ya.m ta.m sukha.m a~n~natreva kaamehi  a~n~natra akusalehi dhammehii'ti.

[03] 483^b^.^eb^ ``tassa mayha.m, bhaaradvaaja, etadahosi -- `na  kho ta.m sukara.m sukha.m adhigantu.m eva.m adhimattakasimaana.m pattakaayena.  ya.mnuunaaha.m o.laarika.m aahaara.m aahaareyya.m odanakummaasa'nti. so kho  aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, o.laarika.m aahaara.m aahaaresi.m odanakummaasa.m. tena  kho pana ma.m, bhaaradvaaja, samayena pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu paccupa.t.thitaa  honti -- `ya.m kho sama.no gotamo dhamma.m adhigamissati ta.m no  aarocessatii'ti. yato kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, o.laarika.m aahaara.m  aahaaresi.m odanakummaasa.m, atha me te pa~ncavaggiyaa bhikkhuu nibbijja  pakkami.msu -- `baahulliko sama.no gotamo padhaanavibbhanto aavatto  baahullaayaa'ti.

[03] ``so kho aha.m, bhaaradvaaja, o.laarika.m aahaara.m aahaaretvaa bala.m ^a^T2.0686^ea^  gahetvaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m.  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m  avitakka.m avicaara.m ^a^M2.0437^ea^ samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m...   tatiya.m jhaana.m... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne  vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye ^a^V2.0444^ea^ .thite aane~njappatte  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so anekavihita.m  pubbenivaasa.m anussaraami, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi  jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m  anussaraami. aya.m kho me, bhaaradvaaja, rattiyaa pa.thame yaame pa.thamaa  vijjaa adhigataa, avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato,  aaloko uppanno; yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa  viharato.

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe  pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite  aane~njappatte sattaana.m ^a^T2.0687^ea^ cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so  dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passaami  cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate  yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaami...pe0... aya.m kho me, bhaaradvaaja,  rattiyaa majjhime yaame dutiyaa vijjaa adhigataa, avijjaa vihataa,  vijjaa uppannaa; tamo vihato, aaloko uppanno; yathaa ta.m appamattassa  aataapino pahitattassa viharato.

[01] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate  ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m  khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaamesi.m. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m  abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m  dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m; `ime aasavaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m  abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m  aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m. tassa me eva.m jaanato eva.m  passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccittha,  avijjaasavaapi ^a^M2.0438^ea^ citta.m vimuccittha. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m  ahosi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m  itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi.m. aya.m kho me, bhaaradvaaja, rattiyaa pacchime  yaame tatiyaa ^a^T2.0688^ea^ vijjaa adhigataa, avijjaa vihataa, vijjaa uppannaa; tamo  vihato, aaloko uppanno; yathaa ta.m appamattassa aataapino  pahitattassa viharato''ti.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, sa"ngaaravo maa.navo bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``a.t.thitavata.m {a.t.thita vata (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhoto gotamassa padhaana.m ahosi,  sappurisavata.m {sappurisa vata (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhoto gotamassa padhaana.m ahosi; yathaa ta.m arahato  sammaasambuddhassa. ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, atthi devaa''ti {adhidevaati (ka0)  eva.m sabbesu `atthi devaa'tipadesu}?  ``.thaanaso meta.m {kho paneta.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, bhaaradvaaja, vidita.m yadida.m -- adhidevaa''ti  {atthi devaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), atidevaati (?) eva.m  sabbesu `adhidevaa'tipadesu}. ``ki.m  nu kho, bho gotama, `atthi devaa'ti pu.t.tho samaano `.thaanaso meta.m,  bhaaradvaaja ^a^V2.0445^ea^, vidita.m yadida.m adhidevaa'ti vadesi. nanu, bho gotama,  eva.m sante tucchaa musaa hotii''ti? ```atthi devaa'ti, bhaaradvaaja, pu.t.tho  samaano `atthi devaa'ti ^a^P2.0213^ea^ yo vadeyya, `.thaanaso  me viditaa'ti {.thaanaso viditaa me viditaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), .thaanaso  me viditaa atidevaati (?)} yo vadeyya; atha khvettha vi~n~nunaa purisena eka.msena  ni.t.tha.m gantabba.m {gantu.m (ka0), gantu.m vaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} yadida.m -- `atthi devaa'''ti.   ``kissa pana me bhava.m  gotamo aadikeneva na byaakaasii''ti {gotamo aadikeneva byaakaasiiti (ka0),  gotamo atthi devaati na byaakaasiiti (?)}? ``uccena sammata.m kho eta.m,  bhaaradvaaja, lokasmi.m yadida.m -- `atthi devaa'''ti.

[03] 486^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, sa"ngaaravo maa.navo bhagavanta.m  etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama!  seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa  vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m  dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti -- evameva.m bhotaa  gotamena anekapariyaayena ^a^T2.0689^ea^ dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m ^a^M2.0439^ea^ bhavanta.m gotama.m  sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo  dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
